आटोपेन पटीयसा यदपि सा वाणी कवेरामुखे खेलन्ती प्रथते तथापि कुरुते नो सन्मनोरञ्जनम् । न स्याद्यावदमन्दसुन्दरगुणालङ्कारझाङ्कारितः स प्रस्यन्दिलसद्रसायनरसासारानुसारी रसः ॥ ४९ ॥ āṭopena paṭīyasā yadapi sā vāṇī kaverāmukhe khelantī prathate tathāpi kurute no sanmanorañjanam | na syādyāvadamandasundaraguṇālaṅkārajhāṅkāritaḥ sa prasyandilasadrasāyanarasāsārānusārī rasaḥ || 49 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मधुकणमुचो वाचो येषां विसारि रसं कम-प्युरुतरपरीपाकोद्रेकाः पिका इव बिभ्रति । त इह कवयो मन्ये नान्ये पुनर्दुरतिक्रम-क्रमकठिनतायोगाद्येषां विमुह्यति शेमुषी ॥ ५० ॥ madhukaṇamuco vāco yeṣāṃ visāri rasaṃ kama-pyurutaraparīpākodrekāḥ pikā iva bibhrati | ta iha kavayo manye nānye punarduratikrama-kramakaṭhinatāyogādyeṣāṃ vimuhyati śemuṣī || 50 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
परश्लोकान्स्तोकान्प्रतिदिवसमभ्यस्य ननु ये चतुष्पादीं कुर्युर्बहव इव ते सन्ति कवयः । अविच्छिन्नोद्गच्छज्जलधिलहरीरीतिसुहृदः सुहृद्या वैशद्यं दधति किल केषाञ्चन गिरः ॥ ५१ ॥ paraślokānstokānpratidivasamabhyasya nanu ye catuṣpādīṃ kuryurbahava iva te santi kavayaḥ | avicchinnodgacchajjaladhilaharīrītisuhṛdaḥ suhṛdyā vaiśadyaṃ dadhati kila keṣāñcana giraḥ || 51 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दिव्ये वाक्प्रसरक्रमे सुकवितुः प्रत्यक्षवाचस्पतेः श्रोतृस्तोतृकथासु कः खलु पटुः स्याच्चर्मचक्षुर्जनः । लभ्यः शेषफणी कुतोऽत्र स तु यश्चक्षुःसहस्रद्वये- नाकर्ण्यैनमथ स्तुतौ वितनुयाज्जिह्वासहस्रद्वयीम् ॥ ५२ ॥ divye vākprasarakrame sukavituḥ pratyakṣavācaspateḥ śrotṛstotṛkathāsu kaḥ khalu paṭuḥ syāccarmacakṣurjanaḥ | labhyaḥ śeṣaphaṇī kuto'tra sa tu yaścakṣuḥsahasradvaye- nākarṇyainamatha stutau vitanuyājjihvāsahasradvayīm || 52 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मेण्ठे स्वर्द्विरदाधिरोहिणि वशं याते सुबन्धौ विधेः शान्ते हन्त च भारवौ विघटिते बाणे विषादस्पृशः । वाग्देव्या विरमन्तु मन्तुविधुरा द्राग्दृष्टयश्चेष्टते शिष्टः कश्चन स प्रसादयति तां यद्वाणिसद्वाणिनी ॥ ५३ ॥ meṇṭhe svardviradādhirohiṇi vaśaṃ yāte subandhau vidheḥ śānte hanta ca bhāravau vighaṭite bāṇe viṣādaspṛśaḥ | vāgdevyā viramantu mantuvidhurā drāgdṛṣṭayaśceṣṭate śiṣṭaḥ kaścana sa prasādayati tāṃ yadvāṇisadvāṇinī || 53 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
त्रयस्त्रिंशत्कोट्यो दधतु विबुधा द्वेषकलुषां धियं नित्यं काव्ये त्रिदशचरिते के वयममी । भुवः खण्डेऽप्यस्मिन्बत स विधिनैकोऽपि विबुधो न सृष्टो यः काव्यं धृतविमलबुद्धिः कलयते ॥ ५४ ॥ trayastriṃśatkoṭyo dadhatu vibudhā dveṣakaluṣāṃ dhiyaṃ nityaṃ kāvye tridaśacarite ke vayamamī | bhuvaḥ khaṇḍe'pyasminbata sa vidhinaiko'pi vibudho na sṛṣṭo yaḥ kāvyaṃ dhṛtavimalabuddhiḥ kalayate || 54 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शब्दार्थानां परिषदखिला नित्यमाज्ञाविधेया दास्यं यस्य श्रयति पुरतो भ्रूलतास्पन्दनेन । स श्लाघ्यश्रीर्जगति कथितश्चक्रवर्ती कवीनां श्वेतच्छत्रच्छविरुपचिता किं च तस्यैव कीर्तिः ॥ ५५ ॥ śabdārthānāṃ pariṣadakhilā nityamājñāvidheyā dāsyaṃ yasya śrayati purato bhrūlatāspandanena | sa ślāghyaśrīrjagati kathitaścakravartī kavīnāṃ śvetacchatracchavirupacitā kiṃ ca tasyaiva kīrtiḥ || 55 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शैथिल्यस्पृशि संशयावहपदे क्षोदासहिष्णौ कवेः स्वैरं तत्र सरस्वती निविशते किं काव्यजीर्णौकसि । यच्छास्त्रक्रमशिल्पकारुभिरलम्भूष्णुप्रकर्षैः परै-र्न्यस्ताभिः कथमप्युपस्कृतिवचःस्थूणाभिरुत्तभ्यते ॥ ५६ ॥ śaithilyaspṛśi saṃśayāvahapade kṣodāsahiṣṇau kaveḥ svairaṃ tatra sarasvatī niviśate kiṃ kāvyajīrṇaukasi | yacchāstrakramaśilpakārubhiralambhūṣṇuprakarṣaiḥ parai-rnyastābhiḥ kathamapyupaskṛtivacaḥsthūṇābhiruttabhyate || 56 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वाचः काव्यरहस्यवर्त्मनि पराः पुष्णन्तु पङ्गूयितं तस्याः किं तु गिरः क्व नाम घटते रोधः पदस्फूर्तिषु । या सारस्वतपादलेपनिभृतावस्कन्दितानङ्कुश -स्वाच्छन्द्याखिलवाङ्मयाध्वसु यथाभिप्रायमाचेष्टते ॥ ५७ ॥ vācaḥ kāvyarahasyavartmani parāḥ puṣṇantu paṅgūyitaṃ tasyāḥ kiṃ tu giraḥ kva nāma ghaṭate rodhaḥ padasphūrtiṣu | yā sārasvatapādalepanibhṛtāvaskanditānaṅkuśa-svācchandyākhilavāṅmayādhvasu yathābhiprāyamāceṣṭate || 57 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
:1 tānsaṅgacchati bhāratī bhagavatī visrambhataḥ krīḍayā-nudhyātaiva jhagityasāvapi haṭhānabhyāsadūrīkṛtā | tattadyatnaśataprasāditavacodevīprasādīkṛtaṃ svacchaṃ saṅgamanīyaratnamiva ye śaktyadbhutaṃ bibhrati || 58 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति श्रीजोनराजकृतया टीकया समेतः श्रीराजानकविश्वावर्तसूनोर्महाकविराजराजानकश्रीमङ्खकस्य कृतौ श्रीकण्ठचरिते महाकाव्ये सुजनदुर्जनवर्णनो नाम द्वितीयः सर्गः ॥ तृतीयः सर्गः कुबेरसख्याः ककुभो ललाटिका यदेति कश्मीरपदाभिधेयताम् । सतीसरोनाम तदस्ति मण्डलं विचित्रसर्गावभृथः प्रजापतेः ॥ १ ॥ kuberasakhyāḥ kakubho lalāṭikā yadeti kaśmīrapadābhidheyatām | satīsaronāma tadasti maṇḍalaṃ vicitrasargāvabhṛthaḥ prajāpateḥ || 1 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विभान्ति यत्रानघदैर्ध्यसौहृदादहंयुभिर्यूपपरिग्रहैर्दिशः। कलेः प्रवेशानवकाशसिद्धये स्वयं मुखेष्वङ्कुरितार्गला इव ॥ २ ॥ vibhānti yatrānaghadairdhyasauhṛdādahaṃyubhiryūpaparigrahairdiśaḥ| kaleḥ praveśānavakāśasiddhaye svayaṃ mukheṣvaṅkuritārgalā iva || 2 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विभाव्यते सान्द्रहिमार्द्रमूर्तिभिः प्रवर्तिताट्टालकमुद्रमद्रिभिः । मणिव्रजैश्वर्यजितेन सूत्रितप्रदक्षिणं क्षीरसरस्वतेव यत् ॥ ३ ॥ vibhāvyate sāndrahimārdramūrtibhiḥ pravartitāṭṭālakamudramadribhiḥ | maṇivrajaiśvaryajitena sūtritapradakṣiṇaṃ kṣīrasarasvateva yat || 3 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तनौ बटूनां प्रकटत्वमानयन्नयत्नकृष्णाजिनसंविधानकम् । शिखित्रयीधूमभरोऽखिलं रजः प्रमार्ष्टि यत्रौकसि सोमपीथिनाम् ॥ ४ ॥ tanau baṭūnāṃ prakaṭatvamānayannayatnakṛṣṇājinasaṃvidhānakam | śikhitrayīdhūmabharo'khilaṃ rajaḥ pramārṣṭi yatraukasi somapīthinām || 4 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
क्व भान्ति यस्मिन्मधुपानभूमयो न नागरङ्गैः शिशिरे विलासिनाम् । शनैर्मनो भङ्क्तुमुपोढधन्वनः स्मरस्य शोणाश्मबृहद्गुलैरिव ॥ ५ ॥ kva bhānti yasminmadhupānabhūmayo na nāgaraṅgaiḥ śiśire vilāsinām | śanairmano bhaṅktumupoḍhadhanvanaḥ smarasya śoṇāśmabṛhadgulairiva || 5 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्थलाधिदेवीकुरुविन्दशेखरप्रभाङ्कुरैः कुङ्कुमगर्भकेसरैः। करोति यस्य क्षितिरक्षतायुषं जगत्त्रयस्त्रैणविशेषकक्रियाम् ॥ ६ ॥ sthalādhidevīkuruvindaśekharaprabhāṅkuraiḥ kuṅkumagarbhakesaraiḥ | karoti yasya kṣitirakṣatāyuṣaṃ jagattrayastraiṇaviśeṣakakriyām || 6 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वितस्तया यत्र लुठत्तटद्रुमप्रसूनसौहार्दभृतोऽलिसम्पदः । पुरस्क्रियन्ते हठमज्जनोत्सवभ्रमत्सुरस्त्रीकबरीसनाभयः ॥ ७ ॥ vitastayā yatra luṭhattaṭadrumaprasūnasauhārdabhṛto'lisampadaḥ | puraskriyante haṭhamajjanotsavabhramatsurastrīkabarīsanābhayaḥ || 7 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रसायनैर्यत्र पुरन्धिविभ्रमक्रियामयैरात्तनवीनयौवनः। पतत्तुषारच्छलतस्तपःक्षणे जहाति मूर्तं पलितं रतिप्रियः ॥ ८ ॥ rasāyanairyatra purandhivibhramakriyāmayairāttanavīnayauvanaḥ | patattuṣāracchalatastapaḥkṣaṇe jahāti mūrtaṃ palitaṃ ratipriyaḥ || 8 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
व्यनक्ति यत्रोदकतर्षकैर्वृतं घनैर्महापद्मफणीश्वरः सरः । मुकुन्दपादाहतिदोहदोन्मिषच्छिरःसरोजातिथिभृङ्गभङ्गिभिः ॥ ९ ॥ vyanakti yatrodakatarṣakairvṛtaṃ ghanairmahāpadmaphaṇīśvaraḥ saraḥ | mukundapādāhatidohadonmiṣacchiraḥsarojātithibhṛṅgabhaṅgibhiḥ || 9 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विवृण्वती कौतुकतन्तुसन्ततिं भुवं यदीयामधिगम्य शारदा । घनै रजोभिश्चरणारविन्दजैः करोति सारस्वतदृक्प्रसादनम् ॥ १० ॥ vivṛṇvatī kautukatantusantatiṃ bhuvaṃ yadīyāmadhigamya śāradā | ghanai rajobhiścaraṇāravindajaiḥ karoti sārasvatadṛkprasādanam || 10 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पिनाकिनो मूर्तिषु सर्पिरर्पितं न यत्र नेत्राग्निबलाद्विलीयते । किरीटकोटीगृहमेधिनो विधोः प्रभाभिराश्यानमिवोत्तरायणे ॥ ११ ॥ pinākino mūrtiṣu sarpirarpitaṃ na yatra netrāgnibalādvilīyate | kirīṭakoṭīgṛhamedhino vidhoḥ prabhābhirāśyānamivottarāyaṇe || 11 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वशंवदः शंसितसन्ततस्थितेरिव श्रियाः कार्मणकर्मयुक्तिभिः । विमुच्य दुग्धाब्धिजरत्कुटीरकं पुनाति यच्चक्रधरात्मना हरिः ॥ १२ ॥ vaśaṃvadaḥ śaṃsitasantatasthiteriva śriyāḥ kārmaṇakarmayuktibhiḥ | vimucya dugdhābdhijaratkuṭīrakaṃ punāti yaccakradharātmanā hariḥ || 12 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अवामनानेकसमीपपर्वतच्छलादुदस्ताभयहस्तसंहति । यदण्डजाखण्डलभङ्गखण्डनात्करोति कद्र्वा अदरिद्रमन्वयम् ॥ १३ ॥ avāmanānekasamīpaparvatacchalādudastābhayahastasaṃhati | yadaṇḍajākhaṇḍalabhaṅgakhaṇḍanātkaroti kadrvā adaridramanvayam || 13 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स यत्र भर्गः कपटेश्वराख्यया निरस्तलोकत्रयकल्मषक्लमः । दधद्वपुः काष्ठमयं जले स्वपित्यनुद्गमायेव दृगग्मिग्नितेजसः॥ १४ ॥ sa yatra bhargaḥ kapaṭeśvarākhyayā nirastalokatrayakalmaṣaklamaḥ | dadhadvapuḥ kāṣṭhamayaṃ jale svapityanudgamāyeva dṛgagmignitejasaḥ|| 14 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
बिभर्ति मार्तण्डवपुर्यदन्तिके पदं प्रभुर्ध्वान्तगदैकभेषजम् । उपेत्य पौरप्रमदामुखेन्दुभिः खकान्तिपूरैर्मसृणीकृतातपः ॥ १५ ॥ bibharti mārtaṇḍavapuryadantike padaṃ prabhurdhvāntagadaikabheṣajam | upetya paurapramadāmukhendubhiḥ khakāntipūrairmasṛṇīkṛtātapaḥ || 15 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पुरस्थतीर्थप्रतियातनातिथिर्विगाहते यत्र स धाम वामनः । बलेरकाण्डे दययेव बन्धनच्छिदेऽवरोहन्फणिराजविष्टपम् ॥ १६ ॥ purasthatīrthapratiyātanātithirvigāhate yatra sa dhāma vāmanaḥ | balerakāṇḍe dayayeva bandhanacchide'varohanphaṇirājaviṣṭapam || 16 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वियोगिहृल्लोहितसंविभागवन्मनोभवप्रासविलासबन्धुभिः । दिगन्तदूतैर्घृसृणस्य केसरैः करोति यत्कीर्तिसुभिक्षमक्षतम् ॥ १७ ॥ viyogihṛllohitasaṃvibhāgavanmanobhavaprāsavilāsabandhubhiḥ | digantadūtairghṛsṛṇasya kesaraiḥ karoti yatkīrtisubhikṣamakṣatam || 17 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
न जातु यस्मिन्वसुधाविलासिनामकीर्तिजम्बालजनिक्रियाक्रमः । यतः स कूटस्थतयैव जृम्भते पुराङ्गनालोकदृशामवग्रहः ॥ १८ ॥ na jātu yasminvasudhāvilāsināmakīrtijambālajanikriyākramaḥ | yataḥ sa kūṭasthatayaiva jṛmbhate purāṅganālokadṛśāmavagrahaḥ || 18 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कटाक्षिते शारदया दयामृतद्रवार्द्रदृष्ट्या श्रुतिशष्कुलीपदम् । न शास्त्रभोगानशनव्रतक्रियासहिष्णु बाला अपि यत्र बिभ्रति ॥ १९ ॥ kaṭākṣite śāradayā dayāmṛtadravārdradṛṣṭyā śrutiśaṣkulīpadam | na śāstrabhogānaśanavratakriyāsahiṣṇu bālā api yatra bibhrati || 19 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स सङ्गमो यत्र समुद्रकान्तयोर्विहारवीथी ध्रुवमिन्दुलक्ष्मणः । निरन्तरावर्तशतैर्व्यनक्ति यः खुराग्रमुद्रा इव तत्ककुद्मतः ॥ २० ॥ sa saṅgamo yatra samudrakāntayorvihāravīthī dhruvamindulakṣmaṇaḥ | nirantarāvartaśatairvyanakti yaḥ khurāgramudrā iva tatkakudmataḥ || 20 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गुणैर्मयूखैरिव शुद्धिमत्तरैर्निकाममुत्तंसितसर्वदिङ्मुखम् । धृतप्रसिद्धि प्रवराख्यया पुरं विगाहते यस्य किरीटरत्नताम् ॥ २१ ॥ guṇairmayūkhairiva śuddhimattarairnikāmamuttaṃsitasarvadiṅmukham | dhṛtaprasiddhi pravarākhyayā puraṃ vigāhate yasya kirīṭaratnatām || 21 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
जयन्ति ते यत्र चकोरचक्षुषां परं विलासा रतितन्त्रसूरयः । विवृण्वते मान्मथशौर्यकत्थनप्रथासु ये तथ्यतया समर्थनाम् ॥ २२ ॥ jayanti te yatra cakoracakṣuṣāṃ paraṃ vilāsā ratitantrasūrayaḥ | vivṛṇvate mānmathaśauryakatthanaprathāsu ye tathyatayā samarthanām || 22 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रदर्शिताश्लेषनिपीडनोल्लसद्रसातिरेकेषु न यत्र जातुचित् । कुचेषु नैबिड्यमधीरचक्षुषां महाकवीनां च वचःसु शीर्यते ॥ २३ ॥ pradarśitāśleṣanipīḍanollasadrasātirekeṣu na yatra jātucit | kuceṣu naibiḍyamadhīracakṣuṣāṃ mahākavīnāṃ ca vacaḥsu śīryate || 23 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पयोनिधिप्रेमभुवोर्महासरिद्वितस्तयोर्यत्र चकास्ति सङ्गमः । वनं घनावर्तनिभेन योजयन्नवालवालैरिव धर्मगर्मुताम् ॥ २४ ॥ payonidhipremabhuvormahāsaridvitastayoryatra cakāsti saṅgamaḥ | vanaṃ ghanāvartanibhena yojayannavālavālairiva dharmagarmutām || 24 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निशासु यस्मिन्वलभीषु विभ्रमादपास्तनीरङ्गिकवक्ररोचिषा । विलासलोला बहुलेऽपि कुर्वते विधोर्विपत्सङ्गमभङ्गमङ्गनाः ॥ २५ ॥ niśāsu yasminvalabhīṣu vibhramādapāstanīraṅgikavakrarociṣā | vilāsalolā bahule'pi kurvate vidhorvipatsaṅgamabhaṅgamaṅganāḥ || 25 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इतस्ततः कुङ्कुमरेणुधोरणीर्वियोगिनीवध्यपटानिव क्षिपन् । न यत्र वायुः सहते नतभ्रुवामकाण्डमानग्रहकीर्तिडिण्डिमम् ॥ २६ ॥ itastataḥ kuṅkumareṇudhoraṇīrviyoginīvadhyapaṭāniva kṣipan | na yatra vāyuḥ sahate natabhruvāmakāṇḍamānagrahakīrtiḍiṇḍimam || 26 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मधुव्रतानां श्रवणोत्पलस्पृशां कुलैरुपश्लोकितदैर्घ्यरीतयः । हरन्ति यत्रैणदृशां दृशो रतेरसह्यवैधव्यविषादविक्रियाम् ॥ २७ ॥ madhuvratānāṃ śravaṇotpalaspṛśāṃ kulairupaślokitadairghyarītayaḥ | haranti yatraiṇadṛśāṃ dṛśo raterasahyavaidhavyaviṣādavikriyām || 27 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सरःसु यस्मिन्बिसदण्डमण्डली चकास्ति शेषेण निजा फणावली । स्फुटं विसृष्टेव मुकुन्दसुन्दरीं सरोजपर्यङ्कजुषं निषेवितुम् ॥ २८ ॥ saraḥsu yasminbisadaṇḍamaṇḍalī cakāsti śeṣeṇa nijā phaṇāvalī | sphuṭaṃ visṛṣṭeva mukundasundarīṃ sarojaparyaṅkajuṣaṃ niṣevitum || 28 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
हिमागमे यत्र गृहेषु योषितां ज्वलद्बहुच्छिद्रसखी हसन्तिका । विभाति जेतुं मदनेन शूलिनं धृता ततिर्वह्निमयीव चक्षुषाम् ॥ २९ ॥ himāgame yatra gṛheṣu yoṣitāṃ jvaladbahucchidrasakhī hasantikā | vibhāti jetuṃ madanena śūlinaṃ dhṛtā tatirvahnimayīva cakṣuṣām || 29 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विभाव्य यत्राननकेलिकानने विलासचैत्रोत्सवमेणचक्षुषाम् । प्रियासखो दीर्घगुणैरभङ्गुरामपाङ्गदोलामधिरोहति स्मरः ॥ ३० ॥ vibhāvya yatrānanakelikānane vilāsacaitrotsavameṇacakṣuṣām | priyāsakho dīrghaguṇairabhaṅgurāmapāṅgadolāmadhirohati smaraḥ || 30 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स मन्मथो नाम जगाम तद्भुवि प्रथां प्रसन्नेश्वरदृष्टिभाजनम् । न मार्गणानां सुमनोमयात्मनां मनागपि क्षेपकलासु शिक्षितः॥ ३१ ॥ sa manmatho nāma jagāma tadbhuvi prathāṃ prasanneśvaradṛṣṭibhājanam | na mārgaṇānāṃ sumanomayātmanāṃ manāgapi kṣepakalāsu śikṣitaḥ|| 31 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अपारिजातप्रसरे प्रदर्शितक्षमास्थितावच्छदयाश्रियाञ्चिते । बभार यस्मिन्सततं मनः पिता प्ररोहदानन्दमपूर्वनन्दने ॥ ३२ ॥ apārijātaprasare pradarśitakṣamāsthitāvacchadayāśriyāñcite | babhāra yasminsatataṃ manaḥ pitā prarohadānandamapūrvanandane || 32 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सिषेच पुण्यद्रुमकाननानि यः समग्रमक्षालयदान्तरं रजः । वृषप्रमोदाश्रुसमानधर्मिभिर्द्विजातिहस्तार्पितदक्षिणाम्बुभिः॥ ३३ ॥ siṣeca puṇyadrumakānanāni yaḥ samagramakṣālayadāntaraṃ rajaḥ | vṛṣapramodāśrusamānadharmibhirdvijātihastārpitadakṣiṇāmbubhiḥ|| 33 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अशेषमाहेश्वरमौलिरत्नतामुपेयिवान्यः स्वयशःप्रयुक्तिभिः । प्रसादनायेव विभोः किलाखिलान्नगान्निनाय स्फटिकाद्रिभूमिकाम् ॥ ३४ ॥ aśeṣamāheśvaramauliratnatāmupeyivānyaḥ svayaśaḥprayuktibhiḥ | prasādanāyeva vibhoḥ kilākhilānnagānnināya sphaṭikādribhūmikām || 34 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वदान्यमास्त्यानबृहत्कृपारसप्रवाहशङ्काजननैकदक्षिणम् । स्वसूक्तिकीर्तिप्रसरैरनश्वरं स विश्ववर्ताख्यमवाप नन्दनम् ॥ ३५ ॥ vadānyamāstyānabṛhatkṛpārasapravāhaśaṅkājananaikadakṣiṇam | svasūktikīrtiprasarairanaśvaraṃ sa viśvavartākhyamavāpa nandanam || 35 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अनेकशो येन धृताङ्कुशा इव प्रचारशान्त्यै कलिदुष्टदन्तिनः । अरालसौवर्णविषाणकोटयः कति द्विजेभ्यो ददिरे न धेनवः ॥ ३६ ॥ anekaśo yena dhṛtāṅkuśā iva pracāraśāntyai kaliduṣṭadantinaḥ | arālasauvarṇaviṣāṇakoṭayaḥ kati dvijebhyo dadire na dhenavaḥ || 36 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गलत्यविद्यातिमिरे शुभापतद्गुरूपदेशाञ्जनसेवनेन यः । विशुद्धदृष्टिः क्व न पारमेश्वरं वपुर्विमुच्य द्वयमेकमैक्षत ॥ ३७ ॥ galatyavidyātimire śubhāpatadgurūpadeśāñjanasevanena yaḥ | viśuddhadṛṣṭiḥ kva na pārameśvaraṃ vapurvimucya dvayamekamaikṣata || 37 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सहस्रशो भक्तिकथासु वक्षसि स्खलद्भिरानन्दभुवोऽश्रुणः कणैः । रराज यो हृद्गतमिन्दुशेखरं भजन्निवानर्गलमर्घमौक्तिकैः ॥ ३८ ॥ sahasraśo bhaktikathāsu vakṣasi skhaladbhirānandabhuvo'śruṇaḥ kaṇaiḥ | rarāja yo hṛdgataminduśekharaṃ bhajannivānargalamarghamauktikaiḥ || 38 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
महद्भिरामूर्धतलं दिवः पदं निजैर्विशङ्क्येव भृतं सुकर्मभिः । अनुल्बणो यो विनयावरुद्धया धिया सदैवावनताननोऽभवत् ॥ ३९ ॥ mahadbhirāmūrdhatalaṃ divaḥ padaṃ nijairviśaṅkyeva bhṛtaṃ sukarmabhiḥ | anulbaṇo yo vinayāvaruddhayā dhiyā sadaivāvanatānano'bhavat || 39 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उपेत्य पादद्वितयं जगाहिरे नमत्समग्रामरकेशकौशलम् । करालकालोरगकङ्कणस्रजां भुजेषु चक्रुः पुनरुक्तकल्पनम् ॥ ४० ॥ upetya pādadvitayaṃ jagāhire namatsamagrāmarakeśakauśalam | karālakāloragakaṅkaṇasrajāṃ bhujeṣu cakruḥ punaruktakalpanam || 40 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वितेनिरे प्राप्य गलस्थलं शनैरकाण्डरोहद्गरलान्तरभ्रमम् । नवोद्गतश्मश्रुनिवेशपेशलं कपोलमूले दधति स्म विभ्रमम् ॥ ४१ ॥ vitenire prāpya galasthalaṃ śanairakāṇḍarohadgaralāntarabhramam | navodgataśmaśruniveśapeśalaṃ kapolamūle dadhati sma vibhramam || 41 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ललाटिकालिङ्गनलीढपार्वतीकुरङ्गनाभीतिलकाङ्कुरायितम् । क्रमात्प्रपद्यालिकपट्टवर्त्मनि क्षणावतंसप्रणयं प्रणिन्यिरे ॥ ४२ ॥ lalāṭikāliṅganalīḍhapārvatīkuraṅganābhītilakāṅkurāyitam | kramātprapadyālikapaṭṭavartmani kṣaṇāvataṃsapraṇayaṃ praṇinyire || 42 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शिरःशशाङ्कस्य विवव्रुरन्तिके सभाजनासन्ननिशीथिनीप्रथाम् । ययुस्ततो जूटसुरापगातटे जलग्रहव्यग्रपयोदवैदुषीम् ॥ ४३ ॥ śiraḥśaśāṅkasya vivavrurantike sabhājanāsannaniśīthinīprathām | yayustato jūṭasurāpagātaṭe jalagrahavyagrapayodavaiduṣīm || 43 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
समुच्छ्वसद्भक्तिलतानिमन्त्रितद्विरेफपङ्क्तिप्रतिनायकश्रियः । अनेकदग्धागुरुधूमराजयो यदर्चनस्यावसरे पिनाकिनः॥ ४४ ॥ (कुलकम्) samucchvasadbhaktilatānimantritadvirephapaṅktipratināyakaśriyaḥ anekadagdhāgurudhūmarājayo yadarcanasyāvasare pinākinaḥ || 44 || (kulakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पुरः स शृङ्गारमुदारचेष्टितं सुतं प्रपेदे पदमेकमुन्नतेः । मुखेन यः सत्यसरस्वतीमयश्रिणार्धनारीश्वरतामिवाग्रहीत् ॥ ४५ ॥ puraḥ sa śṛṅgāramudāraceṣṭitaṃ sutaṃ prapede padamekamunnateḥ | mukhena yaḥ satyasarasvatīmayaśriṇārdhanārīśvaratāmivāgrahīt || 45 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कवित्ववक्तृत्वमयैरनुद्रुतं प्रदानभोगादिमयैस्तथोर्मिभिः । सरस्वती श्रीश्च मिथः समागते यमाश्रितद्वीपदशं विवव्रतुः ॥ ४६ ॥ kavitvavaktṛtvamayairanudrutaṃ pradānabhogādimayaistathormibhiḥ | sarasvatī śrīśca mithaḥ samāgate yamāśritadvīpadaśaṃ vivavratuḥ || 46 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अरालयद्भ्रूकुटिकृष्णपन्नगीनिरङ्कुशश्छिन्नपथो यतोऽभवत् । अतः प्रतापो युधि हर्षभूभुजश्चकार यात्रामपुनर्निवृत्तये ॥ ४७ ॥ arālayadbhrūkuṭikṛṣṇapannagīniraṅkuśaśchinnapatho yato'bhavat | ataḥ pratāpo yudhi harṣabhūbhujaścakāra yātrāmapunarnivṛttaye || 47 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ज्वलत्प्रतापाग्निसमक्षमक्षतं जयश्रियो यो घटयन्करग्रहम् । अखण्डजन्यान्तरबद्धपद्धतिः सहेलमैक्षिष्ट कबन्धनर्तनम् ॥ ४८ ॥ jvalatpratāpāgnisamakṣamakṣataṃ jayaśriyo yo ghaṭayankaragraham | akhaṇḍajanyāntarabaddhapaddhatiḥ sahelamaikṣiṣṭa kabandhanartanam || 48 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अनुक्षणानेकनिपीतशात्रवप्रतापवह्निप्रतिवर्षणादिव । असह्यतां कस्य न नाम निष्पतज्जगाम यद्वामविलोचनाञ्चलम् ॥ ४९ ॥ anukṣaṇānekanipītaśātravapratāpavahniprativarṣaṇādiva | asahyatāṃ kasya na nāma niṣpatajjagāma yadvāmavilocanāñcalam || 49 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वितीर्य पुष्पस्रजमुन्मदालिभिः पुरस्कृतां दैवशुभाक्षरैरिव । असूत्रयद्यस्य स सुस्सलक्षमापतिर्बृहत्तन्त्रपतित्वकल्पनम् ॥ ५० ॥(चक्कलकम्) vitīrya puṣpasrajamunmadālibhiḥ puraskṛtāṃ daivaśubhākṣarairiva | asūtrayadyasya sa sussalakṣamāpatirbṛhattantrapatitvakalpanam || 50 || (cakkalakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अदीर्घसूत्रः प्रसरद्भिरङ्कितो गुणैर्वृहत्तन्त्रपतिर्विशेषवित् । उपोढशास्त्रप्रकृतिर्मृदुक्रमः करोति यः कौतुककाहलं जगत् ॥ ५१ ॥ adīrghasūtraḥ prasaradbhiraṅkito guṇairvṛhattantrapatirviśeṣavit | upoḍhaśāstraprakṛtirmṛdukramaḥ karoti yaḥ kautukakāhalaṃ jagat || 51 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वसन्तमाप्तं क्व न वीक्ष्य यो मुदं बिभर्ति लुम्पन्सुमनःस्वलं रजः। विमुद्रपद्माधिगमेऽपि नोज्झति स्पृहातिरेकं मदवारणे चयः (च यः) ॥ ५२ ॥ vasantamāptaṃ kva na vīkṣya yo mudaṃ bibharti lumpansumanaḥsvalaṃ rajaḥ| vimudrapadmādhigame'pi nojjhati spṛhātirekaṃ madavāraṇe cayaḥ (ca yaḥ) || 52 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स भृङ्ग इत्यस्य गतोऽनुजन्मतां दधत्स्वनाम्नोऽनुगुणामपि श्रियम् । अपक्षतित्वे पदमुन्नतोन्नतं विगाहमानो दिशति स्म विस्मयम् ॥ ५३ ॥ (युग्मम्) sa bhṛṅga ityasya gato'nujanmatāṃ dadhatsvanāmno'nuguṇāmapi śriyam | apakṣatitve padamunnatonnataṃ vigāhamāno diśati sma vismayam || 53 || (yugmam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
धृतामिताभं वदनेन्दुमण्डलं प्रसन्नतारागतिरीक्षणद्वयी। सु(स)मञ्जुघोषं च वचः परिच्छदः प्रदर्शितश्रीघनविभ्रमग्रहः ॥ ५४ ॥ dhṛtāmitābhaṃ vadanendumaṇḍalaṃ prasannatārāgatirīkṣaṇadvayī| su(sa)mañjughoṣaṃ ca vacaḥ paricchadaḥ pradarśitaśrīghanavibhramagrahaḥ || 54 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इतीदृशीं प्रस्तुवतोऽपि सौगतक्रमानुरूपप्रतिपत्तिकल्पनाम् । विलोक्यते यस्य कदापि केनचिन्न सौहृदेषु क्षणभङ्गसङ्गतिः॥ ५५ ॥ (युग्मम्) itīdṛśīṃ prastuvato'pi saugatakramānurūpapratipattikalpanām | vilokyate yasya kadāpi kenacinna sauhṛdeṣu kṣaṇabhaṅgasaṅgatiḥ || 55 || (yugmam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ततः कनीयानजनिष्ट विष्टपत्रयेऽप्यविच्छिन्नगतागतैर्गुणैः । श्रयन्नलङ्कार इति प्ररूढतां सरस्वतीपादरजोऽतिथौ पथि ॥ ५६ ॥ tataḥ kanīyānajaniṣṭa viṣṭapatraye'pyavicchinnagatāgatairguṇaiḥ | śrayannalaṅkāra iti prarūḍhatāṃ sarasvatīpādarajo'tithau pathi || 56 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
न सूत्रकृद्वार्तिककृन्न चेष्टिकृच्छशाक यल्लक्षणतन्त्रमीक्षितुम् । स्वयं तदुन्मीलितवानकल्पयच्चतुर्मुनि व्याकरणस्य वर्त्म यः ॥ ५७ ॥ na sūtrakṛdvārtikakṛnna ceṣṭikṛcchaśāka yallakṣaṇatantramīkṣitum | svayaṃ tadunmīlitavānakalpayaccaturmuni vyākaraṇasya vartma yaḥ || 57 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सदा मुखे यस्य निसर्गमाधुरीपरीतनृत्यत्पदसूक्तियुक्तिभिः। सरस्वतीसद्मसरोरुहस्पृशां रसायुषां व्यक्तिमुपैति निक्वणः ॥ ५८ ॥ sadā mukhe yasya nisargamādhurīparītanṛtyatpadasūktiyuktibhiḥ| sarasvatīsadmasaroruhaspṛśāṃ rasāyuṣāṃ vyaktimupaiti nikvaṇaḥ || 58 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वहत्यनिर्वेदगतिं न मुञ्चति द्विजाधिराजश्रियि वर्धनोद्यमम् । बतोपयुङ्क्ते च बहुप्रमाणतामुपोढलोकायतवृत्ति यद्यशः ॥ ५९ ॥ vahatyanirvedagatiṃ na muñcati dvijādhirājaśriyi vardhanodyamam | batopayuṅkte ca bahupramāṇatāmupoḍhalokāyatavṛtti yadyaśaḥ || 59 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यदाननेन्दुद्युतिसङ्गसङ्कुचन्निकेतपङ्केरुहपीडनादिव । चिरं पुरस्ताद्वदनेषु जायते विवादिनामाकुलिता सरस्वती ॥ ६० ॥ yadānanendudyutisaṅgasaṅkucanniketapaṅkeruhapīḍanādiva | ciraṃ purastādvadaneṣu jāyate vivādināmākulitā sarasvatī || 60 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
खलीकृता यस्य वचोभिरुद्धतैर्विलुण्ठ्य सर्वप्रतिभामयीं श्रियम् । भवन्ति सद्यः प्रतिवादिनां गिरो गभीरमौनहृदमग्नमूर्तयः ॥ ६१ ॥ khalīkṛtā yasya vacobhiruddhatairviluṇṭhya sarvapratibhāmayīṃ śriyam | bhavanti sadyaḥ prativādināṃ giro gabhīramaunahṛdamagnamūrtayaḥ || 61 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निवेशिते सुस्सलभूबिडौजसा स्वयं गरीयस्यपि सन्धिविग्रहे । विधाय चक्रे स्वयशोमयीं लिपिं स लेखवर्गस्य विमुद्रमाननम् ॥ ६२ ॥ niveśite sussalabhūbiḍaujasā svayaṃ garīyasyapi sandhivigrahe | vidhāya cakre svayaśomayīṃ lipiṃ sa lekhavargasya vimudramānanam || 62 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अथोदभूत्तस्य कनिष्ठसोदरः स मङ्खको यस्य शिशोरतन्वत । शिरस्युपोढा गुरुपादरेणवः सरस्वतीकार्मणचूर्णनैपुणम् ॥ ६३ ॥ athodabhūttasya kaniṣṭhasodaraḥ sa maṅkhako yasya śiśoratanvata | śirasyupoḍhā gurupādareṇavaḥ sarasvatīkārmaṇacūrṇanaipuṇam || 63 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्वदेहलीनां दधदुन्नतिप्रथामखर्वसद्धर्म्यगतिप्रतिश्रवः । बहिष्कृतानेकपराङ्गनस्थितिर्य एक एवावसथोऽजनि श्रियः॥ ६४ ॥ svadehalīnāṃ dadhadunnatiprathāmakharvasaddharmyagatipratiśravaḥ | bahiṣkṛtānekaparāṅganasthitirya eka evāvasatho'jani śriyaḥ|| 64 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अधीतवैदग्ध्यविशेषमक्रमात्कलासु शास्त्रे व्यवहारकर्मसु । विशेषवात्सल्यवतीव यं सुतं मुखैरचुम्बद्बहुभिः सरस्वती ॥ ६५ ॥ adhītavaidagdhyaviśeṣamakramātkalāsu śāstre vyavahārakarmasu | viśeṣavātsalyavatīva yaṃ sutaṃ mukhairacumbadbahubhiḥ sarasvatī || 65 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अनन्तरं सुस्सलदेवनन्दनो यमादराच्छ्रीजयसिंहभूपतिः । व्यधात्प्रजापालनकार्यपूरुषं रुषं वितन्वन्नविनीतजन्तुषु ॥ ६६ ॥ anantaraṃ sussaladevanandano yamādarācchrījayasiṃhabhūpatiḥ | vyadhātprajāpālanakāryapūruṣaṃ ruṣaṃ vitanvannavinītajantuṣu || 66 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पिता स तेषां जरयापि जर्जरो निपीयमाने श्रुतिसम्पुटाध्वना । अनेकतत्कीर्तिरसायनेऽभवन्नवीनतारुण्यविशेषवानिव ॥ ६७ ॥ pitā sa teṣāṃ jarayāpi jarjaro nipīyamāne śrutisampuṭādhvanā | anekatatkīrtirasāyane'bhavannavīnatāruṇyaviśeṣavāniva || 67 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अनेकमुक्तानुगतात्मनि स्वयं विगाहमाने बहुदानवारिताम् । अतिद्रुतं तस्य यियासतो दिवं नवारणस्वामिनि (नवा रणस्वामिनि/न वारणस्वामिनि) भक्तिरुद्ययौ ॥ ६८ ॥ anekamuktānugatātmani svayaṃ vigāhamāne bahudānavāritām | atidrutaṃ tasya yiyāsato divaṃ navāraṇasvāmini (navā raṇasvāmini/na vāraṇasvāmini) bhaktirudyayau || 68 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ततः स काले शिवरात्रिपावने मनागिव क्लिष्टशरीरसौष्ठवः । दशामगात्तीर्थपथोपपत्तिमत्कुशाग्रशय्यासुखसुप्तिकासखीम् ॥ ६९ ॥ tataḥ sa kāle śivarātripāvane manāgiva kliṣṭaśarīrasauṣṭhavaḥ | daśāmagāttīrthapathopapattimatkuśāgraśayyāsukhasuptikāsakhīm || 69 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
लीलामुक्तमनुष्यविग्रहमयग्रन्थिग्रहः शार्ङ्गिण-स्तीर्थे सोऽथ तिथौ व(म)हत्व(त्य)वनिभृत्पुत्रीपतेरभ्यगात् । वामार्धध्वजराजदण्डजपतित्रस्तापरार्धस्खल-केलीकङ्कणदन्दशूकबहुलोत्फालावचूलं वपुः ॥ ७० ॥ līlāmuktamanuṣyavigrahamayagranthigrahaḥ śārṅgiṇa-stīrthe so'tha tithau va(ma)hatva(tya)vanibhṛtputrīpaterabhyagāt | vāmārdhadhvajarājadaṇḍajapatitrastāparārdhaskhala- kelīkaṅkaṇadandaśūkabahulotphālāvacūlaṃ vapuḥ || 70 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इत्थं याते पितरि झगिति ब्रह्मभूयं य आसी-दन्तस्तेषां विषमविषमाहङ्कृतिः शोकशङ्कुः । चेतोभित्तेरनुपधिबृहद्बन्धुरेको विवेको लब्धोद्रेको निभृतनिभृतं तं शनैरुच्चखान ॥ ७१ ॥ itthaṃ yāte pitari jhagiti brahmabhūyaṃ ya āsī-dantasteṣāṃ viṣamaviṣamāhaṅkṛtiḥ śokaśaṅkuḥ | cetobhitteranupadhibṛhadbandhureko viveko labdhodreko nibhṛtanibhṛtaṃ taṃ śanairuccakhāna || 71 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
एकादश्यां व्रतनियमवानेकदा तत्कनीया-नेकाकी सन्भवनवलभीं मङ्खकः सोऽधिशिश्ये । वागीश्वर्या वदनवसतेः केवलं वाहहंसं व्यञ्जन्गण्डस्थलपरिणमच्चन्द्रबिम्बच्छलेन ॥ ७२ ॥ ekādaśyāṃ vrataniyamavānekadā tatkanīyā-nekākī sanbhavanavalabhīṃ maṅkhakaḥ so'dhiśiśye | vāgīśvaryā vadanavasateḥ kevalaṃ vāhahaṃsaṃ vyañjangaṇḍasthalapariṇamaccandrabimbacchalena || 72 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्वप्ने तत्र ददर्श स स्वपितरं देहं वहन्तं मिल-त्तापिच्छच्छदकेतकच्छविवपुष्खण्डद्वयीकल्पितम् । एकार्धेन वमन्तमग्रचरणद्वारेण मन्दाकिनी-मन्यार्धेन च बिभ्रतं पटुरटद्वीचिं जटावर्त्मनि ॥ ७३ ॥ svapne tatra dadarśa sa svapitaraṃ dehaṃ vahantaṃ mila-ttāpicchacchadaketakacchavivapuṣkhaṇḍadvayīkalpitam | ekārdhena vamantamagracaraṇadvāreṇa mandākinī-manyārdhena ca bibhrataṃ paṭuraṭadvīciṃ jaṭāvartmani || 73 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सुतमथ स तदानीं कल्पितप्रत्यभिज्ञं लहरिभिरनुगृह्णन्दूरतोऽभीक्ष्णमक्ष्णाम् । अमुचदमृतमित्थं कर्णगण्डूषलेह्यं स्नपनमिव विवृण्वञ्ज्योत्स्नया दन्तपङ्क्तेः ॥ ७४ ॥ sutamatha sa tadānīṃ kalpitapratyabhijñaṃ laharibhiranugṛhṇandūrato'bhīkṣṇamakṣṇām | amucadamṛtamitthaṃ karṇagaṇḍūṣalehyaṃ snapanamiva vivṛṇvañjyotsnayā dantapaṅkteḥ || 74 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
द्वैराज्यकारि सुमनोनिवहस्य कर्ण–पूरश्रियः किमपि वाङ्मयमध्यगीष्ठाः । तत्किं पुनासि न सुत क्षणदाकुटुम्बलेखावचूलचटुयुक्तिभिरुक्तिदेवीम् ॥ ७५ ॥ dvairājyakāri sumanonivahasya karṇa–pūraśriyaḥ kimapi vāṅmayamadhyagīṣṭhāḥ | tatkiṃ punāsi na suta kṣaṇadākuṭumbalekhāvacūlacaṭuyuktibhiruktidevīm || 75 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति सूक्तिमौक्तिकमयीं सुतस्य स प्रकटय्य कर्णभुवि शेखरस्रजम् । गगनाध्वलङ्घनघनश्रमस्पृशा शशिना सहैव चतुरं तिरोदधे ॥ ७६ ॥ iti sūktimauktikamayīṃ sutasya sa prakaṭayya karṇabhuvi śekharasrajam | gaganādhvalaṅghanaghanaśramaspṛśā śaśinā sahaiva caturaṃ tirodadhe || 76 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उद्युक्ते गुणवद्विषादकदनव्यग्रैर्गवामुद्गमै-र्निर्मातुं भुवनानुरञ्जनविधिं देवे ततो भास्वति । तच्छून्यासु विसृज्य दिक्षु सुचिरं निद्रादरिद्रे दृशा-वुत्कण्ठां च शुचं च विस्मयरसोल्लासं च तुल्यं दधौ ॥ ७७ ॥ udyukte guṇavadviṣādakadanavyagrairgavāmudgamai-rnirmātuṃ bhuvanānurañjanavidhiṃ deve tato bhāsvati | tacchūnyāsu visṛjya dikṣu suciraṃ nidrādaridre dṛśā-vutkaṇṭhāṃ ca śucaṃ ca vismayarasollāsaṃ ca tulyaṃ dadhau || 77 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पितृभारतीविवृतपौष्टिकक्रियाक्रममाणभक्तिसहवासिमानसः । इति स प्रबन्धयति मङ्खको गिरं विरचय्य शङ्करचरित्रकिङ्करीम् ॥ ७८ ॥ pitṛbhāratīvivṛtapauṣṭikakriyākramamāṇabhaktisahavāsimānasaḥ | iti sa prabandhayati maṅkhako giraṃ viracayya śaṅkaracaritrakiṅkarīm || 78 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति श्रीजोनराजकृतया टीकया समेतः श्रीराजानकविश्ववर्तसूनोर्महाकविराजराजानकश्रीमङ्खकस्य कृतौ श्रीकण्ठचरिते महाकाव्ये देशवंशादिवर्णनं नाम तृतीयः सर्गः ॥ चतुर्थः सर्गः ॥ शशिशुभ्राः किरन्भासो हासो धनपतेर्दिशः । गिरिरस्तीह कैलासो निवासो वृषलक्ष्मणः ॥ १ ॥ śaśiśubhrāḥ kiranbhāso hāso dhanapaterdiśaḥ | girirastīha kailāso nivāso vṛṣalakṣmaṇaḥ || 1 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
बिम्बितैर्यो मृगैर्भाति स्फुटस्फाटिकसानुषु । कौतुकेन कृतो धात्रा राशिभिः शशिनामिव ॥ २ ॥ bimbitairyo mṛgairbhāti sphuṭasphāṭikasānuṣu | kautukena kṛto dhātrā rāśibhiḥ śaśināmiva || 2 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रश्मयोऽभ्रङ्कषा यस्य श्रयन्ते सरलश्रियः । मूले मृणालनालत्वं ब्रह्मासनसरोरुहः ॥ ३ ॥ raśmayo'bhraṅkaṣā yasya śrayante saralaśriyaḥ | mūle mṛṇālanālatvaṃ brahmāsanasaroruhaḥ || 3 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यदंशुस्रोतसः सङ्गादुत्तमाङ्गेऽपि धूर्जटेः । नेन्दुः क्षीरोदकल्लोलनिवासप्रीतिमुज्झति ॥ ४ ॥ yadaṃśusrotasaḥ saṅgāduttamāṅge'pi dhūrjaṭeḥ | nenduḥ kṣīrodakallolanivāsaprītimujjhati || 4 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सर्वतोऽपि प्रनृत्यद्भिर्यश्चकास्ति गभस्तिभिः । लिखन्मुखेषु ककुभां कर्पूरस्थासकानिव ॥ ५ ॥ sarvato'pi pranṛtyadbhiryaścakāsti gabhastibhiḥ | likhanmukheṣu kakubhāṃ karpūrasthāsakāniva || 5 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पादैर्महद्भिराक्रान्तदिगन्तो यः सितद्युतिः । बिभर्ति क्षममात्मानं मोक्तुं नवसुधाभरम् ॥ ६ ॥ pādairmahadbhirākrāntadiganto yaḥ sitadyutiḥ | bibharti kṣamamātmānaṃ moktuṃ navasudhābharam || 6 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
जहाति यस्य लिम्पद्भिः करैराचान्तकालिमा । जलदः प्रावृषेण्योऽपि न शारदपयोदताम् ॥ ७ ॥ jahāti yasya limpadbhiḥ karairācāntakālimā | jaladaḥ prāvṛṣeṇyo'pi na śāradapayodatām || 7 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सगुहां प्रकटाहीनकटकां दधदाकृतिम् । सदापिनाकमाक्रम्य स्थितः पादवलद्गणः ॥ ८ ॥ saguhāṃ prakaṭāhīnakaṭakāṃ dadhadākṛtim | sadāpinākamākramya sthitaḥ pādavaladgaṇaḥ || 8 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दधानोऽधिगतश्वेतसानुग्रहशरीरताम् । स्व​साम्यमिव यो नीतः सेवाप्रीतेन शम्भुना ॥ ९ ॥ (युग्मम्) dadhāno’dhigataśvetasānugrahaśarīratām | svasāmyamiva yo nītaḥ sevāprītena śambhunā || 9 || (yugmam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आबद्धपरिवेषस्य रश्मिभिः स्फटिकाश्मनाम् । प्रदक्षिणप्रवृत्तेव राजते यस्य जाह्नवी ॥ १० ॥ ābaddhapariveṣasya raśmibhiḥ sphaṭikāśmanām | pradakṣiṇapravṛtteva rājate yasya jāhnavī || 10 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
धत्तेंऽशुभिः समालब्धां भर्गनेत्रहविर्भुजः । यो मूर्तिं रोहणं जेतुं पद्मरागमयीमिव ॥ ११ ॥ dhatteṃ'śubhiḥ samālabdhāṃ bharganetrahavirbhujaḥ | yo mūrtiṃ rohaṇaṃ jetuṃ padmarāgamayīmiva || 11 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यत्र स्फटिकतेजोभिर्भर्गस्य च गलत्विषा । रजन्यपि दिनम्मन्या रात्रिम्मन्यं भवत्यहः ॥ १२ ॥ yatra sphaṭikatejobhirbhargasya ca galatviṣā | rajanyapi dinammanyā rātrimmanyaṃ bhavatyahaḥ || 12 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दिक्षु द्युतिभिरेणाङ्कगभस्तिप्रतिवस्तुभिः । यशांसि वर्षता येन राजन्वन्तो महीभृतः ॥ १३ ॥ dikṣu dyutibhireṇāṅkagabhastiprativastubhiḥ | yaśāṃsi varṣatā yena rājanvanto mahībhṛtaḥ || 13 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नृत्यद्भवपदक्षुण्णयत्क्षोणीरेणुविप्रुषः । भनिभेन नभो नूनं नक्तं नक्तमुपासते ॥ १४ ॥ nṛtyadbhavapadakṣuṇṇayatkṣoṇīreṇuvipruṣaḥ | bhanibhena nabho nūnaṃ naktaṃ naktamupāsate || 14 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शिववाहखुरोपज्ञजातरूपसमृद्धिभिः । क्षणान्मेरुसहस्रं यः सूते शैलप्रजापतिः ॥ १५ ॥ śivavāhakhuropajñajātarūpasamṛddhibhiḥ | kṣaṇānmerusahasraṃ yaḥ sūte śailaprajāpatiḥ || 15 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यत्र नेत्रानलः शम्भोः प्रतिबिम्बावलम्बनात् । कल्पतेऽनल्पदावाग्निशिल्पकृद्रत्नसानुषु ॥ १६ ॥ yatra netrānalaḥ śambhoḥ pratibimbāvalambanāt | kalpate'nalpadāvāgniśilpakṛdratnasānuṣu || 16 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रुद्रोत्तंसविधूद्रेकद्रवच्चन्द्राश्मजन्मभिः। प्रवाहैरिव यः सख्यं क्वचिन्नोज्झति निर्झरैः ॥ १७ ॥ rudrottaṃsavidhūdrekadravaccandrāśmajanmabhiḥ| pravāhairiva yaḥ sakhyaṃ kvacinnojjhati nirjharaiḥ || 17 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
किंस्विद्गौरीहरेर्भीत्या विनीत्या किमु धूर्जटेः। दूराद्रथमृगं त्यक्त्वा यं मृदुः सेवतेऽनिलः ॥ १८ ॥ kiṃsvidgaurīharerbhītyā vinītyā kimu dhūrjaṭeḥ| dūrādrathamṛgaṃ tyaktvā yaṃ mṛduḥ sevate'nilaḥ || 18 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
