भृशकृशमहरिष्यदेव तस्या वपुरपसव्यसमीरणो रयेण । यदि न समजनिष्यतोज्जिहानस्तनजघनस्थलगौरवान्तरायः ॥ ३५ ॥ bhṛśakṛśamahariṣyadeva tasyā vapurapasavyasamīraṇo rayeṇa | yadi na samajaniṣyatojjihānastanajaghanasthalagauravāntarāyaḥ || 35 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विषममृतसनाथमुद्गिर​न्त्यो युवतिमहाविरहार्तिकीर्तनेन । अभिदधति रसाञ्चितैर्वचोभिर्युवजनमित्यचिरादुपेत्य सख्यः ॥ ३६ ॥ viṣamamṛtasanāthamudgirantyo yuvatimahāvirahārtikīrtanena | abhidadhati rasāñcitairvacobhiryuvajanamityacirādupetya sakhyaḥ || 36 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मनसि धृतिलतां विबाधमानो मुकुलबृहत्करकौघदुर्दिनेन । कुसुमशरयशश्छटाविवर्तस्तुदति वियोगिजनस्य सिन्धुवारः ॥ ३७ ॥ manasi dhṛtilatāṃ vibādhamāno mukulabṛhatkarakaughadurdinena | kusumaśarayaśaśchaṭāvivartastudati viyogijanasya sindhuvāraḥ || 37 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रकृतिमभिसरन्निजां कथञ्चिद्घनहिमदुर्दिनगर्भवासमुक्तेः । जगदुपवदते शनैरुदञ्चत्सरसिजभर्तुरयातयाममोजः ॥ ३८ ॥ prakṛtimabhisarannijāṃ kathañcidghanahimadurdinagarbhavāsamukteḥ | jagadupavadate śanairudañcatsarasijabharturayātayāmamojaḥ || 38 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चटुलितसिचयाञ्चलच्छटाभिर्मुरलपुरन्ध्रिकुचेषु पुष्पकेतोः । भुवनविजयकीर्तिवैजयन्तीर्म​रुदयमुत्क्षिपतीव दाक्षिणात्यः ॥ ३९ ॥ caṭulitasicayāñcalacchaṭābhirmuralapurandhrikuceṣu puṣpaketoḥ | bhuvanavijayakīrtivaijayantīrmarudayamutkṣipatīva dākṣiṇātyaḥ || 39 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
युवजनघनकेलिसूत्रधारो विरहिशरीरनवीनवह्निवर्षः । स्खलति बत न सैंहलो नभस्वान्क्षणमपि मानशरव्यसव्यसाची ॥ ४० ॥ yuvajanaghanakelisūtradhāro virahiśarīranavīnavahnivarṣaḥ | skhalati bata na saiṃhalo nabhasvānkṣaṇamapi mānaśaravyasavyasācī || 40 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ज्वलितदलदशोकयातनाग्निस्तरलतमालतरुच्छदासिपत्रा । निरयति गुरुमानदुष्कृतानामुपवनभूमिरवामनस्तनीनाम् ॥ ४१ ॥ Nirayati is a nominal verb form that is derived from the noun niraya (hell) by adding the affix 'kvip' according to the Vārttika 'sarvaprātipadikebhyaḥ kvip'. Its meaning is ‘niraya iva ācarati’ (‘behaves like hell’). Fires burn in hell and the trees that grow there have swords for their leaves (see also footnote under 22.41) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रतिरमणनटस्य पान्थनारीजनवधनाटकनर्तनोन्मुखस्य । व्रजति जवनिकालिपिं पुरस्तात्पवनविसारितचूतपांसुपट्टः ॥ ४२ ॥ ratiramaṇanaṭasya pānthanārījanavadhanāṭakanartanonmukhasya | vrajati javanikālipiṃ purastātpavanavisāritacūtapāṃsupaṭṭaḥ || 42 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विनमदसमबाणचापमौर्वीरवबधिरीकृतसप्तलोकरन्ध्रे । मुखरमधुकरेऽस्त्यमुत्र चैत्रे कथमिव मानवतीजनस्य निद्रा ॥ ४३ ॥ vinamadasamabāṇacāpamaurvīravabadhirīkṛtasaptalokarandhre | mukharamadhukare'styamutra caitre kathamiva mānavatījanasya nidrā || 43 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शिखरिदुहितुरुत्तरङ्गसूक्तिव्यवहृतिभिः शशिखण्डमुण्डमाल्ये । इति भगवति कञ्चन प्रसादं कृतवति कर्णरसामृतप्रपाभिः ॥ ४४ ॥ śikhariduhituruttaraṅgasūktivyavahṛtibhiḥ śaśikhaṇḍamuṇḍamālye | iti bhagavati kañcana prasādaṃ kṛtavati karṇarasāmṛtaprapābhiḥ || 44 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मधुमुपनयता रदांशुतन्त्रैरभिनवकेतकसूचिसख्यरेखाम् । भगवदभिमुखं शनैरथेत्थं विशदमगादि शिलादनन्दनेन॥ ४५ ॥ (युगलकम्) madhumupanayatā radāṃśutantrairabhinavaketakasūcisakhyarekhām | bhagavadabhimukhaṃ śanairathetthaṃ viśadamagādi śilādanandanena || 45 || (yugalakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पिबदिव दिनलक्ष्मीं क्षीबतामेति चक्षु-स्तरुणतपनसङ्गाद्गात्रमत्रस्तमास्ते । किमपरमनिमित्तोत्कण्ठया देव दृष्ट्वा नवसुरभिविलासं माति न क्वापि चेतः ॥ ४६ ॥ pibadiva dinalakṣmīṃ kṣībatāmeti cakṣu-staruṇatapanasaṅgādgātramatrastamāste | kimaparamanimittotkaṇṭhayā deva dṛṣṭvā navasurabhivilāsaṃ māti na kvāpi cetaḥ || 46 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दूरं दृशां प्रहिणु नाथ मनाक्पतङ्ग-स्वाहाभुजङ्गशशिसङ्गभृतां तरङ्गान् । सञ्जायतां समुदिताभिरथ प्रभाभि-स्तासां दिशां घुसृणचन्दनलेपसन्धिः ॥ ४७ ॥ dūraṃ dṛśāṃ prahiṇu nātha manākpataṅga-svāhābhujaṅgaśaśisaṅgabhṛtāṃ taraṅgān | sañjāyatāṃ samuditābhiratha prabhābhi-stāsāṃ diśāṃ ghusṛṇacandanalepasandhiḥ || 47 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
लिम्पन्नभो मरकतद्रवनिम्नगाभि-श्चान्द्रं महश्च घटयन्स्फटिकाश्मकूटैः । तन्वन्दिशां परिमलाद्वयवाददीक्षां पश्योल्लसत्ययमृतुः कुसुमावतंसः ॥ ४८ ॥ limpannabho marakatadravanimnagābhi-ścāndraṃ mahaśca ghaṭayansphaṭikāśmakūṭaiḥ | tanvandiśāṃ parimalādvayavādadīkṣāṃ paśyollasatyayamṛtuḥ kusumāvataṃsaḥ || 48 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दिङ्मण्डली कनककेतकसिन्धुवार-कङ्केल्लिवल्लिपटलीशबलीकृतेयम् । चैत्रेण विश्वविजयाय झषध्वजस्य सज्जीकृताममरचापततिं व्यनक्ति ॥ ४९ ॥ diṅmaṇḍalī kanakaketakasindhuvāra-kaṅkellivallipaṭalīśabalīkṛteyam | caitreṇa viśvavijayāya jhaṣadhvajasya sajjīkṛtāmamaracāpatatiṃ vyanakti || 49 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्राग्दक्षिणां दिशमशिश्रियदुष्णरश्मि-रभ्यग्रहीत्प्रणयितां मरुदुत्तरस्याः । उन्निद्रचूतसुहृदेष तयोस्त्विदानी-मन्योन्यदिग्विनिमयं समयः करोति ॥ ५० ॥ prāgdakṣiṇāṃ diśamaśiśriyaduṣṇaraśmi-rabhyagrahītpraṇayitāṃ maruduttarasyāḥ | unnidracūtasuhṛdeṣa tayostvidānī-manyonyadigvinimayaṃ samayaḥ karoti || 50 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
हेलावहन्मसृणदक्षिणगन्धवाह-प्रेङ्खोलचम्पकशिखामधिरूढवन्ति । प्रेङ्खाविलासमधुना मधुनामुना य- त्पश्य द्विरेफमिथुनान्यपि शिक्षितानि ॥ ५१ ॥ helāvahanmasṛṇadakṣiṇagandhavāha – preṅkholacampakaśikhāmadhirūḍhavanti | preṅkhāvilāsamadhunā madhunāmunā ya- tpaśya dvirephamithunānyapi śikṣitāni || 51 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गण्डप्रभाभिरपहस्तितचम्पकाभि-र्व्योम्नोऽतसीकुसुमसाम्यमपह्नुवाना । युष्मन्निदेशमधिगम्य विलासलोला दोलातलं भगवती तदलङ्करोतु ॥ ५२ ॥ (युगलकम्) gaṇḍaprabhābhirapahastitacampakābhi-rvyomno'tasīkusumasāmyamapahnuvānā| yuṣmannideśamadhigamya vilāsalolā dolātalaṃ bhagavatī tadalaṅkarotu || 52 (yugalakam) || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आपीय स श्रुतिमुखेन सुधासनाभि तन्नन्दिनो वचनमिन्दुकलाकिरीटः । देवीमवोचत दिशन्दशनांशुपूरै-र्भूयोऽप्युपोढहिमतामिव दिङ्मुखेषु ॥ ५३ ॥ āpīya sa śrutimukhena sudhāsanābhi tannandino vacanamindukalākirīṭaḥ | devīmavocata diśandaśanāṃśupūrai-rbhūyo'pyupoḍhahimatāmiva diṅmukheṣu || 53 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नन्दी यदिन्दुवदने मदनेन्द्रजाल- दिव्योपदेशवति वक्ति तदद्य युक्तम् । आदत्स्व तत्परिकरं सुचिरं कुरुष्व मल्लोचनान्यनुसृतामृतपारणानि ॥ ५४ ॥ nandī yadinduvadane madanendrajāla- divyopadeśavati vakti tadadya yuktam | ādatsva tatparikaraṃ suciraṃ kuruṣva mallocanānyanusṛtāmṛtapāraṇāni || 54 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दोलां मदाशयमिवानुबधान नाके मद्दृष्टिभिः सह विधेहि गतागतानि । त्वत्कण्ठमौक्तिकततिप्रतिपत्तिभिः खे सञ्जायतामितरतारकवर्गसर्गः ॥ ५५ ॥ dolāṃ madāśayamivānubadhāna nāke maddṛṣṭibhiḥ saha vidhehi gatāgatāni | tvatkaṇṭhamauktikatatipratipattibhiḥ khe sañjāyatāmitaratārakavargasargaḥ || 55 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ध्यानेन दोलनविलोलपदारविन्द-सन्दानितौ मुखरतामखिलं नयन्तौ । त्वन्नूपुरौ रचयतां क्षणमन्तरिक्षं प्रत्यक्षसिद्धनिजशब्दगुणप्रसिद्धिः (? प्रसिद्धि) ॥ ५६ ॥ dhyānena dolanavilolapadāravinda-sandānitau mukharatāmakhilaṃ nayantau | tvannūpurau racayatāṃ kṣaṇamantarikṣaṃ pratyakṣasiddhanijaśabdaguṇaprasiddhiḥ (? prasiddhi) || 56 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अन्तर्वसन्मदनसायकपुष्पगन्ध-मभ्युद्धरन्निव घनस्तदनु श्रमेण । श्वासस्तव द्युसरिदब्जवनं वियोग-मिन्दिन्दिरैर्नयतु सौरभचाटुकारैः ॥ ५७ ॥ antarvasanmadanasāyakapuṣpagandha-mabhyuddharanniva ghanastadanu śrameṇa | śvāsastava dyusaridabjavanaṃ viyoga-mindindirairnayatu saurabhacāṭukāraiḥ || 57 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दोलेयमुम्भितवपुर्मणिभिर्विनिर्य-निर्यन्त्ररश्मिनिकरेण सुसंहतोरु । आरोढुमिद्धमनसे रभसेन तुभ्यं दूरात्पुरो वितरतीव करावलम्बम् ॥ ५८ ॥ doleyamumbhitavapurmaṇibhirvinirya-niryantraraśminikareṇa susaṃhatoru | āroḍhumiddhamanase rabhasena tubhyaṃ dūrātpuro vitaratīva karāvalambam || 58 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
किं चेयमञ्चितमरुद्बलतो वलन्ती दूरोच्छलत्कनकपीठमरीचिबाहुः । आसन्नतावकप्रदप्रणयप्रमोदा-त्पश्य प्रिये नभसि लास्यमिव प्रयुङ्क्ते ॥ ५९ ॥ kiṃ ceyamañcitamarudbalato valantī dūrocchalatkanakapīṭhamarīcibāhuḥ | āsannatāvakapradapraṇayapramodā-tpaśya priye nabhasi lāsyamiva prayuṅkte || 59 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
एनां समीरवलनक्षणवाग्मिनीनां नादैर्घ​नैश्चटुलकाञ्चनकिङ्किणीनाम् । अभ्यर्थनामनुमुहूर्तमिवाचरन्ती-मध्यासनादनुगृहाण गलद्विलम्बम् ॥ ६० ॥ enāṃ samīravalanakṣaṇavāgminīnāṃ nādairghanaiścaṭulakāñcanakiṅkiṇīnām | abhyarthanāmanumuhūrtamivācarantī-madhyāsanādanugṛhāṇa galadvilambam || 60 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति वचनमनीचोदञ्चिरोमाञ्चसूची-सचिववपुरुमा तद्व्याहृतं वल्लभेन । श्रुतिपथमुपनीय प्रीतिकल्लोलिताक्षी चिरविरलितलज्जा तां शनैरध्यरुक्षत् ॥ ६१ ॥ iti vacanamanīcodañciromāñcasūcī-sacivavapurumā tadvyāhṛtaṃ vallabhena | śrutipathamupanīya prītikallolitākṣī ciraviralitalajjā tāṃ śanairadhyarukṣat || 61 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अङ्गैः काञ्चनभङ्गभङ्गिभवनैर्भान्ती परं पार्श्वयो-रुन्मीलन्मणिकर्णपूरकिरणैरुन्मुद्रितेन्द्रायुधा । आचस्कन्द तदेन्दुमौलिदयिता दोलाविलासक्रियायातायातशतैरनभ्रगगनाविर्भूतविद्युद्द्युतिम् ॥ ६२ ॥ aṅgaiḥ kāñcanabhaṅgabhaṅgibhavanairbhāntī paraṃ pārśvayo-runmīlanmaṇikarṇapūrakiraṇairunmudritendrāyudhā | ācaskanda tadendumaulidayitā dolāvilāsakriyā-yātāyātaśatairanabhragaganāvirbhūtavidyuddyutim || 62 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आलिम्पन्ती सकलककुभामन्तरालं विशालं तस्या व्योम्नि व्यसरदसमा कापि लावण्यसिन्धुः । दोलोत्फालावपतनकलाडम्बरेण स्वयं सा स्वैरं यस्यामसकृदकृतोन्मज्जनं मजनं च ॥ ६३ ॥ ālimpantī sakalakakubhāmantarālaṃ viśālaṃ tasyā vyomni vyasaradasamā kāpi lāvaṇyasindhuḥ | dolotphālāvapatanakalāḍambareṇa svayaṃ sā svairaṃ yasyāmasakṛdakṛtonmajjanaṃ majanaṃ ca || 63 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शिखरिदुहितुः प्रेङ्खोत्फालक्रियावसरे गत-श्चरणसरणेरग्रं वक्त्र​प्रभावजयादिव । चटुलिततुलाकोटिध्वानोपहूतसितच्छद-च्छविविचयनं चक्रे तत्र क्षणं क्षणदाकरः ॥ ६४ ॥ śikhariduhituḥ preṅkhotphālakriyāvasare gata-ścaraṇasaraṇeragraṃ vaktraprabhāvajayādiva | caṭulitatulākoṭidhvānopahūtasitacchada-cchavivicayanaṃ cakre tatra kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇadākaraḥ || 64 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यस्तस्याः श्रमनीरसीकरभरः क्रीडातिरेकक्रमा-दासीत्तं जवनो जहार पवनो लोलः कपोलस्थलात् । हेलानर्तितजागरूककनकाम्भोजाधिवासाकरं स्वर्गङ्गाजलबिन्दुवृन्दममुचत्तन्निष्क्रयायेव च ॥ ६५ ॥ yastasyāḥ śramanīrasīkarabharaḥ krīḍātirekakramā- dāsīttaṃ javano jahāra pavano lolaḥ kapolasthalāt | helānartitajāgarūkakanakāmbhojādhivāsākaraṃ svargaṅgājalabinduvṛndamamucattanniṣkrayāyeva ca || 65 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वेल्लल्लोलोत्तरीयाञ्चलमलसवलत्काञ्चिसञ्चारितोच्च-क्वाणं मञ्जीरमञ्जुस्वनितमुखरिताखण्डदिङ्मण्डलं च । यातायातानि दोलाविधिभिरधिनभोऽनङ्कुशं दर्शयन्ती सा पुष्पास्त्रस्य लोकत्रयजयपिशुना वैजयन्तीव रेजे ॥ ६६ ॥ vellallolottarīyāñcalamalasavalatkāñcisañcāritocca-kvāṇaṃ mañjīramañjusvanitamukharitākhaṇḍadiṅmaṇḍalaṃ ca | yātāyātāni dolāvidhibhiradhinabho'naṅkuśaṃ darśayantī sā puṣpāstrasya lokatrayajayapiśunā vaijayantīva reje || 66 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति श्रीजोनराजकृतया टीकया समेतः श्रीराजानकविश्ववर्तसूनोर्महाकविराजराजानकश्रीमङ्खकस्य कृतौ श्रीकण्ठचरिते महाकाव्ये दोलाक्रीडावर्णनं नाम सप्तमः सर्गः ॥ अष्टमः सर्गः ॥ चिरखेलनखेदवद्भिरङ्गैरवरूढा विरहय्य केलिदोलाम् । रभसादपि साधिबाहुयन्त्रं गिरिपुत्री जगृहे महेश्वरेण ॥ १ ॥ cirakhelanakhedavadbhiraṅgairavarūḍhā virahayya kelidolām | rabhasādapi sādhibāhuyantraṃ giriputrī jagṛhe maheśvareṇa || 1 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
घनकेलिविमर्दकीर्णकर्णप्रणयीन्दीवररेणुसीकरेषु । हृतपीतनघ​र्मबिन्दुवृन्दैरधिगण्डस्थलि बुब्रुडे मृडान्याः ॥ २ ॥ ghanakelivimardakīrṇakarṇapraṇayīndīvarareṇusīkareṣu | hṛtapītanagharmabinduvṛndairadhigaṇḍasthali bubruḍe mṛḍānyāḥ || 2 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
क्लमसङ्गिभिरङ्गकैः सती सा परिरेभे सुभगं चलद्दुकूला । बहुशः पृषदश्वमष्टमूर्तिप्रियमूर्त्यन्तरमित्यपास्तशङ्कम् ॥ ३ ॥ klamasaṅgibhiraṅgakaiḥ satī sā parirebhe subhagaṃ caladdukūlā | bahuśaḥ pṛṣadaśvamaṣṭamūrtipriyamūrtyantaramityapāstaśaṅkam || 3 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
हिमवद्दुहितुस्तदावहद्भिः स्मृतिशेषश्रमसीकरं शरीरम् । हरशेखरनिम्नगोर्मिभङ्गैरनुसस्ने सितचामराधिकारः ॥ ४ ॥ himavadduhitustadāvahadbhiḥ smṛtiśeṣaśramasīkara śarīraṃ | haraśekharanimnagormibhaṅgairanusasne sitacāmarādhikāraḥ || 4 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
घटिताग्रकरः पपौ स तस्याः श्रमजं निर्भरजृम्भमाणमम्भः । गिरिशस्य शिखेन्दुरूर्ध्वनेत्रज्वलनासङ्गभुवा पिपासयेव ॥ ५ ॥ ghaṭitāgrakaraḥ papau sa tasyāḥ śramajaṃ nirbharajṛmbhamāṇamambhaḥ | giriśasya śikhendurūrdhvanetrajvalanāsaṅgabhuvā pipāsayeva || 5 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विजयाकरनर्तितैर्मुहूर्तात्कुचकुम्भातिथिघ​र्मवारि तस्याः । अनिलो नलिनीदलैरशेषं चषकैर्मारकतैरिवाचचाम ॥ ६ ॥ vijayākaranartitairmuhūrtātkucakumbhātithigharmavāri tasyāḥ | anilo nalinīdalairaśeṣaṃ caṣakairmārakatairivācacāma || 6 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
क्षणशिक्षितवेगतारतम्यैः श्वसितैरात्तवती गतागतानि । व्यतनोदिव वीजनोपचारं निजचूर्णालकमालिकापि तस्याः ॥ ७ ॥ kṣaṇaśikṣitavegatāratamyaiḥ śvasitairāttavatī gatāgatāni | vyatanodiva vījanopacāraṃ nijacūrṇālakamālikāpi tasyāḥ || 7 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वचनाधिकमाधुरीषु शिष्यः पिकलोकोऽन्तिकचूतजागरूकः । उपवीजयति स्म​ तां क्लमार्तिक्षतिदीक्षागुरुभिर्गरुत्समीरैः ॥ ८ ॥ vacanādhikamādhurīṣu śiṣyaḥ pikaloko'ntikacūtajāgarūkaḥ | upavījayati sma tāṃ klamārtikṣatidīkṣāgurubhirgarutsamīraiḥ || 8 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अथ लोलकपोलपाटलिम्नि स्खलितस्वेदपृषद्गरिम्णि तस्याः । निभृतश्वसिते च विग्रहेऽभूद्विधुताशेषपरिच्छदः सखेदः ॥ ९ ॥ atha lolakapolapāṭalimni skhalitasvedapṛṣadgarimṇi tasyāḥ | nibhṛtaśvasite ca vigrahe'bhūdvidhutāśeṣaparicchadaḥ sakhedaḥ || 9 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यदुवाह वपुस्तदा मृडानी निबिडक्रीडनशीर्णसर्वभूषम् । अधिकाधिकभूषणामथैतां बत मेने तत एव चन्द्रचूडः ॥ १० ॥ yaduvāha vapustadā mṛḍānī nibiḍakrīḍanaśīrṇasarvabhūṣam | adhikādhikabhūṣaṇāmathaitāṃ bata mene tata eva candracūḍaḥ || 10 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मृडमौलिशशाङ्करश्मिभिर्यन्मुखपङ्केरुहमुन्मिमील तस्याः। ननु जृम्भित एष तत्र जैत्रो मदनस्याद्वयवादसम्प्रदायः ॥ ११ ॥ mṛḍamauliśaśāṅkaraśmibhiryanmukhapaṅkeruhamunmimīla tasyāḥ| nanu jṛmbhita eṣa tatra jaitro madanasyādvayavādasampradāyaḥ || 11 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गिरिराजभुवः शशाङ्ककान्तं वदनं प्रोच्छ्व​सदच्छरश्मिपङ्क्ति । मुहुरुग्रकराभिमर्षयोगाद्विरतस्वेदजलप्रबन्धमासीत् ॥ १२ ॥ girirājabhuvaḥ śaśāṅkakāntaṃ vadanaṃ procchvasadaccharaśmipaṅkti | muhurugrakarābhimarṣayogādviratasvedajalaprabandhamāsīt || 12 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सुचिरं शिशिरोपचारतन्त्रैरिति देहात्प्रतिमुक्ततान्तितन्तुः । कुसुमोच्चयनेन सा लतानां सफलीकर्तुमियेष चैत्रमैत्रीम् ॥ १३ ॥ suciraṃ śiśiropacāratantrairiti dehātpratimuktatāntitantuḥ | kusumoccayanena sā latānāṃ saphalīkartumiyeṣa caitramaitrīm || 13 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सुमनोनिवहं ग्रहीतुमिच्छञ्जि(च्छुर्जि)तमुक्ताशबलेन्द्रनीलभासः । प्रतिपण्यतयेव दृष्टिपातानमुचत्सा प्रथमं महीरुहेषु ॥ १४ ॥ sumanonivahaṃ grahītumicchañj(cchurji)itamuktāśabalendranīlabhāsaḥ | pratipaṇyatayeva dṛṣṭipātānamucatsā prathamaṃ mahīruheṣu || 14 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्वसितेषु सृजत्सु तत्र तस्याः प्रसरत्सौरभसारसत्रदानम् । अलितर्कुकलोकभूमजन्मा कुसुमानां विरलीबभूव भारः ॥ १५ ॥ śvasiteṣu sṛjatsu tatra tasyāḥ prasaratsaurabhasārasatradānam | alitarkukalokabhūmajanmā kusumānāṃ viralībabhūva bhāraḥ || 15 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अथ तामनुजग्मुरुन्मिषद्भिर्मणिमञ्जीररवैरुदीरयन्त्यः । मदनाभ्युदयोत्सवाग्रवाद्यं विजयाद्याः प्रमथाग्रणीरमण्यः ॥ १६ ॥ atha tāmanujagmurunmiṣadbhirmaṇimañjīraravairudīrayantyaḥ | madanābhyudayotsavāgravādyaṃ vijayādyāḥ pramathāgraṇīramaṇyaḥ || 16 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
लतिका लतिका व्यलोकि देव्या तरला केरलमारुतच्छटाभिः । पृथुवेपथुमद्वपुर्भविष्यत्सुमनोलुण्ठिभिया विवृण्वतीव ॥ १७ ॥ latikā latikā vyaloki devyā taralā keralamārutacchaṭābhiḥ | pṛthuvepathumadvapurbhaviṣyatsumanoluṇṭhibhiyā vivṛṇvatīva || 17 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निभृतं प्रतिकेलिवल्लि तस्या नवशोभाविभवाद्भुतेन चक्षुः । भ्रमरावलिलोहशृङ्खलानां विनिवेशैरिव बध्यमानमासीत् ॥ १८ ॥ nibhṛtaṃ pratikelivalli tasyā navaśobhāvibhavādbhutena cakṣuḥ | bhramarāvalilohaśṛṅkhalānāṃ viniveśairiva badhyamānamāsīt || 18 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तरुसङ्कटसीम्नि कर्णिकारैस्तनुलेखा परिपस्पृशे सुरीणाम् । अधिगन्तुमिवाङ्गनाङ्गसङ्गान्नवसौरभ्यमगोचरं विधातुः ॥ १९ ॥ tarusaṅkaṭasīmni karṇikāraistanulekhā paripaspṛśe surīṇām | adhigantumivāṅganāṅgasaṅgānnavasaurabhyamagocaraṃ vidhātuḥ || 19 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अधिनोद्बकुलः सदाधिकं यो मधुगण्डूषसमर्पणेन भृङ्गीः । स तदा गिरिजानुयायिभृङ्गीमधुगण्डूषरसं बताचकाङ्क्ष ॥ २० ॥ adhinodbakulaḥ sadādhikaṃ yo madhugaṇḍūṣasamarpaṇena bhṛṅgīḥ | sa tadā girijānuyāyibhṛṅgīmadhugaṇḍūṣarasaṃ batācakāṅkṣa || 20 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तिलकोऽग्रपथस्थितोऽमरीषु प्रकिरन्तीषु यदृच्छयैव दृष्टिम् । कमपि श्रममन्तरेण सद्यः शरकारः कुसुमायुधस्य जज्ञे ॥ २१ ॥ tilako'grapathasthito'marīṣu prakirantīṣu yadṛcchayaiva dṛṣṭim | kamapi śramamantareṇa sadyaḥ śarakāraḥ kusumāyudhasya jajñe || 21 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विशतो विबुधीजनस्य सम्यक्चरणस्पर्शमिवाप्तुमश्रमेण । प्रतिबिम्बनिभाद्विलीय तस्थौ मणिमय्यां विपिनावनावशोकः ॥ २२ ॥ viśato vibudhījanasya samyakcaraṇasparśamivāptumaśrameṇa | pratibimbanibhādvilīya tasthau maṇimayyāṃ vipināvanāvaśokaḥ || 22 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चरणाहतिभिः प्रसूय नीत्वा विकचत्वं ललना नखैर्लुनन्त्यः । समकालमशोकपुष्पजातेर्बत सर्गस्थितिसंहृतीर्वितेनुः ॥ २३ ॥ caraṇāhatibhiḥ prasūya nītvā vikacatvaṃ lalanā nakhairlunantyaḥ | samakālamaśokapuṣpajāterbata sargasthitisaṃhṛtīrvitenuḥ || 23 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सुचिरं विरसक्रमापि खेलत्पदसम्पर्करसैरशोकपाली। सहसा विबुधाधिपावरोधैरथ चक्रे मधुपौघकामधेनुः ॥ २४ ॥ suciraṃ virasakramāpi khelatpadasamparkarasairaśokapālī| sahasā vibudhādhipāvarodhairatha cakre madhupaughakāmadhenuḥ || 24 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
बकुलो द्विजजातिसंस्तुतोऽपि प्रमदोच्छेषणमद्यपीत आसीत् । बत गाढनिषेवितस्वशाखैरपि पातित्यमथान्वभावि कुन्दैः ॥ २५ ॥ bakulo dvijajātisaṃstuto'pi pramadoccheṣaṇamadyapīta āsīt | bata gāḍhaniṣevitasvaśākhairapi pātityamathānvabhāvi kundaiḥ || 25 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रमणी चरणं दध(?द​)त्यशोके सहसोदस्तमपि प्रसूनखण्डम् । तरुणारुणरत्ननूपुरांशुस्तबकच्छन्नतनौ चिरादबोधि ॥ २६ ॥ ramaṇī caraṇaṃ dadha(da)tyaśoke sahasodastamapi prasūnakhaṇḍam | taruṇāruṇaratnanūpurāṃśustabakacchannatanau cirādabodhi || 26 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
हठताडितमूर्तिरङ्घ्रिणाग्रे मुखरीभूतविलासनूपुरेण । अधरद्युतितस्कराण्यशोकः सुदृशामाशु पुपोष कुड्मलानि ॥ २७ ॥ haṭhatāḍitamūrtiraṅghriṇāgre mukharībhūtavilāsanūpureṇa | adharadyutitaskarāṇyaśokaḥ sudṛśāmāśu pupoṣa kuḍmalāni || 27 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्रवणाभरणीकृतं वधूनामुपकारान्तरमादधावशोकम् । नवकुङ्कुमपत्रभङ्गभासा प्रतिबिम्बेन विमण्डयत्कपोलम् ॥ २८ ॥ śravaṇābharaṇīkṛtaṃ vadhūnāmupakārāntaramādadhāvaśokam | navakuṅkumapatrabhaṅgabhāsā pratibimbena vimaṇḍayatkapolam || 28 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स सुरप्रमदाजनस्तदानीं वनपर्यन्तपथप्ररोहभाजि । करजक्षतकर्मणा विकारानतिमुक्ते सुमनस्यपि व्यधत्त ॥ २९ ॥ sa surapramadājanastadānīṃ vanaparyantapathaprarohabhāji | karajakṣatakarmaṇā vikārānatimukte sumanasyapi vyadhatta || 29 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सहकारमथो विधाय काचित्क्षतपुष्पव्रजसम्पदं पिकानाम् । वसतिच्छिदया वचोऽनुवादक्रमवैरप्रतियातनं चकार ॥ ३० ॥ sahakāramatho vidhāya kācitkṣatapuṣpavrajasampadaṃ pikānām | vasaticchidayā vaco'nuvādakramavairapratiyātanaṃ cakāra || 30 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अवचित्य करेण कापि दध्रे शिरसा पुष्पमशोकपादपस्य । अपनेतुमिवाङ्घ्रिघातहेलाविनयातिक्रमजं क्रुधः प्रबन्धम् ॥ ३१ ॥ avacitya kareṇa kāpi dadhre śirasā puṣpamaśokapādapasya | apanetumivāṅghrighātahelāvinayātikramajaṃ krudhaḥ prabandham || 31 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निदधे सविधे श्रुतेर्वधूभिश्च्युतनिद्रं नवचम्पकप्रसूनम् । अथ काञ्चनकर्णिकाकपोलस्थलयोस्तस्य च सामरस्यमासीत् ॥ ३२ ॥ nidadhe savidhe śrutervadhūbhiścyutanidraṃ navacampakaprasūnam | atha kāñcanakarṇikākapolasthalayostasya ca sāmarasyamāsīt || 32 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मुखरं कुहरद्विरेफनादैस्तुलितानङ्गमहेभहेमघण्टम् । प्रियगात्रसगोत्रमित्यजस्रं चतुरा काचन चम्पकं ददर्श ॥ ३३ ॥ mukharaṃ kuharadvirephanādaistulitānaṅgamahebhahemaghaṇṭam | priyagātrasagotramityajasraṃ caturā kācana campakaṃ dadarśa || 33 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कबरीभुजगी तथामरीभिस्तगरैरञ्चितकञ्चुकेव चक्रे । अभिपत्य यथा मधुव्रतानां प्रकरो वेणिभरान्तरं ससर्ज ॥ ३४ ॥ kabarībhujagī tathāmarībhistagarairañcitakañcukeva cakre | abhipatya yathā madhuvratānāṃ prakaro veṇibharāntaraṃ sasarja || 34 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नवकिंशुककर्णपूरमन्या दयितेन स्वकरार्पितं बभार । बत तत्क्षणमेव तत्सपत्न्याः प्रकटापाटलमाननं बभूव ॥ ३५ ॥ navakiṃśukakarṇapūramanyā dayitena svakarārpitaṃ babhāra | bata tatkṣaṇameva tatsapatnyāḥ prakaṭāpāṭalamānanaṃ babhūva || 35 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इतरा कुसुमं ग्रहीतुमैच्छद्विटपादुच्चतरादुदस्तपाणिः । भरतो वपुरानमय्य तस्याः कुचभारस्तु मनोरथं बभञ्ज ॥ ३६ ॥ itarā kusumaṃ grahītumaicchadviṭapāduccatarādudastapāṇiḥ | bharato vapurānamayya tasyāḥ kucabhārastu manorathaṃ babhañja || 36 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्रवणाग्रनिवेशिसिन्दुवारं घटमानप्रतियातनं कपोले। उदगच्छदकृत्रिमप्ररूढस्मितगुच्छच्छविचौरतां परस्याः ॥ ३७ ॥ śravaṇāgraniveśisinduvāraṃ ghaṭamānapratiyātanaṃ kapole | udagacchadakṛtrimaprarūḍhasmitagucchacchavicauratāṃ parasyāḥ || 37 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कुसुमान्यपहृत्य यस्य शाखा मुमुचे ताभिरवाञ्चिताञ्चलस्य । नमनापगमे जवादुदञ्चन्स रुषेवाथ तरुश्चिरं चकम्पे ॥ ३८ ॥ kusumānyapahṛtya yasya śākhā mumuce tābhiravāñcitāñcalasya | namanāpagame javādudañcansa ruṣevātha taruściraṃ cakampe || 38 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
परया दुधुवे द्रुमः सहेलं रजसापूर्य दृशौ क्रुधेव तस्याः । अथ तद्दयितस्य तेन तेने परकान्तापरिरम्भणोपलम्भः ॥ ३९ ॥ parayā dudhuve drumaḥ sahelaṃ rajasāpūrya dṛśau krudheva tasyāḥ | atha taddayitasya tena tene parakāntāparirambhaṇopalambhaḥ || 39 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उदजृम्भत वीरुधां रजस्तद्विबुधाधीशपुरन्ध्रिभिर्धुतानाम् । मधुमन्मथयोर्निसर्गसख्यात्प्रचुराकल्पत येन पांसुकेलिः ॥ ४० ॥ udajṛmbhata vīrudhāṃ rajastadvibudhādhīśapurandhribhirdhutānām | madhumanmathayornisargasakhyātpracurākalpata yena pāṃsukeliḥ || 40 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रसभं परिरेभिरे तथा ता अधिरोढुं वरशाखिनं सुमुख्यः । अथ तत्र यथा द्युसद्युवानो द्रुमजन्मप्रणिधानमेव चक्रुः ॥ ४१ ॥ prasabhaṃ parirebhire tathā tā adhiroḍhuṃ varaśākhinaṃ sumukhyaḥ | atha tatra yathā dyusadyuvāno drumajanmapraṇidhānameva cakruḥ || 41 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अधिरोहणसज्जया कयाचिन्निदधत्या चरणौ तरुस्तरुण्या । अवजेतुमशोकमुज्जिहानस्तबकस्तद्रुचिसञ्चयेन चक्रे ॥ ४२ ॥ adhirohaṇasajjayā kayācinnidadhatyā caraṇau tarustaruṇyā | avajetumaśokamujjihānastabakastadrucisañcayena cakre || 42 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अतिमुक्तकमौक्तिकैर्विवव्रे कुचकुम्भेषु वधूजनस्य हारः । समधत्त तदन्तरेऽप्ययत्नादलिपुञ्जस्तरलेन्द्रनीललीलाम् ॥ ४३ ॥ atimuktakamauktikairvivavre kucakumbheṣu vadhūjanasya hāraḥ | samadhatta tadantare'pyayatnādalipuñjastaralendranīlalīlām || 43 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
परया बकुलस्य पुष्पलोभप्रसरत्पाणिनखांशुमण्डलेन । वितरीतुमिव द्रुमाधिराज्यं विदधे मूर्धनि पट्टबन्धसन्धिः ॥ ४४ ॥ parayā bakulasya puṣpalobhaprasaratpāṇinakhāṃśumaṇḍalena | vitarītumiva drumādhirājyaṃ vidadhe mūrdhani paṭṭabandhasandhiḥ || 44 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विधुतः करपुष्करेण दूरान्निपतद्भिः कुसुमैरधश्चरन्तीम् । तरुणीमितरस्तरुश्च काञ्चिच्चिरमानर्च मनोभवाधिदेवीम् ॥ ४५ ॥ vidhutaḥ karapuṣkareṇa dūrānnipatadbhiḥ kusumairadhaścarantīm | taruṇīmitarastaruśca kāñcicciramānarca manobhavādhidevīm || 45 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स पुरन्ध्रिजनः कृतोपकारं सहकारं कुसुमार्पणोपदाभिः । रजसा जनितैर्दृगम्बुपूरैरसिचत्प्रत्युपकर्तुमिच्छयेव ॥ ४६ ॥ sa purandhrijanaḥ kṛtopakāraṃ sahakāraṃ kusumārpaṇopadābhiḥ | rajasā janitairdṛgambupūrairasicatpratyupakartumicchayeva || 46 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अवतंसितमल्लिकाधिवासप्रबले गण्डतले विलासिनीनाम् । घटिता कुटिलालिपङ्क्तिराधान्मृगनाभीमकरीषु पौनरुक्त्यम् ॥ ४७ ॥ avataṃsitamallikādhivāsaprabale gaṇḍatale vilāsinīnām | ghaṭitā kuṭilālipaṅktirādhānmṛganābhīmakarīṣu paunaruktyam || 47 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गणपक्ष्मलचक्षुषां तदानीं रजसार्द्रं सुमनोभिरर्पितेन । निपतत्कठिनार्कतापयोगद्रुतलावण्यमिवाङ्गमङ्गमासीत् ॥ ४८ ॥ gaṇapakṣmalacakṣuṣāṃ tadānīṃ rajasārdraṃ sumanobhirarpitena | nipatatkaṭhinārkatāpayogadrutalāvaṇyamivāṅgamaṅgamāsīt || 48 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
करवीरमधीरलोचनाभिर्जगृहे यत्सविलासमग्रहस्तैः । प्रसरत्करजांशुसूत्रसख्यात्स्रजि तद्बद्धमिवाप्रयत्नतोऽभूत् ॥ ४९ ॥ karavīramadhīralocanābhirjagṛhe yatsavilāsamagrahastaiḥ | prasaratkarajāṃśusūtrasakhyātsraji tadbaddhamivāprayatnato'bhūt || 49 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सकलाध्वगलोकनिर्निमित्तक्षपणाख्याभ्यधिकापराधवन्ति । निबिडं रसराजकिङ्करीभ्यो ललनाभ्यः कुसुमानि बन्धमापुः ॥ ५० ॥ sakalādhvagalokanirnimittakṣapaṇākhyābhyadhikāparādhavanti | nibiḍaṃ rasarājakiṅkarībhyo lalanābhyaḥ kusumāni bandhamāpuḥ || 50 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अभग्ननैसर्गिकसौकुमार्ये निःशेषभूषाग्रथनास्पदेषु । चक्रे शरीरे गणसुन्दरीभिरुदात्ततत्तत्सुमनःसमाजः ॥ ५१ ॥ abhagnanaisargikasaukumārye niḥśeṣabhūṣāgrathanāspadeṣu | cakre śarīre gaṇasundarībhirudāttatattatsumanaḥsamājaḥ || 51 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
एकत्र लीनो मधुपः परत्र पुष्पे पुरोऽभूद्बहुलाभिलाषः । तत्तत्प्रसूनोत्करभाजि देहे तासामनाकाङ्क्षतया तु तस्थौ ॥ ५२ ॥ ekatra līno madhupaḥ paratra puṣpe puro'bhūdbahulābhilāṣaḥ | tattatprasūnotkarabhāji dehe tāsāmanākāṅkṣatayā tu tasthau || 52 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आसीत्स्फुरन्मधुकरक्व​णितासहिष्णु-श्छायादरिद्रितमथोदवहच्छरीरम् । उत्कम्पमापदवशं श्वसनानुबन्धा-त्कान्तैर्वियोगमधिगम्य लता गुलुच्छैः ॥ ५३ ॥ āsītsphuranmadhukarakvaṇitāsahiṣṇu-śchāyādaridritamathodavahaccharīram | utkampamāpadavaśaṃ śvasanānubandhā-tkāntairviyogamadhigamya latā gulucchaiḥ || 53 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उत्तंसितातिसुरभिप्रसवानुबन्धा-त्पृष्ठे भ्रमद्रविकराङ्कुरितक्लमायाः । देव्याः किरीटमणिदीधितिदण्डसङ्गि तद्भ​(द्भृ)ङ्गमण्डलमभूदसितातपत्रम् ॥ ५४ ॥ uttaṃsitātisurabhiprasavānubandhā-tpṛṣṭhe bhramadravikarāṅkuritaklamāyāḥ | devyāḥ kirīṭamaṇidīdhitidaṇḍasaṅgi tadbha(dbhṛ)ṅgamaṇḍalamabhūdasitātapatram || 54 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सर्वस्वे सुमनोमयेऽथ समये तस्मिन्गणप्रेयसी-लोकेनापहृते झगित्यवसिताशेषश्रियः पादपाः । प्राक्संस्कारनिषीददाकुलघनोत्तालालिमालारवै-रब्रह्मण्यमुदैरयन्निव हठोदस्ताग्रशाखाभुजम् ॥ ५५ ॥ sarvasve sumanomaye'tha samaye tasmingaṇapreyasī-lokenāpahṛte jhagityavasitāśeṣaśriyaḥ pādapāḥ | prāksaṃskāraniṣīdadākulaghanottālālimālāravai-rabrahmaṇyamudairayanniva haṭhodastāgraśākhābhujam || 55 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कर्णे चम्पकमुन्नतस्तनतटोत्सङ्गेऽतिमुक्तस्रजं भूषायै प्रमथप्रिया निदधिरे मौलौ च चूताङ्कुरम् । प्रत्यङ्गं कृतनित्यसन्निधिविधेः सद्यः सपर्यारस- स्तेनाकल्पत नान्तरीयकतया देवस्य शृङ्गारिणः ॥ ५६ ॥ karṇe campakamunnatastanataṭotsaṅge'timuktasrajaṃ bhūṣāyai pramathapriyā nidadhire maulau ca cūtāṅkuram | pratyaṅgaṃ kṛtanityasannidhividheḥ sadyaḥ saparyārasa-stenākalpata nāntarīyakatayā devasya śṛṅgāriṇaḥ || 56 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति श्रीजोनराजकृतया टीकया समेतः श्रीराजानकविश्ववर्तसूनोर्महाकविराजराजानकश्रीमङ्खकस्य कृतौ श्रीकण्ठचरिते महाकाव्ये पुष्पावचयवर्णनं नामाष्टमः सर्गः ॥ नवमः सर्गः ॥ अथ ताः प्रसूनरभसेन निभृतपिहिता मधुव्रतैः । श्रान्तिदवथुहतये यमुनापयसीव मग्नवपुषोऽवतस्थिरे ॥ १ ॥ atha tāḥ prasūnarabhasena nibhṛtapihitā madhuvrataiḥ | śrāntidavathuhataye yamunāpayasīva magnavapuṣo'vatasthire || 1 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अवहन्त ताः श्रमजलार्द्रकुसुमरजसाञ्चितं वपुः । एत्य सुरभिरमया रभसाद्विहिताङ्गरागमिव निर्जराङ्गनाः ॥ avahanta tāḥ śramajalārdrakusumarajasāñcitaṃ vapuḥ | etya surabhiramayā rabhasādvihitāṅgarāgamiva nirjarāṅganāḥ || 2 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
घनकर्णिकारभररेणुकवचितसमग्रविग्रहा । श्यामतनुरपि सुगौरतनूरिव तत्र कापि रुरुचे चकोरदृक् ॥ ३ ॥ ghanakarṇikārabharareṇukavacitasamagravigrahā| śyāmatanurapi sugauratanūriva tatra kāpi ruruce cakoradṛk || 3 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अपरा परागनिकरेण घनतरहरिद्रिताम्बरा । आत्तदयितवसनव्यसनां रमणीमनुव्यधित पीतवाससः ॥ ४ ॥ aparā parāganikareṇa ghanataraharidritāmbarā | āttadayitavasanavyasanāṃ ramaṇīmanuvyadhita pītavāsasaḥ || 4 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अथ ताभिरुग्रतरखेदबहुलगतिभिर्मुखानिलैः । नुन्नमिव दिवसनाथवपुः सुरवर्त्मनः सपदि मध्यमध्यगात् ॥ ५ ॥ atha tābhirugratarakhedabahulagatibhirmukhānilaiḥ | nunnamiva divasanāthavapuḥ suravartmanaḥ sapadi madhyamadhyagāt || 5 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गगनासिताश्मतटकोटिनिबिडतरघट्टनादिव । धाम कठिनमभवत्तरणेरधिकं तदा विवृततापविप्लवम् ॥ ६ ॥ gaganāsitāśmataṭakoṭinibiḍataraghaṭṭanādiva | dhāma kaṭhinamabhavattaraṇeradhikaṃ tadā vivṛtatāpaviplavam || 6 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तिलकं ममार्ज विससर्ज घुसृणरसमार्द्र​यद्वपुः । घ​र्मसलिलमकृतैणदृशामवगाहकृत्यमलुनात्तु न क्लमम् ॥ ७ ॥ tilakaṃ mamārja visasarja ghusṛṇarasamārdrayadvapuḥ | gharmasalilamakṛtaiṇadṛśāmavagāhakṛtyamalunāttu na klamam || 7 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रहिताग्रदूतमिव सान्द्रविदलदरविन्दबन्दिभिः । ऊर्मिपवननिवहैरथ ताः प्रययुर्निमज्ज​नरसेन मानसम् ॥ ८ ॥ prahitāgradūtamiva sāndravidaladaravindabandibhiḥ | ūrmipavananivahairatha tāḥ prayayurnimajanarasena mānasam || 8 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उदपश्यदाशु कुतुकेन गणशशिमुखीस्तटोन्मुखीः । लोलशफरवलनेन सरः प्रकटय्य लोचनविचेष्टितानि ताः ॥ ९ ॥ udapaśyadāśu kutukena gaṇaśaśimukhīstaṭonmukhīḥ | lolaśapharavalanena saraḥ prakaṭayya locanaviceṣṭitāni tāḥ || 9 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पुलिनस्थलीकनकपट्टपटलमुकुटेषु तत्र ताः । केलितुलितकलधौतशिलैर्जघनैर्निषेदुरसमश्रमच्छिदे ॥ १० ॥ pulinasthalīkanakapaṭṭapaṭalamukuṭeṣu tatra tāḥ | kelitulitakaladhautaśilairjaghanairniṣedurasamaśramacchide || 10 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पवनात्तताण्डवतदङ्गपरिचितदुकूलपल्लवैः । तस्य तटमपि चिरं सरसो धवलोर्मिसर्ग इव सक्तिमग्रहीत् ॥ ११ ॥ pavanāttatāṇḍavatadaṅgaparicitadukūlapallavaiḥ | tasya taṭamapi ciraṃ saraso dhavalormisarga iva saktimagrahīt || 11 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रतिफालमेत्य सरसोऽन्तरपि धृतपटावगुण्ठनः । तूर्णमकृत स पुरन्ध्रिजनः प्रतिपालनासहतयेव मज्ज​नम् ॥ १२ ॥ pratiphālametya saraso'ntarapi dhṛtapaṭāvaguṇṭhanaḥ | tūrṇamakṛta sa purandhrijanaḥ pratipālanāsahatayeva majjanam || 12 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
द्रवदिन्द्रनीलमणिभासि पयसि सरसः स बिम्बितः। दिव्ययुवतिनिवहः प्रययौ बहिरुज्जिहानजलमानुषीलिपिम् ॥ १३ ॥ dravadindranīlamaṇibhāsi payasi sarasaḥ sa bimbitaḥ| divyayuvatinivahaḥ prayayau bahirujjihānajalamānuṣīlipim || 13 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
जलकेलिनाटकनटीषु तटपथमुपेयुषीष्वथो । उद्यदमललहरीनिवहः पुरतोऽव्रजज्जवनिकापरिश्रमम् ॥ १४ ॥ jalakelināṭakanaṭīṣu taṭapathamupeyuṣīṣvatho | udyadamalalaharīnivahaḥ purato'vrajajjavanikāpariśramam || 14 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्फुरदुत्कटोत्कलिकमाशु विसृमरतरङ्गबाहुभिः । शैलदुहितृपरिवारवधूः परिरब्धुमैच्छदिव ता जलाशयः ॥ १५ ॥ sphuradutkaṭotkalikamāśu visṛmarataraṅgabāhubhiḥ | śailaduhitṛparivāravadhūḥ parirabdhumaicchadiva tā jalāśayaḥ || 15 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्रमवारिबिन्दुभरवर्षपरिचितपयोधरोद्धुराः । कूलसितविहगलोकमदच्छिदिमादधुर्गतिरसेन तत्र ताः ॥ १६ ॥ śramavāribindubharavarṣaparicitapayodharoddhurāḥ | kūlasitavihagalokamadacchidimādadhurgatirasena tatra tāḥ || 16 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वरुणावरोधपुरसौधसहचरविलाससद्मनि । दृष्टिरजनि घनफेनभरे सुदृशां निजस्मितसखे सखेलना ॥ १७ ॥ varuṇāvarodhapurasaudhasahacaravilāsasadmani | dṛṣṭirajani ghanaphenabhare sudṛśāṃ nijasmitasakhe sakhelanā || 17 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मुखरस्तरङ्गनिकरः स मुखनिमितफेनलीलया । किंस्विदचलदुहितुर्व्यतनोदभिषेककेलिशुभशङ्खवादनम् ॥ १८ ॥ mukharastaraṅganikaraḥ sa mukhanimitaphenalīlayā| kiṃsvidacaladuhiturvyatanodabhiṣekakeliśubhaśaṅkhavādanam || 18 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विधुतः स्मराग्निकणवर्षकरणिभिरशोककोरकैः । भाविसलिलपरिमर्शभयादिव तत्यजे कचभरो नतभ्रुवाम् ॥ १९ ॥ vidhutaḥ smarāgnikaṇavarṣakaraṇibhiraśokakorakaiḥ | bhāvisalilaparimarśabhayādiva tatyaje kacabharo natabhruvām || 19 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
