विवलत्तिमिप्रणयभाजि तरलसितफेनचामरे । प्रीतिमधित सुरभीरुजनः स्मरकेतुदण्ड इव वीचिमण्डले ॥ २० ॥ vivalattimipraṇayabhāji taralasitaphenacāmare | prītimadhita surabhīrujanaḥ smaraketudaṇḍa iva vīcimaṇḍale || 20 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स तदा विकीर्य कणपङ्क्तिमुरसि निबिडोन्नतस्तने । हारमपरमुपकल्पितवान्समतूतुषत्स्वरबला जलाशयः ॥ २१ ॥ sa tadā vikīrya kaṇapaṅktimurasi nibiḍonnatastane | hāramaparamupakalpitavānsamatūtuṣatsvarabalā jalāśayaḥ || 21 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स तटान्बभार सुरदारविविधमणिभूषणांशुभिः । वारिविसररभसाभिसरद्घ​नढौकितेन्द्रधनुरुद्धतानिव ॥ २२ ॥ sa taṭānbabhāra suradāravividhamaṇibhūṣaṇāṃśubhiḥ | vārivisararabhasābhisaradghanaḍhaukitendradhanuruddhatāniva || 22 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अरुणत्विषाधरदलेन शशिरुचिसखैस्तथा मुखैः । स्त्रैणमकृत तटजानपदं हरिहेतिहूतिजनमुन्मदाकुलम् ॥ २३ ॥ aruṇatviṣādharadalena śaśirucisakhaistathā mukhaiḥ | straiṇamakṛta taṭajānapadaṃ harihetihūtijanamunmadākulam || 23 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
जलदेवताजनविनिर्यदसितमणिकेलिदर्पणैः। वक्त्रहिमगुसविधे सुदृशां गगनायितं घनसरोजिनीदलैः ॥ २४ ॥ jaladevatājanaviniryadasitamaṇikelidarpaṇaiḥ| vaktrahimagusavidhe sudṛśāṃ gaganāyitaṃ ghanasarojinīdalaiḥ || 24 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
च्यवमानवाससि चिराय वपुषि गणयोषितां प्रियः। ऊर्मिमरुदतत वेपथुमत्पुलकोद्गमं कृतहठावगूहनः ॥ २५ ॥ cyavamānavāsasi cirāya vapuṣi gaṇayoṣitāṃ priyaḥ| ūrmimarudatata vepathumatpulakodgamaṃ kṛtahaṭhāvagūhanaḥ || 25 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रतिबिम्ब्य वारिणि ममज्ज वदनपटली नतभ्रुवाम् । जन्मभुवमिव सभाजयितुं निजसन्निवेशसुहृदां सरोरुहाम् ॥ २६ ॥ pratibimbya vāriṇi mamajja vadanapaṭalī natabhruvām | janmabhuvamiva sabhājayituṃ nijasanniveśasuhṛdāṃ saroruhām || 26 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कुचकुड्मलैस्तरलवीचिभरपरिणतैः सुचक्षुषाम् । प्रापि सुचिरमतिवेलवलज्जलदेवताकनककन्दुकायितम् ॥ २७ ॥ kucakuḍmalaistaralavīcibharapariṇataiḥ sucakṣuṣām | prāpi suciramativelavalajjaladevatākanakakandukāyitam || 27 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
क्षुभिते तदाम्भसि मुमोच मधुपबिसरः सरोरुहम् । द्रष्टुममरयुवतीः कुतुकात्पुरतोऽपसारित इव श्रियोदरात् ॥ २८ ॥ kṣubhite tadāmbhasi mumoca madhupabisaraḥ saroruham | draṣṭumamarayuvatīḥ kutukātpurato'pasārita iva śriyodarāt || 28 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भयकातरं तरुणमुक्तकुटिलहठदीर्घविग्रहः । प्रैक्षि जलकरिभिरेणदृशां कबरीभरोऽभिनवशृङ्खलाभ्रमात् ॥ २९ ॥ bhayakātaraṃ taruṇamuktakuṭilahaṭhadīrghavigrahaḥ | praikṣi jalakaribhireṇadṛśāṃ kabarībharo'bhinavaśṛṅkhalābhramāt || 29 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
जलदन्तिदानभरलोभविशदलिकलापचापलम् । मज्जदमररमणीचिकुरप्रकरस्तदा वरसरस्यसेवत ॥ ३० ॥ jaladantidānabharalobhaviśadalikalāpacāpalam | majjadamararamaṇīcikuraprakarastadā varasarasyasevata || 30 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तनुसीकरोत्करनिभेन पुलकित इवास्त विग्रहः । दिव्ययुवतितनुसङ्गसुखं सलिलाशयस्य सहसाभ्युपेयुषः ॥ ३१ ॥ tanusīkarotkaranibhena pulakita ivāsta vigrahaḥ | divyayuvatitanusaṅgasukhaṃ salilāśayasya sahasābhyupeyuṣaḥ || 31 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
जलमानुषीचिकुरभारशिथिलपटुपाटलस्रजाम् । धार्ष्ट्यमधुरुपनमत्तरुणीघुसृणाङ्गरागसुभगास्तदोर्मयः ॥ ३२ ॥ jalamānuṣīcikurabhāraśithilapaṭupāṭalasrajām | dhārṣṭyamadhurupanamattaruṇīghusṛṇāṅgarāgasubhagāstadormayaḥ || 32 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अपनीय पीतनमुपोढदयितनखलक्ष्मणस्तनोः। कापि झगिति परिपाटलतां प्रतिनायिकाननमिवानयत्पयः ॥ ३३ ॥ apanīya pītanamupoḍhadayitanakhalakṣmaṇastanoḥ| kāpi jhagiti paripāṭalatāṃ pratināyikānanamivānayatpayaḥ || 33 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अपहृत्य पीतनमशेषममरसुदृशां शरीरतः । भीत इव गहननाभिगुहां प्रपलाय्य तूर्णमविशत्पयोभरः ॥ ३४ ॥ apahṛtya pītanamaśeṣamamarasudṛśāṃ śarīrataḥ | bhīta iva gahananābhiguhāṃ prapalāyya tūrṇamaviśatpayobharaḥ || 34 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ललनासु मज्जनरतासु तदमलमुखेन्दुसन्निधौ । वृद्धिमधिकमधिगम्य तदा सरसोऽम्बुनाम्बुधिजलं व्यडम्ब्यत ॥ ३५ ॥ lalanāsu majjanaratāsu tadamalamukhendusannidhau | vṛddhimadhikamadhigamya tadā saraso'mbunāmbudhijalaṃ vyaḍambyata || 35 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अवशं प्रविश्य रससज्जदनिमिषतरङ्गितात्मनाम् । तत्र सरसि ततिरप्सरसां सलिलं चकार किल कूलमुद्रुजम् ॥ ३६ ॥ avaśaṃ praviśya rasasajjadanimiṣataraṅgitātmanām | tatra sarasi tatirapsarasāṃ salilaṃ cakāra kila kūlamudrujam || 36 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निजतीरशेखरमरालकुलगतिविलासतस्करीः । क्षुभ्यदकृत लहरीलगुडैर्हठघट्टितास्त्रिदिवसुन्दरीः सरः ॥ ३७ ॥ nijatīraśekharamarālakulagativilāsataskarīḥ | kṣubhyadakṛta laharīlaguḍairhaṭhaghaṭṭitāstridivasundarīḥ saraḥ || 37 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
द्युवधूचतुःसमरसेन कलुषितमशेषतस्तदा। कूलधवलविहगानदुनोदपि मानसस्य सरसो बतोदकम् ॥ ३८ ॥ dyuvadhūcatuḥsamarasena kaluṣitamaśeṣatastadā| kūladhavalavihagānadunodapi mānasasya saraso batodakam || 38 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गतिभङ्गिनिर्जितजलेभदशनशकलभ्रमादिव । कापि बिसमुदहरत्सरसः प्रियकेलिघट्टनधियामराङ्गना ॥ ३९ ॥ gatibhaṅginirjitajalebhadaśanaśakalabhramādiva | kāpi bisamudaharatsarasaḥ priyakelighaṭṭanadhiyāmarāṅganā || 39 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सलिलग्रहाय परिरब्धमपद इव सान्ध्यनीरदैः । स्त्रैणतनुघुसृणसंवननप्रथितारुणद्युति रराज तत्सरः ॥ ४० ॥ salilagrahāya parirabdhamapada iva sāndhyanīradaiḥ | straiṇatanughusṛṇasaṃvananaprathitāruṇadyuti rarāja tatsaraḥ || 40 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रसमज्ज​दुन्मदपुरन्धितरुणकबरीभरैर्दधे । व्यक्तसलिलतुरगप्रवरश्रुतिकृष्णचामरविडम्बचुम्बनम् ॥ ४१ ॥ rasamajjadunmadapurandhitaruṇakabarībharairdadhe | vyaktasalilaturagapravaraśrutikṛṣṇacāmaraviḍambacumbanam || 41 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
क्षुभिताम्बुभूम्नि निरमज्जि सुरयुवतिवक्त्रनिर्जितैः । गन्तुमिव शरणमम्बुरुहैर्बलिसद्मशायिहरिनाभिपङ्कजम् ॥ ४२ ॥ kṣubhitāmbubhūmni niramajji surayuvativaktranirjitaiḥ | gantumiva śaraṇamamburuhairbalisadmaśāyiharinābhipaṅkajam || 42 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
करजैर्लुलाव कलधौतकमलकुलमङ्गनागणः(जनः) । रूढनवकनकपद्ममिव प्रतिबिम्बितैरथ सरोऽकरोन्मुखैः ॥ ४३ ॥ karajairlulāva kaladhautakamalakulamaṅganāgaṇaḥ(?janaḥ) | rūḍhanavakanakapadmamiva pratibimbitairatha saro'karonmukhaiḥ || 43 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विजहेऽधिवारि तटकोकमिथुनततिमात्मसोदरीम् । द्रष्टुमिव कुचयुगैः पुरतो घनकुङ्कुमावरणमेणचक्षुषाम् ॥ ४४ ॥ vijahe'dhivāri taṭakokamithunatatimātmasodarīm | draṣṭumiva kucayugaiḥ purato ghanakuṅkumāvaraṇameṇacakṣuṣām || 44 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भगवानथ स्वयमुपेत्य सममचलराजकन्यया । तस्य बहलजलकेलिरसात्कमलाकरस्य पुलिनं व्यमण्डयत् ॥ ४५ ॥ bhagavānatha svayamupetya samamacalarājakanyayā | tasya bahalajalakelirasātkamalākarasya pulinaṃ vyamaṇḍayat || 45 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चूडेन्दुना मुकुलिताम्बुजमन्धकार-शङ्काकृता गलरुचासमशोककोकम् । नेत्रानलोष्मचरितेन दरिद्रिताम्भ-स्तस्याग्रतो बत सरो विधुरीबभूव ॥ ४६ ॥ cūḍendunā mukulitāmbujamandhakāra-śaṅkākṛtā galarucāsamaśokakokam | netrānaloṣmacaritena daridritāmbha-stasyāgrato bata saro vidhurībabhūva || 46 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तत्तत्क्षणं भगवतः शशिखण्डमौले: सायुज्यमाप्तमिव मानसमाबभासे । तद्विग्रहेण पयसि द्रवदिन्द्रनील-लावण्यलुण्ठनकृति प्रतिबिम्बितेन ॥ ४७ ॥ tattatkṣaṇaṃ bhagavataḥ śaśikhaṇḍamauleḥ sāyujyamāptamiva mānasamābabhāse | tadvigraheṇa payasi dravadindranīla-lāvaṇyaluṇṭhanakṛti pratibimbitena || 47 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शुद्धप्रभेऽम्भसि तदा स जलाशयाग्र्य – स्तस्योर्ध्वनेत्रशिखिना प्रतिफालभाजा । हर्तुं स्मयव्यतिकरं जलधेरपूर्व- मौर्वाग्निसौहृदमिव प्रकटीचकार ॥ ४८ ॥ śuddhaprabhe'mbhasi tadā sa jalāśayāgrya – stasyordhvanetraśikhinā pratiphālabhājā | hartuṃ smayavyatikaraṃ jaladherapūrva- maurvāgnisauhṛdamiva prakaṭīcakāra || 48 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
फेनापाण्डुरखण्डभस्मरजसं पर्यन्तसीमन्तितो हेमाम्भोरुहकुड्मलैः प्रकटितालीकाग्निकीलाभरम् । बिभ्राणो जटिलं वपुः पुटकिनीपत्रैर्घनोद्यद्गल-च्छायं तं स मृडं व्यडम्बयदिव क्रीडासरोजाकरः ॥ ४९ ॥ phenāpāṇḍurakhaṇḍabhasmarajasaṃ paryantasīmantito hemāmbhoruhakuḍmalaiḥ prakaṭitālīkāgnikīlābharam | bibhrāṇo jaṭilaṃ vapuḥ puṭakinīpatrairghanodyadgala-cchāyaṃ taṃ sa mṛḍaṃ vyaḍambayadiva krīḍāsarojākaraḥ || 49 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दधच्चूडाचन्द्रं नयनदहनार्चिःकपिशितं जलक्रीडासज्जीकृतकनकशृङ्गप्रतिभुवम् । निमज्ज्य प्राज्यत्वं सह गिरिदुहित्राथ भगवा-ननैषीत्तस्याम्भो घटितपटुफेनाट्टहसितम् ॥ ५० ॥ dadhaccūḍācandraṃ nayanadahanārciḥkapiśitaṃ jalakrīḍāsajjīkṛtakanakaśṛṅgapratibhuvam | nimajjya prājyatvaṃ saha giriduhitrātha bhagavā-nanaiṣīttasyāmbho ghaṭitapaṭuphenāṭṭahasitam || 50 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तरललहरीबाहुक्षिप्तैस्त्रिलोचनमार्चिच-च्चिरमिव सरः फेनश्वेतप्रसूनकदम्बकैः । हरितसलिलावर्तश्रेण्या हरिन्मणिकङ्कण-प्रकरमुपदाहेतोर्देव्यै ददाविव चादृतम् ॥ ५१ ॥ taralalaharībāhukṣiptaistrilocanamārcica-cciramiva saraḥ phenaśvetaprasūnakadambakaiḥ | haritasalilāvartaśreṇyā harinmaṇikaṅkaṇa-prakaramupadāhetordevyai dadāviva cādṛtam || 51 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तस्मिन्नथो सरसि दत्तसमुद्रशङ्के सोदर्यवत्सलतया तनया हिमाद्रेः । पातालमूलविहितावसथं वराकं मैनाकमाश्विव सभाजयितुं ममज्ज​ ॥ ५२ ॥ tasminnatho sarasi dattasamudraśaṅke sodaryavatsalatayā tanayā himādreḥ | pātālamūlavihitāvasathaṃ varākaṃ mainākamāśviva sabhājayituṃ mamajja || 52 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
संसज्जत्सरभसनीलकण्ठदृष्टावातिथ्यं निबिडपयोधरप्रपञ्चे । आयाते गिरिदुहितुर्बतातिरेकं तत्कालं किल सलिलाशयोऽधिशिश्ये ॥ ५३ ॥ saṃsajjatsarabhasanīlakaṇṭhadṛṣṭāvātithyaṃ nibiḍapayodharaprapañce| āyāte giriduhiturbatātirekaṃ tatkālaṃ kila salilāśayo'dhiśiśye || 53 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
परितो महेश्वरकुरङ्गचक्षुषः प्रतिबिम्बिताम्बुरुहबन्धुमण्डलाः । धृतशातकौम्भकलशा इवादधुः सुचिरं तरङ्गततयोऽभिषेचनम् ॥ ५४ ॥ parito maheśvarakuraṅgacakṣuṣaḥ pratibimbitāmburuhabandhumaṇḍalāḥ | dhṛtaśātakaumbhakalaśā ivādadhuḥ suciraṃ taraṅgatatayo'bhiṣecanam || 54 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कचेष्वकृत मुक्ततां व्यधित वीतरागं वपु-र्निरञ्जनदशास्पृशावथ ततान सद्यो दृशौ । स मज्जनमहोत्सवः पुलककम्पसम्पज्जुषं जगत्त्रयगुरुप्रियामपि निकाममन्वग्रहीत् ॥ ५५ ॥ kaceṣvakṛta muktatāṃ vyadhita vītarāgaṃ vapu-rnirañjanadaśāspṛśāvatha tatāna sadyo dṛśau | sa majjanamahotsavaḥ pulakakampasampajjuṣaṃ jagattrayagurupriyāmapi nikāmamanvagrahīt || 55 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
त्वङ्गत्तुङ्गतरङ्गधौतशिरसोऽप्यातन्वतो मज्जन-क्रीडां सार्धमगाधिराजसुतया देवस्य मारद्रुहः । मौलीन्दुद्युतिपौनरुक्त्यगुरुभिर्गात्रोद्भवैर्भस्मभि-र्दिक्केलीमुकुरे निकाममुदभूत्तस्मिन्सरस्यच्छता ॥ ५६ ॥ tvaṅgattuṅgataraṅgadhautaśiraso'pyātanvato majjana-krīḍāṃ sārdhamagādhirājasutayā devasya māradruhaḥ | maulīndudyutipaunaruktyagurubhirgātrodbhavairbhasmabhi-rdikkelīmukure nikāmamudabhūttasminsarasyacchatā || 56 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति श्रीजोनराजकृतया टीकया समेतः श्रीराजानकविश्ववर्तसूनोर्महाकविराजराजानकश्रीमङ्खकस्य कृतौ श्रीकण्ठचरिते महाकाव्ये जलक्रीडावर्णनं नाम नवमः सर्गः ॥ दशमः सर्गः ॥ भानुमानथ नभोध्वलङ्घनक्लान्तिकुड्मलितपादपल्लवः । मन्द्रनिर्झररवैरुदीरितस्वागतं चरमशैलमभ्यगात् ॥ १ ॥ bhānumānatha nabhodhvalaṅghanaklāntikuḍmalitapādapallavaḥ | mandranirjhararavairudīritasvāgataṃ caramaśailamabhyagāt || 1 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तत्क्षणोज्जिगमिषन्सुधाकरग्रावदुर्दिनकणोक्षणादिव । अस्तभूभृति कलापमूष्मणोऽभीक्ष्णमर्यममरीचयोऽमुचन् ॥ २ ॥ tatkṣaṇojjigamiṣansudhākaragrāvadurdinakaṇokṣaṇādiva | astabhūbhṛti kalāpamūṣmaṇo'bhīkṣṇamaryamamarīcayo'mucan || 2 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रस्थितेन रविणा समं पितुर्गन्तुमिच्छुरिव पार्श्वमम्बुधेः । पल्लवाररपिधानबन्धुरं श्रीरमुञ्चदरविन्दमन्दिरम् ॥ ३ ॥ prasthitena raviṇā samaṃ piturgantumicchuriva pārśvamambudheḥ | pallavārarapidhānabandhuraṃ śrīramuñcadaravindamandiram || 3 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भूमिमण्डलरसोपभुक्तिभिस्तिग्मगोः सुहिततामुपेयुषः । तल्पकल्पचरमाद्रिशायिनः पादलालनमकारि वारिजैः ॥ ४ ॥ bhūmimaṇḍalarasopabhuktibhistigmagoḥ suhitatāmupeyuṣaḥ | talpakalpacaramādriśāyinaḥ pādalālanamakāri vārijaiḥ || 4 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रोद्भुमिच्छुरिव गन्तुमुद्यतं वल्लभं द्युतिपटाञ्चलग्रहात् । सङ्कुचत्कमलपाणिपल्लवो विक्लवोऽजनि सरोजिनीजनः ॥ ५ ॥ rodbhumicchuriva gantumudyataṃ vallabhaṃ dyutipaṭāñcalagrahāt | saṅkucatkamalapāṇipallavo viklavo'jani sarojinījanaḥ || 5 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चण्डधामनि वहत्यदूरतामावहद्भिरसमोष्मविप्लवम् । सूर्यकान्तगतिरेव पश्चिमे प्रापि सर्वमणिभिः पयोनिधौ ॥ ६ ॥ caṇḍadhāmani vahatyadūratāmāvahadbhirasamoṣmaviplavam | sūryakāntagatireva paścime prāpi sarvamaṇibhiḥ payonidhau || 6 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पद्मपाणिमरविन्दिनी तदा यद्बभार करसम्मुखं रवेः । वेद्मि तेन पुनरागमार्थिनी धर्महस्तममुतः किलाग्रहीत् ॥ ७ ॥ padmapāṇimaravindinī tadā yadbabhāra karasammukhaṃ raveḥ | vedmi tena punarāgamārthinī dharmahastamamutaḥ kilāgrahīt || 7 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रुग्णपादघटनादिवांशुमद्बिम्बशोणमणिपीठिकालुठत् । सम्भ्रमाकुलसरोजलोचनो वासरोऽजनि चिरान्निराश्रयः ॥ ८ ॥ rugṇapādaghaṭanādivāṃśumadbimbaśoṇamaṇipīṭhikāluṭhat | sambhramākulasarojalocano vāsaro'jani cirānnirāśrayaḥ || 8 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अम्बुधेः पयसि बिम्बमम्बरात्तूर्णमम्बुजपतेस्तदापतत् । तत्समुच्छलितसीकरैरिव प्रापदर्कमणिपावकः शमम् ॥ ९ ॥ ambudheḥ payasi bimbamambarāttūrṇamambujapatestadāpatat | tatsamucchalitasīkarairiva prāpadarkamaṇipāvakaḥ śamam || 9 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मन्दमग्निमधुरर्यमोपला दर्शितश्वयथु चाभवत्तमः । दृष्टयस्तिमिरजं सिषेविरे दोषमोषधिपतेरसन्निधौ ॥ १० ॥ mandamagnimadhuraryamopalā darśitaśvayathu cābhavattamaḥ | dṛṣṭayastimirajaṃ siṣevire doṣamoṣadhipaterasannidhau || 10 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उन्मिषत्तरलतारतारया सन्ध्यया तरुणता तथा दधे । गाढरागगरिमोद्गमो यथा वासरो भृशकृशत्वमाययौ ॥ ११ ॥ unmiṣattaralatāratārayā sandhyayā taruṇatā tathā dadhe | gāḍharāgagarimodgamo yathā vāsaro bhṛśakṛśatvamāyayau || 11 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सर्ववासरनिघृष्टपद्मिनीकण्टकक्षतकरः प्रभाकरः। पातितोऽम्बरतलादनेहसा चक्षमे किमपि नावलम्बितुम् ॥ १२ ॥ sarvavāsaranighṛṣṭapadminīkaṇṭakakṣatakaraḥ prabhākaraḥ| pātito'mbaratalādanehasā cakṣame kimapi nāvalambitum || 12 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शंसितुं विजयितामनेहसो न्यस्यता लहरिकोणमब्धिना । निर्ममेऽभ्युपनमन्मरीचिमद्बिम्बताम्रपटहावघट्टनम् ॥ १३ ॥ śaṃsituṃ vijayitāmanehaso nyasyatā laharikoṇamabdhinā | nirmame'bhyupanamanmarīcimadbimbatāmrapaṭahāvaghaṭṭanam || 13 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पद्मरागरुचिसञ्चयाञ्चितावर्तगर्तशतबन्धुरेऽम्बुधौ । सान्ध्यरागसचिवं न मण्डलं पप्रथे विवलमानमुष्णगोः ॥ १४ ॥ padmarāgarucisañcayāñcitāvartagartaśatabandhure'mbudhau | sāndhyarāgasacivaṃ na maṇḍalaṃ paprathe vivalamānamuṣṇagoḥ || 14 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पश्चिमाद्रिवनदावपावके चण्डरोचिषि दधत्यदूरताम् । गर्भसोढवडवानलव्यथः सागरोऽथ बहिरप्य​दह्यत ॥ १५ ॥ paścimādrivanadāvapāvake caṇḍarociṣi dadhatyadūratām | garbhasoḍhavaḍavānalavyathaḥ sāgaro'tha bahirapyadahyata || 15 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
क्षोभिते प्रविशता विवस्वता वारिधावधिकमा रसातलात् । रत्नशारिततदीयपङ्कवत्प्रोद्ययौ तरुणतारकं तमः ॥ १६ ॥ kṣobhite praviśatā vivasvatā vāridhāvadhikamā rasātalāt | ratnaśāritatadīyapaṅkavatprodyayau taruṇatārakaṃ tamaḥ || 16 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सत्यमुष्णरुचिराययौ तदा सम्मुखत्वमनले विविक्षया । तद्विमानशुकचञ्चुरोचिषामञ्चनादिव भृशं शुशोण यत् ॥ १७ ॥ satyamuṣṇarucirāyayau tadā sammukhatvamanale vivikṣayā | tadvimānaśukacañcurociṣāmañcanādiva bhṛśaṃ śuśoṇa yat || 17 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सायमर्चनविधिं वितेनिरे खेचरा नियतमुष्णरश्मये । सान्ध्यरागहरिचन्दनाञ्चितैर्भैर्नभोऽर्घकणवद्यदा बभौ ॥ १८ ॥ sāyamarcanavidhiṃ vitenire khecarā niyatamuṣṇaraśmaye | sāndhyarāgaharicandanāñcitairbhairnabho'rghakaṇavadyadā babhau || 18 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
किं नु कालगणनापतेर्मषीभाण्डमर्यमवपुर्हिरण्मयम् । तत्र यद्विपरिवर्तितानने लिम्पति स्म धरणिं तमोमषी ॥ १९ ॥ kiṃ nu kālagaṇanāpatermaṣībhāṇḍamaryamavapurhiraṇmayam | tatra yadviparivartitānane limpati sma dharaṇiṃ tamomaṣī || 19 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दृप्तमान्मथवरूथिनीभटस्पष्टकृष्टकरवालरोचिषाम् । बन्धवोऽन्धतमसोर्मयोऽभवन्वल्लभाभिसरणाय सुभ्रुवाम् ॥ २० ॥ dṛptamānmathavarūthinībhaṭaspaṣṭakṛṣṭakaravālarociṣām | bandhavo'ndhatamasormayo'bhavanvallabhābhisaraṇāya subhruvām || 20 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शाम्यतोऽर्कमणिजातवेदसो जृम्भमाण इव धूमडम्बरः । अन्धकारनिकरो विनिर्ममे चक्रवाकदृशि बाष्पदुर्दिनम् ॥ २१ ॥ śāmyato'rkamaṇijātavedaso jṛmbhamāṇa iva dhūmaḍambaraḥ | andhakāranikaro vinirmame cakravākadṛśi bāṣpadurdinam || 21 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ताम्यतामधिकसान्ध्यनर्तने शम्भुकङ्कणफणाभृतामिव । श्वासधूमविसरेण मांसलं तत्तमिस्रमतुदद्वियोगिनः ॥ २२ ॥ tāmyatāmadhikasāndhyanartane śambhukaṅkaṇaphaṇābhṛtāmiva | śvāsadhūmavisareṇa māṃsalaṃ tattamisramatudadviyoginaḥ || 22 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सान्ध्यताण्डवविलाससंसरच्चन्द्रशेखरशिरःसरिज्जलैः । पूर्यमाण इव नीरधिर्दधे वृद्धिमिन्दुदृषदम्बुभिः सह ॥ २३ ॥ sāndhyatāṇḍavavilāsasaṃsaraccandraśekharaśiraḥsarijjalaiḥ | pūryamāṇa iva nīradhirdadhe vṛddhimindudṛṣadambubhiḥ saha || 23 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दीपिका रजनिकेलिकुङ्कुमस्थासकप्रतिभुवो मरीचिभिः । जर्जरत्वमुपनीय सान्द्रतां निन्युरञ्जनरजोभरैस्तमः ॥ २४ ॥ dīpikā rajanikelikuṅkumasthāsakapratibhuvo marīcibhiḥ | jarjaratvamupanīya sāndratāṃ ninyurañjanarajobharaistamaḥ || 24 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
केलिसौधशिखरे ततोऽधिका दीपिकाः प्रतिगृहं चकाशिरे । उल्लसन्त्य इव दग्धुमध्वगप्रेयसीजनमनभ्रविद्युतः ॥ २५ ॥ kelisaudhaśikhare tato'dhikā dīpikāḥ pratigṛhaṃ cakāśire | ullasantya iva dagdhumadhvagapreyasījanamanabhravidyutaḥ || 25 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उन्मयूखमनुसन्दधन्पु(धत्पु)रः प्राणनाथवदनेन्दुमण्डलम् । अस्खलत्पथि तमिस्रनिःसहे नो कथञ्चिदभिसारिकाजनः ॥ २६ ॥ unmayūkhamanusandadhanpu(dhatpu)raḥ prāṇanāthavadanendumaṇḍalam | askhalatpathi tamisraniḥsahe no kathañcidabhisārikājanaḥ || 26 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तन्त्रमद्भुतमहो मनोभुवो यन्मते तिमिरमेव योषिताम् । चित्तनाथमभिसर्तुमञ्जसा जायते स्म पथि हस्तदीपिका ॥ २७ ॥ tantramadbhutamaho manobhuvo yanmate timirameva yoṣitām | cittanāthamabhisartumañjasā jāyate sma pathi hastadīpikā || 27 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सङ्कटावटपथेऽपि चास्खलन्मांसले तमसि नाभिसारिकाः । जग्मुरम्बरपथेन निश्चितं ता विमानमधिरुह्य मान्मथम् ॥ २८ ॥ saṅkaṭāvaṭapathe'pi cāskhalanmāṃsale tamasi nābhisārikāḥ | jagmurambarapathena niścitaṃ tā vimānamadhiruhya mānmatham || 28 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शीलितोष्णकरधामभिश्चिरं रात्रिमारुतजडीकृतैरिव । व्यक्ति(क्त​)सीत्कृतमलिस्वनैस्तदा सङ्कुचत्तनुभिरासि नीरजैः ॥ २९ ॥ śīlitoṣṇakaradhāmabhiściraṃ rātrimārutajaḍīkṛtairiva | vyakti(kta)sītkṛtamalisvanaistadā saṅkucattanubhirāsi nīrajaiḥ || 29 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सैन्यरेणुरुदगाज्जिगीषतो रोदसी रतिपतेर्ध्रुवं तमः। स्वापकैतवमुपेत्य जन्तुभिर्यद्भयादिव निमीलिता दृशः ॥ ३० ॥ sainyareṇurudagājjigīṣato rodasī ratipaterdhruvaṃ tamaḥ| svāpakaitavamupetya jantubhiryadbhayādiva nimīlitā dṛśaḥ || 30 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पानतः खरमयूखरोचिषामात्ततापमिव तत्क्षणं तमः । निर्ममेऽङ्गवलनान्यलिव्रजव्याजतो विकचकैरवोदरे ॥ ३१ ॥ pānataḥ kharamayūkharociṣāmāttatāpamiva tatkṣaṇaṃ tamaḥ | nirmame'ṅgavalanānyalivrajavyājato vikacakairavodare || 31 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कुत्र नो सरसि तत्यजे रजःसत्रदानपतिता सरोरुहैः । कैरवाणि जगृहुः शनैः शनैश्चञ्चरीकनवरङ्गपीठताम् ॥ ३२ ॥ kutra no sarasi tatyaje rajaḥsatradānapatitā saroruhaiḥ | kairavāṇi jagṛhuḥ śanaiḥ śanaiścañcarīkanavaraṅgapīṭhatām || 32 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उद्यतोऽथ रजनीविलासिनो भासि कन्दलितनिर्मलश्रियि । क्षुभ्यदम्बुधिविमुक्तमौक्तिकद्योतसख्यमधितेव शक्रदिक् ॥ ३३ ॥ udyato'tha rajanīvilāsino bhāsi kandalitanirmalaśriyi | kṣubhyadambudhivimuktamauktikadyotasakhyamadhiteva śakradik || 33 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पूर्वपर्वतशिखाधिशायिभिर्ग्रावभिः शशिमयूखपाण्डुरैः । भाविनाशभयतस्ततो दधावस्थिशेषमिव विग्रहं तमः ॥ ३४ ॥ pūrvaparvataśikhādhiśāyibhirgrāvabhiḥ śaśimayūkhapāṇḍuraiḥ | bhāvināśabhayatastato dadhāvasthiśeṣamiva vigrahaṃ tamaḥ || 34 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गाढरागमभिगच्छतश्चिरादुन्नतप्रसरदंशुबाहुभिः । इष्यते स्म परिरम्भणं पुरः कर्तुमोषधिभिरोषधि(धी)पतेः ॥ ३५ ॥ gāḍharāgamabhigacchataścirādunnataprasaradaṃśubāhubhiḥ | iṣyate sma parirambhaṇaṃ puraḥ kartumoṣadhibhiroṣadhi(dhī)pateḥ || 35 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गन्धसारमृगनाभिपङ्कयोः सङ्करं प्रतिदिशं दिशन्निव । स क्षणो विहितसन्धिविग्रहश्चन्द्रिकातिमिरयोरजायत ॥ ३६ ॥ gandhasāramṛganābhipaṅkayoḥ saṅkaraṃ pratidiśaṃ diśanniva | sa kṣaṇo vihitasandhivigrahaścandrikātimirayorajāyata || 36 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दिक्तटान्क्वचन चन्द्रिकाञ्चितान्क्वाप्यनुज्झिततमिस्रविप्रुषः । उत्थितो जलनिधेर्विधुर्व्यधात्कीर्णमौक्तिकहरिन्मणीनिव ॥ ३७ ॥ diktaṭānkvacana candrikāñcitānkvāpyanujjhitatamisravipruṣaḥ | utthito jalanidhervidhurvyadhātkīrṇamauktikaharinmaṇīniva || 37 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रात्रिवल्लभमरीचिशारितध्वान्तसन्ततिपरिच्छदे पथि । तत्क्षणे किल सितासितांशुकैः सख्यमैच्छदभिसारिकाजनः ॥ ३८ ॥ rātrivallabhamarīciśāritadhvāntasantatiparicchade pathi | tatkṣaṇe kila sitāsitāṃśukaiḥ sakhyamaicchadabhisārikājanaḥ || 38 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कोऽप्यराजत नभस्तले तदा रोहिणीरमणबिम्बदर्पणः । यत्र विश्ववरवामचक्षुषामेकतः परिणता मुखद्युतिः ॥ ३९ ॥ ko'pyarājata nabhastale tadā rohiṇīramaṇabimbadarpaṇaḥ | yatra viśvavaravāmacakṣuṣāmekataḥ pariṇatā mukhadyutiḥ || 39 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भूतलेऽन्धतमसेन सेविते कुत्रचित्क्वचन धामभिर्विधोः । देहयुग्ममिव शौरिशर्वयोराससाद तिलतण्डुलायितम् ॥ ४० ॥ bhūtale'ndhatamasena sevite kutracitkvacana dhāmabhirvidhoḥ | dehayugmamiva śauriśarvayorāsasāda tilataṇḍulāyitam || 40 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पूर्वाद्रिनिर्झरजलान्मृदुभिः समीरै-रुल्लास्यमान इव नूतनफेनपिण्डः । बिम्बः शनैरथ निशीथवतीप्रियस्य प्रावेशिकीमधिनभोङ्गनमाततान ॥ ४१ ॥ pūrvādrinirjharajalānmṛdubhiḥ samīrai-rullāsyamāna iva nūtanaphenapiṇḍaḥ | bimbaḥ śanairatha niśīthavatīpriyasya prāveśikīmadhinabhoṅganamātatāna || 41 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उन्मुद्रतामुदयनक्षण एव देवः सारङ्गकेतुरनयत्क्व​ न कैरवाणि । न्यासीकृतामुषसि भानुभिया स्वभासं तत्कुड्मलेभ्य इव मङ्क्षु पुनर्जिघृक्षुः ॥ ४२ ॥ unmudratāmudayanakṣaṇa eva devaḥ sāraṅgaketuranayatkva na kairavāṇi | nyāsīkṛtāmuṣasi bhānubhiyā svabhāsaṃ tatkuḍmalebhya iva maṅkṣu punarjighṛkṣuḥ || 42 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
या प्रागौर्वज्वलनदवथुच्छेदनेच्छोपयुक्त-श्रीखण्डाम्भःपरिकरधुरामम्बुराशौ चुचुम्ब । सा पूर्वाद्रौ वनकरिरदोदञ्चदंशुव्यवस्थां प्राप्य ज्योत्स्नालभत नभसः कैरवोत्तंसमुद्राम् ॥ ४३ ॥ yā prāgaurvajvalanadavathucchedanecchopayukta-śrīkhaṇḍāmbhaḥparikaradhurāmamburāśau cucumba | sā pūrvādrau vanakariradodañcadaṃśuvyavasthāṃ prāpya jyotsnālabhata nabhasaḥ kairavottaṃsamudrām || 43 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अङ्कारूढघुणायमानहरिणप्रोत्कीर्यमाणोदर-श्रीखण्डद्रुमखण्डपाण्डुशशभृच्चूणा(र्णौ)घकीर्णा इव । ज्योत्स्ना सा विदधे दिशो दश पटुः पान्थाङ्गनाघट्टन-व्यग्रानङ्गनिशाचराट्टहसिताशङ्कासमुट्टङ्कने ॥ ४४ ॥ aṅkārūḍhaghuṇāyamānahariṇaprotkīryamāṇodara-śrīkhaṇḍadrumakhaṇḍapāṇḍuśaśabhṛccūṇā(rṇau)ghakīrṇā iva | jyotsnā sā vidadhe diśo daśa paṭuḥ pānthāṅganāghaṭṭana-vyagrānaṅganiśācarāṭṭahasitāśaṅkāsamuṭṭaṅkane || 44 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अभ्युद्धृतो रजनिवल्लभबिम्बभङ्ग्या रात्र्या तदा ध्रुवमनङ्गनिधानकुम्भः । यत्तत्र मण्डलितविग्रहकालरक्षा-सर्पद्युतिर्विरहिणीरदशत्कलङ्कः ॥ ४५ ॥ abhyuddhṛto rajanivallabhabimbabhaṅgyā rātryā tadā dhruvamanaṅganidhānakumbhaḥ | yattatra maṇḍalitavigrahakālarakṣā-sarpadyutirvirahiṇīradaśatkalaṅkaḥ || 45 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कूलाङ्केषु मृणालशेवललताभङ्गान् र​थाङ्गो मुखा-त्पर्यस्ताञ्शिशिरोपचाररचनाहेतोरिवाग्रे वहन् । सावश्यायपयःकणोत्करवलत्पक्षावलीलीलया दध्रे गाढवियोगतापविधुरः सान्द्रां जलार्द्रामिव ॥ ४६ ॥ kūlāṅkeṣu mṛṇālaśevalalatābhaṅgān rathāṅgo mukhā-tparyastāñśiśiropacāraracanāhetorivāgre vahan | sāvaśyāyapayaḥkaṇotkaravalatpakṣāvalīlīlayā dadhre gāḍhaviyogatāpavidhuraḥ sāndrāṃ jalārdrāmiva || 46 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विहितपरिसमूहनः पुरस्ताच्छशिमणिवारिभरार्द्रितैः कराग्रैः । विरहहुतवहे जुहाव कोकाञ्जिगमिषुराशु दिवं द्विजाधिराजः ॥ ४७ ॥ vihitaparisamūhanaḥ purastācchaśimaṇivāribharārdritaiḥ karāgraiḥ | virahahutavahe juhāva kokāñjigamiṣurāśu divaṃ dvijādhirājaḥ || 47 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
राज्ञो दर्शितमण्डलाग्रमहसः सोढप्रहाराश्चिरं प्रेङ्खत्खड्गरुचस्तमिस्रनिचया ये जीवितं तत्यजुः । ते सद्योऽगुरुधूपधूमकलया जन्मान्तरं लेभिरे शङ्के नाकिवधूजनार्द्रचिकुरोत्सङ्गोपभोगोचितम् ॥ ४८ ॥ rājño darśitamaṇḍalāgramahasaḥ soḍhaprahārāściraṃ preṅkhatkhaḍgarucastamisranicayā ye jīvitaṃ tatyajuḥ | te sadyo'gurudhūpadhūmakalayā janmāntaraṃ lebhire śaṅke nākivadhūjanārdracikurotsaṅgopabhogocitam || 48 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यः सान्द्रोदयरागयोगसुभगः सिन्दूरमुद्रालिपिं प्रागध्यास्त समस्तमान्मथबृहत्कोषप्रतिष्ठातिथिः । जज्ञे स क्रमशो निरङ्कुशरतक्षुभ्यत्सुरप्रेयसी-कर्णाग्रच्युतदन्तपत्रतुलनामल्लस्तमीवल्लभः ॥ ४९ ॥ yaḥ sāndrodayarāgayogasubhagaḥ sindūramudrālipiṃ prāgadhyāsta samastamānmathabṛhatkoṣapratiṣṭhātithiḥ | jajñe sa kramaśo niraṅkuśaratakṣubhyatsurapreyasī-karṇāgracyutadantapatratulanāmallastamīvallabhaḥ || 49 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भ्रातृव्यं दिव्यनारीजनवदनरुचां कुर्वदाचार्यचर्या-मम्भोधेः स्थूलकूलङ्कषजललहरीलास्यलीलारहस्ये । बिम्बं कौटुम्ब्यचुम्बि स्मरमदकरटिश्रोत्रशङ्खप्रथानां चार्द्रं(न्द्रं) द्रागेव लीढाम्बरतलमलुनाद्विश्वचक्षुर्विषादम् ॥ ५० ॥ bhrātṛvyaṃ divyanārījanavadanarucāṃ kurvadācāryacaryā-mambhodheḥ sthūlakūlaṅkaṣajalalaharīlāsyalīlārahasye | bimbaṃ kauṭumbyacumbi smaramadakaraṭiśrotraśaṅkhaprathānāṃ cārdraṃ(ndraṃ) drāgeva līḍhāmbaratalamalunādviśvacakṣurviṣādam || 50 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
हृदयनिवसत्कन्दर्पेषुप्रसूनजसौरभ-प्रणयिमधुकृत्पङ्क्त्या छायाछलादनुधाविताः । घनहिमकरालोके लोके विपाण्डुरमण्डना-श्चतुरचतुरं कान्तोपान्तं ययुर्वरयोषितः ॥ ५१ ॥ hṛdayanivasatkandarpeṣuprasūnajasaurabha-praṇayimadhukṛtpaṅktyā chāyāchalādanudhāvitāḥ | ghanahimakarāloke loke vipāṇḍuramaṇḍanā-ścaturacaturaṃ kāntopāntaṃ yayurvarayoṣitaḥ || 51 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
देवः शिखामणिरयुग्मविलोचनस्य ज्योत्स्नानिचोलनिहिताखिलजीवलोकः । तत्कालकान्तविरहार्तपुरन्ध्रिवर्ग-दृङ्मार्गमात्रशरणं विदधेऽन्धकारम् ॥ ५२ ॥ devaḥ śikhāmaṇirayugmavilocanasya jyotsnānicolanihitākhilajīvalokaḥ | tatkālakāntavirahārtapurandhrivarga-dṛṅmārgamātraśaraṇaṃ vidadhe'ndhakāram || 52 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
असकृदुदयद्दानस्रोतःकणोत्करविभ्रमं सरसि सरसि व्यातन्वानैर्निलीनमलिव्रजम् । जलगजघटोदस्तैर्दन्ताङ्कुरैरिव सर्वतः कुमुदमुकुलैर्द्रागस्फोटि स्फुटेन्दुकरोदये ॥ ५३ ॥ asakṛdudayaddānasrotaḥkaṇotkaravibhramaṃ sarasi sarasi vyātanvānairnilīnamalivrajam | jalagajaghaṭodastairdantāṅkurairiva sarvataḥ kumudamukulairdrāgasphoṭi sphuṭendukarodaye || 53 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आमन्द्रोर्मिनिनादबृंहितरवैराघ्रातदिक्कुञ्जरः स्वैरं वारिधिवारणस्तटगिरिप्रक्रान्तवप्रक्रियः । चञ्चच्चन्द्रमरीचिभूतिरजसः सङ्गेन शृङ्गारितै-रङ्गैर्व्योमतमालकाननहठास्कन्दाय दध्रे मदम् ॥ ५४ ॥ āmandrormininādabṛṃhitaravairāghrātadikkuñjaraḥ svairaṃ vāridhivāraṇastaṭagiriprakrāntavaprakriyaḥ | cañcaccandramarīcibhūtirajasaḥ saṅgena śṛṅgāritai-raṅgairvyoma tamālakānanahaṭhāskandāya dadhre madam || 54 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
व्याख्याता पृथुमान्मथोपनिषदां कल्याणमित्रं हठ-प्राणेशाभिसृतिव्रते मृगदृशां हस्तप्रदीपो रतेः । ध्वान्तारुन्तुदकान्तिदन्तुरवपुः सीमन्तितस्वर्मुखो देवोऽजायत यामिनीप्रियतमस्तृष्यञ्चकोरप्रपा ॥ ५५ ॥ vyākhyātā pṛthumānmathopaniṣadāṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ haṭha-prāṇeśābhisṛtivrate mṛgadṛśāṃ hastapradīpo rateḥ | dhvāntāruntudakāntidanturavapuḥ sīmantitasvarmukho devo'jāyata yāminīpriyatamastṛṣyañcakoraprapā || 55 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
किं देवस्य कुमुद्वतीकुलपतेर्व्योमस्थलीशायिनः सङ्क्रान्तप्रतिकेलिवापि तरलोत्तालं बभौ मण्डलम् । पेष्टुं मानवतीजनस्य मनसो मानं स्मरो निर्ममे किं पानीयघरट्टटङ्कनमिति भ्रान्तिर्न विश्राम्यति ॥ ५६ ॥ kiṃ devasya kumudvatīkulapatervyomasthalīśāyinaḥ saṅkrāntapratikelivāpi taralottālaṃ babhau maṇḍalam | peṣṭuṃ mānavatījanasya manaso mānaṃ smaro nirmame kiṃ pānīyagharaṭṭaṭaṅkanamiti bhrāntirna viśrāmyati || 56 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भूरैन्दवोपलमयी सलिलं ववर्ष द्यौराप ताण्डवितचित्रशिखण्डिरूपम् । आस्तोपड्ड(डुप​)स्य रससीम्नि न रोधवृत्ति-रित्थं ससर्ज किल रात्रिरपूर्ववर्षाः ॥ ५७ ॥ bhūraindavopalamayī salilaṃ vavarṣa dyaurāpa tāṇḍavitacitraśikhaṇḍirūpam | āstopaḍḍa(ḍup)sya rasasīmni na rodhavṛtti- ritthaṃ sasarja kila rātrirapūrvavarṣāḥ || 57 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
करैः शाम्यत्सूर्योपलदहनभस्मव्यतिकरा-दिवापाण्डुच्छायैर्हृदयमुकुरं भङ्गुरदृशाम् । समुत्सृज्याशेषं मलमतुलमानग्रहमयं मृगाङ्कस्तत्कालप्रतिफलितकन्दर्पमकरोत् ॥ ५८ ॥ karaiḥ śāmyatsūryopaladahanabhasmavyatikarā-divāpāṇḍucchāyairhṛdayamukuraṃ bhaṅguradṛśām | samutsṛjyāśeṣaṃ malamatulamānagrahamayaṃ mṛgāṅkastatkālapratiphalitakandarpamakarot || 58 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आरक्तं हठरोदनारुणपतन्नेत्रान्तकान्त्युद्गमै-निःश्वासैर्विरमन्निसर्गशिशिरस्पर्शं कठोरोर्मिभिः । चन्द्रं चण्डकरं वियोगजरुजासब्रह्मचारिक्वथ-त्कोकीशोकजिहीर्षयेव सुचिरं पान्थप्रियाश्चक्रिरे ॥ ५९ ॥ āraktaṃ haṭharodanāruṇapatannetrāntakāntyudgamai-niḥśvāsairviramannisargaśiśirasparśaṃ kaṭhorormibhiḥ | candraṃ caṇḍakaraṃ viyogajarujāsabrahmacārikvatha-tkokīśokajihīrṣayeva suciraṃ pānthapriyāścakrire || 59 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्फूर्जत्किञ्जल्कहालाहलबहुलरसोद्गारतो मानिनीनां दत्तायासं विकासं कुवलयमुकुलान्याश्रयन्ति श्रमेण । उद्यत्सायाह्नवात्याकवलनकलितस्पन्दकन्दर्पकाल-व्यालव्यादीर्यमाणस्फुटफणफलकप्रौढिमानं विवव्रुः ॥ ६० ॥ sphūrjatkiñjalkahālāhalabahularasodgārato māninīnāṃ dattāyāsaṃ vikāsaṃ kuvalayamukulānyāśrayanti śrameṇa | udyatsāyāhnavātyākavalanakalitaspandakandarpakāla-vyālavyādīryamāṇasphuṭaphaṇaphalakaprauḍhimānaṃ vivavruḥ || 60 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मललवनिभसज्जत्कज्जलः सान्द्रसान्ध्य-द्युतिशिखिखचिताभ्रभ्राष्ट्रगश्चन्द्रबिम्बः । नवरजतकटाहः कल्पितो मन्मथेन क्वथयितुमिव पान्थप्रेयसीमानसानि ॥ ६१ ॥ malalavanibhasajjatkajjalaḥ sāndrasāndhya-dyutiśikhikhacitābhrabhrāṣṭragaścandrabimbaḥ | navarajatakaṭāhaḥ kalpito manmathena kvathayitumiva pānthapreyasīmānasāni || 61 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति श्रीजोनराजकृतया टीकया समेतः श्रीराजानकविश्ववर्तसूनोर्महाकविराजराजानकश्रीमङ्खकस्य कृतौ श्रीकण्ठचरिते महाकाव्ये सन्ध्यावर्णनं नाम दशमः सर्गः ॥ एकादशः सर्गः ॥ मण्डलेन शशिनो विनिविश्य व्योम्नि दीर्घकरदण्डसखेन । मारवज्रगुलकप्रतिमेन द्रागभज्यत वधूजनमानः ॥ १ ॥ maṇḍalena śaśino viniviśya vyomni dīrghakaradaṇḍasakhena | māravajragulakapratimena drāgabhajyata vadhūjanamānaḥ || 1 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यत्कला किल झषाङ्कपुलिन्दस्पन्दमानबडिशव्रतमाधात् । मण्डलोऽमृतरुचोऽजनि चक्रं स क्रमेण रसराजरथस्य ॥ २ ॥ yatkalā kila jhaṣāṅkapulindaspandamānabaḍiśavratamādhāt | maṇḍalo'mṛtaruco'jani cakraṃ sa krameṇa rasarājarathasya || 2 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आवहन्ननवधिं परिवारं मण्डलं शशभृतोऽधिशयानः । चित्रमत्र कुसुमायुधदेवो मानिनीष्वधित संहृतिमुद्राम् ॥ ३ ॥ āvahannanavadhiṃ parivāraṃ maṇḍalaṃ śaśabhṛto'dhiśayānaḥ | citramatra kusumāyudhadevo māninīṣvadhita saṃhṛtimudrām || 3 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दूरतः परिणमद्विधुबिम्बं विक्लवाः कुचतटं विरहिण्यः । बिभ्रति स्म हृदि दत्तपिधानं मन्मथेन पुटपाकधियेव ॥ ४ ॥ dūrataḥ pariṇamadvidhubimbaṃ viklavāḥ kucataṭaṃ virahiṇyaḥ | bibhrati sma hṛdi dattapidhānaṃ manmathena puṭapākadhiyeva || 4 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अब्धिवारिवदवीवृधदिन्दुः कोष्णमम्बु दृशि मानवतीनाम् । येन सिक्तवपुषो रतिभर्तुः प्रत्युत प्रववृते भुजकण्डूः ॥ ५ ॥ abdhivārivadavīvṛdhadinduḥ koṣṇamambu dṛśi mānavatīnām | yena siktavapuṣo ratibhartuḥ pratyuta pravavṛte bhujakaṇḍūḥ || 5 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रस्तुताखिलधृतिक्षतिदीक्षैर्मण्डलाञ्चनचणैः शशिपादैः । निर्ममे गुरुभिरध्वगयूनामश्रु नेत्रपटबन्धविधानम् ॥ ६ ॥ Spiritual masters observe vows, worship maṇḍalas, and blindfold their disciples with a piece of cloth while initiating them into a mantra (JR) (also see footnote under 7.. The plural 'pādāḥ' is often added to the names of spiritual masters (e.g., Abhinavaguptapādāḥ) to express veneration. महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मध्यलक्ष्यपृथुलाञ्छनमिन्दोर्मण्डलं ददृशुरध्वगवध्वः । उद्धृताररमिव स्फटिकाश्मद्वारमन्तकपुरीमधिरोढुम् ॥ ७ ॥ madhyalakṣyapṛthulāñchanamindormaṇḍalaṃ dadṛśuradhvagavadhvaḥ | uddhṛtāraramiva sphaṭikāśmadvāramantakapurīmadhiroḍhum || 7 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मानिनीषु परुषो मरुदासीत्फुल्लकैरवरजःप्रकरेण । भस्मनेव विरहानलहेलादग्धपान्थहृदयप्रसृतेन ॥ ८ ॥ māninīṣu paruṣo marudāsītphullakairavarajaḥprakareṇa | bhasmaneva virahānalahelādagdhapānthahṛdayaprasṛtena || 8 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
