चूचुकोपमशशः शशिबिम्बः कोऽप्यदर्शि स निशाकुचकुम्भः । पीडनं निबिडमग्रकरैर्यश्चित्रमातनुत कामिजनस्य ॥ ९ ॥ cūcukopamaśaśaḥ śaśibimbaḥ ko'pyadarśi sa niśākucakumbhaḥ | pīḍanaṃ nibiḍamagrakarairyaścitramātanuta kāmijanasya || 9 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चन्द्रहासपथदर्शनताम्यद्विप्रयोगभरजर्जररामे । सेतुबन्ध इव तत्समये स क्षोभ​सम्भ्रममवाप पयोधिः ॥ १० ॥ candrahāsapathadarśanatāmyadviprayogabharajarjararāme | setubandha iva tatsamaye sa kṣobhasambhramamavāpa payodhiḥ || 10 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मीलितासु नलिनीषु तदानीं किं रमा कुमुदिनीरधिशिश्ये । तासु यत्तदिभदानकणानां टङ्कमापुरलयो निपतन्तः ॥ ११ ॥ mīlitāsu nalinīṣu tadānīṃ kiṃ ramā kumudinīradhiśiśye | tāsu yattadibhadānakaṇānāṃ ṭaṅkamāpuralayo nipatantaḥ || 11 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चन्द्रमाः स्मरचमूवरयोधो धामभिर्व्यददरत्कुमुदानि । विप्रयुक्तवनिताजनचेतोदारणे विरचयन्निव योग्याम् ॥ १२ ॥ candramāḥ smaracamūvarayodho dhāmabhirvyadadaratkumudāni | viprayuktavanitājanacetodāraṇe viracayanniva yogyām || 12 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कमलरुचिनिमीलनैककार्यप्रविसृमराधिकसख्यरेखयेव । नवपरिणतमूर्तिरेणलक्ष्मा परिरभते रभसेन तेऽङ्घ्रियुग्मम् ॥ १३ ॥ kamalarucinimīlanaikakāryapravisṛmarādhikasakhyarekhayeva | navapariṇatamūrtireṇalakṣmā parirabhate rabhasena te'ṅghriyugmam || 13 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तव चरणयुगं प्रिये नखेषु प्रतिफलता हरिणाङ्कमण्डलेन । चतुरमुखरनूपुरोपहूताविरलमरालसनाथतामिवैति ॥ १४ ॥ tava caraṇayugaṃ priye nakheṣu pratiphalatā hariṇāṅkamaṇḍalena | caturamukharanūpuropahūtāviralamarālasanāthatāmivaiti || 14 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
घनजघनतटे निलीयतेऽसौ तव तरुणि प्रतिमाहिमांशुबिम्बः । दधदधिगतनित्यसन्निधानस्मरनृपराजतपादपीठगोष्ठीम् ॥ १५ ॥ ghanajaghanataṭe nilīyate'sau tava taruṇi pratimāhimāṃśubimbaḥ | dadhadadhigatanityasannidhānasmaranṛparājatapādapīṭhagoṣṭhīm || 15 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
परिणतिमुपजग्मुषा तुषारद्युतिवपुषोदरसीम्न्यखण्डितेन । अनुहरसि हरेः पुरन्ध्रिमूर्तिं पिहितहठोद्गतनाभिपुण्डरीकाम् ॥ १६ ॥ pariṇatimupajagmuṣā tuṣāradyutivapuṣodarasīmnyakhaṇḍitena | anuharasi hareḥ purandhrimūrtiṃ pihitahaṭhodgatanābhipuṇḍarīkām || 16 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तव वरललने वलीविभङ्गप्रतिफलनप्रविभक्तमूर्तिरिन्दुः । श्रयति लिपिमकृत्रिमप्ररोहन्नवरशनाश्रयरत्नकिङ्किणीनाम् ॥ १७ ॥ tava varalalane valīvibhaṅgapratiphalanapravibhaktamūrtirinduḥ | śrayati lipimakṛtrimaprarohannavaraśanāśrayaratnakiṅkiṇīnām || 17 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रहरति हरिणाङ्कने तवेदं कुचयुगमन्तिकबिम्बिते लस​न्त्याः । रुचिसहचरकोकपक्षपातादिव चलहारलताविवल्गनेन ॥ १८ ॥ praharati hariṇāṅkane tavedaṃ kucayugamantikabimbite lasantyāḥ | rucisahacarakokapakṣapātādiva calahāralatāvivalganena || 18 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विलसति कलकण्ठि कण्ठ एष प्रतिफलता तव चन्द्रमण्डलेन । मुररिपुकरकम्बुनेव शोभाहरणरुषा हठकिङ्करीकृतेन ॥ १९ ॥ vilasati kalakaṇṭhi kaṇṭha eṣa pratiphalatā tava candramaṇḍalena | muraripukarakambuneva śobhāharaṇaruṣā haṭhakiṅkarīkṛtena || 19 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
परिणतवपुरेष रात्रिराजस्तव सविधेऽधरपल्लवस्य मुग्धे । प्रभवति रचनामनुग्रहीतुं प्रतिदिनपुञ्जितविभ्रमस्मितस्य ॥ २० ॥ pariṇatavapureṣa rātrirājastava savidhe'dharapallavasya mugdhe | prabhavati racanāmanugrahītuṃ pratidinapuñjitavibhramasmitasya || 20 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रतिमितमधिगण्डमण्डलं ते रजनिपतेः परिपूर्तिमच्छरीरम् । उपनयति नताङ्गि पौनरुक्त्यं पृथुतरमौक्तिककुण्डलप्रतिष्ठाम् ॥ २१ ॥ pratimitamadhigaṇḍamaṇḍalaṃ te rajanipateḥ paripūrtimaccharīram | upanayati natāṅgi paunaruktyaṃ pṛthutaramauktikakuṇḍalapratiṣṭhām || 21 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्रवणपरिसरे तुषारधामा तव घटितप्रतियातनश्चकास्ति । युवतिकुलगुरोर्मुखादधीतं किमपि हरस्य(रहस्य​)मिवोपदेष्टुकामः ॥ २२ ॥ śravaṇaparisare tuṣāradhāmā tava ghaṭitapratiyātanaścakāsti | yuvatikulagurormukhādadhītaṃ kimapi harasya(rahasya)mivopadeṣṭukāmaḥ || 22 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अलिकफलकसीम्नि तेऽब्ज​वक्त्रे शिशिरकरप्रतिबिम्बपङ्क्तिरास्ते । निखिलयुवतिमण्डलाधिराज्ये कृत इव पञ्चशरेण मौलिबन्धः ॥ २३ ॥ alikaphalakasīmni te'javaktre śiśirakarapratibimbapatirāste | nikhilayuvatimaṇḍalādhirājye kṛta iva pañcaśareṇa maulibandhaḥ || 23 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निरुपममहिमस्पृशां शशाङ्कप्रतितनुभिर्निखिलाङ्गसङ्गिनीभिः । अघटि चटुचमूरिति प्रियेण प्रसृतिदृशामनुरागकिङ्करेण ॥ २४ ॥ nirupamamahimaspṛśāṃ śaśāṅkapratitanubhirnikhilāṅgasaṅginībhiḥ | aghaṭi caṭucamūriti priyeṇa prasṛtidṛśāmanurāgakiṅkareṇa || 24 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
जहि नीलदुकूलसंविधानं वपुषस्त्वं शरकाण्डपाण्डुरस्य । क्षतिमेतु कुरङ्गकेतुमूर्तेर्जलदातङ्ककलामयः कलङ्कः ॥ २५ ॥ jahi nīladukūlasaṃvidhānaṃ vapuṣastvaṃ śarakāṇḍapāṇḍurasya | kṣatimetu kuraṅgaketumūrterjaladātaṅkakalāmayaḥ kalaṅkaḥ || 25 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सकृदेव विलोचनद्वयीयं कृतवत्येणमदावधीरणं ते । घटनामधुना तु गण्डलेखाप्यनुयात्वेणमदावधीरणाय ॥ २६ ॥ sakṛdeva vilocanadvayīyaṃ kṛtavatyeṇamadāvadhīraṇaṃ te | ghaṭanāmadhunā tu gaṇḍalekhāpyanuyātveṇamadāvadhīraṇāya || 26 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विसृज स्रजमुत्पलच्छदानां हठकेशग्रहसाहसैकधृष्णुम् । क्रियते तव पैशुनं कदाचिद्यदमीभिर्नयनैकवैरकारैः ॥ २७ ॥ visṛja srajamutpalacchadānāṃ haṭhakeśagrahasāhasaikadhṛṣṇum | kriyate tava paiśunaṃ kadācidyadamībhirnayanaikavairakāraiḥ || 27 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
द्रुतमुच्चकुचद्वयं दरिद्रं कुरु कालागुरुमञ्जरीभरेण । मुखरभ्रमरोपहूतिचञ्चुर्यदनर्थान्तरमप्ययं प्रसूते ॥ २८ ॥ drutamuccakucadvayaṃ daridraṃ kuru kālāgurumañjarībhareṇa | mukharabhramaropahūticañcuryadanarthāntaramapyayaṃ prasūte || 28 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निबिडस्तनमण्डलात्तवासावपयातु द्रुतमिन्द्रनीलहारः । वितनोति तमोधियेव चन्द्रो रुचिकेशग्रहमस्य यत्कराग्रैः ॥ २९ ॥ nibiḍastanamaṇḍalāttavāsāvapayātu drutamindranīlahāraḥ | vitanoti tamodhiyeva candro rucikeśagrahamasya yatkarāgraiḥ || 29 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति मेचक एष वेषमार्गः शममायातु तवानवद्यगात्रि । उदयन्यदयं करोति विघ्नं मृगलक्ष्मा तिमिराभिसारिकाणाम् ॥ ३० ॥ iti mecaka eṣa veṣamārgaḥ śamamāyātu tavānavadyagātri | udayanyadayaṃ karoti vighnaṃ mṛgalakṣmā timirābhisārikāṇām || 30 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अथवा बिभृहि त्वमङ्गवीथ्यामसिताकल्पमनल्पमिन्दुवक्त्रे । स्वयमेव पिधास्यते यदेनं घनकेलिस्मितचन्द्रिकाधिकारः ॥ ३१ ॥ athavā bibhṛhi tvamaṅgavīthyāmasitākalpamanalpaminduvaktre | svayameva pidhāsyate yadenaṃ ghanakelismitacandrikādhikāraḥ || 31 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चतुरं शशलक्ष्मणि क्षपाया हरति ध्वान्तसितेतरोत्तरीयम् । उपदेशमिति प्रसह्य सख्यो रचयन्ति स्म तमोभिसारिकाणाम् ॥ ३२ ॥ caturaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇi kṣapāyā harati dhvāntasitetarottarīyam | upadeśamiti prasahya sakhyo racayanti sma tamobhisārikāṇām || 32 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ज्योत्स्नाभिसारविधये बिसकङ्कणानि मुक्तागुणा मलयजं च तवातितुष्ट्यै । कन्दर्पदाहलहरीहरणादवाप्तं यत्रान्तरीयकगुणान्तरमप्यमीभिः ॥ ३३ ॥ jyotsnābhisāravidhaye bisakaṅkaṇāni muktāguṇā malayajaṃ ca tavātituṣṭyai | kandarpadāhalaharīharaṇādavāptaṃ yatrāntarīyakaguṇāntaramapyamībhiḥ || 33 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कल्लोलिताप्युदयतो यदतिग्मरश्मे-र्यद्गाहसे च झषकेतुविवल्गितानि । शुभ्राभिसारपरिपाण्डुरवेषबन्धु-स्तद्भासि दुग्धजलधेरधिदेवता त्वम् ॥ ३४ ॥ kallolitāpyudayato yadatigmaraśme-ryadgāhase ca jhaṣaketuvivalgitāni | śubhrābhisāraparipāṇḍuraveṣabandhu-stadbhāsi dugdhajaladheradhidevatā tvam || 34 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सम्पादयेन्दुवदने त्वमकाण्ड एव श्रीखण्डकाण्डरसपङ्किलमङ्गमङ्गम् । येनात्र केतकशरो विचरन्पदानि नोद्धर्तुमर्हति जवेन रतिद्वितीयः ॥ ३५ ॥ sampādayenduvadane tvamakāṇḍa eva śrīkhaṇḍakāṇḍarasapaṅkilamaṅgamaṅgam | yenātra ketakaśaro vicaranpadāni noddhartumarhati javena ratidvitīyaḥ || 35 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चूर्णालकव्यतिकरे ननु किं मुधैव शेफालिकामुकुलशेखरकल्पनाभिः । अस्मिंल्ललाटफलके प्रतिबिम्बितस्ते तत्कर्मनर्म कुरुते हि तमीकुटुम्बः ॥ ३६ ॥ cūrṇālakavyatikare nanu kiṃ mudhaiva śephālikāmukulaśekharakalpanābhiḥ | asmiṃllalāṭaphalake pratibimbitaste tatkarmanarma kurute hi tamīkuṭumbaḥ || 36 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चन्द्रातपाभिसरणे मणिनूपुराभ्यां पादौ परं परिचर त्वमधीरतारे । तन्मञ्जुशिञ्जितशतैरुपहूयमानं यन्निह्नवाय तव केलिमरालयूथम् ॥ ३७ ॥ candrātapābhisaraṇe maṇinūpurābhyāṃ pādau paraṃ paricara tvamadhīratāre | tanmañjuśiñjitaśatairupahūyamānaṃ yannihnavāya tava kelimarālayūtham || 37 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
खेलैः पदैर्दयितमानससञ्चरिष्णु-स्त्वं प्रस्थिता मदनविभ्रमराजहंसि । व्यालोलचीनसिचयाञ्चलपक्षपालि-स्तूर्णं किमुड्डयनकर्म विनिर्मिमीषे ॥ ३८ ॥ khelaiḥ padairdayitamānasasañcariṣṇu-stvaṃ prasthitā madanavibhramarājahaṃsi | vyālolacīnasicayāñcalapakṣapāli-stūrṇaṃ kimuḍḍayanakarma vinirmimīṣe || 38 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ज्योत्स्नास्थितावभिसरन्त्यभिकं शरीरे भूषां वृथैव कृतवत्यसि चन्द्रकान्तैः । एषां यदिन्दुकरताण्डवितैः पयोभि-रार्द्रीकृते पथि पदानि तव स्खलन्ति ॥ ३९ ॥ jyotsnāsthitāvabhisarantyabhikaṃ śarīre bhūṣāṃ vṛthaiva kṛtavatyasi candrakāntaiḥ | eṣāṃ yadindukaratāṇḍavitaiḥ payobhi-rārdrīkṛte pathi padāni tava skhalanti || 39 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रक्षायताक्षि सितवेषविशेषमेव चिन्ता प्रियं प्रति न सम्प्रति युज्यते ते। तज्जन्मभिः श्रमजलैर्हि कदाचिदेष त्रुट्यत्युदारघनसारमयोऽङ्गरागः ॥ ४० ॥ rakṣāyatākṣi sitaveṣaviśeṣameva cintā priyaṃ prati na samprati yujyate te| tajjanmabhiḥ śramajalairhi kadācideṣa truṭyatyudāraghanasāramayo'ṅgarāgaḥ || 40 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दाक्षायणीप्रियतमे विहिताभिसारे ज्योत्स्नासितांशुकविनिह्नुतया रजन्या । आपाण्डुभूषणजुषामभिसारिकाणा-मित्थं मिथोऽकथि पथिष्वनुगत्वरीभिः ॥ ४१ ॥ ज्योत्स्नाभिसारिकाकुलकम् ॥ dākṣāyaṇīpriyatame vihitābhisāre jyotsnāsitāṃśukavinihnutayā rajanyā | āpāṇḍubhūṣaṇajuṣāmabhisārikāṇā-mitthaṃ mitho'kathi pathiṣvanugatvarībhiḥ || 41 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वक्त्रश्रिया सततदक्षिणयोपनीतः प्रीतिं शिरस्ययमितो निदधत्कराग्रम् । भूयाः समग्रललनाकुलमौलिरत्नं दत्ते तवाशिषमितीव पतिर्द्विजानाम् ॥ ४२ ॥ vaktraśriyā satatadakṣiṇayopanītaḥ prītiṃ śirasyayamito nidadhatkarāgram | bhūyāḥ samagralalanākulamauliratnaṃ datte tavāśiṣamitīva patirdvijānām || 42 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सौभाग्यविभ्रमविशेषकराण्ययं ते मन्ये लिलेखिषति दिव्यशुभाक्षराणि । सन्ध्यावशेषघुसूणेन विसृत्वरीभि-र्भालस्थले हिमकरः करलेखनीभिः ॥ ४३ ॥ saubhāgyavibhramaviśeṣakarāṇyayaṃ te manye lilekhiṣati divyaśubhākṣarāṇi | sandhyāvaśeṣaghusūṇena visṛtvarībhi- rbhālasthale himakaraḥ karalekhanībhiḥ || 43 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कर्पूरपांसुलहरीलटभा घटन्ते मिथ्या तवाध​रदले शशिनो मयूखाः । अस्मिन्सुहृन्दि रतिकान्तयशश्छटाना-मेषां ननु स्थितिमपह्नुवते स्मितानि ॥ ४४ ॥ karpūrapāṃsulaharīlaṭabhā ghaṭante mithyā tavādharadale śaśino mayūkhāḥ | asminsuhṛndi ratikāntayaśaśchaṭānā-meṣāṃ nanu sthitimapahnuvate smitāni || 44 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दन्तच्छदं हृतमदं नवविद्रुमाणां चान्द्रास्तव स्तबकयन्ति कराग्रभागाः। एषाममुष्यकिरणैररुणीकृतानां भूयोऽप्यसावुदयराग इवाभ्युदेति ॥ ४५ ॥ dantacchadaṃ hṛtamadaṃ navavidrumāṇāṃ cāndrāstava stabakayanti karāgrabhāgāḥ| eṣāmamuṣyakiraṇairaruṇīkṛtānāṃ bhūyo'pyasāvudayarāga ivābhyudeti || 45 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दूरप्रसारितकरस्य पुरः सुदूर-माक्रामता तरलहारलताकराग्रैः । मुग्धे नियुद्धघटना शशिमण्डलस्य किं वर्तते सह तव स्तनमण्डलेन ॥ ४६ ॥ dūraprasāritakarasya puraḥ sudūra-mākrāmatā taralahāralatākarāgraiḥ | mugdhe niyuddhaghaṭanā śaśimaṇḍalasya kiṃ vartate saha tava stanamaṇḍalena || 46 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
एणाङ्करश्मिलहरीभिरधीतसख्यः पुष्णाति ते श्रियमसावुदरप्रदेशः । कार्श्यक्रमावजितवज्रतयार्जितस्य व्यञ्जन्निवाच्छमहसो यशसस्तरङ्गान् ॥ ४७ ॥ eṇāṅkaraśmilaharībhiradhītasakhyaḥ puṣṇāti te śriyamasāvudarapradeśaḥ | kārśyakramāvajitavajratayārjitasya vyañjannivācchamahaso yaśasastaraṅgān || 47 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्रोतः शशाङ्कमहसां सहसा गभीर-नाभीपथं शिशुमृगाक्षि तवाधिशेते । अत्रास्य निर्जरतरङ्गवतीसपङ्क्ते रोमावलीयमुनया घटतां प्रयागः ॥ ४८ ॥ srotaḥ śaśāṅkamahasāṃ sahasā gabhīra- nābhīpathaṃ śiśumṛgākṣi tavādhiśete | atrāsya nirjarataraṅgavatīsapaṅkte romāvalīyamunayā ghaṭatāṃ prayāgaḥ || 48 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रम्भोरु सम्भृततमोऽत्र तवातिदूरा-दूरुद्वयीं स्पृशति चन्द्रमसः प्रकाशः । एषा किलैतदुदयात्कदलीविशेषा-न्कान्त्येव शैत्यकलयापि तिरस्करोतु ॥ ४९ ॥ rambhoru sambhṛtatamo'tra tavātidūrā-dūrudvayīṃ spṛśati candramasaḥ prakāśaḥ | eṣā kilaitadudayātkadalīviśeṣā-nkāntyeva śaityakalayāpi tiraskarotu || 49 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
एते करा हिमकरस्य चलाचलाक्षि लाक्षाजुषोश्चरणयोस्तव संस्तवेन । जन्मानवाप्तचरफुल्लसहस्रपत्र-सौहार्दसौख्यघटनां चिरमाप्नुवन्तु ॥ ५० ॥ ete karā himakarasya calācalākṣi lākṣājuṣoścaraṇayostava saṃstavena | janmānavāptacaraphullasahasrapatra-sauhārdasaukhyaghaṭanāṃ ciramāpnuvantu || 50 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उत्तुङ्गसौधपदबन्धरता नताङ्ग्यः प्रत्यङ्गसङ्गतकुरङ्गभृदंशुरेखाः । इत्थं क्रमेण रमणैर्मणिपीठपृष्ठ-प्रष्ठैरवर्णिषत चाटुमयैर्वचोभिः ॥ ५१ ॥ uttuṅgasaudhapadabandharatā natāṅgyaḥ pratyaṅgasaṅgatakuraṅgabhṛdaṃśurekhāḥ | itthaṃ krameṇa ramaṇairmaṇipīṭhapṛṣṭha-praṣṭhairavarṇiṣata cāṭumayairvacobhiḥ || 51 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आलि कल्पय पुरः करदीपं चन्द्रमण्डलमिति प्रथितेन । नन्वनेन पिहितं मम चक्षुर्मङ्क्षु पाण्डुरतमोगुलकेन ॥ ५२ ॥ āli kalpaya puraḥ karadīpaṃ candramaṇḍalamiti prathitena | nanvanena pihitaṃ mama cakṣurmaṅkṣu pāṇḍuratamogulakena || 52 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कोटरे तिमिरमेष कलङ्कच्छद्मना वहति हन्त शशाङ्कः। यत्कणैरिव विलुम्पति दृष्टिं मादृशां दयितदीपवियोगे ॥ ५३ ॥ koṭare timirameṣa kalaṅkacchadmanā vahati hanta śaśāṅkaḥ| yatkaṇairiva vilumpati dṛṣṭiṃ mādṛśāṃ dayitadīpaviyoge || 53 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कालकूटमिह निन्दति लोको येन शम्भुरजरामर एव । अन्तकं विरहिणीषु सुधांशुं स्तौत्यमुं तु विरलो हि विवेकः ॥ ५४ ॥ kālakūṭamiha nindati loko yena śambhurajarāmara eva | antakaṃ virahiṇīṣu sudhāṃśuṃ stautyamuṃ tu viralo hi vivekaḥ || 54 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
घोरकर्म विरहिष्वहह त्वं कर्तुमिच्छसि तवोचितमेतत् । मूर्ध्नि रात्रिकर तिष्ठसि शश्वद्विश्वसंहृतिकृतो हि हरस्य ॥ ५५ ॥ ghorakarma virahiṣvahaha tvaṃ kartumicchasi tavocitametat | mūrdhni rātrikara tiṣṭhasi śaśvadviśvasaṃhṛtikṛto hi harasya || 55 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कालकूटमधुनापि निहन्तुं हन्त नो वहसि लाञ्छनभङ्गया। यद्भयादिव निगीर्णमपि त्वामाशु मुञ्चति सुधाकर राहुः ॥ ५६ ॥ kālakūṭamadhunāpi nihantuṃ hanta no vahasi lāñchanabhaṅgayā| yadbhayādiva nigīrṇamapi tvāmāśu muñcati sudhākara rāhuḥ || 56 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अंशवस्तव निशाकर नूनं कल्पितास्तरुणकेतकखण्डैः । येन पाण्डुरतरद्युतयो नः कण्टकैरिव तुदन्ति शरीरम् ॥ ५७ ॥ aṃśavastava niśākara nūnaṃ kalpitāstaruṇaketakakhaṇḍaiḥ | yena pāṇḍurataradyutayo naḥ kaṇṭakairiva tudanti śarīram || 57 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अम्बुधेरुदगमद्विधुभङ्ग्या नूनमौर्वशिखिभास्मनपिण्डः । यत्किलास्य घटते नहि तृप्तिः खण्डिताजनदृगम्बुसरिद्भिः ॥ ५८ ॥ ambudherudagamadvidhubhaṅgyā nūnamaurvaśikhibhāsmanapiṇḍaḥ | yatkilāsya ghaṭate nahi tṛptiḥ khaṇḍitājanadṛgambusaridbhiḥ || 58 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रात्रिराज सुकुमारशरीरः कः सहेत तव नाम मयूखान् । स्पर्शमाप्य सहसैव यदीयं चन्द्रकान्तदृषदोऽपि गलन्ति ॥ ५९ ॥ rātrirāja sukumāraśarīraḥ kaḥ saheta tava nāma mayūkhān | sparśamāpya sahasaiva yadīyaṃ candrakāntadṛṣado'pi galanti || 59 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
युक्तमाह दयितो मम वक्त्रं पङ्कजं रहसि चाटुकथासु । संस्तवं रुचिभिरस्य हिमांशोः प्राप्य कामपि रुजं यदुपैति ॥ ६० ॥ yuktamāha dayito mama vaktraṃ paṅkajaṃ rahasi cāṭukathāsu | saṃstavaṃ rucibhirasya himāṃśoḥ prāpya kāmapi rujaṃ yadupaiti || 60 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पद्मनाभ करुणां कुरु भूयोविग्रहेण परिपूरय राहुम् । येन तज्जठरकोटरशायी जात्वयं विधुरयेन्न विधुर्नः ॥ ६१ ॥ padmanābha karuṇāṃ kuru bhūyovigraheṇa paripūraya rāhum | yena tajjaṭharakoṭaraśāyī jātvayaṃ vidhurayenna vidhurnaḥ || 61 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तापय(व​)द्वपुरुदश्रुदुकूलाः कल्पयन्त्य इव सान्द्रजलार्द्रम् । खण्डिता निबिडदैन्यवतीभिर्वाग्भिरित्यसकृदिन्दुमनिन्दन् ॥ ६२ ॥ tāpaya(va)dvapurudaśrudukūlāḥ kalpayantya iva sāndrajalārdram | khaṇḍitā nibiḍadainyavatībhirvāgbhirityasakṛdindumanindan || 62 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मुधैव बाधं कुसुमायुधस्य क्रुद्धः शरीरे व्यधित त्रिनेत्रः । त्वया हि मित्रेण सुधाकरेण नीतः स भूयोऽप्यजरामरत्वम् ॥ ६३ ॥ mudhaiva bādhaṃ kusumāyudhasya kruddhaḥ śarīre vyadhita trinetraḥ | tvayā hi mitreṇa sudhākareṇa nītaḥ sa bhūyo'pyajarāmaratvam || 63 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
त्वन्मण्डलं नूनमतिग्मरश्मे चेतोभुवः सङ्गमनीयरत्नम् । यस्य प्रभावात्सहसैव भङ्गं यात्यङ्गनानां प्रियविप्रयोगः ॥ ६४ ॥ Saṅgamanīya' gem is the name of a fabled gem that reunites separated lovers (see also footnote under 2.58) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यदर्धनारीश्वरमूर्तिरीशः सदैव गौरीविरहानभिज्ञः । शृङ्गारबन्धो भजतः शिरोग्रं शशाङ्क शङ्के स तव प्रभावः ॥ ६५ ॥ yadardhanārīśvaramūrtirīśaḥ sadaiva gaurīvirahānabhijñaḥ | śṛṅgārabandho bhajataḥ śirograṃ śaśāṅka śaṅke sa tava prabhāvaḥ || 65 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
लब्ध्वा विधो कान्तभुजोपधानं क्ष्माधूलिशय्यामधितस्थुषीणाम् । सङ्केतभूमावभिसारिकाणां भवस्ययत्नेन रतिप्रदीपः ॥ ६६ ॥ labdhvā vidho kāntabhujopadhānaṃ kṣmādhūliśayyāmadhitasthuṣīṇām | saṅketabhūmāvabhisārikāṇāṃ bhavasyayatnena ratipradīpaḥ || 66 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अन्योन्यमेणाङ्क न(णाङ्कन) सङ्घटय्य विलासिनोर्देहकवाटयुग्मम् । सुरक्षितं त्वं दृढबाहुबन्धात्करोषि कन्दर्परहस्यकोषम् ॥ ६७ ॥ anyonyameṇāṅka na(ṇāṅkana) saṅghaṭayya vilāsinordehakavāṭayugmam | surakṣitaṃ tvaṃ dṛḍhabāhubandhātkaroṣi kandarparahasyakoṣam || 67 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
धुर्योऽसि सौभाग्यभृतां सुधांशो यस्मिन्पुरो गोचरताधिरूढे । मुखे स्मितं बिभ्रति कैरविण्यश्चिरेण निद्रन्ति च पङ्कजिन्यः ॥ ६८ ॥ dhuryo'si saubhāgyabhṛtāṃ sudhāṃśo yasminpuro gocaratādhirūḍhe | mukhe smitaṃ bibhrati kairaviṇyaścireṇa nidranti ca paṅkajinyaḥ || 68 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
किं कौतुकं तत्स्ववपुःसखानि धिनोषि यद्वामदृशां मुखानि । भवान्निसर्गेण तमीभुजङ्ग वहत्यनङ्गेऽपि हि पक्षपातम् ॥ ६९ ॥ kiṃ kautukaṃ tatsvavapuḥsakhāni dhinoṣi yadvāmadṛśāṃ mukhāni | bhavānnisargeṇa tamībhujaṅga vahatyanaṅge'pi hi pakṣapātam || 69 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
न नूतनं तत्प्रमदाश्रुवृष्टिं दृष्टौ यदासादितवल्लभानाम् । तनोषि चन्द्र प्रथमस्त्वमत्रेरानन्दजन्मा हि दृगम्बुबिन्दुः ॥ ७० ॥ na nūtanaṃ tatpramadāśruvṛṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭau yadāsāditavallabhānām | tanoṣi candra prathamastvamastvatrerānandajanmā hi dṛgambubinduḥ || 70 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मृगावचूलोदित एव सद्यः कर्णान्तरे(ञ्चले) सञ्चितविभ्रमाणि । करोषि नेत्राणि विलासिनीनामुत्सङ्गसारङ्गकशिक्षयेव ॥ ७१ ॥ mṛgāvacūlodita eva sadyaḥ karṇāntare(ñcale) sañcitavibhramāṇi | karoṣi netrāṇi vilāsinīnāmutsaṅgasāraṅgakaśikṣayeva || 71 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
राशीनशेषाञ्जहता सहेलं क्रमादुदारेण विधो युवानः । त्वयातुलत्वं गमितेऽनुरागे नान्योन्यमानग्रहमुत्सहन्ते ॥ ७२ ॥ rāśīnaśeṣāñjahatā sahelaṃ kramādudāreṇa vidho yuvānaḥ | tvayātulatvaṃ gamite'nurāge nānyonyamānagrahamutsahante || 72 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अदृष्टतापव्यसनाः स्तनाग्रं प्राणेश्वरे हार इवाधिरूढे । वाक्यैरिति प्रीतिरसोत्तरङ्गैस्तन्व्यः स्तुवन्ति स्म सुधागभस्तिम् ॥ ७३ ॥ adṛṣṭatāpavyasanāḥ stanāgraṃ prāṇeśvare hāra ivādhirūḍhe | vākyairiti prītirasottaraṅgaistanvyaḥ stuvanti sma sudhāgabhastim || 73 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शृङ्गारद्विरदो हृदम्बुजवनं यूनां झगित्युत्खन-न्नित्यासीदवचूलचामरधुरारूढेन्दुबिम्बोन्मदः । आसेदुः कुमुदानि सामिविकसन्मूर्तीनि यस्योदर-त्वङ्गद्भृङ्गरवाणि सम्भ्रमरणहुर्वर्णघण्टालिपिम् ॥ ७४ ॥ śṛṅgāradvirado hṛdambujavanaṃ yūnāṃ jhagityutkhana- nnityāsīdavacūlacāmaradhurārūḍhendubimbonmadaḥ | āseduḥ kumudāni sāmivikasanmūrtīni yasyodara- tvaṅgaddbhṛṅgaravāṇi sambhramaraṇahurvarṇaghaṇṭālipim || 74 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
त्रैलोक्याशक्यवीरव्रतविवृतिरतानङ्गकोदण्डविद्या-तुष्यद्गीर्वाणवर्गप्रहितपिपतिषत्पुष्पवृष्टिप्रतिष्ठाम् । आक्रामद्भिर्महद्भिर्निबिडितमुडुभिर्व्योम सोमांशुपुञ्जै-रित्थं शृङ्गारकल्पद्रुमघनसुमनोगुच्छसख्यं पुपोष ॥ ७५ ॥ trailokyāśakyavīravratavivṛtiratānaṅgakodaṇḍavidyā-tuṣyadgīrvāṇavargaprahitapipatiṣatpuṣpavṛṣṭipratiṣṭhām | ākrāmadbhirmahadbhirnibiḍitamuḍubhirvyoma somāṃśupuñjai-ritthaṃ śṛṅgārakalpadrumaghanasumanogucchasakhyaṃ pupoṣa || 75 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति श्रीजोनराजकृतया टीकया समेतः श्रीराजानकविश्ववर्तसूनोर्महाकविराजराजानकश्रीमङ्खकस्य कृतौ श्रीकण्ठचरिते महाकाव्ये चन्द्र(चन्द्रोदय​)वर्णनं नामैकादशः सर्गः ॥ द्वादशः सर्गः ॥ तद्वपुष्युपहितं विरराज क्रीडया कदलिपत्रतनुत्रम् । नीलिमाद्वयनयान्न कथञ्चित्तत्र यस्य घटते परभागः ॥ १ ॥ tadvapuṣyupahitaṃ virarāja krīḍayā kadalipatratanutram | nīlimādvayanayānna kathañcittatra yasya ghaṭate parabhāgaḥ || 1 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कामिसन्ततिहृदन्तरवासक्रान्तरागलहरीसमरीतिः । पाटलापटलमय्युदगच्छद्वीरपट्टघटनाधिललाटम् ॥ २ ॥ kāmisantatihṛdantaravāsakrāntarāgalaharīsamarītiḥ | pāṭalāpaṭalamayyudagacchadvīrapaṭṭaghaṭanādhilalāṭam || 2 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
माधवप्रथितया कृतरोधं गोधया विकचचम्पकमय्या । उज्झितेऽपि वलये कृतकेलिस्व​र्णकङ्कणमिवास्त भुजाग्रम् ॥ ३ ॥ mādhavaprathitayā kṛtarodhaṃ godhayā vikacacampakamayyā | ujjhite'pi valaye kṛtakelisvarṇakaṅkaṇamivāsta bhujāgram || 3 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चापमाप करपङ्करुहाङ्कं पाटलं दलदशोककुलेन । सर्वतः परिणताधररागं चुम्बनादिव जगज्जयलक्ष्म्याः ॥ ४ ॥ cāpamāpa karapaṅkaruhāṅkaṃ pāṭalaṃ daladaśokakulena | sarvataḥ pariṇatādhararāgaṃ cumbanādiva jagajjayalakṣmyāḥ || 4 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तद्धनुर्गुणलताग्रनिषण्णैः क्षोभयत्त्रिजगदप्यलिशावैः । साञ्जनैर्विरहिणीनयनाम्भःसीकरैरिव करालितमासीत् ॥ ५ ॥ taddhanurguṇalatāgraniṣaṇṇaiḥ kṣobhayattrijagadapyaliśāvaiḥ | sāñjanairvirahiṇīnayanāmbhaḥsīkarairiva karālitamāsīt || 5 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सोऽस्त्रपुष्पनिवहैर्भृतगर्भः पृष्ठवर्त्मनि ररङ्ग निषङ्गः। यत्र सौरभहृतभ्रमरौघे मज्जति स्म शिथिलः कचभारः ॥ ६ ॥ so'strapuṣpanivahairbhṛtagarbhaḥ pṛṣṭhavartmani raraṅga niṣaṅgaḥ| yatra saurabhahṛtabhramaraughe majjati sma śithilaḥ kacabhāraḥ || 6 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अन्वरोधि दधता गुरु रंहः सैंहलेन रथता पवनेन । सौरभादुपनतैरलिचक्रैर्योऽग्रसङ्गतरथाङ्ग इवासीत् ॥ ७ ॥ anvarodhi dadhatā guru raṃhaḥ saiṃhalena rathatā pavanena | saurabhādupanatairalicakrairyo'grasaṅgatarathāṅga ivāsīt || 7 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आतपत्रपदवीमधिशिश्ये मण्डलो रजनिभर्तुरखण्डः । चित्रमध्वगसरोजमुखीनां योऽन्तरातपविशेषमपुष्यत् ॥ ८ ॥ ātapatrapadavīmadhiśiśye maṇḍalo rajanibharturakhaṇḍaḥ | citramadhvagasarojamukhīnāṃ yo'ntarātapaviśeṣamapuṣyat || 8 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आकुलान्कलकलाननुबध्नन्नग्रतः परभृतोऽजनि बन्दी। यः पृषत्कसहकारपरागैरप्यनीयत परं परितोषम् ॥ ९ ॥ ākulānkalakalānanubadhnannagrataḥ parabhṛto'jani bandī | yaḥ pṛṣatkasahakāraparāgairapyanīyata paraṃ paritoṣam || 9 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आवहन्प्रविशदुद्धतमानन्यक्कृतिं युवतिहृद्भवनेषु । दृप्ततां दधदधिप्रतिहारं पञ्चमोऽप्युपययौ प्रथमत्वम् ॥ १० ॥ āvahanpraviśaduddhatamānanyakkṛtiṃ yuvatihṛdbhavaneṣu | dṛptatāṃ dadhadadhipratihāraṃ pañcamo'pyupayayau prathamatvam || 10 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उन्नतस्य झगिति स्वयमग्रं केतनस्य तिमिरध्यशयिष्ट । वाहिनीर्विरहिणीक्षणवार्भिर्यः प्रपञ्चयति वासधियेव ॥ ११ ॥ unnatasya jhagiti svayamagraṃ ketanasya timiradhyaśayiṣṭa | vāhinīrvirahiṇīkṣaṇavārbhiryaḥ prapañcayati vāsadhiyeva || 11 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कौतुकादिति जगत्त्र(ज्ज)यलक्ष्मीमुद्यतो रतिपतिः परिणेतुम् । सन्ननाह दयितार्पितनेत्रप्रान्तकान्तिपुनरुक्ततनुत्रः ॥ १२ ॥ kautukāditi jagattra(jja)yalakṣmīmudyato ratipatiḥ pariṇetum | sannanāha dayitārpitanetraprāntakāntipunaruktatanutraḥ || 12 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रिय खण्डयितुं वियोगिनीः कतरस्तेऽयमियान्परिश्रमः । अबलादलनात्क्व वाद्यते वद वीरव्रतकीर्तिडिण्डिमः ॥ १३ ॥ priya khaṇḍayituṃ viyoginīḥ kataraste'yamiyānpariśramaḥ | abalādalanātkva vādyate vada vīravratakīrtiḍiṇḍimaḥ || 13 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्वयमेव कथं प्रवर्तसे(प्रतिष्ठसे) त्रिजगज्जेतुमुपोढकङ्कटः । घटते मधुनेन्दुनाथवा न तदेकेन पदातिनापि ते ॥ १४ ॥ svayameva kathaṃ pravartase(pratiṣṭhase) trijagajjetumupoḍhakaṅkaṭaḥ | ghaṭate madhunendunāthavā na tadekena padātināpi te || 14 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स निहत्य बभूव राघवः स्त्रियमेकामपि दुर्यशोनिधिः । तव नाथ कथं नु कीर्तनं त्रिजगत्स्त्रैणवधात्प्रवर्त्स्यति ॥ १५ ॥ sa nihatya babhūva rāghavaḥ striyamekāmapi duryaśonidhiḥ | tava nātha kathaṃ nu kīrtanaṃ trijagatstraiṇavadhātpravartsyati || 15 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शमिनामथ धैर्यलुप्तये यतसे बिभ्रदुदाशुगं धनुः । अधिकं वद किं त्वयेप्सितं स्वशरीरव्ययतोऽपि सत्फलम् ॥ १६ ॥ śamināmatha dhairyaluptaye yatase bibhradudāśugaṃ dhanuḥ | adhikaṃ vada kiṃ tvayepsitaṃ svaśarīravyayato'pi satphalam || 16 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तव दुर्म​दता कियत्यहो हरनेत्राग्निशिखाङ्कुरैः शितैः । घटनादधुनापि यस्य नो भुजकण्डूरुपशान्तिमश्नुते ॥ १७ ॥ tava durmadatā kiyatyaho haranetrāgniśikhāṅkuraiḥ śitaiḥ | ghaṭanādadhunāpi yasya no bhujakaṇḍūrupaśāntimaśnute || 17 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विजहीहि मुधा तपोधनानवजेतुं स्मर चापचापलम् । पुरतः पुनरप्यहं सहे नहि वैधव्यविषादविक्रियाम् ॥ १८ ॥ vijahīhi mudhā tapodhanānavajetuṃ smara cāpacāpalam | purataḥ punarapyahaṃ sahe nahi vaidhavyaviṣādavikriyām || 18 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शमिषु त्यज तर्जनोद्यमं सफलानुग्रहनिग्रहा हि ते । ननु निश्चितनिष्फलश्रमो व्यवसायोऽयमनर्थसंश्रयः ॥ १९ ॥ śamiṣu tyaja tarjanodyamaṃ saphalānugrahanigrahā hi te | nanu niścitaniṣphalaśramo vyavasāyo'yamanarthasaṃśrayaḥ || 19 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
त्रिजगद्विजये स्म(येऽस्ति) सम्भृतं ललना एव तवैकसाधनम् । कतरेण पथाथ(था तु) जेष्यसि प्रथमं ता यदि हंस्यनागसः ॥ २० ॥ trijagadvijaye sma(ye'sti) sambhṛtaṃ lalanā eva tavaikasādhanam | katareṇa pathātha(tu) jeṣyasi prathamaṃ tā yadi haṃsyanāgasaḥ || 20 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भवतोज्झित एव विग्रहः सुमनोमार्गणपूरणैषिणा । तव नाथ तथाप्ययं कथं परबाधाय मुधैव दुर्ग्रहः ॥ २१ ॥ bhavatojjhita eva vigrahaḥ sumanomārgaṇapūraṇaiṣiṇā | tava nātha tathāpyayaṃ kathaṃ parabādhāya mudhaiva durgrahaḥ || 21 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अधुनाप्यनुभूयते त्वया स्मर शापात्फलमब्जजन्मनः । किमयं क्रियते तदप्यहो बहुमुन्यन्तरशापसङ्ग्रहः ॥ २२ ॥ adhunāpyanubhūyate tvayā smara śāpātphalamabjajanmanaḥ | kimayaṃ kriyate tadapyaho bahumunyantaraśāpasaṅgrahaḥ || 22 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कुसुमैर्निहताः कथं व्यथामुपयान्तीति वृथैव मन्यसे । मणिमन्त्रपथातिवर्तिनां विषमेषां हि पुरोऽमृतायते ॥ २३ ॥ kusumairnihatāḥ kathaṃ vyathāmupayāntīti vṛthaiva manyase | maṇimantrapathātivartināṃ viṣameṣāṃ hi puro'mṛtāyate || 23 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सनयैः सभयैश्च विस्तरैर्वचसामित्यरुणत्स्मरं रतिः । स तु तत्करतोंऽशुकाञ्चलं द्रुतमाकृष्य मदेन निर्ययौ ॥ २४ ॥ sanayaiḥ sabhayaiśca vistarairvacasāmityaruṇatsmaraṃ ratiḥ | sa tu tatkaratoṃ'śukāñcalaṃ drutamākṛṣya madena niryayau || 24 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विलोचनाम्भःसरितो व्यनक्ति सा मुखेन मीनाङ्कपथानुबन्धिनीः । ह्रदेषु यासां प्रतिबिम्बिताश्चिरं व्रजन्ति सख्यो जलमानुषीलिपिम् ॥ २६ ॥ vilocanāmbhaḥsarito vyanakti sā mukhena mīnāṅkapathānubandhinīḥ | hradeṣu yāsāṃ pratibimbitāściraṃ vrajanti sakhyo jalamānuṣīlipim || 26 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भुजङ्ग तस्या विरहापचारितः प्रवर्धमानोऽभ्यधिकं मधावपि । त्वदाप्तिसङ्कल्पचमत्क्रियौषधैर्निशीथिनीनां श्वयथुर्विलुप्यते ॥ २६ ॥ bhujaṅga tasyā virahāpacāritaḥ pravardhamāno'bhyadhikaṃ madhāvapi | tvadāptisaṅkalpacamatkriyauṣadhairniśīthinīnāṃ śvayathurvilupyate || 26 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ससौरभश्वासहृतैर्मधुव्रतैः स्मरोप्तहालाहलबीजबन्धुभिः । निपत्य तस्याः पुरतोऽश्रुसारणीभृतो हलोल्लेखरुजेव जन्यते ॥ २७ ॥ sasaurabhaśvāsahṛtairmadhuvrataiḥ smaroptahālāhalabījabandhubhiḥ | nipatya tasyāḥ purato'śrusāraṇībhṛto halollekharujeva janyate || 27 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कुचस्थले सा बिसकाण्डतन्तुभिर्विवृण्वती हारलतापरिग्रहम् । व्यनक्ति लब्धं मदनादवध्यतां धृतोपवीतामिव देहकन्दलीम् ॥ २८ ॥ kucasthale sā bisakāṇḍatantubhirvivṛṇvatī hāralatāparigraham | vyanakti labdhaṃ madanādavadhyatāṃ dhṛtopavītāmiva dehakandalīm || 28 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अनल्पसङ्कल्पवशेन मन्यते दिशस्त्वदाकारकृतावगूहनाः । ततश्च सा तासु मुहुर्विमुग्धधीर्विमुञ्चतीर्ष्याकलुषे विलोचने ॥ २९ ॥ analpasaṅkalpavaśena manyate diśastvadākārakṛtāvagūhanāḥ | tataśca sā tāsu muhurvimugdhadhīrvimuñcatīrṣyākaluṣe vilocane || 29 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शशाङ्ककान्तोपलकुट्टिमेषु सा विभाति सङ्क्रान्तवपुः प्रतिक्षपम् । रसातले कर्तुमिवोद्यता शशिच्छविच्छटासङ्गभयेन मज्जनम् ॥ ३० ॥ śaśāṅkakāntopalakuṭṭimeṣu sā vibhāti saṅkrāntavapuḥ pratikṣapam | rasātale kartumivodyatā śaśicchavicchaṭāsaṅgabhayena majjanam || 30 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वियोगवत्याः शबले कुचस्थले सकज्जलप्रोच्छलदश्रुचक्रकैः । कथञ्चनोच्छ्वासधुतेर्विभाव्यते निवेश्यमानाम्बुजिनीदलावलिः ॥ ३१ ॥ viyogavatyāḥ śabale kucasthale sakajjalaprocchaladaśrucakrakaiḥ | kathañcanocchvāsadhutervibhāvyate niveśyamānāmbujinīdalāvaliḥ || 31 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
व्यनक्त्युपान्ते श्रवसोर्वलत्तनुः सकज्जलां सा नयनाम्बुपद्धतिम् । स्वकां स्वसारं रविजेन निम्नगां पुरो विसृष्टामिव दूत्यसिद्धये ॥ ३२ ॥ vyanaktyupānte śravasorvalattanuḥ sakajjalāṃ sā nayanāmbupaddhatim | svakāṃ svasāraṃ ravijena nimnagāṃ puro visṛṣṭāmiva dūtyasiddhaye || 32 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्तनाग्ररम्भादलडम्बरेषु सा पतद्भिरात्ताञ्जनमश्रुणः कणैः । यियासतां दूरमनङ्गशासनाल्लिखत्यसूनां पथि पट्टकानिव ॥ ३३ ॥ stanāgrarambhādalaḍambareṣu sā patadbhirāttāñjanamaśruṇaḥ kaṇaiḥ | yiyāsatāṃ dūramanaṅgaśāsanāllikhatyasūnāṃ pathi paṭṭakāniva || 33 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ततः किमन्यद्बहुनाधुनापि चेदुपैषि चातुर्यवशंवदैः पदैः । न जायते ते तदकीर्तिकल्मषप्ररोहकल्माषनिवेशनं यशः ॥ ३४ ॥ tataḥ kimanyadbahunādhunāpi cedupaiṣi cāturyavaśaṃvadaiḥ padaiḥ | na jāyate te tadakīrtikalmaṣaprarohakalmāṣaniveśanaṃ yaśaḥ || 34 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निपीय दूतीवदनात्तजन्मनः क्षणं श्रुतिभ्यामिव वाक्यविप्नुषः । जवाद्युवानो दधतः पदात्पदं ययुः प्रियाणां नयनोच्चुलुम्प्यताम् ॥ ३५ ॥ nipīya dūtīvadanāttajanmanaḥ kṣaṇaṃ śrutibhyāmiva vākyavipnuṣaḥ | javādyuvāno dadhataḥ padātpadaṃ yayuḥ priyāṇāṃ nayanocculumpyatām || 35 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अभ्रल्लिहोल्लोलकुले कुचेषु क्षिप्रं क्षिपत्यक्षतमौक्तिकालीः । बभूव वैमानिककामिनीनामयत्नतो हारलतानिवेशः ॥ ३६ ॥ abhrallihollolakule kuceṣu kṣipraṃ kṣipatyakṣatamauktikālīḥ | babhūva vaimānikakāminīnāmayatnato hāralatāniveśaḥ || 36 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इन्दौ सुदूरोच्छलदूर्मिमुक्तैर्मुक्ताफलैरात्तनवावगूहे । दक्षस्य कन्याश्चुकुपुः प्रसङ्गमाशङ्क्य तस्येतरतारकाभिः ॥ ३७ ॥ indau sudūrocchaladūrmimuktairmuktāphalairāttanavāvagūhe | dakṣasya kanyāścukupuḥ prasaṅgamāśaṅkya tasyetaratārakābhiḥ || 37 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तुङ्गोर्मिभङ्गेषु सुरर्षिलोकः प्रसङ्गतोऽप्यग्रमवाप्तवत्सु । आचान्तये प्रोद्भुतसीधुशेषभयेन पस्पर्श न तत्पयांसि ॥ ३८ ॥ tuṅgormibhaṅgeṣu surarṣilokaḥ prasaṅgato'pyagramavāptavatsu | ācāntaye prodbhutasīdhuśeṣabhayena pasparśa na tatpayāṃsi || 38 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
छन्नेऽम्बरेऽनर्गलवीचिचक्रादुत्थाय मीनैर्मकरैरनेकैः । मौहूर्तिकानां प्रबभूव दृष्टिर्न राशिसञ्चारविनिश्चयेषु ॥ ३९ ॥ channe'mbare'nargalavīcicakrādutthāya mīnairmakarairanekaiḥ | mauhūrtikānāṃ prababhūva dṛṣṭirna rāśisañcāraviniścayeṣu || 39 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दूरोच्छलल्लोहितकांशुजालैरालम्बमाना नवमङ्गरागम् । स्वे सौम्यकाव्याङ्गिरसादयोऽपि न कस्य भौमभ्रममेव चक्रुः ॥ ४० ॥ dūrocchalallohitakāṃśujālairālambamānā navamaṅgarāgam | sve saumyakāvyāṅgirasādayo'pi na kasya bhaumabhramameva cakruḥ || 40 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अन्तःशयानाच्युतनाभिपद्मगन्धानुसन्धिं दिवि तन्वतीषु । सन्त्यज्य​ सन्तानकवीरुधोऽपि वीचीषु नाकभ्रमरा निषेदुः ॥ ४१ ॥ antaḥśayānācyutanābhipadmagandhānusandhiṃ divi tanvatīṣu | santyajya santānakavīrudho'pi vīcīṣu nākabhramarā niṣeduḥ || 41 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
