तत्राकल्पमनल्पमादृततया सन्तन्वतीनां स्मर-स्वाराज्याद्भुतविभ्रमप्रतिभुवां नाकेसदेणीदृशाम् । तासां केलिकलाविलोलकबरीभाराग्रवासन्तिका-सौगन्ध्यातिथिभिः शुभं शुभमितीवावादि मत्तालिभिः॥ ४९ ॥ tatrākalpamanalpamādṛtatayā santanvatīnāṃ smara-svārājyādbhutavibhramapratibhuvāṃ nākesadeṇīdṛśām | tāsāṃ kelikalāvilolakabarībhārāgravāsantikā-saugandhyātithibhiḥ śubhaṃ śubhamitīvāvādi mattālibhiḥ|| 49 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
काचित्तत्र विमुद्रपङ्कजमुखी सौभाग्यभाग्यावधि-र्बिभ्राणं हठकष्टरक्षितनिजाकल्पैकपात्रं वपुः । प्रेमव्याकुलकान्तकेलिकलहप्रोन्मृज्यमानाखिल-क्रीडामण्डनडम्बरा व्यजयतायत्नात्सपत्नीजनम् ॥ ५० ॥ kācittatra vimudrapaṅkajamukhī saubhāgyabhāgyāvadhi-rbibhrāṇaṃ haṭhakaṣṭarakṣitanijākalpaikapātraṃ vapuḥ | premavyākulakāntakelikalahapronmṛjyamānākhila-krīḍāmaṇḍanaḍambarā vyajayatāyatnātsapatnījanam || 50 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निर्वर्त्येत्थं प्रथमसुहृदं मान्मथप्रक्रियाणां तास्तन्वङ्ग्यो विविधमधुरोल्लेखतो वेषशेषम् । हेलाखेलत्प्रियकरतलन्यस्तहस्तारविन्दाः क्रीडोद्यानावनितिलकतां कौतुकादध्यरुक्षन् ॥ ५१ ॥ nirvartyetthaṃ prathamasuhṛdaṃ mānmathaprakriyāṇāṃ tāstanvaṅgyo vividhamadhurollekhato veṣaśeṣam | helākhelatpriyakaratalanyastahastāravindāḥ krīḍodyānāvanitilakatāṃ kautukādadhyarukṣan || 51 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
बिभ्राणा घनरागयोगलहरी भृङ्गावलिप्रीणन-प्रौढाकृत्रिमसंसरत्परिमला गीर्वाणवामभ्रुवाम् । व्यालोलप्रथमाननेत्रचषकैरापीयमाना चिरं तत्र स्वस्वविलासिनां समजनि प्रीत्यै प्रसन्ना तनुः ॥ ५२ ॥ bibhrāṇā ghanarāgayogalaharī bhṛṅgāvaliprīṇana-prauḍhākṛtrimasaṃsaratparimalā gīrvāṇavāmabhruvām | vyālolaprathamānanetracaṣakairāpīyamānā ciraṃ tatra svasvavilāsināṃ samajani prītyai prasannā tanuḥ || 52 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति श्रीजोनराजकृतया टीकया समेतः श्रीराजानकविश्ववर्तसूनोर्महाकवि- राजराजानकश्रीमङ्खकस्य कृतौ श्रीकण्ठचरिते महाकाव्ये प्रसाधनवर्णनं नाम त्रयोदशः सर्गः ॥ चतुर्दशः सर्गः ॥ अधिवल्लिमण्डपमखण्डमान्मथप्रथमोपदेशगुरु भङ्गुरभुवः । अथ वल्लभैः सममभग्नविभ्रमा मधु कर्तुमीषुरधरामृतातिथिम् ॥ १ ॥ adhivallimaṇḍapamakhaṇḍamānmathaprathamopadeśaguru bhaṅgurabhuvaḥ | atha vallabhaiḥ samamabhagnavibhramā madhu kartumīṣuradharāmṛtātithim || 1 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पटुगन्धलुब्धमधुपायिधोरणीपरिरम्भणेन बहुला हलिप्रिया । मणिकुन्तलेषु ववृतेऽतिलोभतो निजवाससा हलभृतेव गोपिता ॥ २ ॥ paṭugandhalubdhamadhupāyidhoraṇīparirambhaṇena bahulā halipriyā | maṇikuntaleṣu vavṛte'tilobhato nijavāsasā halabhṛteva gopitā || 2 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रसरत्प्रभादलतयाग्रढौकिता नवपद्मरागचषकाः सिषेविरे । निपतिष्यदासवरसावलेहनस्पृहया प्रसारितरसज्ञतामिव ॥ ३ ॥ prasaratprabhādalatayāgraḍhaukitā navapadmarāgacaṣakāḥ siṣevire | nipatiṣyadāsavarasāvalehanaspṛhayā prasāritarasajñatāmiva || 3 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पृथुभाण्डतोऽन्यलघुभाजनोदरे विनिवेश्यमानविसरः पुरःसरैः । अविदूरनिर्जरपुरन्ध्रिचुम्बनप्रमदादिवोदनददासवद्रवः ॥ ४ ॥ pṛthubhāṇḍato'nyalaghubhājanodare viniveśyamānavisaraḥ puraḥsaraiḥ | avidūranirjarapurandhricumbanapramadādivodanadadāsavadravaḥ || 4 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
परिबभ्रमुर्मधुरगन्धगृध्न​वो बहुहारहूरकभृतासु पारिषु । अलिमण्डला विपिनदेवतार्पितप्रकटेन्द्रनीलचषकानुकारिणः ॥ ५ ॥ paribabhramurmadhuragandhagṛdhravo bahuhārahūrakabhṛtāsu pāriṣu | alimaṇḍalā vipinadevatārpitaprakaṭendranīlacaṣakānukāriṇaḥ || 5 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पृथुशातकौम्भकरिकास्ततस्तदा पुरतस्तरङ्गितदृशामलिस्वनैः । उदरस्थितासवतयेव मत्ततामधिगम्य किञ्चिदलपन्निवास्फुटम् ॥ ६ ॥ pṛthuśātakaumbhakarikāstatastadā puratastaraṅgitadṛśāmalisvanaiḥ | udarasthitāsavatayeva mattatāmadhigamya kiñcidalapannivāsphuṭam || 6 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मदिरा चिराय चषकेषु दिद्युते दधती विमुग्धपरिपाटलं महः । अविलम्बमम्बुनिधिसम्भवक्षणे सकलप्रवालशकलैरिवार्पितम् ॥ ७ ॥ madirā cirāya caṣakeṣu didyute dadhatī vimugdhaparipāṭalaṃ mahaḥ | avilambamambunidhisambhavakṣaṇe sakalapravālaśakalairivārpitam || 7 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रतिपादितस्वकतनूरकृत्रिमप्रमदोदयैकविधये शरीरिणाम् । शतशः सुरा बहुजनानुरागभूः क्व न पुष्पवृष्टिघटनोचिताभवत् ॥ ८ ॥ pratipāditasvakatanūrakṛtrimapramadodayaikavidhaye śarīriṇām | śataśaḥ surā bahujanānurāgabhūḥ kva na puṣpavṛṣṭighaṭanocitābhavat || 8 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दृढमानतन्तुकरपत्रप्रक्रिया नयनद्वयाकृतकलास्यदेशिकः । सदसद्विभागकलनामलिम्लुचो मृगचक्षुषामजनि सीधुसंस्तवः ॥ ९ ॥ dṛḍhamānatantukarapatraprakriyā nayanadvayākṛtakalāsyadeśikaḥ | sadasadvibhāgakalanāmalimluco mṛgacakṣuṣāmajani sīdhusaṃstavaḥ || 9 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मधुडम्बरेण सुमनःशिलीमुखप्रणयोद्धतेन घनरागयोगिना । हृदयप्रवेशकलनैकचञ्चुना ललनाजनोऽधरदलेष्वचुम्ब्यत ॥ १० ॥ madhuḍambareṇa sumanaḥśilīmukhapraṇayoddhatena ghanarāgayoginā | hṛdayapraveśakalanaikacañcunā lalanājano'dharadaleṣvacumbyata || 10 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मणिकुट्टिमप्रतिमितं पुरोऽपरा शशिमण्डलं हरिणशारितोदरम् । मधुपानकेलितरला धृतोत्पलस्फटिकाश्मकुन्तलधिया व्यलोकयत् ॥ ११ ॥ maṇikuṭṭimapratimitaṃ puro'parā śaśimaṇḍalaṃ hariṇaśāritodaram | madhupānakelitaralā dhṛtotpalasphaṭikāśmakuntaladhiyā vyalokayat || 11 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रसना सुपर्वसुदृशां प्रयत्नतो रसमासवस्य शनकैरबुध्यत । ननु नासिकापरिमलोच्चुलुम्पनादजनिष्ट तत्प्रथमभोगभागिनी ॥ १२ ॥ rasanā suparvasudṛśāṃ prayatnato rasamāsavasya śanakairabudhyata | nanu nāsikāparimalocculumpanādajaniṣṭa tatprathamabhogabhāginī || 12 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निपतन्विलासमणिभाण्डमण्डले नवकापिशायनरसोऽन्ववर्तत । घटिताङ्गरागरतिनाथपार्थिवप्रथमाभिषेकसलिलच्छटालिपिम् ॥ १३ ॥ nipatanvilāsamaṇibhāṇḍamaṇḍale navakāpiśāyanaraso'nvavartata | ghaṭitāṅgarāgaratināthapārthivaprathamābhiṣekasalilacchaṭālipim || 13 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
किमपीन्द्रजालमहह प्रसन्नया विदधे तया सदसि वामचक्षुषाम् । विनिपत्य सानवरतं हि कुम्भकाच्चषकान्तरे व्यधित वर्षविभ्रमम् ॥ १४ ॥ kimapīndrajālamahaha prasannayā vidadhe tayā sadasi vāmacakṣuṣām | vinipatya sānavarataṃ hi kumbhakāccaṣakāntare vyadhita varṣavibhramam || 14 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अतिदीर्घया सरलया च दूरतो मधुधारयाधिमणिकेलिकुन्तलम् । भ्रमतः स्ववर्त्मनि दधेऽङ्गनागुरोरवलम्बविद्रुमविलासयष्टिता ॥ १५ ॥ atidīrghayā saralayā ca dūrato madhudhārayādhimaṇikelikuntalam | bhramataḥ svavartmani dadhe'ṅganāguroravalambavidrumavilāsayaṣṭitā || 15 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मदिरारसस्य किमतः परं वयं प्रथयामहे प्रकटचाटुकक्रमम् । अपि योऽन्वमोदि सुदृशामविप्लुतद्विजमध्यजन्मसुहृदा रसज्ञया ॥ १६ ॥ madirārasasya kimataḥ paraṃ vayaṃ prathayāmahe prakaṭacāṭukakramam | api yo'nvamodi sudṛśāmaviplutadvijamadhyajanmasuhṛdā rasajñayā || 16 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मुखपङ्कजस्य सविधेऽधिकाधिकप्रसवाङ्कितं किमपि कापिशायनम् । स्पृशतां वधूसदसि पुष्पपायिनां बत तत्क्षणं शुभपरम्पराभवत् ॥ १७ ॥ mukhapaṅkajasya savidhe'dhikādhikaprasavāṅkitaṃ kimapi kāpiśāyanam | spṛśatāṃ vadhūsadasi puṣpapāyināṃ bata tatkṣaṇaṃ śubhaparamparābhavat || 17 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दयिताः स्तनस्तबकशालिनीः शनैरवलम्ब्य मञ्जुतरगीतिकेलिषु । मधुपत्वमाचरितवत्सु पप्रथे तरुणेषु भृङ्ग इति सार्थकं वचः ॥ १८ ॥ dayitāḥ stanastabakaśālinīḥ śanairavalambya mañjutaragītikeliṣu | madhupatvamācaritavatsu paprathe taruṇeṣu bhṛṅga iti sārthakaṃ vacaḥ || 18 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
परिपीयमानमदिरोर्मिलीलया द्रुतसान्द्रमानरजसो मृगीदृशाम् । वदनाध्वना विविशुरन्तरं भरात्सशरीररागरसनिर्झरा इव ॥ १९ ॥ paripīyamānamadirormilīlayā drutasāndramānarajaso mṛgīdṛśām | vadanādhvanā viviśurantaraṃ bharātsaśarīrarāgarasanirjharā iva || 19 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नतशातकुम्भकलशीमुखाच्युतं वलमानमग्रकरभाजि कुन्तले । सुतनोर्मुखामृतरुचेरुपेयुषो व्यधित प्रदक्षिणमिवान्तिके मधु ॥ २० ॥ nataśātakumbhakalaśīmukhācyutaṃ valamānamagrakarabhāji kuntale | sutanormukhāmṛtarucerupeyuṣo vyadhita pradakṣiṇamivāntike madhu || 20 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ललनाननाग्रकृतसङ्गसङ्गलद्धनहारहूरकमनोहरस्थितिः । चषकान्तरागतवती तदा तुलां बकुलेन बालसहकारसंहतिः ॥ २१ ॥ lalanānanāgrakṛtasaṅgasaṅgaladdhanahārahūrakamanoharasthitiḥ | caṣakāntarāgatavatī tadā tulāṃ bakulena bālasahakārasaṃhatiḥ || 21 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कटचीनपिष्टघटनाविपाटलस्मरगन्धसिन्धुरमदच्छटामिव । मदिरां समेत्य बहुभृङ्गसंहतिर्निपपौ स्फुरन्मधुरगीतनिक्वणम् ॥ २२ ॥ kaṭacīnapiṣṭaghaṭanāvipāṭalasmaragandhasindhuramadacchaṭāmiva | madirāṃ sametya bahubhṛṅgasaṃhatirnipapau sphuranmadhuragītanikvaṇam || 22 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चषकः सपीतिसमये द्युयोषितां बहिरप्युपोढमधुसीकरोऽरुचत् । मृदुतत्कराग्रपरिमर्शवैकृतप्रथमानघर्मकणसङ्गवानिव ॥ २३ ॥ caṣakaḥ sapītisamaye dyuyoṣitāṃ bahirapyupoḍhamadhusīkaro'rucat | mṛdutatkarāgraparimarśavaikṛtaprathamānagharmakaṇasaṅgavāniva || 23 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वदनं विशन्मृगदृशां सुराभरः शुशुभेऽग्रसङ्गिघनभृङ्गसंहतिः। अधरामृतासवरसाद्भुतेक्षणत्रपया पुरो मुखपटं वहन्निव ॥ २४ ॥ vadanaṃ viśanmṛgadṛśāṃ surābharaḥ śuśubhe'grasaṅgighanabhṛṅgasaṃhatiḥ| adharāmṛtāsavarasādbhutekṣaṇatrapayā puro mukhapaṭaṃ vahanniva || 24 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
परिपीतसर्वमदिरारसोऽप्यहो गणमुग्धया कनककेलिकुन्तलः । परिपूर्ण इत्यविरमन्निजाधरद्युतिसंस्तवो न सुचिरं व्यमुच्यत ॥ २५ ॥ paripītasarvamadirāraso'pyaho gaṇamugdhayā kanakakelikuntalaḥ | paripūrṇa ityaviramannijādharadyutisaṃstavo na suciraṃ vyamucyata || 25 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रतिबिम्ब्य यत्प्रथममापदुत्पलप्रतिमल्लतां मधुनि लोचनद्वयम् । सुदृशां तदेव घटमानशोणिम क्रमशोऽथ तत्र शपथैरबुध्यत ॥ २६ ॥ pratibimbya yatprathamamāpadutpalapratimallatāṃ madhuni locanadvayam | sudṛśāṃ tadeva ghaṭamānaśoṇima kramaśo'tha tatra śapathairabudhyata || 26 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मुखरद्विरेफरणिताभिमन्त्रितं दृढमानखण्डननिरर्गलस्थिति । मदनस्य वारुणमिवास्त्रमाबभौ हृदयं विशन्मधु विमुग्धचक्षुषाम् ॥ २७ ॥ mukharadvirepharaṇitābhimantritaṃ dṛḍhamānakhaṇḍananirargalasthiti | madanasya vāruṇamivāstramābabhau hṛdayaṃ viśanmadhu vimugdhacakṣuṣām || 27 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नवहालया सुतनवोऽगमन्समां प्रतिकामिनीषु च सखीषु च स्थितिम् । तदनुग्रहेण घटते हि देहिनां क्व न सामरस्यमयसंविदुद्गमः ॥ २८ ॥ navahālayā sutanavo'gamansamāṃ pratikāminīṣu ca sakhīṣu ca sthitim | tadanugraheṇa ghaṭate hi dehināṃ kva na sāmarasyamayasaṃvidudgamaḥ || 28 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रथमं यतो दधुरपत्रपिष्णुतां चरमं च मोहपथमग्नतामिव । रुरुचे मदस्य बहुविभ्रमैकभूरिति मध्यमैव गतिरेणचक्षुषाम् ॥ २९ ॥ prathamaṃ yato dadhurapatrapiṣṇutāṃ caramaṃ ca mohapathamagnatāmiva | ruruce madasya bahuvibhramaikabhūriti madhyamaiva gatireṇacakṣuṣām || 29 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अधिकुन्तलं तिलकितं द्युसद्मनां मधु मालतीमुकुलकैरलक्ष्यत । प्रतिमाशशाङ्कपरिरम्भलोभतः कृतसन्निधानमिव तारकाकुलैः ॥ ३० ॥ adhikuntalaṃ tilakitaṃ ghusadmanāṃ madhu mālatīmukulakairalakṣyata | pratimāśaśāṅkaparirambhalobhataḥ kṛtasannidhānamiva tārakākulaiḥ || 30 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रसरच्चमत्कृतिविशेषपोषतः पुटयोर्मनाङ्मुकुलतां विवृण्वती । अनिमेषपक्ष्मलदृशां दृशौ हठात्सनिमेषतामिव हलिप्रियानयत् ॥ ३१ ॥ prasaraccamatkṛtiviśeṣapoṣataḥ puṭayormanāṅmukulatāṃ vivṛṇvatī | animeṣapakṣmaladṛśāṃ dṛśau haṭhātsanimeṣatāmiva halipriyānayat || 31 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रियया मुखासवविलासघट्टनादधिरोपितो बकुलवन्मुदः पदम् । चिरमाचकाङ्क्ष तरुणस्तदन्तिकात्तदनन्तरं कुरबकस्य दोहदम् ॥ ३२ ॥ priyayā mukhāsavavilāsaghaṭṭanādadhiropito bakulavanmudaḥ padam | ciramācakāṅkṣa taruṇastadantikāttadanantaraṃ kurabakasya dohadam || 32 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शशिनः कलां परिणतां सुरीसुरा पुरतः प्रसारिकुसुमां तदावहत् । अधिरोप्यमाणविशिखां धनुर्लतां गमितां स्फुटत्वमिव पुष्पपत्रिणः ॥ ३३ ॥ śaśinaḥ kalāṃ pariṇatāṃ surīsurā purataḥ prasārikusumāṃ tadāvahat | adhiropyamāṇaviśikhāṃ dhanurlatāṃ gamitāṃ sphuṭatvamiva puṣpapatriṇaḥ || 33 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मदनप्रतापतपनोष्मविप्लवद्रुतविश्वपाटलमणिद्रवद्रुहि । जघटे परिस्रुतिन(ति न​)वीनमालतीमुकुलैर्विडम्बितविशुद्धमौक्तिकैः ॥ ३४ ॥ madanapratāpatapanoṣmaviplavadrutaviśvapāṭalamaṇidravadruhi | jaghaṭe parisrutina(ti na)vīnamālatīmukulairviḍambitaviśuddhamauktikaiḥ || 34 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वदनप्रभालवजितस्य शीतगोरबलाः कलां विचकरुः परिस्रुति । नियतं तदा मृदुलमालतीमिषाद्घ​नतत्सुधासव(रस​)निवेशसिद्धये ॥ ३५ ॥ vadanaprabhālavajitasya śītagorabalāḥ kalāṃ vicakaruḥ parisruti | niyataṃ tadā mṛdulamālatīmiṣādghanatatsudhāsava(rasa)niveśasiddhaye || 35 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सदसद्विकल्पकलनापहारिणो मधुनः स्मरोपनिषदेकशालिनः । घटमानचाटुवचसः कलस्वरैरलयः प्रदक्षिणमिव प्रणिन्यिरे ॥ ३६ ॥ sadasadvikalpakalanāpahāriṇo madhunaḥ smaropaniṣadekaśālinaḥ | ghaṭamānacāṭuvacasaḥ kalasvarairalayaḥ pradakṣiṇamiva praṇinyire || 36 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चरितं व्यजेष्ट बत पानगोष्ठिका सुचिरप्ररूढमपि पद्मसद्मनः । ललनाननाम्बुजकदम्बके तदा व्यतनिष्ट यन्नवमधूदयोत्सवम् ॥ ३७ ॥ caritaṃ vyajeṣṭa bata pānagoṣṭhikā suciraprarūḍhamapi padmasadmanaḥ | lalanānanāmbujakadambake tadā vyataniṣṭa yannavamadhūdayotsavam || 37 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्वकरोढकुन्तलमुपान्तवर्तिनं स्मयने प्रियं प्रति विलोलचक्षुषः । प्रतिबिम्बिता मधुनि दन्तमण्डली नवमालतीमुकुलभङ्गिमग्रहीत् ॥ ३८ ॥ svakaroḍhakuntalamupāntavartinaṃ smayane priyaṃ prati vilolacakṣuṣaḥ | pratibimbitā madhuni dantamaṇḍalī navamālatīmukulabhaṅgimagrahīt || 38 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अधिमद्यमध्यमुरुपुष्पसंहतिभ्रमरावली कलकलाकुला दधे । हरभीतिभङ्गुरमतमनोभुवो जलदुर्गगर्तगतसैन्यविभ्रमम् ॥ ३९ ॥ adhimadyamadhyamurupuṣpasaṃhatibhramarāvalī kalakalākulā dadhe | harabhītibhaṅguramatamanobhuvo jaladurgagartagatasainyavibhramam || 39 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विनिमज्ज्य सीधुसरिति ध्रुवं स्मरो हरहव्यवाहदवथुव्यथां जहौ । च्यवमानशान्तरुचितत्स्फुलिङ्गता तदुपान्तवर्त्मनि यदापि षट्पदैः॥ ४० ॥ vinimajjya sīdhusariti dhruvaṃ smaro harahavyavāhadavathuvyathāṃ jahau | cyavamānaśāntarucitatsphuliṅgatā tadupāntavartmani yadāpi ṣaṭpadaiḥ|| 40 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
परिपाटले मधुनि मालतीकुलैर्धवले विवल्गदसितालिशालिनि । तपनीयकुन्तलमयूखदन्तुरे स्मरचित्रभित्तिरिति पप्रथे भ्रमः ॥ ४१ ॥ paripāṭale madhuni mālatīkulairdhavale vivalgadasitāliśālini | tapanīyakuntalamayūkhadanture smaracitrabhittiriti paprathe bhramaḥ || 41 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कनकालुकामुपरि कापि पाणिना दधती स्व​वक्त्रपतदासवस्रुतिम् । अतनोदखण्डशशिबिम्बकोटरप्रसरत्सुषुम्णमपरार्कमण्डलम् ॥ ४२ ॥ kanakālukāmupari kāpi pāṇinā dadhatī svaktrapatadāsavasrutim | atanodakhaṇḍaśaśibimbakoṭaraprasaratsuṣumṇamaparārkamaṇḍalam || 42 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रतियातना शशिनि मेचकोत्पलच्छदपङ्क्तिभिर्विनिहिताभिरादधे । मधुभाजनेष्वमरवारयोषितां नवसंसरद्वहुकलङ्कसङ्करः ॥ ४३ ॥ pratiyātanā śaśini mecakotpalacchadapaṅktibhirvinihitābhirādadhe | madhubhājaneṣvamaravārayoṣitāṃ navasaṃsaradvahukalaṅkasaṅkaraḥ || 43 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नवपानकेलिकिलकिञ्चिताञ्चिता भृतमासवेन सुरवामलोचना । पृथुनेत्रनीलनलिनं विनिर्ममे मुखमेव कापि दयितस्य कुन्तलम् ॥ ४४ ॥ navapānakelikilakiñcitāñcitā bhṛtamāsavena suravāmalocanā | pṛthunetranīlanalinaṃ vinirmame mukhameva kāpi dayitasya kuntalam || 44 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अवहद्वपुः कुवलयाग्रकेसरैश्चषकोदरे विवृतरागसङ्गमः । परिचुम्बनात्सुरविलोलचक्षुषां दशनक्षतैरिव सनाथमासवः ॥ ४५ ॥ avahadvapuḥ kuvalayāgrakesaraiścaṣakodare vivṛtarāgasaṅgamaḥ | paricumbanātsuravilolacakṣuṣāṃ daśanakṣatairiva sanāthamāsavaḥ || 45 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मणिभाजनाग्रजवनिष्प​तत्सुरारसविप्रुषः पुपुषुरेणचक्षुषाम् । कटचीनपिष्टपरिपाटलस्मरद्विपकीर्यमाणकरसीकरभ्रमम् ॥ ४६ ॥ maṇibhājanāgrajavaniṣpatatsurārasavipruṣaḥ pupuṣureṇacakṣuṣām | kaṭacīnapiṣṭaparipāṭalasmaradvipakīryamāṇakarasīkarabhramam || 46 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पुरतोऽलिजालपिहितां हलिप्रियां विबुधावरोधललना व्यलोकयत् । हठलुप्यमानविभवामनर्गलं हलिमत्सरादिव कलिन्दकन्यया ॥ ४७ ॥ purato'lijālapihitāṃ halipriyāṃ vibudhāvarodhalalanā vyalokayat | haṭhalupyamānavibhavāmanargalaṃ halimatsarādiva kalindakanyayā || 47 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स ममैष शेवधिविशेष इत्यलं मदिराममंस्त नियतं मनोभवः । कुटिलालिपङ्क्तिकलया सितेतरैरुरगै रिरक्षिषुभिरावृतेव यत् ॥ ४८ ॥ sa mamaiṣa śevadhiviśeṣa ityalaṃ madirāmamaṃsta niyataṃ manobhavaḥ | kuṭilālipaṅktikalayā sitetarairuragai rirakṣiṣubhirāvṛteva yat || 48 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मुखसौरभभ्रमदलिप्रभावतो दशनच्छदोऽभजदिवाञ्जनार्जनम् । मधुनारुणे मृगदृशां विलोचने ययतुश्च सान्द्रमदनार्द्रतामिव ॥ ४९ ॥ mukhasaurabhabhramadaliprabhāvato daśanacchado'bhajadivāñjanārjanam | madhunāruṇe mṛgadṛśāṃ vilocane yayatuśca sāndramadanārdratāmiva || 49 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अतिताम्रयोर्मधुमदेन गण्डयोः प्रविलुप्यमानपरभागविभ्रमम् । अवरोप्य लौहितककुण्डलं व्यधात्सुदृशः श्रुतौ कनककर्णिकां प्रियः ॥ ५० ॥ atitāmrayormadhumadena gaṇḍayoḥ pravilupyamānaparabhāgavibhramam | avaropya lauhitakakuṇḍalaṃ vyadhātsudṛśaḥ śrutau kanakakarṇikāṃ priyaḥ || 50 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
हठचुम्ब्यमानवदना विलासिभिर्ललनास्तदा मदनहृष्टदृष्टयः । मधुमध्यबिम्बितनिपीतशीतरुक्तनुशैत्ययोगत इवाचकम्पिरे ॥ ५१ ॥ haṭhacumbyamānavadanā vilāsibhirlalanāstadā madanahṛṣṭadṛṣṭayaḥ | madhumadhyabimbitanipītaśītaruktanuśaityayogata ivācakampire || 51 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तरुणाः पुरः परिचिता नवोच्छ्वसन्मदघूर्णनाकुलितकेलिवाससाम् । अपि यन्मनोरथगतेरगोचरं तदवापुरीक्षितुमधीरचक्षुषाम् ॥ ५२ ॥ taruṇāḥ puraḥ paricitā navocchvasanmadaghūrṇanākulitakelivāsasām | api yanmanorathagateragocaraṃ tadavāpurīkṣitumadhīracakṣuṣām || 52 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कादम्बरी कुहरसङ्गिकुरङ्गभङ्गि-भृङ्गा कुरङ्गकदृशां मणिकुन्तलेषु । कामप्रतापदहनद्रुतसान्ध्यचन्द्र-बिम्बोपमाधित सुधारससामरस्यम् ॥ ५३ ॥ kādambarī kuharasaṅgikuraṅgabhaṅgi- bhṛṅgā kuraṅgakadṛśāṃ maṇikuntaleṣu | kāmapratāpadahanadrutasāndhyacandra- bimbopamādhita sudhārasasāmarasyam || 53 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
देवी स्वयं भगवती युवसु प्रसन्ना तत्राजनिष्ट नियतं झटिति प्रसन्ना । यद्वैभवाद्दृढमपि प्रविमुच्य मानं तान्सुभ्रुवोऽनुजगृहुर्हठचुम्बनेन ॥ ५४ ॥ devī svayaṃ bhagavatī yuvasu prasannā tatrājaniṣṭa niyataṃ jhaṭiti prasannā | yadvaibhavāddṛḍhamapi pravimucya mānaṃ tānsubhruvo'nujagṛhurhaṭhacumbanena || 54 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चक्रे गतौ च गिरि च स्खलनं पदानां दृष्टौ च चेतसि च रागभरं पुपोष । मार्द्वीकमुत्पलदृशामुपनीयमानं प्रेयोधरामृतरसस्य पुरःसरत्वम् ॥ ५५ ॥ cakre gatau ca giri ca skhalanaṃ padānāṃ dṛṣṭau ca cetasi ca rāgabharaṃ pupoṣa | mārdvīkamutpaladṛśāmupanīyamānaṃ preyodharāmṛtarasasya puraḥsaratvam || 55 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निर्व्याजगद्गदगिरो वदनं वहन्त्या भ्राम्यद्भ्रु पाटलविलोचनगण्डलेखम् । कोपं विपक्षमधुपायनजायमानं क्षैब्यस्पृशो मृगदृशो न युवा विवेद ॥ ५६ ॥ nirvyājagadgadagiro vadanaṃ vahantyā bhrāmyadbhru pāṭalavilocanagaṇḍalekham | kopaṃ vipakṣamadhupāyanajāyamānaṃ kṣaibyaspṛśo mṛgadṛśo na yuvā viveda || 56 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रुष्टा काप्यगमत्प्रसादपदवीमप्रार्थितापि प्रिये निर्हेतु प्रथमानमन्तुरपरा कान्तं प्रकुप्यादुनोत् । तस्थौ काचन सामरस्यसरणौ निस्तोषरोषा वधू-रित्थं भावविभागमाविरकरोत्तासां मदोपक्रमः ॥ ५७ ॥ ruṣṭā kāpyagamatprasādapadavīmaprārthitāpi priye nirhetu prathamānamanturaparā kāntaṃ prakupyādunot | tasthau kācana sāmarasyasaraṇau nistoṣaroṣā vadhū-ritthaṃ bhāvavibhāgamāvirakarottāsāṃ madopakramaḥ || 57 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रक्तत्वं विजहौ कपोलफलकं गृह्णच्छनैः पाण्डुतां मीलन्त्यां दृशि चास्तमापदवशं चाञ्चल्यचर्चाक्रमः । व्यक्तत्वं न जगाम गद्गदपदन्यासश्च मौनाद्गिरा- मित्यासीदतिवृद्धितो मृगदृशां विक्षिप्तलक्ष्मा मदः ॥ ५८ ॥ raktatvaṃ vijahau kapolaphalakaṃ gṛhṇacchanaiḥ pāṇḍutāṃ mīlantyāṃ dṛśi cāstamāpadavaśaṃ cāñcalyacarcākramaḥ | vyaktatvaṃ na jagāma gadgadapadanyāsaśca maunādgirā- mityāsīdativṛddhito mṛgadṛśāṃ vikṣiptalakṣmā madaḥ || 58 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
क्रीडाकुरङ्गककृते न ममाङ्करङ्कुं त्वं चेद्ददासि दयितानननिर्जितोऽपि । तत्ते कवाटितमितश्चषकान्तरेण कारागृहं चषकमेव विधो विधास्ये ॥ ५९ ॥ krīḍākuraṅgakakṛte na mamāṅkaraṅkuṃ tvaṃ ceddadāsi dayitānananirjito'pi | tatte kavāṭitamitaścaṣakāntareṇa kārāgṛhaṃ caṣakameva vidho vidhāsye || 59 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
किं ते कम्पो वपुषि चषकोन्नद्धसीधूर्मिमध्ये क्रीडाबाहूत्तरणमसकृत्कुर्वतः शर्वरीश । आयात्येतन्ननु तव कथङ्कारमस्मिन्नकस्मा-द्बिम्बं तुम्बीफललघु सखे मज्जनस्यातिथित्वम् ॥ ६० ॥ kiṃ te kampo vapuṣi caṣakonnaddhasīdhūrmimadhye krīḍābāhūttaraṇamasakṛtkurvataḥ śarvarīśa | āyātyetannanu tava kathaṅkāramasminnakasmā-dbimbaṃ tumbīphalalaghu sakhe majjanasyātithitvam || 60 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
त्वं राजतां द्विजजने भजसे निसर्गा-त्क्षत्रान्वयस्य च भवान्प्रथमः प्रणेता । तद्युज्यते बत शशाङ्क कथं किलाय-मुच्छिष्टसीधुचषकेषु तवावगाहः ॥ ६१ ॥ tvaṃ rājatāṃ dvijajane bhajase nisargā-tkṣatrānvayasya ca bhavānprathamaḥ praṇetā| tadyujyate bata śaśāṅka kathaṃ kilāya-mucchiṣṭasīdhucaṣakeṣu tavāvagāhaḥ || 61 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
परिहर चतुरं कुरङ्गकेतो मम चषकं त्वमधीश्वरो द्विजानाम् । परिणतमधुसौरभे जुगुप्सां त्वयि न यथा त्रिदशर्षयो जुषन्ते ॥ ६२ ॥ parihara caturaṃ kuraṅgaketo mama caṣakaṃ tvamadhīśvaro dvijānām | pariṇatamadhusaurabhe jugupsāṃ tvayi na yathā tridaśarṣayo juṣante || 62 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तास्तन्वङ्ग्यः परिसरलसत्प्राणनाथाङ्कपाली-लीलालोलालसतरवपुर्लेखमुल्लेखवत्यः । क्षैब्यव्यावल्गनतरलितापाङ्गरङ्गत्कटाक्षा मध्येसीधु प्रतिमितमिति स्वैरमेणाङ्कमूचुः ॥ ६३ ॥ tāstanvaṅgyaḥ parisaralasatprāṇanāthāṅkapālī- līlālolālasataravapurlekhamullekhavatyaḥ | kṣaibyavyāvalganataralitāpāṅgaraṅgatkaṭākṣā madhyesīdhu pratimitamiti svairameṇāṅkamūcuḥ || 63 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निरवधिमधुगोष्ठीगौरवादध्यगच्छ-न्निति कति न तरुण्यः शोणतामाननेषु । अलभत परभागं येन तासां स रज्य-ञ्श्र​कुवलयेभ्योऽप्याशु नेत्रत्रिभागः ॥ ६४ ॥ niravadhimadhugoṣṭhīgauravādadhyagaccha-nniti kati na taruṇyaḥ śoṇatāmānaneṣu | alabhata parabhāgaṃ yena tāsāṃ sa rajya-ñśrravaṇakuvalayebhyo'pyāśu netratribhāgaḥ || 64 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ये नागरङ्गफलखण्डपुटैरपीप्य-न्मुग्धाननां मधु विलासरसाद्युवानः । तस्याः किलाधररसस्य विविच्यमानं ते प्रत्युदाहरणमग्रत एव चक्रुः ॥ ६५ ॥ ye nāgaraṅgaphalakhaṇḍapuṭairapīpya-nmugdhānanāṃ madhu vilāsarasādyuvānaḥ | tasyāḥ kilādhararasasya vivicyamānaṃ te pratyudāharaṇamagrata eva cakruḥ || 65 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
काप्यास्त स्तिमितैव तत्र कृतकक्षैब्यक्षणासूत्रणा –त्तत्कान्तोऽपि परां चुचुम्ब विगलन्निःशेषशङ्कालवम् । तामाविर्भवदुद्धतक्रुधमथ क्षीबासि नो वेत्यहं त्वय्येवं कृतवान्परीक्षणमिति द्राक्सोऽपमन्तुं व्यधात् ॥ ६६ ॥ kāpyāsta stimitaiva tatra kṛtakakṣaibyakṣaṇāsūtraṇā –ttatkānto'pi parāṃ cucumba vigalanniḥśeṣaśaṅkālavam | tāmāvirbhavaduddhatakrudhamatha kṣībāsi no vetyahaṃ tvayyevaṃ kṛtavānparīkṣaṇamiti drākso'pamantuṃ vyadhāt || 66 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इत्थं तासां विलासालसवलितकरोत्सङ्गसंसङ्गिपात्रं प्राणेशान्पाययित्वा सममधरदलप्रान्तदंशावदंशैः । पायं पायं निपीते मधुनि मधुरता याङ्गकेष्वाविरासी-त्तां वक्तुं पौष्पचापे सदसि न कतरोऽप्येति पाण्डित्यमुद्राम् ॥ ६७ ॥ itthaṃ tāsāṃ vilāsālasavalitakarotsaṅgasaṃsaṅgipātraṃ prāṇeśānpāyayitvā samamadharadalaprāntadaṃśāvadaṃśaiḥ | pāyaṃ pāyaṃ nipīte madhuni madhuratā yāṅgakeṣvāvirāsī- ttāṃ vaktuṃ pauṣpacāpe sadasi na kataro'pyeti pāṇḍityamudrām || 67 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पुष्णन्पुष्पेषु सक्तिं विवृतनिरवधिव्यक्तरागानुषङ्गः सीधुस्तासां प्रविश्य त्रिदशमृगदृशामाशयं विभ्रमेण । प्रत्यङ्गं लब्धसङ्गः पटुपुलकभृतो मीलदालोलनेत्रा-स्ताश्चक्रे प्रागवाप्ताधरदलघटनो निर्वृतेरन्तरङ्गाः ॥ ६८ ॥ puṣṇanpuṣpeṣu saktiṃ vivṛtaniravadhivyaktarāgānuṣaṅgaḥ sīdhustāsāṃ praviśya tridaśamṛgadṛśāmāśayaṃ vibhrameṇa | pratyaṅgaṃ labdhasaṅgaḥ paṭupulakabhṛto mīladālolanetrā-stāścakre prāgavāptādharadalaghaṭano nirvṛterantaraṅgāḥ || 68 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति श्रीजोनराजकृतया टीकया समेतः श्रीराजानकविश्ववर्तसूनोर्महाकवि- राजराजानकश्रीमङ्खकस्य कृतौ श्रीकण्ठचरिते महाकाव्ये पानकेलिवर्णनं नाम चतुर्दशः सर्गः ॥ पञ्चदशः सर्गः ॥ ता वारुणीपरिमलानुचरद्विरेफ-कोलाहलाकुलितनूपुरमञ्जुशिञ्जाः । स्वं वासवेश्म विविशुर्मदपूर्णमानाः प्राणेशपाणिनिहिताग्रकरास्तरुण्यः ॥ १ ॥ tā vāruṇīparimalānucaradvirepha-kolāhalākulitanūpuramañjuśiñjāḥ | svaṃ vāsaveśma viviśurmadapūrṇamānāḥ prāṇeśapāṇinihitāgrakarāstaruṇyaḥ || 1 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सान्द्रोपकारकुसुमप्रकरान्तरङ्गं कीर्णं शरैः प्रथममेव मनोभुवेव । सार्धं प्रियैर्युवतयः स्वविलासवास-मासाद्य केलिशयनीयतले निषेदुः ॥ २ ॥ sāndropakārakusumaprakarāntaraṅgaṃ kīrṇaṃ śaraiḥ prathamameva manobhuveva | sārdhaṃ priyairyuvatayaḥ svavilāsavāsa- māsādya keliśayanīyatale niṣeduḥ || 2 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्लिष्यत्फणामणिमनङ्गभुजङ्गमेन क्षिप्तां दधन्ति नवनिर्ल्वयिनीमिवाग्रे । चीनोत्तरच्छदपटैरविदूरकेलि-दीपैर्विलासशयनीयतलानि रेजुः ॥ ३ ॥ śliṣyatphaṇāmaṇimanaṅgabhujaṅgamena kṣiptāṃ dadhanti navanirlvayinīmivāgre | cīnottaracchadapaṭairavidūrakeli-dīpairvilāsaśayanīyatalāni rejuḥ || 3 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रक्रान्तचेलहरणेषु यदृच्छयैव जज्ञे कुरङ्गकदृशां रतिमन्दिरेषु । निर्दह्यमानबहुलागुरुधूमपुञ्जै-स्तत्रासितांशुकतिरस्करिणीनिवेशः ॥ ४ ॥ prakrāntacelaharaṇeṣu yadṛcchayaiva jajñe kuraṅgakadṛśāṃ ratimandireṣu | nirdahyamānabahulāgurudhūmapuñjai-statrāsitāṃśukatiraskariṇīniveśaḥ || 4 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
लीलागृहे विहितनिह्नवयैणनाभि-नासीरधूमलहरीभिरुदेत्य दूरम् । मूर्त्या मुहूर्तमपुषन्मिथुनानि केलि-मुद्वेलमान्मथरसहृदमग्नयेव ॥ ५ ॥ līlāgṛhe vihitanihnavayaiṇanābhi-nāsīradhūmalaharībhirudetya dūram | mūrtyā muhūrtamapuṣanmithunāni keli-mudvelamānmatharasahṛdamagnayeva || 5 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अभ्यस्तसौरभसखालिरवैः सुवृत्त-गण्डोपधानपटलैरघटिष्ट तल्पम् । सज्जीभवत्कुसुमचापरथावशेषै-श्चक्रैरिवोन्मुखरनेमिभिरङ्गनानाम् ॥ ६ ॥ abhyastasaurabhasakhāliravaiḥ suvṛtta-gaṇḍopadhānapaṭalairaghaṭiṣṭa talpam | sajjībhavatkusumacāparathāvaśeṣai-ścakrairivonmukharanemibhiraṅganānām || 6 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रोताहिवल्लिदलवीटकनिर्विभागाः सूच्यो विलेसुरुपधानपथेषु यूनाम् । द्राग्विद्धमेकसमये बहुलक्ष्यवर्ग-मङ्गे वहन्त इव पञ्चशरस्य बाणाः ॥ ७ ॥ protāhivallidalavīṭakanirvibhāgāḥ sūcyo vilesurupadhānapatheṣu yūnām | drāgviddhamekasamaye bahulakṣyavarga-maṅge vahanta iva pañcaśarasya bāṇāḥ || 7 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
लीढोपकारविपुलोत्पलपल्लवाग्रा मत्तालयो भवनभूमिषु जाग्रति स्म । विश्राम्यतो रतिपतेरवजित्य विश्व-मात्तासिधेनव इवाभिनवाङ्गरक्षाः ॥ ८ ॥ līḍhopakāravipulotpalapallavāgrā mattālayo bhavanabhūmiṣu jāgrati sma | viśrāmyato ratipateravajitya viśva-māttāsidhenava ivābhinavāṅgarakṣāḥ || 8 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्राणेश्वरद्विगुणबाहुलतोपधानं लीलानिषण्णवपुषामुपरि प्रियाणाम् । अन्योत्तरीयघटना मदनाज्ञयेव तेने वितानकमणिप्रसृतैर्मयूखैः ॥ ९ ॥ prāṇeśvaradviguṇabāhulatopadhānaṃ līlāniṣaṇṇavapuṣāmupari priyāṇām | anyottarīyaghaṭanā madanājñayeva tene vitānakamaṇiprasṛtairmayūkhaiḥ || 9 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कान्तेषु कञ्चुकविमोचनचञ्चुरेषु व्यक्ता बभौ कुचतटी चटुलेक्षणानाम् । तत्कालकृष्टधनुषे ददती दशार्ध-बाणाय चम्पकशरौघमिवांशुदण्डैः ॥ १० ॥ kānteṣu kañcukavimocanacañcureṣu vyaktā babhau kucataṭī caṭulekṣaṇānām | tatkālakṛṣṭadhanuṣe dadatī daśārdha-bāṇāya campakaśaraughamivāṃśudaṇḍaiḥ || 10 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निष्पीडितस्तनतटं दृढबाहुबन्ध-बन्धुं सहेलकृतकण्ठहठग्रहं च । निर्मुच्य कञ्चुकमथाञ्चितलोचनाभि-स्तत्कर्मणः पदमकल्प्यत कान्तलोकः ॥ ११ ॥ niṣpīḍitastanataṭaṃ dṛḍhabāhubandha-bandhuṃ sahelakṛtakaṇṭhahaṭhagrahaṃ ca | nirmucya kañcukamathāñcitalocanābhi-statkarmaṇaḥ padamakalpyata kāntalokaḥ || 11 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चामीकराम्बुरुहकुड्मलभूमिकासु रूढं कुचद्वयमधीरविलोचनानाम् । अग्रादनङ्गरसनाटकनर्तनाय द्राक्कञ्चुकं जवनिकाभमपाचकार ॥ १२ ॥ cāmīkarāmburuhakuḍmalabhūmikāsu rūḍhaṃ kucadvayamadhīravilocanānām | agrādanaṅgarasanāṭakanartanāya drākkañcukaṃ javanikābhamapācakāra || 12 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
केलिप्रदीपलतिकाप्रतियातनाभि-र्निष्कञ्जुकाः प्रति(?स्तन)भुवो बभुरङ्गनानाम् । कन्दर्पभूभुजि मनोभवनं प्रविष्टे सीमन्तिता इव हिरण्मयवेत्रदण्डाः ॥ १३ ॥ kelipradīpalatikāpratiyātanābhi- rniṣkañjukāḥ prati(?stana)bhuvo babhuraṅganānām | kandarpabhūbhuji manobhavanaṃ praviṣṭe sīmantitā iva hiraṇmayavetradaṇḍāḥ || 13 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आच्छिद्य कञ्चुकमयं सिचयं निपीड्य नैबिड्यतो नखमुखैश्च विदारयद्भिः । नीरन्ध्रपीतनरसा कुचभूः पुरस्ता-त्कोपारुणेव ददृशे युवभिर्वधूनाम् ॥ १४ ॥ ācchidya kañcukamayaṃ sicayaṃ nipīḍya naibiḍyato nakhamukhaiśca vidārayadbhiḥ | nīrandhrapītanarasā kucabhūḥ purastā-tkopāruṇeva dadṛśe yuvabhirvadhūnām || 14 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सख्योऽथ पक्ष्मलदृशां तदवेक्ष्य तन्त्रं स्मेराननार्पितकरं शनकैर्निरीयुः । तत्कर्पटाञ्चलसमीरविधूयमानो दीपोऽपि निर्जिगमिषुत्वमिवाललम्बे ॥ १५ ॥ sakhyo'tha pakṣmaladṛśāṃ tadavekṣya tantraṃ smerānanārpitakaraṃ śanakairnirīyuḥ | tatkarpaṭāñcalasamīravidhūyamāno dīpo'pi nirjigamiṣutvamivālalambe || 15 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नर्मोक्तिमन्त्रमुखरः परिवेष्टयन्तीं कन्दर्पशेवधिसनाभिनितम्बबिम्बम् । कृष्णोरगीमिव ततो झटिति प्रियायाः कश्चिन्मसाररशनास्रजमाचर्ष ॥ १६ ॥ narmoktimantramukharaḥ pariveṣṭayantīṃ kandarpaśevadhisanābhinitambabimbam | kṛṣṇoragīmiva tato jhaṭiti priyāyāḥ kaścinmasāraraśanāsrajamācarṣa || 16 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
काञ्चीहठापहरणाय करे प्रियेण न्यस्ते न्यधत्त दयिता त्रपया निरोद्धुम् । यत्पाणिपङ्कजमभूत्स्मरधूर्तहस्त-सञ्ज्ञाप्रवृत्तिरिव सैव परस्परस्य ॥ १७ ॥ kāñcīhaṭhāpaharaṇāya kare priyeṇa nyaste nyadhatta dayitā trapayā niroddhum | yatpāṇipaṅkajamabhūtsmaradhūrtahasta- sañjñāpravṛttiriva saiva parasparasya || 17 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वस्त्रं हरत्सु विजनेऽथ च चित्तचौर-लोकेषु तूर्णमबलाजघनस्थलानाम् । वीक्ष्य प्रबोधसमयं रसपार्थिवस्य काञ्ची चिरं कलकलं कलमाततान ॥ १८ ॥ vastraṃ haratsu vijane'tha ca cittacaura-lokeṣu tūrṇamabalājaghanasthalānām | vīkṣya prabodhasamayaṃ rasapārthivasya kāñcī ciraṃ kalakalaṃ kalamātatāna || 18 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्राणेश्वरेण रभसापहृतोत्तरीय-मेणीदृशो जघनबिम्बमपत्रपिष्णोः । अग्रेऽसृजन्नवनवद्युतिसंस्तवेन कस्याश्चन स्वयमिवावरणान्तराणि ॥ १९ ॥ prāṇeśvareṇa rabhasāpahṛtottarīya-meṇīdṛśo jaghanabimbamapatrapiṣṇoḥ | agre'sṛjannavanavadyutisaṃstavena kasyāścana svayamivāvaraṇāntarāṇi || 19 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्तम्भेन निर्दयनिपीडनविक्लवानि प्रत्यग्रवेपथुविशेषविशृङ्खलानि । प्रेमाकुलं समघटन्त ततोऽङ्गकानि यूनां कथञ्चन मिथः परिरम्भणेषु ॥ २० ॥ stambhena nirdayanipīḍanaviklavāni pratyagravepathuviśeṣaviśṛṅkhalāni | premākulaṃ samaghaṭanta tato'ṅgakāni yūnāṃ kathañcana mithaḥ parirambhaṇeṣu || 20 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शृङ्गारिणां युवतिभिः सह रागयोगा-त्प्राक्सिद्ध एव मनसोरविभाग आसीत् । सुस्यूतयोः स्मरशरैरिव दृश्यते स्म तस्मिन्क्षणे तु वपुषोरपि नो विभागः ॥ २१ ॥ śṛṅgāriṇāṃ yuvatibhiḥ saha rāgayogā-tprāksiddha eva manasoravibhāga āsīt | susyūtayoḥ smaraśarairiva dṛśyate sma tasminkṣaṇe tu vapuṣorapi no vibhāgaḥ || 21 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रोमाञ्चकञ्चुकतनुत्रभृतो ययुस्ते शृङ्गारिणः सुरतसङ्गरवीरगोष्ठीम् । येषां समं शिततरस्मरकङ्कपत्रै-श्चक्रे पदं हृदि वधूकुचमण्डलाग्रैः ॥ २२ ॥ romāñcakañcukatanutrabhṛto yayuste śṛṅgāriṇaḥ suratasaṅgaravīragoṣṭhīm | yeṣāṃ samaṃ śitatarasmarakaṅkapatrai- ścakre padaṃ hṛdi vadhūkucamaṇḍalāgraiḥ || 22 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अन्योन्यगाढभुजबन्धनबन्धुरत्वं यूनामगाहत तथा परिरम्भमार्गः । जज्ञे यथा पृथुलहारलताफलानां कन्दर्पगन्धगजभूतिरजःप्रतिष्ठा ॥ २३ ॥ anyonyagāḍhabhujabandhanabandhuratvaṃ yūnāmagāhata tathā parirambhamārgaḥ | jajñe yathā pṛthulahāralatāphalānāṃ kandarpagandhagajabhūtirajaḥpratiṣṭhā || 23 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
एणीदृशां कुचतटी पटुयौवनोष्मा हारावली च निबिडा जडिमप्रथाभिः । ताभ्यामुरःसु सममेव निपत्य यूनां शीतातपक्लमशमोऽजनि मन्मथस्य ॥ २४ ॥ eṇīdṛśāṃ kucataṭī paṭuyauvanoṣmā hārāvalī ca nibiḍā jaḍimaprathābhiḥ | tābhyāmuraḥsu samameva nipatya yūnāṃ śītātapaklamaśamo'jani manmathasya || 24 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नीरन्ध्रमात्तपरिरम्भविजृम्भणस्य रम्भोरुभिः सह विलासिजनस्य कामः । प्रोतं विधातुमिव चेतसि रागसूत्रं रोमाञ्चसूचिनिचयं प्रचुरीचकार ॥ २५ ॥ nīrandhramāttaparirambhavijṛmbhaṇasya rambhorubhiḥ saha vilāsijanasya kāmaḥ | protaṃ vidhātumiva cetasi rāgasūtraṃ romāñcasūcinicayaṃ pracurīcakāra || 25 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वामभ्रुवां निबिडतुङ्गपयोधराग्रे सत्यं स्वयं वसति पुष्पशरप्रतापः । तस्मिन्नुरः परिचिते हि तदा युवानो बभ्रुश्चिरं वपुरुपोढदृढश्रमाम्भः ॥ २६ ॥ vāmabhruvāṃ nibiḍatuṅgapayodharāgre satyaṃ svayaṃ vasati puṣpaśarapratāpaḥ | tasminnuraḥ paricite hi tadā yuvāno babhruściraṃ vapurupoḍhadṛḍhaśramāmbhaḥ || 26 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रेमाकुलं युवजनो वनजेक्षणानां तं वीप्सयाधररसासवमाचचाम । जीवाप्तये रतिपतेः पुनरुद्ववाम यद्विभ्रमादमृतमाननपूर्णचन्द्रः ॥ २७ ॥ premākulaṃ yuvajano vanajekṣaṇānāṃ taṃ vīpsayādhararasāsavamācacāma | jīvāptaye ratipateḥ punarudvavāma yadvibhramādamṛtamānanapūrṇacandraḥ || 27 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कान्तावगूढवपुषस्तरुणीजनस्य तानि क्रमान्मसृणतां मणितानि जग्मुः । लीलाशुका यदनुवादविधेर्गुरूणा-मग्रे प्रगे व्यधुरनङ्गरहस्यभेदम् ॥ २८ ॥ kāntāvagūḍhavapuṣastaruṇījanasya tāni kramānmasṛṇatāṃ maṇitāni jagmuḥ | līlāśukā yadanuvādavidhergurūṇā-magre prage vyadhuranaṅgarahasyabhedam || 28 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
लीलारतोद्यदनुपाधिकसामरस्य-लीनेष्वशेषकरणेषु हठोद्गतानि । यूनां ययुर्बधिरकर्णपुटोपजाप-सापत्न्यमेव दयिताजनसीत्कृतानि ॥ २९ ॥ līlāratodyadanupādhikasāmarasya-līneṣvaśeṣakaraṇeṣu haṭhodgatāni | yūnāṃ yayurbadhirakarṇapuṭopajāpa-sāpatnyameva dayitājanasītkṛtāni || 29 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
न्यस्तानि मन्मथरसालसमङ्गनाभि-र्यूनां तनूषु बभुरार्द्रनखक्षतानि । शृङ्गारमत्तकरिणो गलिताः कवाट-सिन्दूरराजय इवालुलिता मदेन ॥ ३० ॥ nyastāni manmatharasālasamaṅganābhi- ryūnāṃ tanūṣu babhurārdranakhakṣatāni | śṛṅgāramattakariṇo galitāḥ kavāṭa-sindūrarājaya ivālulitā madena || 30 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गीर्वाणपार्वणनिशारमणाननानां चेतोविलुण्ठनचणानि कुचस्थलानि । आदेशतो रतिपतिक्षितिपस्य सद्यः प्रापुः कठोरकरजक्षतपीडनानि ॥ ३१ ॥ gīrvāṇapārvaṇaniśāramaṇānanānāṃ cetoviluṇṭhanacaṇāni kucasthalāni | ādeśato ratipatikṣitipasya sadyaḥ prāpuḥ kaṭhorakarajakṣatapīḍanāni || 31 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
