औत्सुक्यतो विवृतशैत्यविपक्षखड्ग-धाराजलाप्लुतिषु रूक्षवचोनुबन्धि । तत्तद्विकारविशरारुतया पुरस्ता-त्कस्यापि वक्त्रमतनोत्पवनप्रकोपम् ॥ ५३ ॥ autsukyato vivṛtaśaityavipakṣakhaḍga-dhārājalāplutiṣu rūkṣavaconubandhi | tattadvikāraviśarārutayā purastā-tkasyāpi vaktramatanotpavanaprakopam || 53 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्रोतांसि घ​र्मसरितो हठचूर्ण्यमान–माणिक्यभूषणरजोभिरुरुप्रकोपः । भालस्थले सिकतिले कुरुते स्म वीर-लोकः पटुभ्रुकुटिशेवलमांसलानि ॥ ५४ ॥ srotāṃsi gharmasarito haṭhacūrṇyamāna-māṇikyabhūṣaṇarajobhiruruprakopaḥ | bhālasthale sikatile kurute sma vīra-lokaḥ paṭubhrukuṭiśevalamāṃsalāni || 54 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सान्द्रस्वेदनदीष्णदोष्णि विकटभ्रूरङ्गपीठीभव-द्भाले पाटलतानिचोलकविशत्प्रोच्चण्डगण्डस्थले । इत्थं क्वाप्य(कुप्य​)तिदृ(ति दृ)प्यदुल्वणगणग्रामे ननामेव भू-स्तद्भूयः करपाणिघट्टनशताविर्भावगोष्ठीभरैः ॥ ५५ ॥ sāndrasvedanadīṣṇadoṣṇi vikaṭabhrūraṅgapīṭhībhava- dbhāle pāṭalatānicolakaviśatproccaṇḍagaṇḍasthale | itthaṃ kvāpya(kupya)tidṛ(ti dṛ)pyadulvaṇagaṇagrāme nanāmeva bhū-stadbhūyaḥ karapāṇighaṭṭanaśatāvirbhāvagoṣṭhībharaiḥ || 55 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रोहद्वारुणवारबाणघटनोत्सिक्तामिवातन्वतां तेषां मूर्तिमजस्रघ​र्मबिसरां सङ्ख्येऽथ नेदीयसि । वीप्साकुट्टिमघट्टनोद्यदरुणच्छायाछटाविष्कृत-प्रौढाग्नेयशरग्रहा इव हठादग्रे व्यवल्गन्कराः ॥ ५६ ॥ rohadvāruṇavārabāṇaghaṭanotsiktāmivātanvatāṃ teṣāṃ mūrtimajasragharmabisarāṃ saṅkhye'tha nedīyasi | vīpsākuṭṭimaghaṭṭanodyadaruṇacchāyāchaṭāviṣkṛta-prauḍhāgneyaśaragrahā iva haṭhādagre vyavalgankarāḥ || 56 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अन्योन्यं घट्टनायाजनि करतलयोर्दन्तदंशव्यथायाः पात्रं चक्रेऽधरौष्ठं व्यतनुत वसुधा घट्टन(वसुधाघट्टन​​)क्लेशमङ्घ्रेः । इत्थं तेषां निजाङ्गान्यपि चिरमतुदन्पार्षदाग्रेसराणां कोपाटोपोऽथ मा भूत्कथमरिपृतनानायिकानां रुजायै ॥ ५७ ॥ anyonyaṃ ghaṭṭanāyājani karatalayordantadaṃśavyathāyāḥ pātraṃ cakre'dharauṣṭhaṃ vyatanuta vasudhā ghaṭṭana(vasudhā ghaṭṭana)kleśamaṅghreḥ | itthaṃ teṣāṃ nijāṅgānyapi ciramatudanpārṣadāgresarāṇāṃ kopāṭopo'tha mā bhūtkathamaripṛtanānāyikānāṃ rujāyai || 57 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तत्तद्युद्ध​वसुन्धराचुलकितारातिप्रतापानल-प्राग्भारं वमतामिवाट्टहसितज्वालावलीलीलया । तेषां रोषकषायितेक्षणपुटव्याजेन वीरश्रियो दीपानाददिरे विचेतुमसुरान्संयन्निशायामिव ॥ ५८ ॥ tattadyuddhavasundharāculakitārātipratāpānala-prāgbhāraṃ vamatāmivāṭṭahasitajvālāvalīlīlayā | teṣāṃ roṣakaṣāyitekṣaṇapuṭavyājena vīraśriyo dīpānādadire vicetumasurānsaṃyanniśāyāmiva || 58 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नृत्यद्भ्रूवल्लिकेतुव्यतिकरतरलैराननैर्दुर्निरीक्ष्या दीक्षां कम्पे दिशन्तः प्रतिपदमवनेः पार्ष्णिभिर्घट्टनेन । नेत्रैः कोपोपरक्तैः क्षयसमयमिवानेकचण्डांशुबिम्ब-प्रादुर्भावं सृजन्तो द्विषदशुभमिवाशेषतस्ते शशंसुः ॥ ५९ ॥ nṛtyadbhrūvalliketuvyatikarataralairānanairdurnirīkṣyā dīkṣāṃ kampe diśantaḥ pratipadamavaneḥ pārṣṇibhirghaṭṭanena | netraiḥ kopoparaktaiḥ kṣayasamayamivānekacaṇḍāṃśubimba-prādurbhāvaṃ sṛjanto dviṣadaśubhamivāśeṣataste śaśaṃsuḥ || 59 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति प्रथितदुःसहासमरुषां गणानां रण-द्विलासवलयावलीमुखरितालिकैः पाणिभिः । घनश्वसनविस्फुरद्दशतयांशुकौघा अपि क्रुधा ददृशिरे चिरं तरलतर्जनीका इव ॥ ६० ॥ iti prathitaduḥsahāsamaruṣāṃ gaṇānāṃ raṇa-dvilāsavalayāvalīmukharitālikaiḥ pāṇibhiḥ | ghanaśvasanavisphuraddaśatayāṃśukaughā api krudhā dadṛśire ciraṃ taralatarjanīkā iva || 60 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इत्थं साम्राज्यमापद्विगलदविरलस्वेदवारिप्रवाह-प्रौढारब्धाभिषेको मुखभुवि भगवत्किङ्कराणां प्रकोपः । द्वाःस्थेनेवारुणिम्ना तरलितविततभ्रूलतावेत्रदण्डं गण्डाभोगात्प्रसादश्चतुरतरमथो दूरमुत्सारितोऽभूत् ॥ ६१ ॥ itthaṃ sāmrājyamāpadvigaladaviralasvedavāripravāha-prauḍhārabdhābhiṣeko mukhabhuvi bhagavatkiṅkarāṇāṃ prakopaḥ | dvāḥsthenevāruṇimnā taralitavitatabhrūlatāvetradaṇḍaṃ gaṇḍābhogātprasādaścaturataramatho dūramutsārito'bhūt || 61 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति श्रीजोनराजकृतया टीकया समेतः श्रीराजानकविश्ववर्तसूनोर्महाकविराजराजानकश्रीमङ्खकस्य कृतौ श्रीकण्ठचरिते महाकाव्ये गणक्षोभवर्णनं नामाष्टादशः सर्गः ॥ एकोनविंशः सर्गः ॥ आक्रष्टुमरिकोषेभ्यः श्रियं ते श्रितकौतुकाः । इत्थमुल्लासयामासुर्वक्रभ्रूवल्लिकुञ्चिकाः ॥ १ ॥ ākraṣṭumarikoṣebhyaḥ śriyaṃ te śritakautukāḥ | itthamullāsayāmāsurvakrabhrūvallikuñcikāḥ || 1 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चूर्णिताभरणस्वर्णमणिरेणुभरोर्मिभिः । तैः पुरस्ताद्विचकरे पटवासो जयश्रियः ॥ २ ॥ cūrṇitābharaṇasvarṇamaṇireṇubharormibhiḥ | taiḥ purastādvicakare paṭavāso jayaśriyaḥ || 2 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
घट्टयत्सु रुषा तेषु साटोपं करपङ्कजैः । हरसंसदि भीत्येव भित्तयोऽपि चकम्पिरे ॥ ३ ॥ ghaṭṭayatsu ruṣā teṣu sāṭopaṃ karapaṅkajaiḥ | harasaṃsadi bhītyeva bhittayo'pi cakampire || 3 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ज्वलता वह्निना शम्भोरधिलोचनवेदिकम् । पराभिषेणने तेषां चक्रे नीराजनाविधिः ॥ ४ ॥ jvalatā vahninā śambhoradhilocanavedikam | parābhiṣeṇane teṣāṃ cakre nīrājanāvidhiḥ || 4 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दन्तक्षतानि तन्वाना नृत्यद्भ्रु दशनच्छदे । क्रोधक्रियैव सा तेषां वल्लभा समजायत ॥ ५ ॥ dantakṣatāni tanvānā nṛtyadbhru daśanacchade | krodhakriyaiva sā teṣāṃ vallabhā samajāyata || 5 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कान्तिस्तेषां च तत्काले लोहितायत्त्विषोर्द्विषोः(र्दृशोः) । अभूदकाण्डसन्ध्येव नाशपैशुनकृद्द्विषाम् ॥ ६ ॥ kāntisteṣāṃ ca tatkāle lohitāyattviṣordviṣoḥ(rdṛśoḥ) | abhūdakāṇḍasandhyeva nāśapaiśunakṛddviṣām || 6 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रकोपपाटलरुचस्ते भार्गवगुरोर्गणाः । कृतस्नाना इवैक्ष्यन्त मध्येऽरिरुधिरहृदम् ॥ ७ ॥ prakopapāṭalarucaste bhārgavagurorgaṇāḥ | kṛtasnānā ivaikṣyanta madhye'rirudhirahṛdam || 7 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कोपाय समरोत्साहशंसिने घ​र्ममार्जितैः । तेऽङ्गरागपटैस्तूर्णं पूर्णपात्रमिवादिशन् ॥ ८ ॥ kopāya samarotsāhaśaṃsine gharmamārjitaiḥ | te'ṅgarāgapaṭaistūrṇaṃ pūrṇapātramivādiśan || 8 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अथ दक्षिणमाधूय पाणिं प्राणितधैर्यभूः । प्रमथानां श्लथीचक्रे कोपकोलाहलं हरः ॥ ९ ॥ atha dakṣiṇamādhūya pāṇiṃ prāṇitadhairyabhūḥ | pramathānāṃ ślathīcakre kopakolāhalaṃ haraḥ || 9 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दन्तांशुभिः शिरःसिन्धुस्रोतोन्तरसधर्मभिः । तेषामशेषतो रोषदहनं शमयन्निव ॥ १० ॥ dantāṃśubhiḥ śiraḥsindhusrotontarasadharmabhiḥ | teṣāmaśeṣato roṣadahanaṃ śamayanniva || 10 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
धामत्रयेण नेत्रेषु क्षिप्यमाणेषु नृत्यता । साम्मुख्यमेत्य द्युसदां तेजः संविभजन्निव ॥ ११ ॥ dhāmatrayeṇa netreṣu kṣipyamāṇeṣu nṛtyatā | sāmmukhyametya dyusadāṃ tejaḥ saṃvibhajanniva || 11 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आत्तस्फूर्जथुपर्जन्यगर्जितप्रतिवादिना । स्वरेण रुचिरां वाचमिति च स्वैरमैरयत् ॥ १२ ॥ āttasphūrjathuparjanyagarjitaprativādinā | svareṇa rucirāṃ vācamiti ca svairamairayat || 12 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वदनैः सूच्यमानानामकाण्डपरिपाण्डुभिः । शुचां मनःसु वः कोऽयं नवः प्रावेशिको विधिः ॥ १३ ॥ vadanaiḥ sūcyamānānāmakāṇḍaparipāṇḍubhiḥ | śucāṃ manaḥsu vaḥ ko'yaṃ navaḥ prāveśiko vidhiḥ || 13 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शुचिरूढमुपोढोग्रसन्तापमथ वो मनः । छायासु चिरमाप्नोतु विश्रान्तिमसिवीरुधाम् ॥ १४ ॥ śucirūḍhamupoḍhograsantāpamatha vo manaḥ | chāyāsu ciramāpnotu viśrāntimasivīrudhām || 14 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उपप्लवरजस्तत्र स्थितिमेति कियच्चिरम् । ईशते ब्रह्मणो यत्र कुशाग्रजलविप्रुषः ॥ १५ ॥ upaplavarajastatra sthitimeti kiyacciram | īśate brahmaṇo yatra kuśāgrajalavipruṣaḥ || 15 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
डिण्डीरमन्तरे कृत्वा यदभूदहितापदम् । तत्किं न कुरुते जिष्णोर्दोर्वीर्यमहितापदम् ॥ १६ ॥ ḍiṇḍīramantare kṛtvā yadabhūdahitāpadam | tatkiṃ na kurute jiṣṇordorvīryamahitāpadam || 16 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शार्ङ्गं भ्रूलतयोर्लास्यमञ्जनं नन्दको दृशोः । हरेः कथं वा सहते विपक्षमृगचक्षुषाम् ॥ १७ ॥ śārṅgaṃ bhrūlatayorlāsyamañjanaṃ nandako dṛśoḥ | hareḥ kathaṃ vā sahate vipakṣamṛgacakṣuṣām || 17 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मरुतो दूरविस्रस्तस्मितपुष्पासु वेपथुम् । कथं तन्वन्ति न द्वेषियोषितां तनुवल्लिषु ॥ १८ ॥ maruto dūravisrastasmitapuṣpāsu vepathum | kathaṃ tanvanti na dveṣiyoṣitāṃ tanuvalliṣu || 18 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तन्वन्वपुषि सन्तापमनन्तमरिसुभ्रुवाम् । ग्रथ्नाति न कथं वह्निर्गण्डयोर्भस्मपाण्डुताम् ॥ १९ ॥ tanvanvapuṣi santāpamanantamarisubhruvām | grathnāti na kathaṃ vahnirgaṇḍayorbhasmapāṇḍutām || 19 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मुखेषु ब्रह्मणः साम दानं स्वर्दन्तिगण्डयोः । दण्डो यमस्य भेदं च हृदि द्रढयतु द्विषाम् ॥ २० ॥ mukheṣu brahmaṇaḥ sāma dānaṃ svardantigaṇḍayoḥ | daṇḍo yamasya bhedaṃ ca hṛdi draḍhayatu dviṣām || 20 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भास्वन्तोऽमी सहोदेत्य व्यञ्जन्तु प्रलयं द्विषाम् । रुद्धाङ्गा लोहसन्नाहैरकाण्डजलदैरिव ॥ २१ ॥ bhāsvanto'mī sahodetya vyañjantu pralayaṃ dviṣām | ruddhāṅgā lohasannāhairakāṇḍajaladairiva || 21 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अपि यद्दिशि साम्मुख्यादन्वहं महसां निधेः । प्रतापो हीयते सोऽयं वरुणः केन सह्यताम् ॥ २२ ॥ api yaddiśi sāmmukhyādanvahaṃ mahasāṃ nidheḥ | pratāpo hīyate so'yaṃ varuṇaḥ kena sahyatām || 22 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वीरश्रीरत्र तन्वाने कबन्धहठताण्डवम् । पुरः सरागा धनदे सारणीव विलीयते ॥ २३ ॥ vīraśrīratra tanvāne kabandhahaṭhatāṇḍavam | puraḥ sarāgā dhanade sāraṇīva vilīyate || 23 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
युज्यते वो न चेतःसु सद्यः कौसीद्यसौहृदम् । गतेऽपि मुञ्चत ग्लानिं हानिं कुरुत वैरिणाम् ॥ २४ ॥ yujyate vo na cetaḥsu sadyaḥ kausīdyasauhṛdam | gate'pi muñcata glāniṃ hāniṃ kuruta vairiṇām || 24 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गता वो यदपि भ्रान्ताः श्रान्ता दैत्या रणाध्वनि । कति नासिलतामूले दीर्घनिद्रारसज्ञताम् ॥ २५ ॥ gatā vo yadapi bhrāntāḥ śrāntā daityā raṇādhvani | kati nāsilatāmūle dīrghanidrārasajñatām || 25 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सुरास्तथापि भीष्मस्य यौष्माकस्य भुजोष्मणः । ममोपस्कुरुतामंशो धाम्नो दग्धुं विरोधिनः ॥ २६ ॥ surāstathāpi bhīṣmasya yauṣmākasya bhujoṣmaṇaḥ | mamopaskurutāmaṃśo dhāmno dagdhuṃ virodhinaḥ || 26 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इत्याप्याप्यायमुग्रस्य श्रुतिग्राह्येण तेजसा । भगवन्तमवोचन्त ते भूयोऽपि सुधालिहः ॥ २७ ॥ ityāpyāpyāyamugrasya śrutigrāhyeṇa tejasā | bhagavantamavocanta te bhūyo'pi sudhālihaḥ || 27 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्वामिन्नस्त्येव नस्तेजो भवत्सेवनवेतनम् । तत्पृथूरःकवाटैस्तु पुरैर्दूरतिरस्कृतम् ॥ २८ ॥ svāminnastyeva nastejo bhavatsevanavetanam | tatpṛthūraḥkavāṭaistu purairdūratiraskṛtam || 28 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वलन्नेत्राञ्चलप्लुष्टकालकामस्य ते वयम् । गृह्यमाणं न चेशान सोढुं प्रौढा महन्महः ॥ २९ ॥ valannetrāñcalapluṣṭakālakāmasya te vayam | gṛhyamāṇaṃ na ceśāna soḍhuṃ prauḍhā mahanmahaḥ || 29 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तत्तान्युदात्तचरित स्वयं संहर्तुमर्हसि । नहि संरभते दीपो निरोद्धुं रोदसीतमः ॥ ३० ॥ tattānyudāttacarita svayaṃ saṃhartumarhasi | nahi saṃrabhate dīpo niroddhuṃ rodasītamaḥ || 30 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तदायुर्जुहुधि प्रेद्धहेतिभाजि हविर्भुजि । भूयोऽपि संविभज्यन्ते ककुभो येन भूतिभिः ॥ ३१ ॥ tadāyurjuhudhi preddhahetibhāji havirbhuji | bhūyo'pi saṃvibhajyante kakubho yena bhūtibhiḥ || 31 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तेजसा तेऽज सान्द्रेण सङ्गलन्महसो वयम् । शीलितार्कांशुसम्पर्कदीपसापत्न्यमाप्नुमः ॥ ३२ ॥ tejasā te'ja sāndreṇa saṅgalanmahaso vayam | śīlitārkāṃśusamparkadīpasāpatnyamāpnumaḥ || 32 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तत्र कर्मणि निर्मातुं यत्नमर्हस्यगर्हितम् । यत्र ते स्वयमायाति भर्ग मार्गणतां हरिः ॥ ३३ ॥ tatra karmaṇi nirmātuṃ yatnamarhasyagarhitam | yatra te svayamāyāti bharga mārgaṇatāṃ hariḥ || 33 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तवोद्योगविधावङ्गीकृतपुष्पवदाकृतिः । उच्चै रथदशामेति शर्व सर्वेयमुर्वरी ॥ ३४ ॥ tavodyogavidhāvaṅgīkṛtapuṣpavadākṛtiḥ | uccai rathadaśāmeti śarva sarveyamurvarī || 34 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पुरां पुराणपुरुष प्लोषाय यदि बुध्यसे । सत्त्वोत्तरगुणस्तर्हि सूतः सञ्जायते विधिः ॥ ३५ ॥ purāṃ purāṇapuruṣa ploṣāya yadi budhyase | sattvottaraguṇastarhi sūtaḥ sañjāyate vidhiḥ || 35 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
न कुत्र त्वयि सन्नद्धे निधनाय विरोधिनाम् । हर प्ररोहमभ्येति गिरि चापलतानवम् ॥ ३६ ॥ na kutra tvayi sannaddhe nidhanāya virodhinām | hara prarohamabhyeti giri cāpalatānavam || 36 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
त्वयि त्र्यक्षाक्षतक्षोभे प्रतिपक्षदिधक्षया । आक्रामञ्श्रवणाभ्यर्णमहीनो जायते गुणः ॥ ३७ ॥ tvayi tryakṣākṣatakṣobhe pratipakṣadidhakṣayā | ākrāmañśravaṇābhyarṇamahīno jāyate guṇaḥ || 37 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
किं च शात्रवसंहारे स्मेरमस्मन्महःकणः । त्रिलोकदुःसहं तेजो भावत्कं वरिवस्यतु ॥ ३८ ॥ kiṃ ca śātravasaṃhāre smeramasmanmahaḥkaṇaḥ | trilokaduḥsahaṃ tejo bhāvatkaṃ varivasyatu || 38 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वाचमुच्चाञ्जलिपुटो बालेन्दुमुकुटं प्रति । इति वक्रोक्तिभिः पूतामसूत दिविषद्गणः ॥ ३९ ॥ vācamuccāñjalipuṭo bālendumukuṭaṃ prati | iti vakroktibhiḥ pūtāmasūta diviṣadgaṇaḥ || 39 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शेषां वचोमयीं मूर्ध्नि गृह्यमाणां सुपर्वभिः । पुनरप्यथ जग्रन्थ नाथो मन्मथमाथकृत् ॥ ४० ॥ śeṣāṃ vacomayīṃ mūrdhni gṛhyamāṇāṃ suparvabhiḥ | punarapyatha jagrantha nātho manmathamāthakṛt || 40 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
एवमस्त्वत्र संरम्भो गरीयानुररीकृतः। मया युष्मद्धिताधानसिद्धिशर्मणि कर्मणि ॥ ४१ ॥ evamastvatra saṃrambho garīyānurarīkṛtaḥ| mayā yuṣmaddhitādhānasiddhiśarmaṇi karmaṇi || 41 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सूतसूतश्रियं क्षुण्णमक्षैर्धुर्यधरं सुराः । कैलासमिव सन्धत्त रथमस्मद्भरक्षमम् ॥ ४२ ॥ sūtasūtaśriyaṃ kṣuṇṇamakṣairdhuryadharaṃ surāḥ | kailāsamiva sandhatta rathamasmadbharakṣamam || 42 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मम वीररसो दूरमास्कन्ध स्यन्दनग्रहम् । द्विषां ललाटतो मार्ष्टु भ्रमद्भ्रूभङ्गकालिकाः ॥ ४३ ॥ mama vīraraso dūramāskandha syandanagraham | dviṣāṃ lalāṭato mārṣṭu bhramadbhrūbhaṅgakālikāḥ || 43 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सुपर्वाणोऽधिकुर्वाणा इव शात्रवमोजसा। वचोभिरिति भर्गस्य तुतुषुर्निस्तुषोर्मिभिः ॥ ४४ ॥ suparvāṇo'dhikurvāṇā iva śātravamojasā| vacobhiriti bhargasya tutuṣurnistuṣormibhiḥ || 44 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अमृतमिति निपीय ते विमुद्रश्रुतिचुलकैः प्रसृतं हराम्बुराशेः । अधिगतधृतयः पुनः सुराग्र्या विवृतदृढस्थिति मेनिरेऽमरत्वम् ॥ ४५ ॥ amṛtamiti nipīya te vimudraśruticulakaiḥ prasṛtaṃ harāmburāśeḥ | adhigatadhṛtayaḥ punaḥ surāgryā vivṛtadṛḍhasthiti menire'maratvam || 45 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तेषां प्रमोदसुहृदां द्युसदां तदानी-मानीतधैर्यमधिगम्य वचः पुरारेः । वक्त्रं महो मुहुरवाप्नुवदन्यदेव निर्मुक्तवैशसमयत्वगिवाबभासे ॥ ४६ ॥ teṣāṃ pramodasuhṛdāṃ dyusadāṃ tadānī-mānītadhairyamadhigamya vacaḥ purāreḥ | vaktraṃ maho muhuravāpnuvadanyadeva nirmuktavaiśasamayatvagivābabhāse || 46 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तस्मिन्क्षणे प्रमदकाहलनाकिलोक-कोलाहलप्रतिरवाङ्कगभीरगर्भः । शम्भोररीनभिषिषेणयिषोः पुपोष मङ्गल्यशङ्खघटनां स्फटिकादिराजः ॥ ४७ ॥ tasminkṣaṇe pramadakāhalanākiloka-kolāhalapratiravāṅkagabhīragarbhaḥ | śambhorarīnabhiṣiṣeṇayiṣoḥ pupoṣa maṅgalyaśaṅkhaghaṭanāṃ sphaṭikādirājaḥ || 47 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रादुर्बभूवुरविदूरविपत्कलाप-सन्तापपैशुनविशेषविशृङ्खलानि । अत्रान्तरे त्रिपुरदानवविष्टपेषु स्पष्टान्यरिष्टपटलेन विचेष्टितानि ॥ ४८ ॥ prādurbabhūvuravidūravipatkalāpa-santāpapaiśunaviśeṣaviśṛṅkhalāni | atrāntare tripuradānavaviṣṭapeṣu spaṣṭānyariṣṭapaṭalena viceṣṭitāni || 48 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आसीदन्मृडचापदण्डगुणतासङ्गप्रसङ्गाश्लथा-म्रेडोत्पीडनभीतिलोलभुजगाधीशानुबन्धादिव । भूः सम्पादितकम्पसम्पदपृथग्भावा ककुप्कुञ्जर-श्रेणीकुम्भतटीगतागतशतश्रान्तिव्यथामन्वभूत् ॥ ४९ ॥ āsīdanmṛḍacāpadaṇḍaguṇatāsaṅgaprasaṅgāślathā-mreḍotpīḍanabhītilolabhujagādhīśānubandhādiva | bhūḥ sampāditakampasampadapṛthagbhāvā kakupkuñjara-śreṇīkumbhataṭīgatāgataśataśrāntivyathāmanvabhūt || 49 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
बिम्बं रवेर्घटितराहुशरीरशेष-संवादिताण्डवनिबन्धवलत्कबन्धम् । आसीददूरहरकूबरिचक्रताप्ति-हेतोरिवोदरविसारिगभीररन्ध्रम् ॥ ५० ॥ bimbaṃ raverghaṭitarāhuśarīraśeṣa-saṃvāditāṇḍavanibandhavalatkabandham | āsīdadūraharakūbaricakratāpti-hetorivodaravisārigabhīrarandhram || 50 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गीर्वाणप्रतिपक्षपक्ष्मलदृशामङ्गेषु संसर्गिभि-र्घोराम्भोधरकीर्यमाणरुधिरस्रोतश्छटाबिन्दुभिः । वैधव्यव्यसनाभिमुख्यसुहृदां रेजे चिरप्रेमत-स्तन्वानैरिव सान्द्रकुङ्कुमरसैराप्रष्टुमालिङ्गनम् ॥ ५१ ॥ gīrvāṇapratipakṣapakṣmaladṛśāmaṅgeṣu saṃsargibhi-rghorāmbhodharakīryamāṇarudhirasrotaśchaṭābindubhiḥ | vaidhavyavyasanābhimukhyasuhṛdāṃ reje cirapremata-stanvānairiva sāndrakuṅkumarasairāpraṣṭumāliṅganam || 51 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सम्भ्रान्तान्तकवाहसैरिभकुलप्रोल्लासिताविर्भव-ल्लाङ्गूलप्रतिवादिभिर्जनमनोभीहेतुभिः केतुभिः । व्योमाब्धेरुदयत्तरङ्गपदवीमारूढवद्भिर्दिशा-माजह्रे हठसाध्वसाकुलतराभिव्यक्तवेणीलिपिः ॥ ५२ ॥ sambhrāntāntakavāhasairibhakulaprollāsitāvirbhava-llāṅgūlaprativādibhirjanamanobhīhetubhiḥ ketubhiḥ | vyomābdherudayattaraṅgapadavīmārūḍhavadbhirdiśā-mājahre haṭhasādhvasākulatarābhivyaktaveṇīlipiḥ || 52 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
द्यावाभूम्योरपि पिदधता मध्यमर्चिःप्रवाहै-र्दिग्दाहेनोड्डुमरिततडिद्दण्डचण्डक्रमेण । शङ्के दृप्यन्परपरिभवाविर्भविष्यद्भवानी-नाथस्थेयोविशिखशिखिनो निर्ममे पूर्वरङ्गः ॥ ५३ ॥ dyāvābhūmyorapi pidadhatā madhyamarciḥpravāhai-rdigdāhenoḍḍumaritataḍiddaṇḍacaṇḍakrameṇa | śaṅke dṛpyanparaparibhavāvirbhaviṣyadbhavānī-nāthastheyoviśikhaśikhino nirmame pūrvaraṅgaḥ || 53 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आसन्नेषूद्धरतरपुरारातिबाणाग्ररङ्ग-द्दुर्वारौर्वायुतसखशिखिप्लोषणोपप्लवेषु । दूरोदञ्चद्विपुलपुलकोल्लोललेखाकरालो वारं वारं सरिदधिपतिर्वासरेऽप्युच्चकम्पे ॥ ५४ ॥ āsanneṣūddharatarapurārātibāṇāgraraṅga-ddurvāraurvāyutasakhaśikhiploṣaṇopaplaveṣu | dūrodañcadvipulapulakollolalekhākarālo vāraṃ vāraṃ saridadhipatirvāsare'pyuccakampe || 54 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आशङ्क्येव पिधास्यतोऽम्बरपथं पातं हरेषोर्भिया स्वर्बाष्पाम्बुकणश्रियोऽनुसमयं पेतुः क्षितौ तारकाः। भूकम्पप्रचलासुराजिरहरिद्रत्नस्थलीषु क्षणं यासां पङ्कजिनीदलोदरपयोबिन्दुभ्रमः पप्रथे ॥ ५५ ॥ āśaṅkyeva pidhāsyato'mbarapathaṃ pātaṃ hareṣorbhiyā svarbāṣpāmbukaṇaśriyo'nusamayaṃ petuḥ kṣitau tārakāḥ| bhūkampapracalāsurājiraharidratnasthalīṣu kṣaṇaṃ yāsāṃ paṅkajinīdalodarapayobindubhramaḥ paprathe || 55 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यस्योच्चैः कटचीनपिष्टपटली दिग्दाहजन्मा रुचि-र्भ्रश्यद्भिः करसीकरायितमथाकाण्डे च यस्योडुभिः । तस्यानर्गलदुर्निमित्तकरिणः क्रूरत्वमाक्रामत-श्चक्रे व्योमनि नूतनैः कदलिकालीलायितं केतुभिः ॥ ५६ ॥ yasyoccaiḥ kaṭacīnapiṣṭapaṭalī digdāhajanmā ruci-rbhraśyadbhiḥ karasīkarāyitamathākāṇḍe ca yasyoḍubhiḥ | tasyānargaladurnimittakariṇaḥ krūratvamākrāmata-ścakre vyomani nūtanaiḥ kadalikālīlāyitaṃ ketubhiḥ || 56 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पुरारिशरवह्निना प्रथममेव धूमोत्करो विकीर्ण इव पूर्णतामुपगतोऽथ पाथोधरः । रुरोध रुधिरैर्धरामधिलसत्तडिन्मण्डल- प्रचण्डरुचिताण्डवक्षणविनिर्मितापह्नवैः ॥ ५७ ॥ purāriśaravahninā prathamameva dhūmotkaro vikīrṇa iva pūrṇatāmupagato'tha pāthodharaḥ | rurodha rudhirairdharāmadhilasattaḍinmaṇḍala- pracaṇḍarucitāṇḍavakṣaṇavinirmitāpahnavaiḥ || 57 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तैर्नृत्यन्मृत्युपादावगलदविरलालक्तकौघानुकारै-रस्रासारैरपारैः पिदधति वसुधामम्बुदे भीतिभाजाम् । पिङ्गापाङ्गप्रणालप्रविसृमररुचिव्यक्तरक्ताश्रुरीत्या दैत्यस्त्रीलोचनानामपि ववृषुरिव श्रेणयः शोणितानि ॥ ५८ ॥ tairnṛtyanmṛtyupādāvagaladaviralālaktakaughānukārai-rasrāsārairapāraiḥ pidadhati vasudhāmambude bhītibhājām | piṅgāpāṅgapraṇālapravisṛmararucivyaktaraktāśrurītyā daityastrīlocanānāmapi vavṛṣuriva śreṇayaḥ śoṇitāni || 58 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रत्यग्रोत्पातवातास्त्वचि मुमुचुरिवापारमङ्गारपूरं दूरं दिग्दाहसाहायकवदथ नभो दृब्धदृग्दाहमासीत् । वार्षासृग्विस्रगन्धो दितिजमृगदृशां पीडयामास नासा-मह्न्य​प्यह्नाय चाभूद्भृशमशिवशिवावाशितैः श्रोत्रशूलम् ॥ ५९ ॥ pratyagrotpātavātāstvaci mumucurivāpāramaṅgārapūraṃ dūraṃ digdāhasāhāyakavadatha nabho dṛbdhadṛgdāhamāsīt | vārṣāsṛgvisragandho ditijamṛgadṛśāṃ pīḍayāmāsa nāsā- mahyapyahnāya cābhūdbhṛśamaśivaśivāvāśitaiḥ śrotraśūlam || 59 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सेवायै समकालमागतवतां षण्णामृतूनामपि प्रत्यासत्तिगुणेन योऽजनि पुरे पूर्वं सुपर्वद्विषाम् । सारिष्टेषु तरुष्वकालकुसुमोल्लासात्स एवाभव-त्तत्काले प्रविभक्तकालसुमनःसम्भेदजृम्भाग्रहः ॥ ६० ॥ sevāyai samakālamāgatavatāṃ ṣaṇṇāmṛtūnāmapi pratyāsattiguṇena yo'jani pure pūrvaṃ suparvadviṣām | sāriṣṭeṣu taruṣvakālakusumollāsātsa evābhava-ttatkāle pravibhaktakālasumanaḥsambhedajṛmbhāgrahaḥ || 60 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पतदविरतरक्तवर्षबिन्दुव्यतिकरनिह्नुतचित्रवर्णपत्रैः । झटिति नयनयोरकालपुष्पैरजनि न दैत्यपरिग्रहस्य कम्पः ॥ ६१ ॥ patadavirataraktavarṣabinduvyatikaranihnutacitravarṇapatraiḥ | jhaṭiti nayanayorakālapuṣpairajani na daityaparigrahasya kampaḥ || 61 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भृगुपतिविजयायेवात्तगाढाभियोगाः पथिषु दितितनूजाः सञ्चरन्तः समन्तात् । अधिकरुधिरवर्षारम्भतः सम्भृतासु प्रविदधुरवगाहं शोणितद्रोणिकासु ॥ ६२ ॥ bhṛgupativijayāyevāttagāḍhābhiyogāḥ pathiṣu dititanūjāḥ sañcarantaḥ samantāt | adhikarudhiravarṣārambhataḥ sambhṛtāsu pravidadhuravagāhaṃ śoṇitadroṇikāsu || 62 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आत्ताः साकमिवोदकेन सिकतास्तत्तत्सरिड्डम्बरा- दालम्ब्याम्बुधरोऽम्बराग्रमवमद्वर्षन् र​जोराजिभिः । यत्सङ्गेन विनापि निष्फलजलक्रीडानुभूतिश्रमं पांसुस्नानममर्त्यवैरिकटकस्तम्बेरमा भेजिरे ॥ ६३ ॥ āttāḥ sākamivodakena sikatāstattatsariḍḍambarā-dālambyāmbudharo'mbarāgramavamadvarṣan rajorājibhiḥ | yatsaṅgena vināpi niṣphalajalakrīḍānubhūtiśramaṃ pāṃsusnānamamartyavairikaṭakastamberamā bhejire || 63 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
धूलीवृष्टिभिरप्यरिष्टपिशुनोत्सेकातिरेके भव-द्दूरापूरितलोचनाभिरसुरस्त्रीणामरीणो गुणः । नैताभिर्बहुदुर्निमित्तनिमितातङ्कातिघोरा दिशो दर्शं दर्शमवापि यन्नवनवत्रासव्यथासाक्षिता ॥ ६४ ॥ dhūlīvṛṣṭibhirapyariṣṭapiśunotsekātireke bhava-ddūrāpūritalocanābhirasurastrīṇāmarīṇo guṇaḥ | naitābhirbahudurnimittanimitātaṅkātighorā diśo darśaṃ darśamavāpi yannavanavatrāsavyathāsākṣitā || 64 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तन्वन्वामपुमङ्गसङ्गमविधिं क्षुन्दन्नथो दक्षिण-स्त्रीगात्राक्रमणक्रियामुपनतोऽपूर्वार्धनारीश्वरः । संहारानुगुणप्रपञ्चितबृहद्दुर्वारलीलायितः कम्पो दानवविष्टपेषु कमपि त्रासप्रयासं व्यधात् ॥ ६५ ॥ tanvanvāmapumaṅgasaṅgamavidhiṃ kṣundannatho dakṣiṇa-strīgātrākramaṇakriyāmupanato'pūrvārdhanārīśvaraḥ | saṃhārānuguṇaprapañcitabṛhaddurvāralīlāyitaḥ kampo dānavaviṣṭapeṣu kamapi trāsaprayāsaṃ vyadhāt || 65 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उद्वृत्तैर्दुर्निमित्तैरिति दितिजपुरोपान्तसञ्चारचर्चा प्रारेभे प्रस्तुवानैरिव विपुलविपत्सैन्यदूत्यप्रयोगम् । किं चान्यत्सञ्चिकाय त्रिदिवपथजुषां स्वैरमावासवीथी सद्यो वर्धिष्णुतत्तच्छुभपिशुनबृहन्मङ्गलालिङ्गनानि ॥ ६६ ॥ udvṛttairdurnimittairiti ditijapuropāntasañcāracarcā prārebhe prastuvānairiva vipulavipatsainyadūtyaprayogam | kiṃ cānyatsañcikāya tridivapathajuṣāṃ svairamāvāsavīthī sadyo vardhiṣṇutattacchubhapiśunabṛhanmaṅgalāliṅganāni || 66 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति श्रीजोनराजकृतया टीकया समेतः श्रीराजानकविश्ववर्तसूनोर्महाकविराजराजानकश्रीमङ्खकस्य कृतौ श्रीकण्ठचरिते महाकाव्ये गणोद्योगवर्णनं नामैकोनविंशः सर्गः ॥ विंशः सर्गः ॥ दृप्तासुरप्राणपणापहारहेतोरिवाक्षीणधृताक्षतन्त्रम् । पुरारये प्रारभतात्तयत्नमथो रथं कर्तुममर्त्यलोकः ॥ १ ॥ dṛptāsuraprāṇapaṇāpahārahetorivākṣīṇadhṛtākṣatantram | purāraye prārabhatāttayatnamatho rathaṃ kartumamartyalokaḥ || 1 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ततः स्व​यं तत्र सुरानुबन्धाद्वसुन्धरा कूबरितां प्रपेदे । दधत्यधोडम्बरलम्बमानरश्मिश्रियस्तुङ्गभुजङ्गभोगान् ॥ २ ॥ tataḥ vayaṃ tatra surānubandhādvasundharā kūbaritāṃ prapede | dadhatyadhoḍambaralambamānaraśmiśriyastuṅgabhujaṅgabhogān || 2 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
जुघूर्णिरे तस्य निसर्गदीर्घा जङ्घापदे सङ्घटितास्तटिन्यः । सचेतनानेकरथाङ्गसङ्गाद्याः सन्ततं कौतुकमेव तेनुः ॥ ३ ॥ jughūrṇire tasya nisargadīrghā jaṅghāpade saṅghaṭitāstaṭinyaḥ | sacetanānekarathāṅgasaṅgādyāḥ santataṃ kautukameva tenuḥ || 3 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
परस्परं दिक्करिदानपङ्कयोगादिवाश्लेषविशेषभाजः । ततः परीवारपथं रथस्य समं दिशश्च प्रदिशश्च जग्मुः ॥ ४ ॥ parasparaṃ dikkaridānapaṅkayogādivāśleṣaviśeṣabhājaḥ | tataḥ parīvārapathaṃ rathasya samaṃ diśaśca pradiśaśca jagmuḥ || 4 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आस्कन्द्य तं स्यन्दनमिन्दुमौलेर्वरूथतां तारकयूथमागात् । स पाण्डुकम्बल्यवलम्बिताङ्गो नीरन्ध्रयद्दीधितिभिर्बभूव ॥ ५ ॥ āskandya taṃ syandanamindumaulervarūthatāṃ tārakayūthamāgāt | sa pāṇḍukambalyavalambitāṅgo nīrandhrayaddīdhitibhirbabhūva || 5 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तस्यानुकर्षत्वपरिग्रहेण ग्रहैरुपान्तस्थितिराललम्बे । द्राग्वासवावासनिवासिनां तु व्यलोक्यताशेषशुभानुबन्धः ॥ ६ ॥ tasyānukarṣatvaparigraheṇa grahairupāntasthitirālalambe | drāgvāsavāvāsanivāsināṃ tu vyalokyatāśeṣaśubhānubandhaḥ || 6 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
धर्मार्थकामैः समुदायवद्भिस्तत्र त्रिवेणुस्थितिरन्वरोधि । देवः परो यत्र शशाङ्कमौलिः स्वयं च मोक्षप्रतिभूर्विभूषा ॥ ७ ॥ dharmārthakāmaiḥ samudāyavadbhistatra triveṇusthitiranvarodhi | devaḥ paro yatra śaśāṅkamauliḥ svayaṃ ca mokṣapratibhūrvibhūṣā || 7 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इतस्ततस्तस्य गृहीतबन्धमध्यासनामोषधयोऽधिजग्मुः । प्रक्रान्तचक्रक्रियरात्रिराजतेजोवगूढेरधिरूढभासः ॥ ८ ॥ itastatastasya gṛhītabandhamadhyāsanāmoṣadhayo'dhijagmuḥ | prakrāntacakrakriyarātrirājatejovagūḍheradhirūḍhabhāsaḥ || 8 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तस्मिन्पतङ्गक्षणदाभुजङ्गौ रथाङ्गतासङ्गतिमग्रहीष्टाम् । यद्भाप्रभावादिव दानवेन्द्रास्तापं च जाड्यं च सहान्वभूवन् ॥ ९ ॥ tasminpataṅgakṣaṇadābhujaṅgau rathāṅgatāsaṅgatimagrahīṣṭām | yadbhāprabhāvādiva dānavendrāstāpaṃ ca jāḍyaṃ ca sahānvabhūvan || 9 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
एकत्र पक्षे रजनीतमिस्रं तस्यापरत्रास्त दिनप्रकाशः। ताभ्यां स सम्भिन्नतनुश्च लोकालोकाचलस्य स्थितिमारुरोह ॥ १० ॥ ekatra pakṣe rajanītamisraṃ tasyāparatrāsta dinaprakāśaḥ| tābhyāṃ sa saṃbhinnatanuśca lokālokācalasya sthitimāruroha || 10 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तस्मिन्मिथः सङ्घटनेन पक्षपदग्रहात्कूबरिणि स्मरारेः । दिनस्य रूपं रजनी विवेद दिनं रजन्याश्च चिराच्चरित्रम् ॥ ११ ॥ tasminmithaḥ saṅghaṭanena pakṣapadagrahātkūbariṇi smarāreḥ | dinasya rūpaṃ rajanī viveda dinaṃ rajanyāśca cirāccaritram || 11 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तस्मिन्विरेजुर्युगवर्त्ममूर्तिमावर्त्य संवर्तकवारिवाहाः । उट्टङ्कयन्तो निबिडं तडिद्भिरकाण्ड एवोड्डमराः पताकाः ॥ १२ ॥ tasminvirejuryugavartmamūrtimāvartya saṃvartakavārivāhāḥ | uṭṭaṅkayanto nibiḍaṃ taḍidbhirakāṇḍa evoḍḍamarāḥ patākāḥ || 12 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रथेऽवतस्थे दिवसो निशा च पूर्णेन्दुपूष्णोर्घटना च जज्ञे । इत्थं विरोधेऽपि बताखिलानामन्योन्यमद्वैतमिवाविरासीत् ॥ १३ ॥ rathe'vatasthe divaso niśā ca pūrṇendupūṣṇorghaṭanā ca jajñe | itthaṃ virodhe'pi batākhilānāmanyonyamadvaitamivāvirāsīt || 13 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चित्रं कथञ्चित्किल नोदलङ्घि संवर्तकाभ्रैः स्वचरित्ररेखा । तदापि तेषां तदशेषतो हि युगान्तमेवानुबबन्ध रूपम् ॥ १४ ॥ citraṃ kathañcitkila nodalaṅghi saṃvartakābhraiḥ svacaritrarekhā | tadāpi teṣāṃ tadaśeṣato hi yugāntamevānubabandha rūpam || 14 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तदाधिशिश्ये युगवर्त्मभाजामुद्भ्रान्तकल्पान्तमहाघनानाम् । वरूथताराभिरदूरयोगाद्गलद्गरीयः करकानुकारः ॥ १५ ॥ tadādhiśiśye yugavartmabhājāmudbhrāntakalpāntamahāghanānām | varūthatārābhiradūrayogādgaladgarīyaḥ karakānukāraḥ || 15 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तस्य प्रशस्या युगतां प्रपद्य द्यौरद्युतन्मन्मथजिद्रथस्य । पुरो वलद्भिः प्रलयाम्बुवाहैर्निमृज्यमानेव तडित्कराग्रैः ॥ १६ ॥ tasya praśasyā yugatāṃ prapadya dyauradyutanmanmathajidrathasya | puro valadbhiḥ pralayāmbuvāhairnimṛjyamāneva taḍitkarāgraiḥ || 16 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तस्मिन्विमाने मदनावरोधवैधव्यदीक्षागुरुलोचनस्य । धृतिश्च मेधा च बभूव शम्या सम्यक्समेत्य स्थितिसन्नतिभ्याम्॥ १७ ॥ tasminvimāne madanāvarodhavaidhavyadīkṣāgurulocanasya | dhṛtiśca medhā ca babhūva śamyā samyaksametya sthitisannatibhyām|| 17 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विडम्बयंश्चुम्बितविस्फुलिङ्गं धूमं भविष्यत्पुरजिच्छराग्नेः । विचित्रवर्त्मत्वमियाय तत्र तारावलीदन्तुरमन्तरिक्षम् ॥ १८ ॥ viḍambayaṃścumbitavisphuliṅgaṃ dhūmaṃ bhaviṣyatpurajiccharāgneḥ | vicitravartmatvamiyāya tatra tārāvalīdanturamantarikṣam || 18 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
फेनच्छलात्पीतचरं मुखेभ्यो भरेण पीयूषमिवोद्गिरन्तः । शक्रः प्रचेता धनदो यमश्च तस्मिन्धृतिं धुर्यतया बबन्धुः ॥ १९ ॥ phenacchalātpītacaraṃ mukhebhyo bhareṇa pīyūṣamivodgirantaḥ | śakraḥ pracetā dhanado yamaśca tasmindhṛtiṃ dhuryatayā babandhuḥ || 19 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विगाहमानस्तुरगत्वमिन्द्रः साकूतमुच्चैःश्रवसा लुलोके । यमोऽश्वमूर्तिर्ददृशे च वाहवाहद्विषा रोषकषायितेन ॥ २० ॥ vigāhamānasturagatvamindraḥ sākūtamuccaiḥśravasā luloke | yamo'śvamūrtirdadṛśe ca vāhavāhadviṣā roṣakaṣāyitena || 20 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ईक्षाम्बभूवे श्रवणान्तगैस्तैर्विलोचनैरश्वमुखीजनेन । महेश्वरस्यन्दनधुर्यतायै हयाकृतिः किम्पुरुषाधिराजः ॥ २१ ॥ īkṣāmbabhūve śravaṇāntagaistairvilocanairaśvamukhījanena | maheśvarasyandanadhuryatāyai hayākṛtiḥ kimpuruṣādhirājaḥ || 21 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सावर्तमूर्तिर्बहलोज्जिहानफेनावलीढं दधदङ्गमङ्गम् । अपाम्पतिर्वाहतनुर्बभार निजाधिकारानुगुणं शरीरम् ॥ २२ ॥ sāvartamūrtirbahalojjihānaphenāvalīḍhaṃ dadhadaṅgamaṅgam | apāmpatirvāhatanurbabhāra nijādhikārānuguṇaṃ śarīram || 22 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तेषु ध्रुवं वाहतनूभवत्सु धुर्यत्वसिद्धावधिकाभिलाषः । शेषाङ्गमप्यश्वमयं विधातुं हयाननो वाक्पतिराचकाङ्क्ष ॥ २३ ॥ teṣu dhruvaṃ vāhatanūbhavatsu dhuryatvasiddhāvadhikābhilāṣaḥ | śeṣāṅgamapyaśvamayaṃ vidhātuṃ hayānano vākpatirācakāṅkṣa || 23 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कुहूः सिनीवाल्यथ तत्र योक्त्ररूपेण राकानुमती च तस्थुः । तुदंश्च धिन्वंश्च ततश्चकोरानभूत्तमश्चन्द्रिकयोः प्रयागः ॥ २४ ॥ kuhūḥ sinīvālyatha tatra yoktrarūpeṇa rākānumatī ca tasthuḥ | tudaṃśca dhinvaṃśca tataścakorānabhūttamaścandrikayoḥ prayāgaḥ || 24 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निरत्ययः सत्यतपोर्थकर्ममयैः स्वयं रश्मिभिराबभासे । स विप्रलम्भव्रतलोपहानिकौसीद्यकृत्तद्विषतां बभूव ॥ २५ ॥ niratyayaḥ satyataporthakarmamayaiḥ svayaṃ raśmibhirābabhāse | sa vipralambhavratalopahānikausīdyakṛttadviṣatāṃ babhūva || 25 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अनूरुवृत्तिग्रहकृद्भवस्य भास्वान् र​थः कोऽपि बभौ स तस्य । रश्मिप्रकाण्डैश्चतुरात्मभिर्यः प्रकाशलक्ष्मीमलुनात्पुरेषु ॥ २६ ॥ anūruvṛttigrahakṛdbhavasya bhāsvān rathaḥ ko'pi babhau sa tasya | raśmiprakāṇḍaiścaturātmabhiryaḥ prakāśalakṣmīmalunātpureṣu || 26 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स वेपमानैः पवनोपदेशाच्चित्रैः पताकासिचयैर्बभासे । उद्दीपनायेव शिवाशुगाग्नेरनेककल्लोलिततालवृन्तः ॥ २७ ॥ sa vepamānaiḥ pavanopadeśāccitraiḥ patākāsicayairbabhāse | uddīpanāyeva śivāśugāgneranekakallolitatālavṛntaḥ || 27 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तदा नवन्यादघनाशनाय मृत्युप्रनृत्यद्रसनासपत्न्यः । कम्पं दधुस्तस्य च वैजयन्त्यः स्वान्तेषु वैरिभ्य इव प्रदातुम् ॥ २८ ॥ tadā navanyādaghanāśanāya mṛtyupranṛtyadrasanāsapatnyaḥ | kampaṃ dadhustasya ca vaijayantyaḥ svānteṣu vairibhya iva pradātum || 28 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नद्धं तदिन्द्रायुधविद्युतोच्चैरमोघमेणाङ्कशिखस्य पत्रम् । अदूरगं दैत्यकबन्धबर्हिनृत्यप्रवृत्तेः समयं शशंस ॥ २९ ॥ naddhaṃ tadindrāyudhavidyutoccairamoghameṇāṅkaśikhasya patram | adūragaṃ daityakabandhabarhinṛtyapravṛtteḥ samayaṃ śaśaṃsa || 29 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सोमावचूलो यजमानमूर्तिरुपोढमन्युर्भगवान्पुरेषु । आसादितस्तोत्रशतोऽथ सद्यस्तद्वेदिकां शस्त्रमयीं चकार ॥ ३० ॥ somāvacūlo yajamānamūrtirupoḍhamanyurbhagavānpureṣu | āsāditastotraśato'tha sadyastadvedikāṃ śastramayīṃ cakāra || 30 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
एकत्र नीतो दिशि शङ्करस्य रथे परिस्कन्दधुराममर्त्यैः । यो ब्रह्मदण्डो न्यपतत्स एव दैत्येषु नूनं वचसा मुनीनाम् ॥ ३१ ॥ ekatra nīto diśi śaṅkarasya rathe pariskandadhurāmamartyaiḥ | yo brahmadaṇḍo nyapatatsa eva daityeṣu nūnaṃ vacasā munīnām || 31 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तस्मिन्परिस्कन्दपदं विमाने देवस्य खट्वाङ्गविभूषणस्य । अन्यासु काष्ठासु च कालरुद्रो दण्डो ज्वरश्च प्रथयाम्बभूवुः ॥ ३२ ॥ tasminpariskandapadaṃ vimāne devasya khaṭvāṅgavibhūṣaṇasya | anyāsu kāṣṭhāsu ca kālarudro daṇḍo jvaraśca prathayāmbabhūvuḥ || 32 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गर्वादथर्वाय रथाङ्गरक्षस्तस्यैकपार्श्वे प्रणयं बबन्ध । पुराभिचाराय महोमयेऽग्नौ कुर्वन्निवापाङ्गरुचासहोमम् ॥ ३३ ॥ garvādatharvāya rathāṅgarakṣastasyaikapārśve praṇayaṃ babandha | purābhicārāya mahomaye'gnau kurvannivāpāṅgarucāsahomam || 33 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
