निःसरत्सु दनुजेषु संयते संयतेद्धकवचेषु भूमिषु । भाविनीं सुवसतिं स्वविष्टपे मन्यते स्म तनयो विवस्वतः ॥ २१ ॥ niḥsaratsu danujeṣu saṃyate saṃyateddhakavaceṣu bhūmiṣu | bhāvinīṃ suvasatiṃ svaviṣṭape manyate sma tanayo vivasvataḥ || 21 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आतपत्रमुपरि प्रपेदिरे भेजिरे च चमराञ्चलानिलम् । यत्सुरारिपतयस्तदास्त तत्केवलं विकसदूष्मशान्तये ॥ २२ ॥ ātapatramupari prapedire bhejire ca camarāñcalānilam | yatsurāripatayastadāsta tatkevalaṃ vikasadūṣmaśāntaye || 22 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उच्छ्रितैरुपरि नाकवैरिणां रत्नखण्डखचितैरचुम्ब्यत । कालमण्डलितपाशपन्नगश्रीरजस्रमसितोष्णवारणैः ॥ २३ ॥ ucchritairupari nākavairiṇāṃ ratnakhaṇḍakhacitairacumbyata | kālamaṇḍalitapāśapannagaśrīrajasramasitoṣṇavāraṇaiḥ || 23 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
जज्ञिरे त्रिपुरदानवाः शिरोरत्नबिम्बितवलक्षचामरैः । शाम्भवाशुगहुताशसंस्तवात्प्रागिव प्रसितभास्मनोर्मयः ॥ २४ ॥ jajñire tripuradānavāḥ śiroratnabimbitavalakṣacāmaraiḥ | śāmbhavāśugahutāśasaṃstavātprāgiva prasitabhāsmanormayaḥ || 24 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सान्द्रतूर्यनिनदा विपाण्डुरच्छत्रसंहतिमती पताकिनी । निर्जरप्रतिभुवां तदा बभावन्तकाट्टहसिताञ्चितेव सा ॥ २६ ॥ sāndratūryaninadā vipāṇḍuracchatrasaṃhatimatī patākinī | nirjarapratibhuvāṃ tadā babhāvantakāṭṭahasitāñciteva sā || 26 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कोणबाहुभिरुरःस्थलश्रियस्ताडयन्त्यलसमन्द्रदुन्दुभीन् । सा ध्वजिन्यतत तूर्यनिःस्वनक्रन्दितान्युपनमत्प्रभुक्षतिः ॥ २७ ॥ koṇabāhubhiruraḥsthalaśriyastāḍayantyalasamandradundubhīn | sā dhvajinyatata tūryaniḥsvanakranditānyupanamatprabhukṣatiḥ || 27 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कर्णतालवलनान्यनारतं तद्गजा विदधिरे मदोद्धताः । व्यञ्जयन्त इव दन्तसंसरत्सन्निधेश्चपलतां प्रभुश्रियः ॥ २८ ॥ karṇatālavalanānyanārataṃ tadgajā vidadhire madoddhatāḥ | vyañjayanta iva dantasaṃsaratsannidheścapalatāṃ prabhuśriyaḥ || 28 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दन्तिनां श्रुतिपुटैरनेकशो नर्त्यमानतनुभिर्व्यतन्यत । क्लाम्यतो द्रुततरागतिश्रमादन्तकस्य नवतालवृन्तता ॥ २९ ॥ dantināṃ śrutipuṭairanekaśo nartyamānatanubhirvyatanyata | klāmyato drutatarāgatiśramādantakasya navatālavṛntatā || 29 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वाजिभिर्निकटविप्लवार्जितैः प्रेषितैर्गगनवर्त्महेषितैः । द्रागदूरयमवाहसैरिभत्रासवैशसमिवाभ्यधीयत ॥ ३० ॥ vājibhirnikaṭaviplavārjitaiḥ preṣitairgaganavartmaheṣitaiḥ | drāgadūrayamavāhasairibhatrāsavaiśasamivābhyadhīyata || 30 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दीर्घकाञ्चनखलीनदीधितिप्रोतमाननमवाहि वाजिभिः । आन्तरस्य महसो निरेष्यतश्चुम्ब्यमानमिव वीचिडम्बरैः ॥ ३१ ॥ dīrghakāñcanakhalīnadīdhitiprotamānanamavāhi vājibhiḥ | āntarasya mahaso nireṣyataścumbyamānamiva vīciḍambaraiḥ || 31 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वक्त्र​निर्यदनलार्चिषां मिषादन्तकाय धृतहस्तदीपकाः । अग्रतः पिशुनिताशिवाः शिवा वाशितानि दिवसेऽपि तेनिरे ॥ ३२ ॥ vaktraniryadanalārciṣāṃ miṣādantakāya dhṛtahastadīpakāḥ | agrataḥ piśunitāśivāḥ śivā vāśitāni divase'pi tenire || 32 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पप्रथे यमवरूथिनीपृथुच्छत्रपङ्क्तिभिरिव क्षतातपा । दूरविस्तृतपतत्रमेचकैः पेचकैः परिचिता नभःस्थली ॥ ३३ ॥ paprathe yamavarūthinīpṛthucchatrapaṅktibhiriva kṣatātapā| dūravistṛtapatatramecakaiḥ pecakaiḥ paricitā nabhaḥsthalī || 33 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सा तदा त्रिदशलोकवैरिणां स्वैरिणां प्रचलिता पताकिनी । विन्ध्यहास्तिकवदास्त विस्तृतप्रस्फुरत्करटवाशिताञ्चिता ॥ ३४ ॥ sā tadā tridaśalokavairiṇāṃ svairiṇāṃ pracalitā patākinī | vindhyahāstikavadāsta vistṛtaprasphuratkaraṭavāśitāñcitā || 34 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नर्तितोड्डमरमृत्युदेवताकाञ्चिमारकतकिङ्किणीलिपिम् । आश्रितैः परभृतामितस्ततो मण्डलैर्मुखरतान्वबध्यत ॥ ३५ ॥ nartitoḍḍamaramṛtyudevatākāñcimārakatakiṅkiṇīlipim | āśritaiḥ parabhṛtāmitastato maṇḍalairmukharatānvabadhyata || 35 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
काकघूकमविमूकतां तथा गाढमापदधिदैत्यवाहिनि । येन नैव पिहिताम्बरोदरः सान्द्रतूर्यनिनदोऽपि पप्रथे ॥ ३६ ॥ kākaghūkamavimūkatāṃ tathā gāḍhamāpadadhidaityavāhini | yena naiva pihitāmbarodaraḥ sāndratūryaninado'pi paprathe || 36 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
व्योमपट्टकतले निरर्गलाः पङ्क्तयो बलिभुजां विरेजिरे । उद्यदन्तकनिदेशशंसनं कल्पयन्त्य इव वर्णराजयः ॥ ३७ ॥ vyomapaṭṭakatale nirargalāḥ paṅktayo balibhujāṃ virejire | udyadantakanideśaśaṃsanaṃ kalpayantya iva varṇarājayaḥ || 37 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
हेमचक्रसचिवासितोल्लसद्वारवाणघटनेन ते बभुः । आवहन्त इव दुष्प्रवृत्तये भूरिचण्डकरमण्डलं नभः ॥ ३८ ॥ hemacakrasacivāsitollasadvāravāṇaghaṭanena te babhuḥ | āvahanta iva duṣpravṛttaye bhūricaṇḍakaramaṇḍalaṃ nabhaḥ || 38 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आत्तमण्डलितचण्डकार्मुकाः कामुका दितिजवामचक्षुषाम् । कङ्कणानि रविजाङ्गनोपदाकल्पनाय बहुशोऽवहन्निव ॥ ३९ ॥ āttamaṇḍalitacaṇḍakārmukāḥ kāmukā ditijavāmacakṣuṣām | kaṅkaṇāni ravijāṅganopadākalpanāya bahuśo'vahanniva || 39 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्यामचर्मफलकाब्जिनीदलव्याकुलोद्यदसिशेवलच्छटा । सा दधौ शमनकेलिदीर्घिकादीर्घतामसुरलोकवाहिनी ॥ ४० ॥ śyāmacarmaphalakābjinīdalavyākulodyadasiśevalacchaṭā | sā dadhau śamanakelidīrghikādīrghatāmasuralokavāhinī || 40 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ते कुकर्मनिधयो जगाहिरे स्वैर्वपुर्भिरसिपत्रयोगिताम् । सम्मुखं तदपि निर्जरद्विषश्चक्रिरे चिरमरौरवग्रहम् ॥ ४१ ॥ te kukarmanidhayo jagāhire svairvapurbhirasipatrayogitām | sammukhaṃ tadapi nirjaradviṣaścakrire ciramarauravagraham || 41 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पङ्कटङ्कशितिकङ्कटाङ्कितैर्वर्ष्मभिर्विवृतवैकृतोर्मयः । तेऽथ जग्मुरधिखड्गमण्डलीवारिधारमवगाहनेप्सवः ॥ ४२ ॥ paṅkaṭaṅkaśitikaṅkaṭāṅkitairvarṣmabhirvivṛtavaikṛtormayaḥ | te'tha jagmuradhikhaḍgamaṇḍalīvāridhāramavagāhanepsavaḥ || 42 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गाढपाटलविलोचनाञ्चिता सा चमूररुचदग्रयायिनी । बिभ्रती तुलितलोहया त्विषा कोपपावकहसन्तिकालिपिम् ॥ ४३ ॥ gāḍhapāṭalavilocanāñcitā sā camūrarucadagrayāyinī | bibhratī tulitalohayā tviṣā kopapāvakahasantikālipim || 43 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पृष्ठनिष्ठबहुतूणपङ्क्त​यस्तेऽरयो मखलिहां चकाशिरे । प्रस्थितौ यमपुरे पुरः पुरामुद्गता दुरितभारिका इव ॥ ४४ ॥ pṛṣṭhaniṣṭhabahutūṇapatayaste'rayo makhalihāṃ cakāśire | prasthitau yamapure puraḥ purāmudgatā duritabhārikā iva || 44 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चित्ररत्नवलयांशुशारितैः कार्मुकैर्ददृशिरेऽमरद्रुहः । भीतितो दितिजभावनिह्नवं कर्तुमात्तविविधायुधा इव ॥ ४५ ॥ citraratnavalayāṃśuśāritaiḥ kārmukairdadṛśire'maradruhaḥ | bhītito ditijabhāvanihnavaṃ kartumāttavividhāyudhā iva || 45 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ते परस्परविमर्दनिर्दयत्रुट्यदङ्गदमणीरितैः कणैः । सैन्यरेणुजलदच्छटोदये ज्योतिरिङ्गणगणानदीदृशन् ॥ ४६ ॥ te parasparavimardanirdayatruṭyadaṅgadamaṇīritaiḥ kaṇaiḥ | sainyareṇujaladacchaṭodaye jyotiriṅgaṇagaṇānadīdṛśan || 46 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उपनतवति मृत्युनोपरोधे कटकरजोजवजन्यमानबाष्पैः । प्रतिपदमविदूरवंशनाशैः स्वयमिव तैरवशं भयादरोदि ॥ ४७ ॥ upanatavati mṛtyunoparodhe kaṭakarajojavajanyamānabāṣpaiḥ | pratipadamavidūravaṃśanāśaiḥ svayamiva tairavaśaṃ bhayādarodi || 47 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ते गाढगाढघटमानपटुप्रकोप-रज्यद्विलोचनरुचो दिविषद्विपक्षाः । हृष्यत्कृतान्तपुरनिर्भरकीर्यमाण-सिन्दूररेणुसचिवा इव चक्रुराशाः ॥ ४८ ॥ te gāḍhagāḍhaghaṭamānapaṭuprakopa-rajyadvilocanaruco diviṣadvipakṣāḥ | hṛṣyatkṛtāntapuranirbharakīryamāṇa-sindūrareṇusacivā iva cakrurāśāḥ || 48 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चञ्चच्चमूभररजोहठलिप्यमान-धुर्याक्षकूबरयुगा युगपत्तदानीम् । ते स्यन्दनीकृतधरं गिरिशं विजेतुं दैत्या रथं स्वमिव पार्थिवतामनेषुः ॥ ४९ ॥ cañcaccamūbhararajohaṭhalipyamāna-dhuryākṣakūbarayugā yugapattadānīm | te syandanīkṛtadharaṃ giriśaṃ vijetuṃ daityā rathaṃ svamiva pārthivatāmaneṣuḥ || 49 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निर्गच्छतो निजपुराद्दितिजव्रजस्य काकावली ककुभमभ्यचिनोदुदीचीम् । तस्य प्रवेशविधये स्वदिशो यमेन प्रोत्सारिता विवृतमार्गमयोर्गलेव ॥ ५० ॥ nirgacchato nijapurādditijavrajasya kākāvalī kakubhamabhyacinodudīcīm | tasya praveśavidhaye svadiśo yamena protsāritā vivṛtamārgamayorgaleva || 50 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चक्रन्द दुन्दुभिरवैरवशं रुरोद विस्तारिभिः करटिनां करसीकरौघैः । तेषां चमूरभिनवोपनतक्षयानां(णां) दुःखोचितं किमिव नासकृदाचचार ॥ ५१ ॥ cakranda dundubhiravairavaśaṃ ruroda vistāribhiḥ karaṭināṃ karasīkaraughaiḥ | teṣāṃ camūrabhinavopanatakṣayāṇāṃ duḥkhocitaṃ kimiva nāsakṛdācacāra || 51 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
किञ्चिन्निमीलदलसालसनेत्रतन्द्रागर्वाद्वपुश्च शिथिलाकुलमावहन्तः । मध्येऽरिशस्त्रशयनीयमदूरदीर्घ-निद्रारसत्वमिव ते बहुशः शशंसुः ॥ ५२ ॥ kiñcinnimīladalasālasanetratandrāgarvādvapuśca śithilākulamāvahantaḥ | madhye'riśastraśayanīyamadūradīrgha-nidrārasatvamiva te bahuśaḥ śaśaṃsuḥ || 52 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
हन्मश्चेत्समरेऽमर​व्रजमथो हन्यामहे तेन वा द्यामासाद्य पदं रतेरुभयथाप्येतद्वधूराप्नुमः । ध्यायं ध्यायमिति प्रकामविकसच्छृङ्गारवीरोर्मयः केचित्तत्र सुरारयो बहुरयोत्साहोदयं निर्ययुः ॥ ५३ ॥ hanmaścetsamare'maravrajamatho hanyāmahe tena vā dyāmāsādya padaṃ raterubhayathāpyetadvadhūrāpnumaḥ | dhyāyaṃ dhyāyamiti prakāmavikasacchṛṅgāravīrormayaḥ kecittatra surārayo bahurayotsāhodayaṃ niryayuḥ || 53 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उद्यद्भिर्विषसीकरैर्वृतमुखास्तद्वाहिनीदन्तिना-माक्रान्तेऽम्बरवर्त्मनि प्रकटितावर्ताः करा रेजिरे । दैत्याकर्षणकेलिसम्भ्रमरुषां मृत्योर्भटानामिव व्यक्ताः पाशमहोरगास्तत इतो व्यावल्गितुं प्रस्तुताः ॥ ५४ ॥ udyadbhirviṣasīkarairvṛtamukhāstadvāhinīdantinā-mākrānte'mbaravartmani prakaṭitāvartāḥ karā rejire | daityākarṣaṇakelisambhramaruṣāṃ mṛtyorbhaṭānāmiva vyaktāḥ pāśamahoragāstata ito vyāvalgituṃ prastutāḥ || 54 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
योद्धुं सार्धमधिज्यकार्मुकगणग्रामाण्यनीकैर्हठा-त्तान्निर्गन्तुमुदञ्चितोद्यमरसान्नाकेसदां वैरिणः । सम्भाव्यापुनरागमं परिणतौत्सुक्याज्जवोद्गत्वरैः स्वाः पुर्यः परिरेभिरे मणिदृषद्भित्तिप्रभाबाहुभिः ॥ ५४ ॥ yoddhuṃ sārdhamadhijyakārmukagaṇagrāmāṇyanīkairhaṭhā-ttānnirgantumudañcitodyamarasānnākesadāṃ vairiṇaḥ | sambhāvyāpunarāgamaṃ pariṇatautsukyājjavodgatvaraiḥ svāḥ puryaḥ parirebhire maṇidṛṣadbhittiprabhābāhubhiḥ || 54 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निर्गच्छत्सु प्रियेषु प्रधनविधिधिया दानवेन्दीवराक्ष्य-स्त्रासस्वेदापनीतैः कुचमुकुलतटास्कन्दिबाह्लीकपङ्कैः । उत्तंसैः स्रंसमानैरथ पृथुविकसद्वेपथूद्वेगयोगा-दूहुः प्रागेव गात्रं दधदिव नियतादूरवैधव्यचिह्नम् ॥ ५६ ॥ nirgacchatsu priyeṣu pradhanavidhidhiyā dānavendīvarākṣya-strāsasvedāpanītaiḥ kucamukulataṭāskandibāhlīkapaṅkaiḥ | uttaṃsaiḥ sraṃsamānairatha pṛthuvikasadvepathūdvegayogā-dūhuḥ prāgeva gātraṃ dadhadiva niyatādūravaidhavyacihnam || 56 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दर्शं दर्शं सुराणां कटकमभिविशत्ताः पुरीर्मुक्तशङ्कं सातङ्कान्तःपुरस्त्रीजनजनितघनाक्रन्दवाचालशालाः । गीर्वाणद्वेषिणस्ते हठकठिननवक्रोधदष्टौष्ठरक्तै-र्वक्त्रैरापीतपूर्वं नियतमुदवमन्वैरिवीरप्रतापम् ॥ ५७ ॥ darśaṃ darśaṃ surāṇāṃ kaṭakamabhiviśattāḥ purīrmuktaśaṅkaṃ sātaṅkāntaḥpurastrījanajanitaghanākrandavācālaśālāḥ | gīrvāṇadveṣiṇaste haṭhakaṭhinanavakrodhadaṣṭauṣṭharaktai-rvaktrairāpītapūrvaṃ niyatamudavamanvairivīrapratāpam || 57 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अन्योन्यं ते ध्वजिन्यावथ सुरदनुजाधिष्ठिते सौष्ठवेन श्लिष्यन्त्यौ फेनपिण्डोपमविधृतसितच्छत्रपालीकराले । स्वीचक्राते प्रसर्पत्पटुपटहरवारभ्यमाणोर्मिघोष-स्फारेणानल्पकल्पात्ययसमयमिलत्सागरद्वन्द्वलीलाम् ॥ ५८ ॥ anyonyaṃ te dhvajinyāvatha suradanujādhiṣṭhite sauṣṭhavena śliṣyantyau phenapiṇḍopamavidhṛtasitacchatrapālīkarāle | svīcakrāte prasarpatpaṭupaṭaharavārabhyamāṇormighoṣa-sphāreṇānalpakalpātyayasamayamilatsāgaradvandvalīlām || 58 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति श्रीजोनराजकृतया टीकया समेतः श्रीराजानकविश्ववर्तसूनोर्महाकविराजमहाराजानकश्रीमङ्खकस्य कृतौ श्रीकण्ठचरिते महाकाव्ये दैत्यपुरीक्षोभवर्णनं नाम द्वाविंशः सर्गः ॥ त्रयोविंशः सर्गः ॥ समघटत पताकिनीयुगं तदथ मिथः प्रथमानय(म​)त्सरैः। द्युसदसुरभटैर्मदोत्कटैः प्रकटितदुर्धरसङ्गरक्रियम् ॥ १ ॥ samaghaṭata patākinīyugaṃ tadatha mithaḥ prathamānaya(ma)tsaraiḥ| dyusadasurabhaṭairmadotkaṭaiḥ prakaṭitadurdharasaṅgarakriyam || 1 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मणिसखयमपाशपन्नगस्फुटफणविभ्रमसख्यचञ्चवः । परिणमदहिमांशुमण्डला विबभुरकोषकृपाणयष्टयः ॥ २ ॥ maṇisakhayamapāśapannagasphuṭaphaṇavibhramasakhyacañcavaḥ | pariṇamadahimāṃśumaṇḍalā vibabhurakoṣakṛpāṇayaṣṭayaḥ || 2 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अशुभपिशुननिःसरद्घ​नश्रमजलसिक्तशराः सुरद्रुहः । हरमनलशरं जिगीषवो दधुरिव कल्पितवारुणेषुताम् ॥ ३ ॥ aśubhapiśunaniḥsaradghanaśramajalasiktaśarāḥ suradruhaḥ | haramanalaśaraṃ jigīṣavo dadhuriva kalpitavāruṇeṣutām || 3 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शिखिमयवपुयो(षो)ऽग्रभाविनो विधृतभया विशिखापिनाकिनः । दिविषदसिसखे श्रियः पुरामचरममेव ममज्जुरम्भसि ॥ ४ ॥ śikhimayavapuyo(ṣo)'grabhāvino vidhṛtabhayā viśikhāpinākinaḥ | diviṣadasisakhe śriyaḥ purāmacaramameva mamajjurambhasi || 4 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अमरकटककिङ्करा मुखश्वसनविपूरिततूर्यचर्यया । अथ दधुरभिसृत्य मृत्यवे पुरबलभोजनकाहलामिव ॥ ५ ॥ amarakaṭakakiṅkarā mukhaśvasanavipūritatūryacaryayā | atha dadhurabhisṛtya mṛtyave purabalabhojanakāhalāmiva || 5 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उपगतवति शङ्करे ततो भुवनगुरावुभयोरनीकयोः। धनुरनमदवाप मुक्ततामथ तु बताविनतोऽपि सायकः ॥ ६ ॥ upagatavati śaṅkare tato bhuvanagurāvubhayoranīkayoḥ| dhanuranamadavāpa muktatāmatha tu batāvinato'pi sāyakaḥ || 6 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सुरशरनिकरोऽम्बरेऽरुचज्जवचटुलोभयपक्षति भ्रमन् । उपनमदसुरास्रपारणामद इव दर्शितनृत्तविभ्रमः ॥ ७ ॥ suraśaranikaro'mbare'rucajjavacaṭulobhayapakṣati bhraman | upanamadasurāsrapāraṇāmada iva darśitanṛttavibhramaḥ || 7 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
समरतरुरनङ्कुशाङ्कुरः पुलकितमूर्तिरशेषदिक्ततिः। चिरमजनि शरैरितस्ततः प्रविसृमरैरमरेन्द्रवर्त्मनि ॥ ८ ॥ samarataruranaṅkuśāṅkuraḥ pulakitamūrtiraśeṣadiktatiḥ| ciramajani śarairitastataḥ pravisṛmarairamarendravartmani || 8 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अपि कटकयुगे धनुष्मतामघटि परस्परमीरितैः शरैः । उरसि विवृतवीप्स​मप्सरःकुचमुकुलप्रणयाग्रदूतता ॥ ९ ॥ api kaṭakayuge dhanuṣmatāmaghaṭi parasparamīritaiḥ śaraiḥ | urasi vivṛtavīpsamapsaraḥkucamukulapraṇayāgradūtatā || 9 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मुखमकृत तथा परो रिपोर्विपुलविसारितमार्गणार्गलम् । श्वसितमरुदवाप नो यथा पुनरपि तत्र किल प्रवेशनम् ॥ १० ॥ mukhamakṛta tathā paro riporvipulavisāritamārgaṇārgalam | śvasitamarudavāpa no yathā punarapi tatra kila praveśanam || 10 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शरपटलविघट्टनोच्छलद्दहनशिखाकपटेन शस्त्रिणाम् । द्विषदसुविघसाय कङ्कटा अपि विकसद्रसना इवाबभुः ॥ ११ ॥ śarapaṭalavighaṭṭanocchaladdahanaśikhākapaṭena śastriṇām | dviṣadasuvighasāya kaṅkaṭā api vikasadrasanā ivābabhuḥ || 11 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रवसदसुरथापरो रयादुरसि निमग्नमुखे शिलीमुखे । अजनि किल मुहूर्तविघ्नितत्रिदशवधूनिबिडावगूहनः ॥ १२ ॥ pravasadasurathāparo rayādurasi nimagnamukhe śilīmukhe | ajani kila muhūrtavighnitatridaśavadhūnibiḍāvagūhanaḥ || 12 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चतुरमसुरसायको मुखे गजवदनस्य कृतावरोहणः । पुनरपररदाङ्कुरोद्गमभ्रममपुषन्मुहुरीशचक्षुषाम् ॥ १३ ॥ caturamasurasāyako mukhe gajavadanasya kṛtāvarohaṇaḥ | punarapararadāṅkurodgamabhramamapuṣanmuhurīśacakṣuṣām || 13 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
क्षणमसुरचमूमतङ्गजा द्विरदमुखस्य मदं विषेहिरे । वहनहरिमवेक्ष्य तस्य तु त्रुटितधृति त्वरितं विदुद्रुवुः ॥ १४ ॥ kṣaṇamasuracamūmataṅgajā dviradamukhasya madaṃ viṣehire | vahanaharimavekṣya tasya tu truṭitadhṛti tvaritaṃ vidudruvuḥ || 14 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उपनतसमरोत्सवग्रहादिव दधतः पटुचीनपिष्टताम् । विधृतनिबिडताण्डवः करे परशुरशोभत विघ्नविद्विषः ॥ १९ ॥ upanatasamarotsavagrahādiva dadhataḥ paṭucīnapiṣṭatām | vidhṛtanibiḍatāṇḍavaḥ kare paraśuraśobhata vighnavidviṣaḥ || 19 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विशिखकुसुमवृष्टिभिः पुरः करिवदनोऽञ्चितचर्चमर्चताम् । मिहिरसुतपुरप्रवेशने व्यतनुत विघ्नहतिं धनुष्मताम् ॥ १६ ॥ viśikhakusumavṛṣṭibhiḥ puraḥ karivadano'ñcitacarcamarcatām | mihirasutapurapraveśane vyatanuta vighnahatiṃ dhanuṣmatām || 16 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
द्विरदनवदने जिगीषया विषमतमात्तबृहन्मदोद्गमाः। उपरि करटसङ्कटानना दितिजभटाः सहसैव जझिरे ॥ १७ ॥ dviradanavadane jigīṣayā viṣamatamāttabṛhanmadodgamāḥ| upari karaṭasaṅkaṭānanā ditijabhaṭāḥ sahasaiva jajhire || 17 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
हठकठिनविटङ्ककीकसस्खलितनिशातविपक्षसायकम् । कवचपरिचयानपेक्षतामभजत भृङ्गिरिटेरहो वपुः ॥ १८ ॥ haṭhakaṭhinaviṭaṅkakīkasaskhalitaniśātavipakṣasāyakam | kavacaparicayānapekṣatāmabhajata bhṛṅgiriṭeraho vapuḥ || 18 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रतिकटकभटान्विशङ्कटप्रविसरदायुधमुक्तियुक्तिभिः । चतुरमुपनयन्कबन्धतामतनुत तण्डुरखण्डताण्डवम् ॥ १९ ॥ pratikaṭakabhaṭānviśaṅkaṭapravisaradāyudhamuktiyuktibhiḥ | caturamupanayankabandhatāmatanuta taṇḍurakhaṇḍatāṇḍavam || 19 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चलकरयुगलक्रमाहतद्विपकरटद्वितयेन नन्दिना । किमु मुरजमवाद्यताग्रतः शशिशिरसो रणरङ्गनर्तने ॥ २० ॥ calakarayugalakramāhatadvipakaraṭadvitayena nandinā | kimu murajamavādyatāgrataḥ śaśiśiraso raṇaraṅganartane || 20 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चतुरतरतया निरस्य तानरिविशिखानखिलानितस्ततः । प्रकटिततनुरग्निभूरभूच्छरवणतः पुनरुद्भवन्निव ॥ २१ ॥ caturataratayā nirasya tānariviśikhānakhilānitastataḥ | prakaṭitatanuragnibhūrabhūccharavaṇataḥ punarudbhavanniva || 21 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पतितमधिकबन्धमुच्छ(?त्फ​)लच्छकलितदन्तितनूद्गतं शिरः । अधिदितिजबलं प्रनर्तनैरपरगणाधिपसंशयं दधौ ॥ २२ ॥ patitamadhikabandhamuccha(?tpha)lacchakalitadantitanūdgataṃ śiraḥ | adhiditijabalaṃ pranartanairaparagaṇādhipasaṃśayaṃ dadhau || 22 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्रवणपुटविवर्तनानिलक्रममुखरश्रुतिकम्बुचुम्बितः । द्विरदनवदनस्य पप्रथे स्वयमसकृज्जयशङ्खवादनम् ॥ २३ ॥ śravaṇapuṭavivartanānilakramamukharaśrutikambucumbitaḥ | dviradanavadanasya paprathe svayamasakṛjjayaśaṅkhavādanam || 23 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रतिमिततनुरग्निजन्मनो व्यरुचदसौ तडिदुज्ज्वलासृजि । नवमुदिरधिया ससम्भ्रमं कृतपरिरम्भ इवाङ्कबर्हिणः ॥ २४ ॥ pratimitatanuragnijanmano vyarucadasau taḍidujjvalāsṛji | navamudiradhiyā sasambhramaṃ kṛtaparirambha ivāṅkabarhiṇaḥ || 24 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
झटिति विरचितेऽसिलेखया पुलकभृता हठतो गलग्रहे । असमशरनिपीडनाकुलः सुभटजनो दृढरक्ततामगात् ॥ २५ ॥ jhaṭiti viracite'silekhayā pulakabhṛtā haṭhato galagrahe | asamaśaranipīḍanākulaḥ subhaṭajano dṛḍharaktatāmagāt || 25 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
व्यसुरसुरभटोऽधिरूढवान्दिवमुपयु(भु)ज्य सुरैणचक्षुषः । अगमयदितरोऽथ पश्यतो द्विगुणितमत्सरतां सुधान्धसः ॥ २६ ॥ vyasurasurabhaṭo'dhirūḍhavāndivamupayu(bhu)jya suraiṇacakṣuṣaḥ | agamayaditaro'tha paśyato dviguṇitamatsaratāṃ sudhāndhasaḥ || 26 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
समिदभिमुखमुज्झितासुषु त्रिदशदशामुपलब्धवत्स्वहो । अपि सुररिपुषु स्वबान्धवैर्विनिदधिरे स्थिरमत्सरा दृशः ॥ २७ ॥ samidabhimukhamujjhitāsuṣu tridaśadaśāmupalabdhavatsvaho | api suraripuṣu svabāndhavairvinidadhire sthiramatsarā dṛśaḥ || 27 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
समिदुपगमदुःसहोच्छ्वसन्महसि धृतोष्मभरः स्ववर्ष्मणि । निजजनयितुरापदग्निभूरसृगरुणोल्बणहेतिकस्तुलाम् ॥ २८ ॥ samidupagamaduḥsahocchvasanmahasi dhṛtoṣmabharaḥ svavarṣmaṇi | nijajanayiturāpadagnibhūrasṛgaruṇolbaṇahetikastulām || 28 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
धृतवति शमने सपाशतामनुसृतशारिभरेषु दन्तिषु । समजनि सुरविद्विषामसुग्लहहरणाय दुरोदरक्रिया ॥ २९ ॥ dhṛtavati śamane sapāśatāmanusṛtaśāribhareṣu dantiṣu | samajani suravidviṣāmasuglahaharaṇāya durodarakriyā || 29 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सकलदिगनुबद्धसैनिकस्फुरदसिसंहतिबिम्बिताननः । दशमुखपदवीमिवासुरो हरबलकम्पकृतो(ते) परोऽगमत् ॥ ३० ॥ sakaladiganubaddhasainikasphuradasisaṃhatibimbitānanaḥ | daśamukhapadavīmivāsuro harabalakampakṛto(te) paro'gamat || 30 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मुहुररिविशिखान्प्रतीच्छता चतुरगतागतकेलिशालिना । श्रवणपुटयुगेन खेटकक्रममपुषद्वदने विनायकः ॥ ३१ ॥ muhurariviśikhānpratīcchatā caturagatāgatakeliśālinā | śravaṇapuṭayugena kheṭakakramamapuṣadvadane vināyakaḥ || 31 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गजवदनरदाग्रघट्टनाशकलितमूर्तिषु नाकवैरिषु । कुपितशमनदन्तसन्ततिप्रहृतिरसः पुनरुक्ततामगात् ॥ ३२ ॥ gajavadanaradāgraghaṭṭanāśakalitamūrtiṣu nākavairiṣu | kupitaśamanadantasantatiprahṛtirasaḥ punaruktatāmagāt || 32 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सकलवपुरुपोढसायकव्यतिकरकण्टकभग्नतालुना। वदनत इव मृत्युनोज्झितः पुनरभजद्व्रणितोऽपि कोऽप्यसून् ॥ ३३ ॥ sakalavapurupoḍhasāyakavyatikarakaṇṭakabhagnatālunā| vadanata iva mṛtyunojjhitaḥ punarabhajadvraṇito'pi ko'pyasūn || 33 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रथमगलदुपोढकुङ्कुमश्रमसलिले वपुषि द्युसद्द्विषः । द्विषदिषुघटनासु कस्यचिद्विसृतमसृङ् न झगित्यलक्ष्यत ॥ ३४ ॥ prathamagaladupoḍhakuṅkumaśramasalile vapuṣi dyusaddviṣaḥ | dviṣadiṣughaṭanāsu kasyacidvisṛtamasṛṅ na jhagityalakṣyata || 34 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रचयितुमिव दूततां मिथः कथमपि सन्धिकृते जयश्रिया । दिविषदसुरसैन्ययोश्चिरं विवृतगतागतता व्यतन्यत ॥ ३५ ॥ racayitumiva dūtatāṃ mithaḥ kathamapi sandhikṛte jayaśriyā | diviṣadasurasainyayościraṃ vivṛtagatāgatatā vyatanyata || 35 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
बहुशरकरसीकरावलीमुचि करवालमदच्छटातिथौ । रणकरिणि गलद्भटासृजा परिममृषे मुखधातुविभ्रमः ॥ ३६ ॥ bahuśarakarasīkarāvalīmuci karavālamadacchaṭātithau | raṇakariṇi galadbhaṭāsṛjā parimamṛṣe mukhadhātuvibhramaḥ || 36 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
धूमो ममज्ज करवालरुचिच्छटासु भेदोऽप्यलम्भि रुधिरोर्मिषु नो शिखाभिः । आग्नेयमस्त्रमिति नाकिभटैः प्रयुक्त-मप्याससाद न कथञ्चिदपि स्फुटत्वम् ॥ ३७ ॥ dhūmo mamajja karavālarucicchaṭāsu bhedo'pyalambhi rudhirormiṣu no śikhābhiḥ | āgneyamastramiti nākibhaṭaiḥ prayukta-mapyāsasāda na kathañcidapi sphuṭatvam || 37 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अस्रं पलं च सममेव पचञ्शवानां यस्तत्क्षणं प्रयुयुजे सु(जेऽस्त्र​)हुताशनोऽन्यैः । हृष्यत्पिशाचरजनीचरपूतनाना-मूरीचकार स महानसवह्निकृत्यम् ॥ ३८ ॥ asraṃ palaṃ ca samameva pacañśavānāṃ yastatkṣaṇaṃ prayuyuje su(je'stra)hutāśano'nyaiḥ | hṛṣyatpiśācarajanīcarapūtanānā-mūrīcakāra sa mahānasavahnikṛtyam || 38 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वरुणदहनजिष्णुब्रह्मविष्ण्वादिभिर्यै-र्जगति विवृतमोजो दैवतैरस्त्रजातेः । स्वयमकृषत तस्यां यत्र तेऽपि प्रयोगं कथमिव विजयाशा तत्र संशीतिपात्रम् ॥ ३९ ॥ varuṇadahanajiṣṇubrahmaviṣṇvādibhiryai-rjagati vivṛtamojo daivatairastrajāteḥ | svayamakṛṣata tasyāṃ yatra te'pi prayogaṃ kathamiva vijayāśā tatra saṃśītipātram || 39 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
त्रिदिवयुवतिरुद्यत्सम्प्रहाराभिमुख्य-प्रवसदसुमनल्पप्रेमकल्लोलितापि । कमपि किल कबन्धीभूतमुज्झाञ्चकार व्यधिकरणमवेत्यालिङ्गनं चुम्बनं च ॥ ४० ॥ tridivayuvatirudyatsamprahārābhimukhya-pravasadasumanalpapremakallolitāpi | kamapi kila kabandhībhūtamujjhāñcakāra vyadhikaraṇamavetyāliṅganaṃ cumbanaṃ ca || 40 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वीरोऽरिशस्त्रगलदस्रवसावसेकै-र्बीभत्सवृत्ति किल वर्ष्म​ यथायथाधात् । चित्तं(त्रं) द्युलोकललनासु तथातथा स शृङ्गारवर्त्मनि विभावदशामियाय ॥ ४१ ॥ vīro'riśastragaladasravasāvasekai- rbībhatsavṛtti kila varṣma yathāyathādhāt | citta(tra)ṃ dyulokalalanāsu tathātathā sa śṛṅgāravartmani vibhāvadaśāmiyāya || 41 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सङ्ग्रामाभिमुखोज्झितासुरसुरो विस्पष्टदंष्ट्राङ्कुर-क्रूरास्योर्जितवीरलोकगतये योऽखण्डयन्मण्डलम् । जज्ञे तेन दिनाधिपस्य किमपि त्रासाय कृत्वा पुरः सम्प्राप्तस्वकबन्धसन्धिविधुरस्वर्भानुसम्भावनाम् ॥ ४२ ॥ saṅgrāmābhimukhojjhitāsurasuro vispaṣṭadaṃṣṭrāṅkura- krūrāsyorjitavīralokagataye yo'khaṇḍayanmaṇḍalam | jajñe tena dinādhipasya kimapi trāsāya kṛtvā puraḥ samprāptasvakabandhasandhividhurasvarbhānusambhāvanām || 42 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अङ्गमङ्गमनिमग्ननिरूढप्रासदन्तुरितवृत्ति दधानः। कोऽपि नर्तनरतिं रणहर्षे दोःशतैरिव बबन्ध कबन्धः ॥ ४३ ॥ aṅgamaṅgamanimagnanirūḍhaprāsadanturitavṛtti dadhānaḥ| ko'pi nartanaratiṃ raṇaharṣe doḥśatairiva babandha kabandhaḥ || 43 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
समरपरिहृतासोः कस्यचिन्नाकनार्या समजनि रतिकेलिश्चुम्बनोल्लासमात्रः । तदधरपरिपीतस्फीतपीयूषपूरैः पुनरपि हि स सद्यो जीवितव्यं प्रपेदे ॥ ४४ ॥ samaraparihṛtāsoḥ kasyacinnākanāryā samajani ratikeliścumbanollāsamātraḥ | tadadharaparipītasphītapīyūṣapūraiḥ punarapi hi sa sadyo jīvitavyaṃ prapede || 44 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वासः कृत्तिभिरासव​र्द्धिरसृजा लीलावदंशः पलै-र्मुक्ताभिः कटजन्मभिश्च दयितालोकस्तनालङ्कृतिः । किं किं नेत्थमसिध्यदुद्यतमृधोल्लासे निशाचारिणा-मन्योन्यप्रहितामरासुरशरस्रग्दार्यमाणैर्गजैः ॥ ४५ ॥ vāsaḥ kṛttibhirāsavarddhirasṛjā līlāvadaṃśaḥ palai-rmuktābhiḥ kaṭajanmabhiśca dayitālokastanālaṅkṛtiḥ | kiṃ kiṃ netthamasidhyadudyatamṛdhollāse niśācāriṇā -manyonyaprahitāmarāsuraśarasragdāryamāṇairgajaiḥ || 45 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्लिप्यन्निशातशरदारणनिर्जिहान–सुव्यक्तमौक्तिकभृताखिलदिग्विभागैः । उद्घाट्यमानयमराजमहानसान्धः-स्थालीलिपिः करटिनामुदटङ्कि कुम्भैः ॥ ४६ ॥ ślipyanniśātaśaradāraṇanirjihāna –suvyaktamauktikabhṛtākhiladigvibhāgaiḥ | udghāṭyamānayamarājamahānasāndhaḥ -sthālīlipiḥ karaṭināmudaṭaṅki kumbhaiḥ || 46 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तमसिपरिकरेण प्रौढिमानं दधाने विततमहिमभाजि प्रोन्मदेभाश्रयेण । समररजनिकाले स्वप्रतापप्रदीपै-र्ददृशुरखिलवा(वी)रास्तत्त्वमग्र्यं जयस्य ॥ ४७ ॥ tamasiparikareṇa prauḍhimānaṃ dadhāne vitatamahimabhāji pronmadebhāśrayeṇa | samararajanikāle svapratāpapradīpai-rdadṛśurakhilavīrāstattvamagryaṃ jayasya || 47 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इत्थङ्कारं करालोऽसमसमररसो दुर्वहान्योन्यवैर-स्वैरस्वाराज्यरज्यन्निखिलमुखरुचामास्त देवासुराणाम् । उच्चण्डैर्मुण्डखण्डैरधिधरणि शरव्रातघातात्पतद्भिः पुष्णन्नुष्णांशुसूनोः प्रमदवनगलन्नारिकेलीफलानि ॥ ४८ ॥ itthaṅkāraṃ karālo'samasamararaso durvahānyonyavaira- svairasvārājyarajyannikhilamukharucāmāsta devāsurāṇām | uccaṇḍairmuṇḍakhaṇḍairadhidharaṇi śaravrātaghātātpatadbhiḥ puṣṇannuṣṇāṃśusūnoḥ pramadavanagalannārikelīphalāni || 48 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
बले दृप्यत्येवं शिशुशशभृदुत्तंसशिरसो जयश्रीविस्रम्भग्रथितपरिरम्भव्यतिकरैः । बृहत्कोपाटोपप्रकटनविशेष​​स्थिरतर-स्फुरद्युद्धश्रद्धं त्रयमपि पुराणामघटत ॥ ४९ ॥ bale dṛpyatyevaṃ śiśuśaśabhṛduttaṃsaśiraso jayaśrīvisrambhagrathitaparirambhavyatikaraiḥ | bṛhatkopāṭopaprakaṭanaviśeṣ​asthiratara-sphuradyuddhaśraddhaṃ trayamapi purāṇāmaghaṭata || 49 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ते रेजुर्दनुजा भुजार्गलहृताशेषद्विषन्मन्दिर-श्रीसञ्चाररसाः प्रकोपविगलद्घ​र्मोमिभिर्मूर्तिभिः । दीर्घक्लेशपरिग्रहासहतया शीघ्रं हरास्त्रानल-ज्वालाप्लोषमवाप्तुमाहितबृहत्तैलानुलेपा इव ॥ ५० ॥ te rejurdanujā bhujārgalahṛtāśeṣadviṣanmandira-śrīsañcārarasāḥ prakopavigaladgharmomibhirmūrtibhiḥ | dīrghakleśaparigrahāsahatayā śīghraṃ harāstrānala-jvālāploṣamavāptumāhita bṛhattailānulepā iva || 50 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कालत्वं भृकुटीषु वेपथुरथो दन्तच्छदे भीष्मता-भाजामूष्मभरश्च चेतसि पदं तेषां बबन्ध क्रुधा । अन्योन्याहितसङ्गकृष्णहिमगुज्वालाध्वजोट्टङ्कितं(त​-)श्रीकण्ठाशुगपातवैशससमासत्तिप्रभावादिव ॥ ५१ ॥ kālatvaṃ bhṛkuṭīṣu vepathuratho dantacchade bhīṣmatā-bhājāmūṣmabharaśca cetasi padaṃ teṣāṃ babandha krudhā | anyonyāhitasaṅgakṛṣṇahimagujvālādhvajoṭṭaṅkitaṃ(ta-) śrīkaṇṭhāśugapātavaiśasasamāsattiprabhāvādiva || 51 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रोहद्दुर्वारगर्वा अपि शशिशकलोत्तंसविध्वंसनाय व्यायस्तैरस्त्रतन्त्रैः प्यधिषत दिविषद्वीरवर्गस्य वर्ष्म​ । ते दैत्याः क्रूरकृत्यास्तदवनिवनितालोकवक्रे तु चित्रं तास्ता लीला विनश्यद्घ​नघुसृणपटे प्रापुरन्तर्हितत्वम् ॥ ५२ ॥ rohaddurvāragarvā api śaśiśakalottaṃsavidhvaṃsanāyavyāyastairastratantraiḥ pyadhiṣata diviṣadvīravargasya varṣma | te daityāḥ krūrakṛtyāstadavanivanitālokavakre tu citraṃ tāstā līlā vinaśyadghanaghusṛṇapaṭe prāpurantarhitatvam || 52 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
हस्तैरस्त्रव्युदस्तैः प्रसृतसरसिजं लूनदण्डैर्विपाण्डु-च्छत्रैरुच्चण्डफेनं स्फुटमसिभिरभिव्यक्तशेवालवल्लि । लीलानृत्यत्कबन्धभ्रमरकरचनैर्नर्तितावर्तचक्रं सङ्ग्रामोर्वीसरस्ते दनुजमदगजा लोडयन्तो जगर्जुः ॥ ५३ ॥ hastairastravyudastaiḥ prasṛtasarasijaṃ lūnadaṇḍairvipāṇḍu-cchatrairuccaṇḍaphenaṃ sphuṭamasibhirabhivyaktaśevālavalli | līlānṛtyatkabandhabhramarakaracanairnartitāvartacakraṃ saṅgrāmorvīsaraste danujamadagajā loḍayanto jagarjuḥ || 53 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
असृक्स्रोतः प्रोतस्थलगलदसिच्छेदपटलैः परीतं वीराणामुपहितनवीनासवमदम् । तदा सङ्ग्रामोर्वीतलमविरलेन्दीवरदल-प्रसन्नौघक्रान्तान्तकचषकसाचिव्यमचिनोत् ॥ ५४ ॥ asṛksrotaḥ protasthalagaladasicchedapaṭalaiḥ parītaṃ vīrāṇāmupahitanavīnāsavamadam | tadā saṅgrāmorvītalamaviralendīvaradala-prasannaughakrāntāntakacaṣakasācivyamacinot || 54 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अन्तःसम्प्राप्तवीरस्थितिरपि विवृतोद्रेकसेका सुराणां सर्वत्रापि प्रवल्गत्पटहरणरसालम्बमानाम्बराग्रम् । वृद्धत्वं दर्शयन्त्यप्यनुपरतरजोविक्रिया विस्मयाय प्रायः सैन्यद्वयी सा समजनि दिविषद्दानवाजिक्रियासु ॥ ५५ ॥ antaḥsamprāptavīrasthitirapi vivṛtodrekasekā surāṇāṃ sarvatrāpi pravalgatpaṭaharaṇarasālambamānāmbarāgram | vṛddhatvaṃ darśayantyapyanuparatarajovikriyā vismayāya prāyaḥ sainyadvayī sā samajani diviṣaddānavājikriyāsu || 55 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आग्नेयास्त्रप्रभाभिर्घनघटितपरीरम्भमुज्जृम्भमाणं दुर्वारं वारुणास्त्रं यदजनि पिहिताशेषसङ्ग्रामभूमि । तस्य क्रोधानुरोधोत्कटकटकयुगान्योन्यनिर्मुच्यमान-क्रूरक्रूरेषुघातोद्धतरुधिरभरैर्निह्नवोऽह्नाय चक्रे ॥ ५६ ॥ āgneyāstraprabhābhirghanaghaṭitaparīrambhamujjṛmbhamāṇaṃ durvāraṃ vāruṇāstraṃ yadajani pihitāśeṣasaṅgrāmabhūmi | tasya krodhānurodhotkaṭakaṭakayugānyonyanirmucyamāna-krūrakrūreṣughātoddhatarudhirabharairnihnavo'hnāya cakre || 56 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति श्रीजोनराजकृतया टीकया समेतः श्रीराजानकविश्ववर्तसूनोर्महाकविराजराजानकश्रीमङ्खकस्य कृतौ श्रीकण्ठचरिते महाकाव्ये युद्धवर्णनं नाम त्रयोविंशः सर्गः ॥ चतुर्विंशः सर्गः ॥ क्रोधोत्सेकादिति दितिभुवां तत्र तेषां त्रयाणां प्रत्त्यासत्तौ पुनरुपययौ यौवनं सङ्ख्यरेखा । हित्वा दूरे तुलितपलितं कोषमुत्खातखड्ग- ज्योतिर्व्याजाद​सितकबरीरीतिमामुञ्चतीव ॥ १ ॥ krodhotsekāditi ditibhuvāṃ tatra teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ prattyāsattau punarupayayau yauvanaṃ saṅkhyarekhā | hitvā dūre tulitapalitaṃ koṣamutkhātakhaḍga-jyotirvyājādasitakabarīrītimāmuñcatīva || 1 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तत्तद्वीरप्रवरवरणप्रेप्सया वीप्सया ता यातास्तस्यां रणभुवि तथा सान्द्रतामिन्द्रवध्वः । तत्रान्योन्यं कथमपि यथा सम्भ्रमाद्भ्रूणहत्या-भीत्या बाणप्रकरकिरणं धन्विनो नान्वतिष्ठन् ॥ २ ॥ tattadvīrapravaravaraṇaprepsayā vīpsayā tā yātāstasyāṃ raṇabhuvi tathā sāndratāmindravadhvaḥ | tatrānyonyaṃ kathamapi yathā sambhramādbhrūṇahatyā-bhītyā bāṇaprakarakiraṇaṃ dhanvino nānvatiṣṭhan || 2 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
धूल्या दृष्टिं त्वचमविरतक्षिप्यमाणास्त्रतन्त्रै-र्घ्राणं गन्धोत्कटकरिमदैस्तूर्यनादैः श्रवांसि । अन्योन्योत्कोपनपटुवचो वि(चोवि)प्लवैश्चाबबाधे जिह्वां जज्ञे तदपि कृतिनामुत्सवायैव युद्धम् ॥ ३ ॥ dhūlyā dṛṣṭiṃ tvacamaviratakṣipyamāṇāstratastrai-rghrāṇaṃ gandhotkaṭakarimadaistūryanādaiḥ śravāṃsi | anyonyotkopanapaṭuvaco vi(covi)plavaiścābabādhe jihvāṃ jajñe tadapi kṛtināmutsavāyaiva yuddham || 3 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
रक्तैः सिन्दूरितमविरतोज्जृम्भमाणोपकारं वक्त्राम्भोजं(जैः) शरशतहठक्षिप्यमाणैर्भटानाम् । सङ्ख्यस्थानं पिहितगगनैरुद्वितानं घनास्त्रैः सद्यो लीलासदनपदवीमाससादान्तकस्य ॥ ४ ॥ raktaiḥ sindūritamaviratojjṛmbhamāṇopakāraṃ vaktrāmbhojaṃ(jaiḥ) śaraśatahaṭhakṣipyamāṇairbhaṭānām | saṅkhyasthānaṃ pihitagaganairudvitānaṃ ghanāstraiḥ sadyo līlāsadanapadavīmāsasādāntakasya || 4 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नीरन्ध्रं यत्प्यधित हरितामन्तरालं करालं वल्गत्कौक्षेयकरुचिमयाकृत्यजस्रं तमिस्रम् । तस्य श्लिष्यन्नवनववरावाप्तिपर्याप्तलोभ- स्वर्लोलाक्षीजनमुखशशिज्योतिषापह्नवोऽभूत् ॥ ५ ॥ nīrandhraṃ yatpyadhita haritāmantarālaṃ karālaṃ valgatkaukṣeyakarucimayākṛtyajasraṃ tamisram | tasya śliṣyannavanavavarāvāptiparyāptalobha- svarlolākṣījanamukhaśaśijyotiṣāpahnavo'bhūt || 5 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
एकस्थानाक्रमणविवृता ख(ताख​)र्ववैराभिमर्षं दर्शं दर्शं त्रिपुरमसुरैः सार्धमन्यैः समन्यौ । भर्गे साभ्यर्थनमिव मुहुस्तत्र सम्भूय भूयो देवाः सेवावनतशिरसश्चिक्षिपुर्लोचनानि ॥ ६ ॥ ekasthānākramaṇavivṛtā kha(tākha)rvavairābhimarṣaṃ darśaṃ darśaṃ tripuramasuraiḥ sārdhamanyaiḥ samanyau | bharge sābhyarthanamiva muhustatra sambhūya bhūyo devāḥ sevāvanataśirasaścikṣipurlocanāni || 6 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नृत्यद्वक्रभ्रुकुटिघटिताटोपलालाटनेत्र-स्पर्धाबन्धप्रणयि धनुषः कुञ्चितस्याञ्चनेन । दैत्यग्लानत्रिजगदगदङ्कारचारित्रसीमा सोऽरातिभ्यः समधित ततो हव्यभुङ्मित्रमस्त्रम् ॥ ७ ॥ nṛtyadvakrabhrukuṭighaṭitāṭopalālāṭanetra-spardhābandhapraṇayi dhanuṣaḥ kuñcitasyāñcanena | daityaglānatrijagadagadaṅkāracāritrasīmā so'rātibhyaḥ samadhita tato havyabhuṅmitramastram || 7 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वैरिद्वेषादपि परिणतिं गृह्णता बाणतायां कृष्णेनाविष्कृत इव हठाद्विभ्रमः स्वप्रभाणाम् । अस्त्रप्रोतप्रबलहुतभुङ्निर्जिहानोग्रधूम- स्तोमोऽपुष्णादसुरसुदृशामश्रुणः पूर्वरङ्गम् ॥ ८ ॥ vairidveṣādapi pariṇatiṃ gṛhṇatā bāṇatāyāṃ kṛṣṇenāviṣkṛta iva haṭhādvibhramaḥ svaprabhāṇām | astraprotaprabalahutabhuṅnirjihānogradhūma-stomo'puṣṇādasurasudṛśāmaśruṇaḥ pūrvaraṅgam || 8 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
व्यञ्जन्कौतूहलबहुलतामाशये खेचराणां यो लक्ष्यत्वं युधि विवृतवान्बाणपक्षं लुलाव । बाणत्वं स त्रिभुवनगुरोरावहञ्शार्ङ्गधन्वा तन्वा सार्धं श्रियमपि हठाद्दग्धुमैच्छत्पुराणाम् ॥ ९ ॥ vyañjankautūhalabahulatāmāśaye khecarāṇāṃ yo lakṣyatvaṃ yudhi vivṛtavānbāṇapakṣaṃ lulāva | bāṇatvaṃ sa tribhuvanagurorāvahañśārṅgadhanvā tanvā sārdhaṃ śriyamapi haṭhāddagdhumaicchatpurāṇām || 9 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
येनोदस्तो नभसि स बलेर्मन्दिराणि प्रवेष्टुं लक्ष्म्या मन्येऽनघपरिघतामाययौ दण्डपादः । बाणीकृत्य त्रिपुररिपुणा मुच्यमानोऽतिदूरं स त्रैलोक्याक्रमणचणतां भूय एव प्रपेदे ॥ १० ॥ yenodasto nabhasi sa balermandirāṇi praveṣṭuṃ lakṣmyā manye'naghaparighatāmāyayau daṇḍapādaḥ | bāṇīkṛtya tripuraripuṇā mucyamāno'tidūraṃ sa trailokyākramaṇacaṇatāṃ bhūya eva prapede || 10 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निर्मुक्तायाः सपवनजवं व्योम्नि भर्गेण हेते-रेकस्या अप्यहह कति नो हेतयस्ताः प्रसस्रुः । याः प्रत्यङ्गं विहितवलनाः प्रेतराजार्प्यमाण-प्रेङ्खज्जिह्वापटलपटुतामालिलिङ्गुः पुराणाम् ॥ ११ ॥ nirmuktāyāḥ sapavanajavaṃ vyomni bhargeṇa hete-rekasyā apyahaha kati no hetayastāḥ prasasruḥ | yāḥ pratyaṅgaṃ vihitavalanāḥ pretarājārpyamāṇa-preṅkhajjihvāpaṭalapaṭutāmāliliṅguḥ purāṇām || 11 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
