तापं बिभ्रत्यसमविशिखासङ्गतो वेपमानै-रङ्गै रागव्यतिकरमयीमादधानेव दृष्टिम् । ज्वालैकैका दितिसुतपतीन्दूरमुक्ताम्बरश्री-रालिङ्गन्ती चतुरमकरोदाकुलान्मोहनेन ॥ १२ ॥ tāpaṃ bibhratyasamaviśikhāsaṅgato vepamānai-raṅgai rāgavyatikaramayīmādadhāneva dṛṣṭim | jvālaikaikā ditisutapatīndūramuktāmbaraśrī-rāliṅgantī caturamakarodākulānmohanena || 12 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नेतुं दैत्योत्करमचरमन्यादतामाददानः पूर्वं प्राणाहुतिमतनुतत्सुन्दरीनेत्रनीरैः । चण्डीभर्तुः स विशिखशिखी ज्वालजिह्वाजटालो विष्वग्विश्वग्रसनरसिकाहङ्कृतित्वं प्रपेदे ॥ १३ ॥ netuṃ daityotkaramacaramanyādatāmādadānaḥ pūrvaṃ prāṇāhutimatanutatsundarīnetranīraiḥ | caṇḍībhartuḥ sa viśikhaśikhī jvālajihvājaṭālo viṣvagviśvagrasanarasikāhaṅkṛtitvaṃ prapede || 13 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ज्वालादण्डाः पुरपरिभवारम्भसंरम्भयोगे लोलाः कोलाहलितककुभि व्योम्नि भर्गास्त्रवह्नेः । नव्योत्साहोत्सवबृहदुपक्रान्तनृत्तक्रियाया रेजुर्व्यक्ता इव सुबहवो बाहवो विश्वलक्ष्म्याः ॥ १४ ॥ jvālādaṇḍāḥ puraparibhavārambhasaṃrambhayoge lolāḥ kolāhalitakakubhi vyomni bhargāstravahneḥ | navyotsāhotsavabṛhadupakrāntanṛttakriyāyā rejurvyaktā iva subahavo bāhavo viśvalakṣmyāḥ || 14 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तत्तन्नानारसशबलिताशेषविश्वोपसर्ग-क्रीडानाम्नि प्रकरणविधावात्तनिर्वाहसीम्नि । स प्राविक्षद्द्रुततरमथालङ्घ्यदैर्घ्याशुगाग्नि-ज्वालाजालान्तरजवनिकां दैत्यशैलूषलोकः ॥ १५ ॥ tattannānārasaśabalitāśeṣaviśvopasarga-krīḍānāmni prakaraṇavidhāvāttanirvāhasīmni | sa prāvikṣaddrutataramathālalaṅghyadairghyāśugāgni-jvālājālāntarajavanikāṃ daityaśailūṣalokaḥ || 15 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तेषामङ्गे मरकतमणिप्रोतसत्पद्मराग-स्वर्णक्रीडाभरणसचिवे दानवाधीश्वराणाम् । धूमस्तोमाकुलितविकसद्विस्फुलिङ्गात्तसङ्ग-श्रीकण्ठास्त्रानलमुखशिखा नो मुहुर्व्यक्तिमूहुः ॥ १६ ॥ teṣāmaṅge marakatamaṇiprotasatpadmarāga-svarṇakrīḍābharaṇasacive dānavādhīśvarāṇām | dhūmastomākulitavikasadvisphuliṅgāttasaṅga-śrīkaṇṭhāstrānalamukhaśikhā no muhurvyaktimūhuḥ || 16 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
घोरक्रूराकृतिविकृततां किं जगत्कण्टकाना-मन्यत्तेषामखिलदिविषद्वैरिणां वर्णयामः । येषामग्रे हठजय(व​)वलत्कीलजालस्य मन्ये बाणाग्नेरप्यजनि सहसोत्कम्पसम्पद्भयेन ॥ १७ ॥ ghorakrūrākṛtivikṛtatāṃ kiṃ jagatkaṇṭakānā-manyatteṣāmakhiladiviṣadvairiṇāṃ varṇayāmaḥ | yeṣāmagre haṭhajaya(va)valatkīlajālasya manye bāṇāgnerapyajani sahasotkampasampadbhayena || 17 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सन्नद्धानामपि परिकरं रत्नमन्त्रौषधीनां मोघीकृत्य त्रिनयनशराग्रेसरो जातवेदाः । गात्रं गात्रं घुसदसुहृदां निर्दहन्नट्टहासं व्यानञ्जेव प्रकटितटसत्कारनादैस्तदस्थ्नाम् ॥ १८ ॥ sannaddhānāmapi parikaraṃ ratnamantrauṣadhīnāṃ moghīkṛtya trinayanaśarāgresaro jātavedāḥ | gātraṃ gātraṃ ghusadasuhṛdāṃ nirdahannaṭṭahāsaṃ vyānañjeva prakaṭitaṭasatkāranādaistadasthnām || 18 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विश्वं बाष्पं व्यसृजदसकृद्यद्ध्वजे व्योमभाजि स्पष्टीचक्रुः समिदुपचिताः कस्य ये नोपतापम् । सोदर्यत्वादिव धृतघनस्नेहयोगः स तेषां चक्रेऽङ्गेऽङ्गे शरहुतवहो गाढमालिङ्गनानि ॥ १९ ॥ viśvaṃ bāṣpaṃ vyasṛjadasakṛdyaddhvaje vyomabhāji spaṣṭīcakruḥ samidupacitāḥ kasya ye nopatāpam | sodaryatvādiva dhṛtaghanasnehayogaḥ sa teṣāṃ cakre'ṅge'ṅge śarahutavaho gāḍhamāliṅganāni || 19 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
व्योमोत्सङ्गं गिरिशविशिखोल्लिख्यमानाग्निशृङ्ग-ष्ठ्यूताः स्यूता दिशि दिशि तदा प्राक्प्यधुर्धूमलेखाः । पश्चादासन्नसुरसुदृशामश्रुणे मुच्यमान-स्वर्बन्दिस्त्रीचरणनिबिडायोमहाशृङ्खलौघाः ॥ २० ॥ vyomotsaṅgaṃ giriśaviśikhollikhyamānāgniśṛṅga-ṣṭhyūtāḥ syūtā diśi diśi tadā prākpyadhurdhūmalekhāḥ | paścādāsannasurasudṛśāmaśruṇe mucyamāna-svarbandistrīcaraṇanibiḍāyomahāśṛṅkhalaughāḥ || 20 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सेनाधूलीतमसि नभसि व्याप्तिपर्याप्तिभाजि भ्राजिष्णुत्वं भजति च गणे सर्वतः खेचराणाम् । तेषां शूरस्थितिमजहतां प्रस्खलन्मण्डलाग्र-च्छाये तस्मिन्महति सहसा धाम वह्नौ ममज्ज ॥ २१ ॥ senādhūlītamasi nabhasi vyāptiparyāptibhāji bhrājiṣṇutvaṃ bhajati ca gaṇe sarvataḥ khecarāṇām | teṣāṃ śūrasthitimajahatāṃ praskhalanmaṇḍalāgra-cchāye tasminmahati sahasā dhāma vahnau mamajja || 21 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
बन्दीभूतत्रिदिववनिताकोष्णनिःश्वाससङ्ग-म्लायद्बालव्यजनपवनाभ्यस्तशीतातपानाम् । ईशानास्त्रज्वलनघटनाद्व्यानशे दानवानां चित्रं तेषां प्रमयसमयेऽप्यङ्गमङ्गं प्रतापः ॥ २२ ॥ bandībhūtatridivavanitākoṣṇaniḥśvāsasaṅga-mlāyadbālavyajanapavanābhyastaśītātapānām | īśānāstrajvalanaghaṭanādvyānaśe dānavānāṃ citraṃ teṣāṃ pramayasamaye'pyaṅgamaṅgaṃ pratāpaḥ || 22 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
हित्वा तेषां घनमपघनं संसरच्छङ्करास्त्र-प्रान्तप्रोतानलसदवथुं विश्वसाम्राज्यलक्ष्मीः । स्वैरं भेजे सुचिरशिशिरोदञ्चदानन्दबाष्प-स्रोतःसिक्तं पुनरपि सुराधीश्वरस्याङ्गसङ्गम् ॥ २३ ॥ hitvā teṣāṃ ghanamapaghanaṃ saṃsaracchaṅkarāstra-prāntaprotānalasadavathuṃ viśvasāmrājyalakṣmīḥ | svairaṃ bheje suciraśiśirodañcadānandabāṣpa-srotaḥsiktaṃ punarapi surādhīśvarasyāṅgasaṅgam || 23 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नृत्यत्कीलापटलजटिला व्याप्नुवन्तः समन्ता-दुर्वीमभ्रंलिहलहरिभिर्भस्मशेषैः शरीरैः । तत्तदीप्तौषधितिलकितोत्सङ्गकैलासभूभृ-च्छृङ्गश्रेणीस्मरणसरणिं तेऽपुषञ्शङ्करस्य ॥ २४ ॥ nṛtyatkīlāpaṭalajaṭilā vyāpnuvantaḥ samantā-durvīmabhraṃlihalaharibhirbhasmaśeṣaiḥ śarīraiḥ | tattadīptauṣadhitilakitotsaṅgakailāsabhūbhṛ-cchṛṅgaśreṇīsmaraṇasaraṇiṃ te'puṣañśaṅkarasya || 24 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भिन्नं भिन्नं निशितविशिखज्योतिषा प्रज्वलन्तो दैत्येन्द्रास्ते समरवसुधावेदिसीम्नि त्रयोऽपि । त्रैलोक्यापत्प्रशमनमये सप्ततन्तावपर्णा-भर्तुर्जग्मुः सदजिनतनोरग्रतो वह्निकृत्यम् ॥ २५ ॥ bhinnaṃ bhinnaṃ niśitaviśikhajyotiṣā prajvalanto daityendrāste samaravasudhāvedisīmni trayo'pi | trailokyāpatpraśamanamaye saptatantāvaparṇā-bharturjagmuḥ sadajinatanoragrato vahnikṛtyam || 25 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उद्यद्दानह्रद इव वलद्धूमदण्डच्छटाभि-र्दूरं मुञ्चन्वमथुकणिका दिङ्मुखेषु स्फुलिङ्गैः । सिन्दूराभासखमुखतया सोऽस्त्रभूर्वीतिहोत्रो भङ्गं दन्तावल इव पुरश्रीनलिन्याश्चकार ॥ २६ ॥ udyaddānahrada iva valaddhūmadaṇḍacchaṭābhi-rdūraṃ muñcanvamathukaṇikā diṅmukheṣu sphuliṅgaiḥ | sindūrābhāsakhamukhatayā so'strabhūrvītihotro bhaṅgaṃ dantāvala iva puraśrīnalinyāścakāra || 26 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तेषां दैर्ध्यप्रसरसुहृदो रेजिरे सिन्दुवार-श्वेतोदस्तानलमलरजोराशयस्ते त्रयाणाम् । यैः कृष्णोरःस्थलतललिपिन्यन्तरिक्षे शिशिक्षे निर्विक्षेपैरुपनतनवब्रह्मसूत्रप्रतिष्ठा ॥ २७ ॥ teṣāṃ dairdhyaprasarasuhṛdo rejire sinduvāra-śvetodastānalamalarajorāśayaste trayāṇām | yaiḥ kṛṣṇoraḥsthalatalalipinyantarikṣe śiśikṣe nirvikṣepairupanatanavabrahmasūtrapratiṣṭhā || 27 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भस्मस्मेरोऽसितफणिनिभाविर्भवद्धूमदण्डो व्यञ्जन्सान्द्राञ्जनजवनिकाविभ्रमात्कालकूटम् । लालाटाक्षिद्युतिभृदुपरि प्रोतकीलाकलापः शम्भोरेवानुकृतिमकरोत्सायकाग्निः क्रमेण ॥ २८ ॥ bhasmasmero'sitaphaṇinibhāvirbhavaddhūmadaṇḍo vyañjansāndrāñjanajavanikāvibhramātkālakūṭam | lālāṭākṣidyutibhṛdupari protakīlākalāpaḥ śambhorevānukṛtimakarotsāyakāgniḥ krameṇa || 28 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पक्वानामप्यनवधिमता स्वप्रतापानलेन स्वर्गारीणां बतबत वपुर्दुर्जरं मेदुराणाम् । बिभ्रद्दीप्तां रुचिमपि मुहुर्यन्निगीर्यैव शुष्मा धूमोद्गारान्कटुककटुकान्भोगिराजः(?काभोगभाजः) ससर्ज ॥ २९ ॥ pakvānāmapyanavadhimatā svapratāpānalena svargārīṇāṃ batabata vapurdurjaraṃ medurāṇām | bibhraddīptāṃ rucimapi muhuryannigīryaiva śuṣmā dhūmodgārānkaṭukakaṭukānbhogirājaḥ(?kābhogabhājaḥ) sasarja || 29 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
त्रैलोक्योपप्लवशममयोत्साहमाहात्म्यभाजां सर्वाशानां विवृतहसितोल्लासभङ्गिर्मुखेषु । तेषामङ्गाज्जवनपवनाडम्बरैः कीर्यमाणो भस्मस्तोमस्तरुणतगरोद्गारबन्धुर्ववल्ग ॥ ३० ॥ trailokyopaplavaśamamayotsāhamāhātmyabhājāṃ sarvāśānāṃ vivṛtahasitollāsabhaṅgirmukheṣu | teṣāmaṅgājjavanapavanāḍambaraiḥ kīryamāṇo bhasmastomastaruṇatagarodgārabandhurvavalga || 30 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भङ्गिर्लेभे चतुरमरुता दिक्षु विस्तार्यमाणै-र्गीर्वाणारिप्रवरवपुषामुन्मिषद्भूतिलेशैः । तत्तत्कल्लोलितचरजगद्विप्लवातङ्कशङ्का-सङ्कोचोत्कत्रिभुवनगुरुक्षिप्यमाणाक्षतानाम् ॥ ३१ ॥ bhaṅgirlebhe caturamarutā dikṣu vistāryamāṇai-gīrvāṇāripravaravapuṣāmunmiṣadbhūtileśaiḥ | tattatkallolitacarajagadviplavātaṅkaśaṅkā-saṅkocotkatribhuvanagurukṣipyamāṇākṣatānām || 31 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
फेनोण्डूकप्रकरकरणिं व्योमसिन्धौ बबन्ध व्यानञ्जाङ्गे त्रिदिवकरिणां किं च शृङ्गारभङ्गिम् । दैत्येन्द्राङ्गानलमलरजोडम्बरोऽशेषदिक्षु क्षिप्तो दृप्तप्रसृमरमरुच्चक्रवालक्रमेण ॥ ३२ ॥ phenoṇḍūkaprakarakaraṇiṃ vyomasindhau babandha vyānañjāṅge tridivakariṇāṃ kiṃ ca śṛṅgārabhaṅgim | daityendrāṅgānalamalarajoḍambaro'śeṣadikṣu kṣipto dṛptaprasṛmaramaruccakravālakrameṇa || 32 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इत्थं सिद्धे दितिजविजये पत्रिणा शैलपुत्री-भर्तुर्निवर्तितजगदभिप्रायपूर्तिक्रमेण । भूयो भूयः प्रमदमदिरापानगोष्ठीगरिष्ठ-क्षैब्यक्षुण्णा इव दिविषदोऽनर्गलं ते ववल्गुः ॥ ३३ ॥ itthaṃ siddhe ditijavijaye patriṇā śailaputrī-bharturnivartitajagadabhiprāyapūrtikrameṇa | bhūyo bhūyaḥ pramadamadirāpānagoṣṭhīgariṣṭha-kṣaibyakṣuṇṇā iva diviṣado'nargalaṃ te vavalguḥ || 33 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निष्कृष्टायाः श्रिय इव गृहाम्भोजसौगन्ध्यलुभ्य-द्भृङ्गश्रेणीः पदनददयःशृङ्खलाः प्रेङ्खयन्त्यः । ता निर्जग्मुस्तदनु दनुजाधीश्वराणां गृहेभ्यो हेलाखेलाः प्रमदपदवीवीजनान्नाकिवन्द्यः ॥ ३४ ॥ niṣkṛṣṭāyāḥ śriya iva gṛhāmbhojasaugandhyalubhya-dbhṛṅgaśreṇīḥ padanadadayaḥśṛṅkhalāḥ preṅkhayantyaḥ | tā nirjagmustadanu danujādhīśvarāṇāṃ gṛhebhyo helākhelāḥ pramadapadavīvījanānnākivandyaḥ || 34 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दैत्यध्वंसोड्डमरितमृडोपक्रियोपक्रमात्ता हित्वा तास्ताः प्रकृतिविकृतीरुद्धतः साध्यसिद्धेः । आज्ञाविश्राणनचटुलितभ्रूलते शूलपाणौ भूयोऽप्यापन्निजनिजवपुःसौहृदं नाकिलोकः ॥ ३५ ॥ daityadhvaṃsoḍḍamaritamṛḍopakriyopakramāttā hitvā tāstāḥ prakṛtivikṛtīruddhataḥ sādhyasiddheḥ | ājñāviśrāṇanacaṭulitabhrūlate śūlapāṇau bhūyo'pyāpannijanijavapuḥsauhṛdaṃ nākilokaḥ || 35 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रत्यक्सिन्धौ स्मरजिदिषुणा क्षिप्यमाणः प्रदीप्तै-रङ्गैर्ज्वालापटलघटनादादितेयारिलोकः । स्वर्नाथास्त्रप्रहरणभयोद्भ्रान्तदावाग्मिमग्न-क्ष्माभृद्वर्गः स्मरणसरणिं कस्य चेतो न निन्ये ॥ ३६ ॥ pratyaksindhau smarajidiṣuṇā kṣipyamāṇaḥ pradīptai-raṅgairjvālāpaṭalaghaṭanādāditeyārilokaḥ | svarnāthāstrapraharaṇabhayodbhrāntadāvāgmimagna-kṣmābhṛdvargaḥ smaraṇasaraṇiṃ kasya ceto na ninye || 36 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नीत्वा तापं त्रिजगदसकृद्दुःसहैर्मण्डलाग्रै-रस्तं यान्तः पयसि जलधेस्ते त्रयस्तत्र शूराः । विश्वस्मिन्नप्यहह महसा बोधितानल्पद्मं प्रादुश्चक्रुर्निरुपधि हठव्यञ्जिताशं प्रकाशम् ॥ ३७ ॥ nītvā tāpaṃ trijagadasakṛdduḥsahairmaṇḍalāgrai-rastaṃ yāntaḥ payasi jaladheste trayastatra śūrāḥ | viśvasminnapyahaha mahasā bodhitānalpadmaṃ prāduścakrurnirupadhi haṭhavyañjitāśaṃ prakāśam || 37 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
देवः सोऽथ त्रिभुवनगुरुर्वैकृतं घोरघोरं तत्सञ्जह्रे त्रिजगदगदङ्कारचारित्रमुद्रः । सन्तो नैसर्गिकमधुरिमोपोढवार्तामु(र्ता मु)हूर्तं नन्वाहार्यां खलनिकृतये विक्रियामाद्रियन्ते ॥ ३८ ॥ devaḥ so'tha tribhuvanaguruḥ kṛtaṃ ghoraghoraṃ tatsañjahre trijagadagadaṅkāracāritramudraḥ | santo naisargikamadhurimopoḍhavārtāmu(rtā mu)hūrtaṃ nanvāhāryāṃ khalanikṛtaye vikriyāmādriyante || 38 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गीर्वाणानां तदनु पृतना सा प्रहर्षान्तरङ्गै-रङ्गैरुद्यद्विपुलपुलकोपस्क्रियामावहन्ती । मध्येकृत्य त्रिनयनमभिव्यक्तभक्तिप्रसक्ति द्यामास्क​न्द्य स्वसदनधिया भूय एव प्रतस्थे ॥ ३९ ॥ gīrvāṇānāṃ tadanu pṛtanā sā praharṣāntaraṅgai-raṅgairudyadvipulapulakopaskriyāmāvahantī | madhyekṛtya trinayanamabhivyaktabhaktiprasakti dyāmāskandya svasadanadhiyā bhūya eva pratasthe || 39 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नृत्यन्निर्मुद्ररुद्राशुगशिखिनिशितज्वालजालावलेह-क्षुभ्यद्दुर्वारदृप्तत्रिपुरपरिचयेनेव सङ्क्रान्ततान्तिम् । सर्वे निर्वापयन्तो निजनिजकरिणामुन्मिषद्दाननीरैः प्रत्यावृत्तां द्युलक्ष्मीं पिदधुरनवधि व्योममुद्रां सुरेन्द्राः ॥ ४० ॥ nṛtyannirmudrarudrāśugaśikhiniśitajvālajālāvaleha-kṣubhyaddurvāradṛptatripuraparicayeneva saṅkrāntatāntim | sarve nirvāpayanto nijanijakariṇāmunmiṣaddānanīraiḥ pratyāvṛttāṃ dyulakṣmīṃ pidadhuranavadhi vyomamudrāṃ surendrāḥ || 40 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सुरपरिवृढो रूढप्रीति क्रमेण तथा दधौ वदनमुदयद्रागोत्फुल्लन्नवाब्जमुखद्युति । सुचिरविरहौत्सुक्याधिक्याविलम्बितचुम्बन-व्यवसितनिजस्त्रीबिम्बोष्ठप्रभाभिरिवाञ्चितम् ॥ ४१ ॥ suraparivṛḍho rūḍhaprīti krameṇa tathā dadhau vadanamudayadrāgotphullannavābjamukhadyuti | suciravirahautsukyādhikyāvilambitacumbana-vyavasitanijastrībimboṣṭhaprabhābhirivāñcitam || 41 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
धातुर्विष्टरपङ्कजे पुनरपि प्रक्रान्तगन्धोद्धतौ निःष्प(स्य)न्दे मदविप्रुषां च वदनादुद्वाति विघ्नद्विषः । भृङ्गाणां सुरकाननान्तरलतावैतालिकानामभू-त्तत्सौरभ्यरसान्तरं तुलयतां दोलाधिरूढं मनः ॥ ४२ ॥ dhāturviṣṭarapaṅkaje punarapi prakrāntagandhoddhatau niḥṣpa(sya)nde madavipruṣāṃ ca vadanādudvāti vighnadviṣaḥ | bhṛṅgāṇāṃ surakānanāntaralatāvaitālikānāmabhū-ttatsaurabhyarasāntaraṃ tulayatāṃ dolādhirūḍhaṃ manaḥ || 42 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तां सेनाममृतान्धसामुपगतामासूच्य लोकत्रय-प्रोतप्रीति बृहत्प्रतीति दितिजव्यापन्मयीं प्रक्रियाम् । शैलः केलिनिकेतनं भगवतो देवस्य खट्वाङ्गिनो मन्येऽनर्गलमालिलिङ्ग मणिमद्वप्रांशुभिः प्रांशुभिः ॥ ४३ ॥ tāṃ senāmamṛtāndhasāmupagatāmāsūcya lokatraya-protaprīti bṛhatpratīti ditijavyāpanmayīṃ prakriyām | śailaḥ keliniketanaṃ bhagavato devasya khaṭvāṅgino manye'nargalamāliliṅga maṇimadvaprāṃśubhiḥ prāṃśubhiḥ || 43 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निःसङ्ख्यामर्त्यमङ्खस्तुतिवचनरसास्वादनासादनोद्य-द्रोमाञ्चाध्यासिताङ्गः प्रभुरथ स सदः स्वं सहेलं पुनानः । दूरन्यञ्चकिरीटाञ्चलमणिमकरीघृष्टरत्नाङ्घ्रिपीठा-ञ्श्रीकण्ठः प्रत्यमुञ्चत्प्रणयरसजुषा चक्षुषा नाकिलोकान् ॥ ४४ ॥ niḥsaṅkhyāmartyamaṅkhastutivacanarasāsvādanāsādanodya-dromāñcādhyāsitāṅgaḥ prabhuratha sa sadaḥ svaṃ sahelaṃ punānaḥ | dūranyañcakirīṭāñcalamaṇimakarīghṛṣṭaratnāṅghripīṭhā-ñśrīkaṇṭhaḥ pratyamuñcatpraṇayarasajuṣā cakṣuṣā nākilokān || 44 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति श्रीजोनराजकृतया टीकया समेतः श्रीराजानकविश्ववर्तसूनोर्महाकविराजराजानकश्रीमङ्खकस्य कृतौ श्रीकण्ठचरिते महाकाव्ये त्रिपुरदाहवर्णनं नाम चतुर्विंशः सर्गः ॥ पञ्चविंशः सर्गः ॥ इति स श्रवणोत्तंसं मांसलं भक्तिविभ्रमैः । जगन्नाथस्य जग्रन्थ मङ्खकः सूक्तिलीलया ॥ १ ॥ iti sa śravaṇottaṃsaṃ māṃsalaṃ । bhaktivibhramaiḥ jagannāthasya jagrantha maṅkhakaḥ sūktilīlayā || 1 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तिग्मानलदृशः खण्डपरशोः प्रणयग्रहात् । तस्य सूक्तिलता व्यक्तं बत साफल्यमग्रहीत् ॥ २ ॥ tigmānaladṛśaḥ khaṇḍaparaśoḥ praṇayagrahāt | tasya sūktilatā vyaktaṃ bata sāphalyamagrahīt || 2 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्वयं मौलीन्दुपीयूषपूरैः सिक्तेव शम्भुना । सरसत्वं च दार्ढ्यं च वाक्तस्याव्यग्रमग्रहीत् ॥ ३ ॥ svayaṃ maulīndupīyūṣapūraiḥ sikteva śambhunā | sarasatvaṃ ca dārḍhyaṃ ca vāktasyāvyagramagrahīt || 3 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रबन्धेन जगद्वन्धुमुपश्लोक्य पिनाकिनम् । आक्रान्तानन्तसन्तोष इति सोऽन्तरचिन्तयत् ॥ ४ ॥ prabandhena jagadvandhumupaślokya pinākinam | ākrāntānantasantoṣa iti so'ntaracintayat || 4 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अहो धन्योऽस्मि यस्येयं स्वच्छन्दापि सरस्वती । विना श्रीकण्ठमन्यत्र नाचरच्चाटुकारिताम् ॥ ५ ॥ aho dhanyo'smi yasyeyaṃ svacchandāpi sarasvatī | vinā śrīkaṇṭhamanyatra nācaraccāṭukāritām || 5 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
महत्कष्टमहो हित्वा यच्छर्वं सर्वतः श्रुतिम्(सर्वतःश्रुतिम्) । गर्वानवधिबाधिर्यो नरेण स्तूयते नरः ॥ ६ ॥ mahatkaṣṭamaho hitvā yaccharvaṃ sarvataḥ śrutim(sarvataḥśrutim) | garvānavadhibādhiryo nareṇa stūyate naraḥ || 6 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मानुष्यजन्म वैदुष्यं विवेकः काव्यचातुरी। श्रीकण्ठे चाटुकारित्वमहो पुण्यपरम्परा ॥ ७ ॥ mānuṣyajanma vaiduṣyaṃ vivekaḥ kāvyacāturī| śrīkaṇṭhe cāṭukāritvamaho puṇyaparamparā || 7 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
धिक्तान्कृतप्लुतिर्येषां भारत्यधिसरस्वति । स्वं दूषयति मत्तेव नृपचाटुकपांसुभिः ॥ ८ ॥ dhiktānkṛtaplutiryeṣāṃ bhāratyadhisarasvati | svaṃ dūṣayati matteva nṛpacāṭukapāṃsubhiḥ || 8 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दृष्टिः सारस्वती भूरिरजोभिरिह पार्थिवैः । वशंवदीकृता सत्यं कवेः कालुष्यमश्नुते ॥ ९ ॥ dṛṣṭiḥ sārasvatī bhūrirajobhiriha pārthivaiḥ | vaśaṃvadīkṛtā satyaṃ kaveḥ kāluṣyamaśnute || 9 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
किं वान्यद्गुणनद्धापि बद्धापि रसवर्त्मनि । रहिता कर्णधारेण सूक्तिर्नौरिव​ सीदति ॥ १० ॥ kiṃ vānyadguṇanaddhāpi baddhāpi rasavartmani | rahitā karṇadhāreṇa sūktirnauriva sīdati || 10 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चामीकरस्य सौरभ्यमम्लानिर्मालतीस्रनाम् । श्रोतुर्निर्मत्सरत्वं च निर्माणागोचरं विधेः ॥ ११ ॥ cāmīkarasya saurabhyamamlānirmālatīsranām | śroturnirmatsaratvaṃ ca nirmāṇāgocaraṃ vidheḥ || 11 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यत्किमप्यस्ति मूर्खाणाममात्सर्यं तु सूक्तिषु । तत्वोपयोगि सौन्दर्य षण्ढस्येव पुरन्ध्रिषु ॥ १२ ॥ yatkimapyasti mūrkhāṇāmamātsaryaṃ tu sūktiṣu | tatvopayogi saundarya ṣaṇḍhasyeva purandhriṣu || 12 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विमत्सरश्च विद्वांश्च श्रोता चेद्घ​टते गिराम् । स्यन्दते तर्हि वाग्वल्ली रसं पर्वणि पर्वणि ॥ १३ ॥ vimatsaraśca vidvāṃśca śrotā cedghaṭate girām | syandate tarhi vāgvallī rasaṃ parvaṇi parvaṇi || 13 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सन्तश्च तादृशाः सन्ति गणिताः सूक्तिभेषजम् । भूषणं यैः स्ववैदुष्यात्सौजन्येन वितन्यते ॥ १४ ॥ santaśca tādṛśāḥ santi gaṇitāḥ sūktibheṣajam | bhūṣaṇaṃ yaiḥ svavaiduṣyātsaujanyena vitanyate || 14 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मदग्रजन्मनः श्रीमल्लङ्ककस्य सभागृहम् । तेऽध्यासते च विस्रब्धाः सारसा इव मानसम् ॥ १५ ॥ madagrajanmanaḥ śrīmallaṅkakasya sabhāgṛham | te'dhyāsate ca visrabdhāḥ sārasā iva mānasam || 15 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ततः साफल्यदीक्षायै स्वपरिश्रमविपुषाम् । तदेवास्य प्रबन्धस्य नेष्यामि निकषाश्मताम् ॥ १६ ॥ tataḥ sāphalyadīkṣāyai svapariśramavipuṣām | tadevāsya prabandhasya neṣyāmi nikaṣāśmatām || 16 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पण्डितैर्मण्डलीबन्धाद्विभ्रद्भिरसमं रसम् । दृब्धालवालवलयं वाग्देवीसुरवीरुधः ॥ १७ ॥ paṇḍitairmaṇḍalībandhādvibhradbhirasamaṃ rasam | dṛbdhālavālavalayaṃ vāgdevīsuravīrudhaḥ || 17 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति सञ्चिन्त्य सन्तोषदन्तुरेण स चेतसा । तदथाविशदास्थानं कृतार्थस्याग्रजन्मनः ॥ १८ ॥ (युग्मम्) iti sañcintya santoṣadantureṇa sa cetasā | tadathāviśadāsthānaṃ kṛtārthasyāgrajanmanaḥ || 18 || (yugmam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्रीवाहकरटिक्षुण्णवर्णकम्बलरुड्मुषि । कुथे निवेशितपदं धुरीवाखिलमन्त्रिणाम् ॥ १९ ॥ śrīvāhakaraṭikṣuṇṇavarṇakambalaruḍmuṣi | kuthe niveśitapadaṃ dhurīvākhilamantriṇām || 19 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ततस्तत्र शिखारत्नमप्रत्नामात्यसंहतेः । अनयन्नयनातिथ्यं पथ्यं स नयवर्त्मनि ॥ २० ॥ (युग्मम्) tatastatra śikhāratnamapratnāmātyasaṃhateḥ | anayannayanātithyaṃ pathyaṃ sa nayavartmani || 20 || (yugmam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विनयेन नमन्नग्रे शपथैरर्थितोऽसकृत् । ज्यायसोऽर्धासने तस्य स कथञ्चिदुपाविशत् ॥ २१ ॥ vinayena namannagre śapathairarthito'sakṛt | jyāyaso'rdhāsane tasya sa kathañcidupāviśat || 21 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नित्यं नृत्यद्वचोदेवीमञ्जीरोच्चरवैरिव । घटते शास्त्रचिन्तासु यस्य निद्रादरिद्रता ॥ २२ ॥ nityaṃ nṛtyadvacodevīmañjīroccaravairiva | ghaṭate śāstracintāsu yasya nidrādaridratā || 22 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
महाभूतानि पञ्चापि विरञ्चेन विमुञ्चता । योऽवैमि वाङ्मयैरेव निममे परमाणुभिः ॥ २३ ॥ mahābhūtāni pañcāpi virañcena vimuñcatā | yo'vaimi vāṅmayaireva nimame paramāṇubhiḥ || 23 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
क्व नु कानि कियत्कालमहो तेपे तपांसि यः । वैदुष्ये लग्नकान्यन्ययोगव्यावृत्तिसाक्षिणि ॥ २४ ॥ kva nu kāni kiyatkālamaho tepe tapāṃsi yaḥ | vaiduṣye lagnakānyanyayogavyāvṛttisākṣiṇi || 24 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पुनानमन्तिकं तस्य प्रथमं ब्रह्मवादिनाम् । विद्वत्सङ्क्रन्दनं तत्र स नन्दनमवन्दत ॥ २५ ॥ (चक्कलकम्) punānamantikaṃ tasya prathamaṃ brahmavādinām | vidvatsaṅkrandanaṃ tatra sa nandanamavandata || 25 || (cakkalakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
व्याख्यासु यस्य वदनं रदनांशुभिरीक्ष्यते । आकर्षदिव वाग्देव्या धौतक्षौमपटाञ्चलम् ॥ २६ ॥ vyākhyāsu yasya vadanaṃ radanāṃśubhirīkṣyate | ākarṣadiva vāgdevyā dhautakṣaumapaṭāñcalam || 26 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अर्पयन्कमपि स्पन्दं धाम्नः सारस्वतस्य भूः । य एव सर्वशास्त्राणां साकारमिव जीवितम् ॥ २७ ॥ arpayankamapi spandaṃ dhāmnaḥ sārasvatasya bhūḥ | ya eva sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ sākāramiva jīvitam || 27 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विवृतीर्यो लिखत्यात्तलेखन्येकाङ्गुलीतलः । ग्रन्थेभ्योऽर्थस्य विश्रान्त्यै सूत्रिकामर्पयन्निव ॥ २८ ॥ vivṛtīryo likhatyāttalekhanyekāṅgulītalaḥ | granthebhyo'rthasya viśrāntyai sūtrikāmarpayanniva || 28 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यत्कृतिष्ववधानेन मूर्धा कस्य न वीप्सया । सारस्वतरसावर्तवलनेनेव चेष्टते ॥ २९ ॥ yatkṛtiṣvavadhānena mūrdhā kasya na vīpsayā | sārasvatarasāvartavalaneneva ceṣṭate || 29 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तं श्रीरुय्यकमालोक्य स प्रियं गुरुमग्रहीत् । सौहार्दप्रश्रयरसस्रोतःसम्भेदमज्जनम् ॥ ३० ॥ (कुलकम्) taṃ śrīruyyakamālokya sa priyaṃ gurumagrahīt | sauhārdapraśrayarasasrotaḥsambhedamajjanam || 30 || (kulakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यस्य व्यनक्ति काषायग्रहमारक्तया रुचा। नित्योपन्याससङ्क्रान्तवेदान्तार्थ इवाधरः ॥ ३१ ॥ yasya vyanakti kāṣāyagrahamāraktayā rucā| nityopanyāsasaṅkrāntavedāntārtha ivādharaḥ || 31 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नीत्वा सफलतां वल्लीरिष्टसिद्धिं विवृण्वता । श्रुतीनां पथि शिष्येषु येन कल्पद्रुमायितम् ॥ ३२ ॥ nītvā saphalatāṃ vallīriṣṭasiddhiṃ vivṛṇvatā | śrutīnāṃ pathi śiṣyeṣu yena kalpadrumāyitam || 32 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निस्तुषीकृतवैदुष्यं स्मयमात्सर्यसंहृतेः । धृतप्रणतिपारम्यं रम्यदेवं तमैक्षत ॥ ३३ ॥ (तिलकम्) nistuṣīkṛtavaiduṣyaṃ smayamātsaryasaṃhṛteḥ | dhṛtapraṇatipāramyaṃ ramyadevaṃ tamaikṣata || 33 || (tilakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वाग्देवतालिनीलीलाधुतपक्षतिचातुरीम् । वदनाम्बुरुहे यस्य भाषाः षडधिशेरते ॥ ३४ ॥ vāgdevatālinīlīlādhutapakṣaticāturīm | vadanāmburuhe yasya bhāṣāḥ ṣaḍadhiśerate || 34 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
खलानां यत्प्रबन्धेषु दृढव्युत्पत्तिवर्मसु । प्रोद्यच्चोद्यमया दूरे कुण्ठिता इव पत्रिणः ॥ ३५ ॥ khalānāṃ yatprabandheṣu dṛḍhavyutpattivarmasu | prodyaccodyamayā dūre kuṇṭhitā iva patriṇaḥ || 35 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कतिचिल्लोष्टदेवस्य तस्येति मुखतोऽशृणोत् । श्रीलङ्ककं प्रति प्रोतचारुचाटुरसा गिरः ॥ ३६ ॥ (तिलकम्) katicilloṣṭadevasya tasyeti mukhato’śṛṇot | śrīlaṅkakaṃ prati protacārucāṭurasā giraḥ || 36 || (tilakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
गोभिः शुभ्ररसैकसूतिभिरनुस्यूतं विभो लङ्कक ज्यायःशुद्धिसखिद्विजोच्छ्वसदनिर्वेदप्रथापावनम् । सत्यायार्पयति स्म दर्शितवते निःसंश्रयत्वं कलौ वाग्देवीसहिताय तावकमुखं मन्येऽग्रहारं विधिः ॥ ३७ ॥ gobhiḥ śubhrarasaikasūtibhiranusyūtaṃ vibho laṅkaka jyāyaḥśuddhisakhidvijocchvasadanirvedaprathāpāvanam | satyāyārpayati sma darśitavate niḥsaṃśrayatvaṃ kalau vāgdevīsahitāya tāvakamukhaṃ manye'grahāraṃ vidhiḥ || 37 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तीक्ष्णा पृथुलोहमयी गुरुतरगुणनिकरसङ्ग्रहव्यग्रा । द्रढयति धर्मपटच्चरमचिरादिह लङ्ककस्य मतिः ॥ ३८ ॥ tīkṣṇā pṛthulohamayī gurutaraguṇanikarasaṅgrahavyagrā । draḍhayati dharmapaṭaccaramacirādiha laṅkakasya matiḥ || 38 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मूर्तिर्यस्य सभानुताद्भुतलिपेः पुष्णाति गाढामृत-प्रादुर्भावविसृत्वरीं परिणतिं पङ्केरुहद्रोहिणः । तस्य त्वन्मुखशीतगोः प्रणयतोऽलङ्कार वाग्देवता गल्वर्कोपलपुत्रिका गुरुपरिस्यन्दं रसं स्यन्दते ॥ ३९ ॥ mūrtiryasya sabhānutādbhutalipeḥ puṣṇāti gāḍhāmṛta-prādurbhāvavisṛtvarīṃ pariṇatiṃ paṅkeruhadrohiṇaḥ | tasya tvanmukhaśītagoḥ praṇayato'laṅkāra vāgdevatā galvarkopalaputrikā guruparisyandaṃ rasaṃ syandate || 39 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यः सामन्तशिखामणेऽत्रभवतालङ्कार नित्यं सता- मानीतोऽनवकाशतां हृदि हृताशेषाद्भुतापद्भियि । तेषां श्रोत्रविलिह्यमानगहनत्वत्सूक्तिचर्वोत्सवे राशीभूत इवाधिशीर्षमधुना कम्पः स सम्पद्यते ॥ ४० ॥ yaḥ sāmantaśikhāmaṇe'trabhavatālaṅkāra nityaṃ satā-mānīto'navakāśatāṃ hṛdi hṛtāśeṣādbhutāpadbhiyi | teṣāṃ śrotravilihyamānagahanatvatsūkticarvotsave rāśībhūta ivādhiśīrṣamadhunā kampaḥ sa sampadyate || 40 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सामन्तभद्रनयमपि भजसे पदमनुसरन्नसामान्यम् । विश्वमपापोऽहमिति श्रीलङ्कक तदपि बोधयसि ॥ ४१ ॥ sāmantabhadranayamapi bhajase padamanusarannasāmānyam | viśvamapāpo'hamiti śrīlaṅkaka tadapi bodhayasi || 41 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यापूर्वा कविगर्वहृत्पदगतिर्यस्या विपर्येति नो स्पष्टं या परपुष्टसौष्ठवहरं वाक्यक्रमं पुष्यति । सा श्रीलङ्कक मानमार्गमजहत्यप्यात्तकण्ठा हठा-द्विद्वत्ता तव चित्रमुज्झितरजाः सूते यशःसन्ततिम् ॥ ४२ ॥ yāpūrvā kavigarvahṛtpadagatiryasyā viparyeti no spaṣṭaṃ yā parapuṣṭasauṣṭhavaharaṃ vākyakramaṃ puṣyati | sā śrīlaṅkaka mānamārgamajahatyapyāttakaṇṭhā haṭhā-dvidvattā tava citramujjhitarajāḥ sūte yaśaḥsantatim || 42 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
मार्गे पदस्य पथि वाक्यकथाप्रथानां मानस्य वर्त्मनि च कन्दलिताभिषेकः । राज्ञेव मन्त्रिवर लङ्कक सूक्तिदेव्या सर्वाधिपत्यपदवीमधिरोपितोऽसि ॥ ४३ ॥ mārge padasya pathi vākyakathāprathānāṃ mānasya vartmani ca kandalitābhiṣekaḥ | rājñeva mantrivara laṅkaka sūktidevyā sarvādhipatyapadavīmadhiropito'si || 43 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्रीमल्लङ्कक यद्विशङ्कमुरगाधीशस्य हालाहल-ज्वालाडम्बरडामराद्वदनतस्तात्पर्यतो निर्ययौ । वाग्देवीकरकुम्भनिर्यदमृतोद्रिक्तेन सिक्ते महा-भाष्यं काव्यरसेन तत्तव चिरं वक्त्रेऽद्य विश्राम्यति ॥ ४४ ॥ śrīmallaṅkaka yadviśaṅkamuragādhīśasya hālāhala-jvālāḍambaraḍāmarādvadanatastātparyato niryayau | vāgdevīkarakumbhaniryadamṛtodriktena sikte mahā-bhāṣyaṃ kāvyarasena tattava ciraṃ vaktre'dya viśrāmyati || 44 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्वान्ताक्रान्तसरस्वतीगृहबृहद्राजीवनालोन्नत-श्लिष्यत्कण्टकशिक्षयेव शतशः पुष्णाति या तीक्ष्णताम् । तस्यां भिन्नसमग्रशास्त्रगहनग्रन्थ्युद्गतौ त्वद्धियि श्रीमल्लङ्कक किं कलिः किल पदं स्वप्नेऽपि दातुं क्षमः ॥ ४५ ॥ svāntākrāntasarasvatīgṛhabṛhadrājīvanālonnata-śliṣyatkaṇṭakaśikṣayeva śataśaḥ puṣṇāti yā tīkṣṇatām | tasyāṃ bhinnasamagraśāstragahanagranthyudgatau tvaddhiyi śrīmallaṅkaka kiṃ kaliḥ kila padaṃ svapne'pi dātuṃ kṣamaḥ || 45 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
बाणोपमः प्रबन्धो लङ्कक तव पत्रलब्धदूरगतिः । विध्यति कस्य न हृदयं विविधसमज्यानिवेशेन ॥ ४६ ॥ bāṇopamaḥ prabandho laṅkaka tava patralabdhadūragatiḥ | vidhyati kasya na hṛdayaṃ vividhasamajyāniveśena || 46 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आरूढाः शुभमेधसां परिचयात्तं पावकोपक्रमं श्रीमल्लङ्कक पाकमाकलयितुं व्यग्रा वचोवर्त्मनि । स्निह्यत्पात्रसहस्रपूरणभरादुन्मीलयन्तो मुदं भावत्काः प्रगुणा गुणा बहुरसाभिज्ञं जगत्कुर्वते ॥ ४७ ॥ ārūḍhāḥ śubhamedhasāṃ paricayāttaṃ pāvakopakramaṃ śrīmallaṅkaka pākamākalayituṃ vyagrā vacovartmani | snihyatpātrasahasrapūraṇabharādunmīlayanto mudaṃ bhāvatkāḥ praguṇā guṇā bahurasābhijñaṃ jagatkurvate || 47 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आक्रान्ता यस्य वक्रिम्णा दीर्घदीर्घगुणा गिरः। वाग्देवीकरवल्लक्या इव पुष्णन्ति माधुरीम् ॥ ४८ ॥ ākrāntā yasya vakrimṇā dīrghadīrghaguṇā giraḥ| vāgdevīkaravallakyā iva puṣṇanti mādhurīm || 48 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
द्विजराजेन भजता प्रभाकररुचिग्रहम् । पावकेन श्रिता येन धामत्रयमयी स्थितिः ॥ ४९ ॥ dvijarājena bhajatā prabhākararucigraham | pāvakena śritā yena dhāmatrayamayī sthitiḥ || 49 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तमदर्शदथ श्रोत्रपथसख्यस्पृशा दृशा । अदभ्रगुणसन्दर्भं श्रीगर्भं हर्षनिर्भरः ॥ ५० ॥ (तिलकम्) tamadarśadatha śrotrapathasakhyaspṛśā dṛśā | adabhraguṇasandarbhaṃ śrīgarbhaṃ harṣanirbharaḥ || 50 || (tilakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चतुर्दशापि यस्यान्तर्द्विजराजश्रितोन्नतेः । कृष्णस्य भुवनानीव विद्यास्थानानि शेरते ॥ ५१ ॥ caturdaśāpi yasyāntardvijarājaśritonnateḥ | kṛṣṇasya bhuvanānīva vidyāsthānāni śerate || 51 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्लिष्यत्कवित्वपाण्डित्यमयसन्दंशवर्त्मना । बाल्य एवोद्धृता येन मोहकर्दमतो मतिः ॥ ५२ ॥ śliṣyatkavitvapāṇḍityamayasandaṃśavartmanā | bālya evoddhṛtā yena mohakardamato matiḥ || 52 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
क्रमादजनि सौन्दर्यरसस्मेरमुखः सखा । श्रैगर्भिर्मण्डनस्तस्य पारणाय स चक्षुषोः ॥ ५३ ॥ (तिलकम्) kramādajani saundaryarasasmeramukhaḥ sakhā | śraigarbhirmaṇḍanastasya pāraṇāya sa cakṣuṣoḥ || 53 (tilakam) || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ततो न्यधित निःशेषवैदुषीकेलिसद्मनि । श्रीकण्ठे विहितोत्कण्ठे दृशं तदनुजन्मनि ॥ ५४ ॥ tato nyadhita niḥśeṣavaiduṣīkelisadmani | śrīkaṇṭhe vihitotkaṇṭhe dṛśaṃ tadanujanmani || 54 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
कृतश्रुतिसुधासेकाः सोद्रेका विविधैर्नयैः । रूढिं यद्वचसि च्छेकाः स्वच्छे कामपि बिभ्रति ॥ ५५ ॥ kṛtaśrutisudhāsekāḥ sodrekā vividhairnayaiḥ | rūḍhiṃ yadvacasi cchekāḥ svacche kāmapi bibhrati || 55 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स सन्मार्गचरो गर्गमानर्च स्थविरं चिरम् । सत्कवीनां तमग्रण्यं द्रोणं चापभृतामिव ॥ ५६ ॥ sa sanmārgacaro gargamānarca sthaviraṃ ciram | satkavīnāṃ tamagraṇyaṃ droṇaṃ cāpabhṛtāmiva || 56 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रदीपरुचिसञ्चारचारु योऽध्यास्य मन्दिरम् । झगित्येव स्वयं विष्णोस्तत्तत्त्वं परमैक्षत ॥ ५७ ॥ pradīparucisañcāracāru yo'dhyāsya mandiram | jhagityeva svayaṃ viṣṇostattattvaṃ paramaikṣata || 57 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अनिरुद्धाच्युतबलश्लाघ्यदर्पकलाञ्चिताः । एकायनस्य यस्यासंश्चातुरात्म्याञ्जिता गिरः ॥ ५८ ॥ aniruddhācyutabalaślāghyadarpakalāñcitāḥ | ekāyanasya yasyāsaṃścāturātmyāñjitā giraḥ || 58 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सुधासधर्मिभिर्द्वित्रैरिति लङ्ककचाटुभिः । अभ्यर्णं कर्णयोस्तस्य स श्रीदेवधरोऽधिनोत् ॥ ५९ ॥ sudhāsadharmibhirdvitrairiti laṅkakacāṭubhiḥ | abhyarṇaṃ karṇayostasya sa śrīdevadharo'dhinot || 59 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
त्रिभिः काण्डैराद्यः कविरमुमविध्यत्तदनु च क्षतो बाणेनायं तदपि विदधे चापलकलाम् । अलङ्कार त्वत्कैः प्रतिपदनिबद्धैर्ध्वनिलवै- रथेदानीमन्तःकरणहरिणः शाम्यति मम ॥ ६० ॥ tribhiḥ kāṇḍairādyaḥ kaviramumavidhyattadanu ca kṣato bāṇenāyaṃ tadapi vidadhe cāpalakalām | alaṅkāra tvatkaiḥ pratipadanibaddhairdhvanilavai- rathedānīmantaḥkaraṇahariṇaḥ śāmyati mama || 60 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
एकं श्रीजयसिंहपार्थिवपतिं काश्मीरमीनध्वजं तस्योपासितसन्धिविग्रहमलङ्कारं द्वितीयं स्तुमः । भूभारः प्रथमेन पन्नगपतेः क्ष्मां रक्षता वारितो नीतोऽन्येन कृतार्थतां प्रवचनैर्भाष्योपदेशश्रमः ॥ ६१ ॥ ekaṃ śrījayasiṃhapārthivapatiṃ kāśmīramīnadhvajaṃ tasyopāsitasandhivigrahamalaṅkāraṃ dvitīyaṃ stumaḥ | bhūbhāraḥ prathamena pannagapateḥ kṣmāṃ rakṣatā vārito nīto'nyena kṛtārthatāṃ pravacanairbhāṣyopadeśaśramaḥ || 61 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
बहुशः श्रवणे यस्य रुचिरुत्कर्षमीयुषी । नाम्नि पुष्यति याथार्थ्यमुद्यत्पदशतश्रियः ॥ ६२ ॥ bahuśaḥ śravaṇe yasya rucirutkarṣamīyuṣī | nāmni puṣyati yāthārthyamudyatpadaśataśriyaḥ || 62 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यस्य पाणिनिबद्धेन वररुच्यञ्चितश्रिया । व्यज्यते कङ्कणेनेव लक्षणेनादरिद्रता ॥ ६३ ॥ yasya pāṇinibaddhena vararucyañcitaśriyā | vyajyate kaṅkaṇeneva lakṣaṇenādaridratā || 63 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वयसो मध्यमत्वेऽपि गुणैरधिकवार्द्धकम् । नागं साहित्यविद्यायाः सौविदल्लं तमैक्षत ॥ ६४ ॥ vayaso madhyamatve’pi guṇairadhikavārddhakam | nāgaṃ sāhityavidyāyāḥ sauvidallaṃ tamaikṣata || 64 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
दृढोऽपि तर्ककार्कश्ये प्रगल्भः कविकर्मणि । यः श्रीतुतातितम्येव पुनर्जन्मान्तरग्रहः ॥ ६५ ॥ dṛḍho'pi tarkakārkaśye pragalbhaḥ kavikarmaṇi | yaḥ śrītutātitamyeva punarjanmāntaragrahaḥ || 65 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तं श्रीत्रैलोक्यमालोक्य गण्यं सत्कर्मिणां धुरि । ययौ मुहुरधिज्यस्य कार्मुकस्य सधर्मताम् ॥ ६६ ॥ taṃ śrītrailokyamālokya gaṇyaṃ satkarmiṇāṃ dhuri | yayau muhuradhijyasya kārmukasya sadharmatām || 66 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सर्वमानातिरिक्तेन विवृतापूर्वजन्मना । योऽधिकार्यस्थितिर्भाति नियोगेनेव चेतसा ॥ ६७ ॥ sarvamānātiriktena vivṛtāpūrvajanmanā | yo'dhikāryasthitirbhāti niyogeneva cetasā || 67 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सूक्तिभूरिगुणानर्घमश्लाघत स वीप्सया । दामोदरं तदासीददादरप्रह्वकन्धरः ॥ ६८ ॥ (युग्मम्) sūktibhūriguṇānarghamaślāghata sa vīpsayā | dāmodaraṃ tadāsīdadādaraprahvakandharaḥ || 68 || (yugmam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यः सन्ततं निसर्गेण विनयानतकन्धरः । व्यनक्त्यात्तबृहच्छास्त्रभारन्यञ्चिततामिव ॥ ६९ ॥ yaḥ santataṃ nisargeṇa vinayānatakandharaḥ | vyanaktyāttabṛhacchāstrabhāranyañcitatāmiva || 69 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पादोपसङ्ग्रहव्यग्रविवलत्पाणिपल्लवः । तं षष्ठं विबुधप्रष्ठं स सोत्कण्ठमवैक्षत ॥ ७०॥ (युग्मम्) pādopasaṅgrahavyagravivalatpāṇipallavaḥ | taṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ vibudhapraṣṭhaṃ sa sotkaṇṭhamavaikṣata || 70 || (yugmam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
व्यज्यते येन निर्मुष्टनिःशेषकलिपांसुना। भट्टप्रभाकरनयद्वयस्रोतोनदीष्णता ॥ ७१ ॥ vyajyate yena nirmuṣṭaniḥśeṣakalipāṃsunā| bhaṭṭaprabhākaranayadvayasrotonadīṣṇatā || 71 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सुवृत्तं क्रमलब्धोर्ध्वपदं परिचितं दृशोः । तं च वागीश्वरीकेलिकन्दुकं जिन्दुकं व्यधात् ॥ ७२ ॥ suvṛttaṃ kramalabdhordhvapadaṃ paricitaṃ dṛśoḥ | taṃ ca vāgīśvarīkelikandukaṃ jindukaṃ vyadhāt || 72 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पथा चरति वक्रेण वाग्यस्य चतुरैः पदैः । सरस्वत्यै विनिर्मातुमुद्यतेव प्रदक्षिणम् ॥ ७३ ॥ pathā carati vakreṇa vāgyasya caturaiḥ padaiḥ | sarasvatyai vinirmātumudyateva pradakṣiṇam || 73 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
