प्रक्रमैर्हठवक्रिम्णो मुरारिमनुधावतः । श्रीराजशेखरगिरो नीवी यस्योक्तिसम्पदाम् ॥ ७४ ॥ prakramairhaṭhavakrimṇo murārimanudhāvataḥ | śrīrājaśekharagiro nīvī yasyoktisampadām || 74 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्रीमद्राजपुरीसन्धिविग्रहस्य नियोगिनम् । अथानर्च वचोभिस्तं जह्वणं विनयाञ्चितैः ॥ ७५ ॥ śrīmadrājapurīsandhivigrahasya niyoginam | athānarca vacobhistaṃ jahvaṇaṃ vinayāñcitaiḥ || 75 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यो रञ्जयति सत्पूगरससञ्चारणोज्ज्वलैः । हा न कस्य स्वप्रबन्धोक्तिवर्णैः पर्णैरिवाननम् ॥ ७६ ॥ yo rañjayati satpūgarasasañcāraṇojjvalaiḥ | hā na kasya svaprabandhoktivarṇaiḥ parṇairivānanam || 76 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पुनानमाभिजन्येन कृत्यं पाण्डित्यपद्धतेः । निसर्गात्तमसन्दिग्धं श्रीगोविन्दमविन्दत ॥ ७७ ॥ punānamābhijanyena kṛtyaṃ pāṇḍityapaddhateḥ | nisargāttamasandigdhaṃ śrīgovindamavindata || 77 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्रीमानलकदत्तो यमनल्पं काव्यशिल्पिषु । स्वपरश्रमसर्वस्वन्याससभ्यममन्यत ॥ ७८ ॥ śrīmānalakadatto yamanalpaṃ kāvyaśilpiṣu | svaparaśramasarvasvanyāsasabhyamamanyata || 78 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तथोपचस्करे येन निजवाड्मयदर्पणः । बिह्लणप्रौढिसङ्क्रान्तौ यथा योग्यत्वमग्रहीत् ॥ ७९ ॥ tathopacaskare yena nijavāḍmayadarpaṇaḥ | bihlaṇaprauḍhisaṅkrāntau yathā yogyatvamagrahīt || 79 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तत्तद्बहुकथाकेलिपरिश्रमनिरङ्कुशम् । तं प्रश्रयप्रयत्नेन कल्याणं सममीमनत् ॥ ८० ॥ tattadbahukathākelipariśramaniraṅkuśam | taṃ praśrayaprayatnena kalyāṇaṃ samamīmanat || 80 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यावाविष्कुरुतो वक्त्रमुरुचन्दनपुण्ड्रकम् । मुद्रितं सूक्तिदेव्येव कोषं काव्यकलाश्रियः ॥ ८१ ॥ yāvāviṣkuruto vaktramurucandanapuṇḍrakam | mudritaṃ sūktidevyeva koṣaṃ kāvyakalāśriyaḥ || 81 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भुड्डश्रीवत्सनामानौ सूरी सब्रह्मचारिणौ । वाक्यैर्जितामृतस्वादैः सादरं तावभाषत ॥ ८२ ॥ bhuḍḍaśrīvatsanāmānau sūrī sabrahmacāriṇau | vākyairjitāmṛtasvādaiḥ sādaraṃ tāvabhāṣata || 82 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तीक्ष्णसारस्वतज्योतिरनुस्यूतरसात्मना । श्रुतिभ्यां लिह्यते सद्भिर्यस्योक्तिः पाकमीयुषी ॥ ८३ ॥ tīkṣṇasārasvatajyotiranusyūtarasātmanā | śrutibhyāṃ lihyate sadbhiryasyoktiḥ pākamīyuṣī || 83 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तं स तर्कमहाम्भोधिकुम्भसम्भवमार्चिचत् । श्र्यानन्दं स्निग्धदृङ्न्यासदीर्घेन्दीवरदामभिः ॥ ८४ ॥ taṃ sa tarkamahāmbhodhikumbhasambhavamārcicat | śryānandaṃ snigdhadṛṅnyāsadīrghendīvaradāmabhiḥ || 84 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उज्झिते पथि वैदर्भे कठोरपदकण्टकैः । निसर्गललिता यस्य स्वैरं चरति भारती ॥ ८५ ॥ ujjhite pathi vaidarbhe kaṭhorapadakaṇṭakaiḥ | nisargalalitā yasya svairaṃ carati bhāratī || 85 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अतूतुषन्निस्तुषया भूषितं कविविद्यया । तं पद्मराजमव्याजव्याहारविनियु(नयो)क्तिभिः ॥ ८६ ॥ (युगलकम् ) atūtuṣannistuṣayā bhūṣitaṃ kavividyayā | taṃ padmarājamavyājavyāhāraviniyu(nayo)ktibhiḥ || 86 || (yugalakam ) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भाति केशकटप्रेण यस्त्रयीधूमबभ्रुणा । उपासनार्द्रया नित्यममुक्त इव सन्ध्यया ॥ ८७ ॥ bhāti keśakaṭapreṇa yastrayīdhūmababhruṇā | upāsanārdrayā nityamamukta iva sandhyayā || 87 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अगर्हबार्हतमतन्या(प्रा)योपन्यासदेशिकम् । श्रीगुन्नमुन्नमत्प्रीति ततस्तं प्रत्यपद्यत(भाषत​) ॥ ८८ ॥ (युगलकम् ) agarhabārhatamatanyā(prā)yopanyāsadeśikam | śrīgunnamunnamatprīti tatastaṃ pratyapadyata(bhāṣata) || 88 || (yugalakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
धिन्वन्पवित्रचारित्रो विश्वामित्र इव त्रयीम् । पाठबोधावनुष्ठानसौष्ठवेन पुनाति यः ॥ ८९ ॥ dhinvanpavitracāritro viśvāmitra iva trayīm | pāṭhabodhāvanuṣṭhānasauṣṭhavena punāti yaḥ || 89 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वक्त्रटङ्को निसर्गेण व्यञ्जन्सदनुरक्तताम् । न जहात्यसुरो यस्य सामराजिस्थितिग्रहम् ॥ ९० ॥ vaktraṭaṅko nisargeṇa vyañjansadanuraktatām | na jahātyasuro yasya sāmarājisthitigraham || 90 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्वतन्त्रः शास्त्रवीथीषु प्रथमः सोमपीथिनाम् । लक्ष्मीदेवस्तमाशीर्भिः स निर्भरमवीवृधत् ॥ ९१ ॥ (तिलकम्) svatantraḥ śāstravīthīṣu prathamaḥ somapīthinām | lakṣmīdevastamāśīrbhiḥ sa nirbharamavīvṛdhat || 91 || (tilakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
व्याख्याभिख्यासु भाष्यस्य यो यागोपक्रमेषु च । इष्टीर्विवृणुते धुर्यो बुधानामिव यज्वनाम् ॥ ९२ ॥ vyākhyābhikhyāsu bhāṣyasya yo yāgopakrameṣu ca | iṣṭīrvivṛṇute dhuryo budhānāmiva yajvanām || 92 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आतन्वन्विनयाकूतं दूरनम्रेण मौलिना । ततो जनकराजेन तेन सन्तुष्य तुष्टुवे ॥ ९३ ॥ (युगलकम्) tato janakarājena tena santuṣya tuṣṭuve || 93 || (yugalakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
व्यनक्ति पृथु सामर्थ्यमाख्याया एव योऽक्षरैः । जयेऽभिनवगुप्तस्य प्रकटः प्रथमो गुरुः ॥ ९४ ॥ vyanakti pṛthu sāmarthyamākhyāyā eva yo'kṣaraiḥ | jaye'bhinavaguptasya prakaṭaḥ prathamo guruḥ || 94 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तं तत्रागमतन्त्रेषु सूचितानङ्कुशश्रमम् । ततः सङ्केतसदनं प्रागल्भ्यस्याभ्यभाषत ॥ ९५ ॥ (युगलकम्) taṃ tatrāgamatantreṣu sūcitānaṅkuśaśramam | tataḥ saṅketasadanaṃ prāgalbhyasyābhyabhāṣata || 95 || (yugalakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
येन जाड्यैकपीडाभिः पुष्णतः कम्पसम्पदम् । विवृतानन्ततापस्य विहितं लङ्घनं कलेः ॥ ९६ ॥ yena jāḍyaikapīḍābhiḥ puṣṇataḥ kampasampadam | vivṛtānantatāpasya vihitaṃ laṅghanaṃ kaleḥ || 96 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अशेषभिषगग्रण्यं शरण्यं शास्त्रपद्धतेः । ववन्देऽथ तमानन्दं सुतं शम्भुमहाकवेः ॥ ९७ ॥ (युगलकम्) aśeṣabhiṣagagraṇyaṃ śaraṇyaṃ śāstrapaddhateḥ | vavande'tha tamānandaṃ sutaṃ śambhumahākaveḥ || 97 || (yugalakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नागरप्रकृतिश्चारुबलात्मा विधृताभयः । यः प्रीणात्यातुरानङ्गेर्भेषजैकमयैरिव ॥ ९८ ॥ nāgaraprakṛtiścārubalātmā vidhṛtābhayaḥ | yaḥ prīṇātyāturānaṅgerbheṣajaikamayairiva || 98 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ततस्तदनुजन्मानमगदङ्कारपुङ्गवम् । सुहलं गाढया प्रीत्या तं पुनः पुनरैक्षत ॥ ९९ ॥ tatastadanujanmānamagadaṅkārapuṅgavam | suhalaṃ gāḍhayā prītyā taṃ punaḥ punaraikṣata || 99 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पाणिनीयातपत्रेण पवित्रं यस्य तन्मुखम् । सङ्गं स्वप्नेऽप्यवाप्नोति नापशब्दरजःकणैः ॥ १०० ॥ pāṇinīyātapatreṇa pavitraṃ yasya tanmukham | saṅgaṃ svapne'pyavāpnoti nāpaśabdarajaḥkaṇaiḥ || 100 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स्वस्येश्वरस्य यो व्यञ्जन्मण्डले मन्त्रसंस्क्रियाम् । धत्ते सदागमप्रीतिं दैशिकानां धुरि स्थितम्(तिम्) ॥ १०१ ॥ svasyeśvarasya yo vyañjanmaṇḍale mantrasaṃskriyām | dhatte sadāgamaprītiṃ daiśikānāṃ dhuri sthitam(tim) || 101 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अन्यः स सुहलस्तेन ततोऽवन्द्यत पण्डितः । दूतो गोविन्दचन्द्रस्य कान्यकुब्जस्य भूभुजः ॥ १०२ ॥ (तिलकम्) anyaḥ sa suhalastena tato’vandyata paṇḍitaḥ | dūto govindacandrasya kānyakubjasya bhūbhujaḥ || 102 || (tilakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तस्येति स ततः प्रीतिं प्रणयाद्देशिकोऽदिशत् । व्यापृतौ काव्यकेलीनामसमस्य समस्यया ॥ १०३ ॥ tasyeti sa tataḥ prītiṃ praṇayāddeśiko'diśat | vyāpṛtau kāvyakelīnāmasamasya samasyayā || 103 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
एतद्बभ्रुकचानुकारिकिरणं राजद्रुहोऽह्नः शिर-श्छेदाभं वियतः प्रतीचि निपतत्यब्धौ रवेर्मण्डलम् । (इति समस्या) etadbabhrukacānukārikiraṇaṃ rājadruho'hnaḥ śira-śchedābhaṃ viyataḥ pratīci nipatatyabdhau ravermaṇḍalam | (iti samasyā) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अपूपुरत्पुरस्तेषां द्रुतमित्थं स तां सताम् । आरात्रिकमिव भ्रूभिर्वलन्तीभिर्विवृण्वताम् ॥ १०४ ॥ apūpuratpurasteṣāṃ drutamitthaṃ sa tāṃ satām | ārātrikamiva bhrūbhirvalantībhirvivṛṇvatām || 104 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
एषापि द्युरमा प्रियानुगमनं प्रोद्दामकाष्ठोत्थिते सन्ध्याग्नौ विरचय्य तारकमिषाज्जातास्थिशेषस्थितिः ॥ १०५ ॥ (इति समस्यापूरणम्) eṣāpi dyuramā priyānugamanaṃ proddāmakāṣṭhotthite sandhyāgnau viracayya tārakamiṣājjātāsthiśeṣasthitiḥ || 105 || (iti samasyāpūraṇam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
अविस्मृतस्वजननीजनक्षीररसा अपि । बटवो निन्यिरे येन सूक्तिदेवीरसज्ञताम् ॥ १०६ ॥ avismṛtasvajananījanakṣīrarasā api | baṭavo ninyire yena sūktidevīrasajñatām || 106 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
जोगराजमुपाध्यायं ध्यायन्तं शुभमञ्जसा । अथ भक्त्या तमानर्चत्त(र्च त​)त्तच्चर्चाभिरर्चितम् ॥ १०७ ॥ (युगलकम्) jogarājamupādhyāyaṃ dhyāyantaṃ śubhamañjasā | atha bhaktyā tamānarcatta(rca ta)ttaccarcābhirarcitam || 107 || (yugalakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
क्व न यः साधुवादेषु नृत्यद्भिर्दशनांशुभिः । विद्वज्जनेन साम्राज्ये सभ्यानामभ्यषिच्यत ॥ १०८ ॥ kva na yaḥ sādhuvādeṣu nṛtyadbhirdaśanāṃśubhiḥ | vidvajjanena sāmrājye sabhyānāmabhyaṣicyata || 108 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वचोभिर्नुनुदे दन्तद्युतिश्रीखण्डपाण्डुभिः । वादिनां वाददर्पोष्मा येन शूर्पारकाध्वसु ॥ १०९ ॥ vacobhirnunude dantadyutiśrīkhaṇḍapāṇḍubhiḥ | vādināṃ vādadarpoṣmā yena śūrpārakādhvasu || 109 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यं श्रीमदपरादित्य इति दूत्यप्रसिद्धये । प्रजिघाय घनश्लाघः काश्मीरान्कुङ्क(न्कोङ्क)णेश्वरः॥ ११० ॥ yaṃ śrīmadaparāditya iti dūtyaprasiddhaye | prajighāya ghanaślāghaḥ kāśmīrānkuṅka(nkoṅka)ṇeśvaraḥ|| 110 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तेन श्रीतेजकण्ठेन सोत्कण्ठमनुबध्नता । इति सोऽधिकवैशद्यनिरवद्यमगद्यत ॥ १११ ॥ (चक्कलकम् ) tena śrītejakaṇṭhena sotkaṇṭhamanubadhnatā | iti so'dhikavaiśadyaniravadyamagadyata || 111 || (cakkalakam ) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
निष्कल्मषं तवैकस्य श्रीमङ्ख कविताद्भुतम् । स्पृष्टोक्तिर्यस्य नास्तुत्यस्तुतिकीर्तनपाप्मभिः ॥ ११२ ॥ niṣkalmaṣaṃ tavaikasya śrīmaṅkha kavitādbhutam | spṛṣṭoktiryasya nāstutyastutikīrtanapāpmabhiḥ || 112 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
शिक्षन्ते भिक्षितुं सर्वे त्वयैकेन न शिक्षितम् । भिक्षाकतां निराकर्तुमशेषविदुषामपि ॥ ११३ ॥ śikṣante bhikṣituṃ sarve tvayaikena na śikṣitam | bhikṣākatāṃ nirākartumaśeṣaviduṣāmapi || 113 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सम्भेदः श्रीसरस्वत्योः केवलं न विपन्मयम् । त्वं मोहमयमप्याशु मलं कस्य न लुम्पसि ॥ ११४ ॥ sambhedaḥ śrīsarasvatyoḥ kevalaṃ na vipanmayam | tvaṃ mohamayamapyāśu malaṃ kasya na lumpasi || 114 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सा वैदुषी फलं यस्या न परोपकृतेः परम् । शिक्षन्ते जीवनोपायमन्ये वाङ्मयशिल्पिनः ॥ ११५ ॥ sā vaiduṣī phalaṃ yasyā na paropakṛteḥ param | śikṣante jīvanopāyamanye vāṅmayaśilpinaḥ || 115 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नृपचाटुकपाप्मभ्यस्तदित्थं तव यद्यपि । सरस्वती बिभेत्येव दधती शुद्धिसंस्क्रियाम् ॥ ११६ ॥ nṛpacāṭukapāpmabhyastaditthaṃ tava yadyapi | sarasvatī bibhetyeva dadhatī śuddhisaṃskriyām || 116 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तथापि मां गुणनिधे भज क्ष्मापचटूक्तिभिः । पञ्चषाभिः पठित्वा याः सभासूद्रिक्ततामियात् ॥ ११७ ॥ tathāpi māṃ guṇanidhe bhaja kṣmāpacaṭūktibhiḥ | pañcaṣābhiḥ paṭhitvā yāḥ sabhāsūdriktatāmiyāt || 117 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
असावध्यवसायोऽस्मदनुग्रहधिया च ते । न दुष्येत्प्रार्थिताः सन्तः किं न दद्युर्हि याचते ॥ ११८ ॥ asāvadhyavasāyo'smadanugrahadhiyā ca te | na duṣyetprārthitāḥ santaḥ kiṃ na dadyurhi yācate || 118 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्रोत्रशुक्तिपुटेनेति पीत्वा तद्वाक्यविप्रुषः । इमामुदगिरत्सोऽथ सूक्तिमुक्ताफलस्रजम् ॥ ११९ ॥ śrotraśuktipuṭeneti pītvā tadvākyavipruṣaḥ | imāmudagiratso'tha sūktimuktāphalasrajam || 119 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यद्वक्रेण पथा प्रयासि सततं यद्वासि विद्वन्मन-श्चौरी यच्च करोषि पूर्वसुकविप्रौढिप्रथोत्पुंसनम् । तस्माद्भारति सद्भिरत्र भवती तीक्ष्णेति सम्भाविता तूर्णं पार्श्वममुष्य पार्थिवमुनेरभ्येहि शुद्ध्यर्थिनी ॥ १२० ॥ yadvakreṇa pathā prayāsi satataṃ yadvāsi vidvanmana-ścaurī yacca karoṣi pūrvasukaviprauḍhiprathotpuṃsanam | tasmādbhārati sadbhiratra bhavatī tīkṣṇeti sambhāvitā tūrṇaṃ pārśvamamuṣya pārthivamunerabhyehi śuddhyarthinī || 120 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
त्वत्खड्गेन जगत्त्रयैकगुरुणा राजन्गणो विद्विषां सङ्ग्रामेषु पलायनोपनिषदां सिद्धान्तमध्यापितः । उन्मुक्तासमसर्वशास्त्रसरणिः सन्त्यक्तपत्रक्रम-श्चित्रं चिन्तयितुं विविक्तविपिनासङ्गं समाश्लिष्यति ॥ १२१ ॥ tvatkhaḍgena jagattrayaikaguruṇā rājangaṇo vidviṣāṃ saṅgrāmeṣu palāyanopaniṣadāṃ siddhāntamadhyāpitaḥ | unmuktāsamasarvaśāstrasaraṇiḥ santyaktapatrakrama-ścitraṃ cintayituṃ viviktavipināsaṅgaṃ samāśliṣyati || 121 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
व्यथोद्रेकादेका घनरुदितशोणे नृपदृशौ वहन्ते वैराग्यादिव विधृतकाषायवसने । अरण्यान्यामन्यास्त्वदरिवनिता यान्ति विपदं लतानां संसर्गादिव नवजटावल्कलभृतः ॥ १२२ ॥ vyathodrekādekā ghanaruditaśoṇe nṛpadṛśau vahante vairāgyādiva vidhṛtakāṣāyavasane | araṇyānyāmanyāstvadarivanitā yānti vipadaṃ latānāṃ saṃsargādiva navajaṭāvalkalabhṛtaḥ || 122 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वैधव्योपहताः प्रतापतपनप्लुष्यद्वपुष्कान्तयः कान्ताराध्वसु लब्धसाध्वसभुवः प्रत्यर्थिवामभ्रवः । राजन्निर्भरबाष्पवारिविवलन्नेत्रालवालावली-सन्दोहैस्तव वर्धयन्ति विशदस्पन्दां यशःकन्दलीम् ॥ १२३ ॥ vaidhavyopahatāḥ pratāpatapanapluṣyadvapuṣkāntayaḥ kāntārādhvasu labdhasādhvasabhuvaḥ pratyarthivāmabhravaḥ | rājannirbharabāṣpavārivivalannetrālavālāvalī-sandohaistava vardhayanti viśadaspandāṃ yaśaḥkandalīm || 123 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
प्रियान्प्रति मरौ लग्नाः कुर्वते त्वदरिस्त्रियः । सास्रधाराः कराश्लिष्टकुचाः पिण्डोदकक्रियाम् ॥ १२४ ॥ priyānprati marau lagnāḥ kurvate tvadaristriyaḥ | sāsradhārāḥ karāśliṣṭakucāḥ piṇḍodakakriyām || 124 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
भिन्नभ्रूवलनाकुले तरलिते वक्त्रोडुपे सान्द्रया निःश्वासक्रमवात्यया किमपरं भर्तर्यरित्रे हते । राजेन्द्र त्वदरातिचन्द्रवदनालोकस्य शोकाचलो-द्भिन्नास्वश्रुतरङ्गिणीपु कुरुते दृङ्मज्जनोन्मजने ॥ १२५ ॥ bhinnabhrūvalanākule taralite vaktroḍupe sāndrayā niḥśvāsakramavātyayā kimaparaṃ bhartaryaritre hate | rājendra tvadarāticandravadanālokasya śokācalo-dbhinnāsvaśrutaraṅgiṇīpu kurute dṛṅmajjanonmajane || 125 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
त्वद्यात्रासमवेतदुर्धरगतेः सैन्यस्य सम्मर्दतो द्राक्पिष्टेऽपि शिरोगणे गुणयुगं जज्ञे फणाभृत्पतेः । प्रापद्भूपरमाणुभिस्तरलितैः कालुष्यमक्ष्णां न य-द्धृ​द्भङ्गस्य च कारणं यदशृणोन्नो पत्तिकोलाहलम् ॥ १२६ ॥ tvadyātrāsamavetadurdharaṅgateḥ sainyasya sammardato drākpiṣṭe'pi śirogaṇe guṇayugaṃ jajñe phaṇābhṛtpateḥ | prāpadbhūparamāṇubhistaralitaiḥ kāluṣyamakṣṇāṃ na ya- ddhṛdbhaṅgasya ca kāraṇaṃ yadaśṛṇonno pattikolāhalam || 126 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ततो यथार्थनामानं द्विजं वागीश्वराभिधम् । अस्तोष्ट पठितश्लोकमिति श्रीलङ्ककं प्रति ॥ १२७ ॥ tato yathārthanāmānaṃ dvijaṃ vāgīśvarābhidham | astoṣṭa paṭhitaślokamiti śrīlaṅkakaṃ prati || 127 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
त्वयि प्रसन्ने मम किं गुणेन त्वय्यप्रसन्ने मम किं गुणेन । रक्ते विरक्ते च वरेऽङ्गनानां मिथ्यैव नेपथ्यविशेषभङ्गिः ॥ १२८ ॥ tvayi prasanne mama kiṃ guṇena tvayyaprasanne mama kiṃ guṇena | rakte virakte ca vare'ṅganānāṃ mithyaiva nepathyaviśeṣabhaṅgiḥ || 128 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
नेत्रे कवित्वपाण्डित्यमये दधदचार्मणे । योऽक्लेशादखिलं वर्त्म सारस्वतमवैक्षत ॥ १२९ ॥ netre kavitvapāṇḍityamaye dadhadacārmaṇe | yo'kleśādakhilaṃ vartma sārasvatamavaikṣata || 129 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
चरतः पथि शास्त्राणां यस्यासच्चर्मचक्षुषः । देव्याः करावलम्बेन न जातु स्खलितं पदैः ॥ १३० ॥ carataḥ pathi śāstrāṇāṃ yasyāsaccarmacakṣuṣaḥ | devyāḥ karāvalambena na jātu skhalitaṃ padaiḥ || 130 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सकृदाकर्णनघ्रातसमस्तग्रन्थसंसृतेः । इति तस्य पटोः पट्वीं गिरं चिरमचर्चयत् ॥ १३१ ॥ (तिलकम्) sakṛdākarṇanaghrātasamastagranthasaṃsṛteḥ | iti tasya paṭoḥ paṭvīṃ giraṃ ciramacarcayat || 131 || (tilakam) महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तज्ज्ञसूरिकृतप्रीति चारुमन्दारपुष्पवत् । कदा भवन्महाकाव्यं व्योमेवेक्षे ध्रुवस्थिति ॥ १३२ ॥ tajjñasūrikṛtaprīti cārumandārapuṣpavat | kadā bhavanmahākāvyaṃ vyomevekṣe dhruvasthiti || 132 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
ज्यायसो वीक्ष्य विद्वद्भिर्हर्षदामिति पर्षदम् । स तदा सुचिरं दध्रे दृशं कर्णान्तचुम्बिनीम् ॥ १३३ ॥ jyāyaso vīkṣya vidvadbhirharṣadāmiti parṣadam | sa tadā suciraṃ dadhre dṛśaṃ karṇāntacumbinīm || 133 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
विद्वद्वादविधिस्तस्य षट्तर्कीरसजन्मभूः । कर्णयोः षड्रसाहारसिद्ध्यै चिरमकल्पत ॥ १३४ ॥ vidvadvādavidhistasya ṣaṭtarkīrasajanmabhūḥ | karṇayoḥ ṣaḍrasāhārasiddhyai ciramakalpata || 134 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
त्रुट्यद्भिराननपथावसथोक्तिदेवी-हस्ताग्रपुस्तकमुखादिव बन्धसूत्रैः । दन्तांशुभिः प्रसृमरैः पिहिताधरौष्ठः श्रीरुय्यकस्त​मथ स स्वगुरुर्बभाषे ॥ १३५ ॥ truṭyadbhirānanapathāvasathoktidevī- hastāgrapustakamukhādiva bandhasūtraiḥ | dantāṃśubhiḥ prasṛmaraiḥ pihitādharauṣṭhaḥ śrīruyyakastamatha sa svagururbabhāṣe || 135 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आराधिता भगवती भवतैव सत्यं प्राग्जन्मसुव्रतशतोर्मिभिरुक्तिदेवी । यत्नं विनाप्यधिवसन्कविकर्म गर्भं सारस्वतत्वमिव योऽलमभिव्यनक्ति ॥ १३६ ॥ ārādhitā bhagavatī bhavataiva satyaṃ prāgjanmasuvrataśatormibhiruktidevī | yatnaṃ vināpyadhivasankavikarma garbhaṃ sārasvatatvamiva yo'lamabhivyanakti || 136 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यत्काव्यरत्नमुपधातुमिवोपनीय शक्त्या निसर्गविवृतोद्गमयार्पितं ते । तच्छाततां गमितवानसि वर्धमान-व्युत्पत्तिशाणफलकार्पणनैपुणेन ॥ १३७ ॥ yatkāvyaratnamupadhātumivopanīya śaktyā nisargavivṛtodgamayārpitaṃ te | tacchātatāṃ gamitavānasi vardhamāna-vyutpattiśāṇaphalakārpaṇanaipuṇena || 137 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तत्सौष्ठवव्यसनि काव्यकलाशरीरं नो जात्ववद्यमयमामयमभ्युपैति । शक्त्यादयो दधति साम्यगतिं त्रयोऽपि ते यत्र धातव इवाविकृतप्रतिष्ठाः ॥ १३८ ॥ tatsauṣṭhavavyasani kāvyakalāśarīraṃ no jātvavadyamayamāmayamabhyupaiti | śaktyādayo dadhati sāmyagatiṃ trayo'pi te yatra dhātava ivāvikṛtapratiṣṭhāḥ || 138 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
धन्यस्त्वं विनिवेशितैर्बहुतिथैरर्थैः स्थितिं बिभ्रती न क्वापि स्ववपुः प्रसारितवती पण्यत्वसंसिद्धये । सालङ्कारपदाधिकध्वनिजुषा मूर्त्या नरीनर्त्य​सौ शम्भोर्येन पुरोऽर्पिता भगवतो वाग्देवतानर्तकी ॥ १३९ ॥ dhanyastvaṃ viniveśitairbahutithairarthaiḥ sthitiṃ bibhratī na kvāpi svavapuḥ prasāritavatī paṇyatvasaṃsiddhaye | sālaṅkārapadādhikadhvanijuṣā mūrtyā narīnartyasau śambhoryena puro'rpitā bhagavato vāgdevatānartakī || 139 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
यच्छ्रीमङ्खक मुख्यतां गतवता व्युत्पत्तिविच्छित्तिभिः श्रीश्रीकण्ठचरित्रमित्यभिधया काव्यं व्यधायि त्वया । एतस्मिन्सदसि प्रसिद्धविविधोपासीनविद्वद्वरे तत्सन्दर्शय तस्य रोहतुतरां साफल्यतः कल्पता ॥ १४० ॥ yacchrīmaṅkhaka mukhyatāṃ gatavatā vyutpattivicchittibhiḥ śrīśrīkaṇṭhacaritramityabhidhayā kāvyaṃ vyadhāyi tvayā | etasminsadasi prasiddhavividhopāsīnavidvadvare tatsandarśaya tasya rohatutarāṃ sāphalyataḥ kalpatā || 140 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
आरूढां परिपाकवर्त्मनि धुरं तत्तद्रसस्यन्दिनीं निःशेषोऽपि सभाजनोऽयमधिकं श्रद्धानुबन्धातिथिः । वीप्सामूर्धविधूननाकुलतरोत्तंसोत्पलाग्रच्छदै-रुन्मीलद्रसनैरिव श्रुतिपुटैस्त्वद्वाचमाचामतु ॥ १४१ ॥ ārūḍhāṃ paripākavartmani dhuraṃ tattadrasasyandinīṃ niḥśeṣo'pi sabhājano'yamadhikaṃ śraddhānubandhātithiḥ | vīpsāmūrdhavidhūnanākulatarottaṃsotpalāgracchadai-runmīladrasanairiva śrutipuṭaistvadvācamācāmatu || 141 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
श्रुत्वा वाक्यमुदारमाशयविदस्तत्तस्य सम्यग्गुरोः किञ्चिन्यञ्चितकन्धरेण शिरसा स व्यञ्जितप्रश्रयः । वाग्देवीकरिणीविसृत्वरमदस्रोतःकणस्पर्धता-मारूद्वैरिव गृढमक्षरशतैर्व्यस्तारयत्पुस्तकम् ॥ १४२ ॥ śrutvā vākyamudāramāśayavidastattasya samyagguroḥkiñcinyañcitakandhareṇa śirasā sa vyañjitapraśrayaḥ | vāgdevīkariṇīvisṛtvaramadasrotaḥkaṇaspardhatā-mārūdvairiva gṛḍhamakṣaraśatairvyastārayatpustakam || 142 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तद्विस्तार्य च पुस्तकं परिचितं कीर्णैर्वचोदेवता-भूषामेचकमौक्तिकैरिव हठाक्षिप्तेक्षणैरक्षरैः । व्याहारेण हृदन्तरालविहरद्विद्यावधूनूपुर-ध्वानभ्रान्तिकृता ततस्तदपठत्स्वं काव्यमव्याकुलः ॥ १४३ ॥ tadvistārya ca pustakaṃ paricitaṃ kīrṇairvacodevatā-bhūṣāmecakamauktikairiva haṭhākṣiptekṣaṇairakṣaraiḥ | vyāhāreṇa hṛdantarālaviharadvidyāvadhūnūpura-dhvānabhrāntikṛtā tatastadapaṭhatsvaṃ kāvyamavyākulaḥ || 143 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
तत्काव्ये धृतदिव्यवर्त्मनि विशत्यन्तः ससन्तोषता-मश्रान्ताहितमूर्धधूननविधिव्याप्तेरभिव्यञ्जनात् । तेषां तत्र कपोलमूलपुलकव्याजाद्ववाम श्रुति-स्तत्तत्पीतचरान्यकाव्यनिवहव्यक्ताक्षरालीमिव ॥ १४४ ॥ tatkāvye dhṛtadivyavartmani viśatyantaḥ sasantoṣatā-maśrāntāhitamūrdhadhūnanavidhivyāpterabhivyañjanāt | teṣāṃ tatra kapolamūlapulakavyājādvavāma śruti-stattatpītacarānyakāvyanivahavyaktākṣarālīmiva || 144 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
वाग्देवीपदधूलिविप्रुष इव व्यक्ताक्षरश्रेणय-स्तास्तत्काव्यवशंवदाः प्रतिपदं कौतूहलं तेनिरे । याः सद्यः श्रुतिरन्ध्रवर्त्मनि भृता(निभृता)वाप्तप्रवेशा दृशो-रानन्दानुगुणाकणानजनयंस्तेषां सतामश्रुणः ॥ १४५ ॥ vāgdevīpadadhūlivipruṣa iva vyaktākṣaraśreṇaya- stāstatkāvyavaśaṃvadāḥ pratipadaṃ kautūhalaṃ tenire | yāḥ sadyaḥ śrutirandhravartmani bhṛtā(nibhṛtā)vāptapraveśā dṛśo-rānandānuguṇākaṇānajanayaṃsteṣāṃ satāmaśruṇaḥ || 145 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
उद्यद्वैद्युतदीप्तिसोदरसरत्सारस्वतज्योतिषा पूतस्तद्वचसां रसः श्रुतिपुटैः संसत्सदामापपे । तेषामुन्मिषितालसालसगतौ दृक्शुक्तिपङ्क्तौ शनै-रानन्दाश्रुपृषन्मयी तु जघटे मुक्ताफलानां ततिः ॥ १४६ ॥ udyadvaidyutadīptisodarasaratsārasvatajyotiṣā pūtastadvacasāṃ rasaḥ śrutipuṭaiḥ saṃsatsadāmāpape | teṣāmunmiṣitālasālasagatau dṛkśuktipaṅktau śanai-rānandāśrupṛṣanmayī tu jaghaṭe muktāphalānāṃ tatiḥ || 146 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सद्वृत्ताश्च सुसूक्ष्मदर्शनकलायोग्याश्च तत्सूक्तय-स्ताः सिद्धार्थतयैव कस्य न मनो निन्युर्घनस्नेहताम् । आसीना वलमानमूर्धनि तदा तस्मिन्वचोदेवता सच्चक्रे व्यतनिष्ट या बहुमुखश्च्योतद्रसस्रोतसः ॥ १४७॥ sadvṛttāśca susūkṣmadarśanakalāyogyāśca tatsūktaya-stāḥ siddhārthatayaiva kasya na mano ninyurghanasnehatām | āsīnā valamānamūrdhani tadā tasminvacodevatā saccakre vyataniṣṭa yā bahumukhaścyotadrasasrotasaḥ || 147 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
स प्रक्रान्तविचारसूरिदशनज्योत्स्नात्तभस्माप्लुतिः स्वव्याख्येयधुरां महेश्वरकथाबन्धुः प्रबन्धोऽन्वभूत् । सत्कल्लोलविलोलतां त्रिजगतीशंस्यस्य यस्याग्रही- दग्रे वक्रकलातिथेर्बुधजनानन्दाश्रुमन्दाकिनी ॥ १४८ ॥ sa prakrāntavicārasūridaśanajyotsnāttabhasmāplutiḥ svavyākhyeyadhurāṃ maheśvarakathābandhuḥ prabandho'nvabhūt | satkallolavilolatāṃ trijagatīśaṃsyasya yasyāgrahī-dagre vakrakalātitherbudhajanānandāśrumandākinī || 148 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
सारस्वतस्य महसः प्रथमा शिखेव सा मङ्खकस्य ववृते धुरि सूक्तिरेका । दग्धुं मनः खलजनस्य कपोलराग-भङ्ग्या व्यधत्त वचनेष्विव या स्व​​​​मोजः ॥ १४९ ॥ sārasvatasya mahasaḥ prathamā śikheva sā maṅkhakasya vavṛte dhuri sūktirekā | dagdhuṃ manaḥ khalajanasya kapolarāga-bhaṅgyā vyadhatta vacaneṣviva yā svamojaḥ || 149 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इत्यादिभिः प्रकरणैर्बुधसाधुवादा-नादाय चेतसि दधत्परितोषमुद्राम् । तत्काव्यपुस्तकमथार्पयति स्म तस्मै पूजाक्षणे त्रिजगतीगुरवे हराय ॥ १५० ॥ ityādibhiḥ prakaraṇairbudhasādhuvādā-nādāya cetasi dadhatparitoṣamudrām | tatkāvyapustakamathārpayati sma tasmai pūjākṣaṇe trijagatīgurave harāya || 150 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इक्षुक्षीरसधर्मनिर्मलरसस्रोतःसमुल्लासना-दातन्वान इवाधिकाधिकमहास्नानक्रियाप्रक्रियाम् । तेनाग्रे निहितश्चराचरगुरोर्वक्रीभवन्मूर्तिभिः शब्दैरङ्कुरितप्रणाम इव स प्रौढिप्रबन्धोऽधिनोत् ॥ १५१ ॥ ikṣukṣīrasadharmanirmalarasasrotaḥsamullāsanā-dātanvāna ivādhikādhikamahāsnānakriyāprakriyām | tenāgre nihitaścarācaragurorvakrībhavanmūrtibhiḥ śabdairaṅkuritapraṇāma iva sa prauḍhiprabandho'dhinot || 151 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
पितुर्बिभ्राणस्य स्मररिपुपुरीपौरपदवीं नियोगेन स्पप्ने पदमुपगतेन श्रवणयोः । प्रबन्धं सन्धायेत्यधिकविबुधश्लाघ्यनिरघ-क्रमं मङ्खः सौख्यं किमपि हृदये कन्दलयति ॥ १५२ ॥ piturbibhrāṇasya smararipupurīpaurapadavīṃ niyogena spapne padamupagatena śravaṇayoḥ | prabandhaṃ sandhāyetyadhikavibudhaślāghyaniragha-kramaṃ maṅkhaḥ saukhyaṃ kimapi hṛdaye kandalayati || 152 || महेश्वरलोकस्थस्य पितुराज्ञया स्वप्ने श्रुतया विबुधस्तुतं तच्छ्रीकण्ठचरितं काव्यं भगवते निवेद्य स मङ्खको मनसि कमप्यानन्दं प्रकाशयति ॥ Having thus composed this poem - highly acclaimed by poets and scholars for its faultless execution – by the command of his father - a denizen of Shiva’s divine abode - who appeared in his dream, Mankha cherishes a rare contentment in his heart. Devotees worship Shiva by pouring sugarcane juice and milk over his image and prostrating before it (JR).
इति श्रीपण्डितलोलतनयपण्डितनोनराजतनय​श्रीजोनराजकृतया टीकया समेतः श्रीराजानकविश्ववर्तसूनोर्महाकविराजराजानकश्रीमङ्खकस्य कृतौ श्रीकण्ठचरिते महाकाव्ये (ग्रन्थकर्तृकविकालीनकविपण्डितादिवर्णनं नाम​) पञ्चविंशः सर्गः ॥
